2a1(phal chen): ltar 'jig/ rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu skyod cing / byang chub
2a2(phal chen): sems dpa'arnams snying po byang chub la 'khrod do// 'jig rten gyi
2a3(phal chen): khams thams cad snang bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang / 
2b1(phal chen): chub la 'khod do// na sbyong byams cad rab tu myur byed cing / byang chub
2b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khrod do// 'ji garten gyi
2b3(phal chen): khyams tharas cung rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing byang chub
2b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i rje pas snying po byang chub la 'kho // de bzhin gshogs pra
2b5(phal chen): g+hAdz+nyA na seng ge'i khril rnam par lto zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub/ 
3a1(phal chen): la 'khod do// yid na mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing / byang chub
3a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ji ltar 'thun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongasu sten cing
3a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// rdo rje'i snying nge 'iding 'dzin
3a4(phal chen): rjes su rtogs par byed cing / ngang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po dang chub la 'khod do// 
3a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing / bya
3b1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod ngo // dadag gi dge ba'i rtsa dwa'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob
3b2(phal chen): cing / ngang chub sems dpa'o rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa
3b3(phal chen): rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems drapa'i rnams snying po byang chud kyi mchog
3b4(phal chen): la 'khod nas stong / ra rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ bcugadri zhe no// kye rgyal
3b5(phal chen): ba'i sras de la snying po byang chud ma chog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams
3b6(phal chen): thams cad ra bzhugaso pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal
4a1(phal chen): mngon par bstan te/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing / kye ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal
4a2(phal chen): par gyur cig ces gsungs rjod de/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog
4a3(phal chen): la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cang dgongs po dang / byin
4a4(phal chen): gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de/ 'dini ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
4a5(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
4a6(phal chen): 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par
4a7(phal chen): sgrub pa ste/ 'dzin tham cad du byung ches gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras stong po byang chu mchog la 'khong
4b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtsa dang / gel ba dang / sdong po dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yong ko lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag 'a
4b2(phal chen): / 'dzin ngo mtshar rmad du brud pa'i chos bzhi pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting la
4b3(phal chen): de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thaMd las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri ma med cing kun nas swAgal
4b4(phal chen): 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen po kun nas yog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rma du byung pa'i chos drug pa'o// 
4b5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'bod pa'i byang chub semasad pa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba shin tu chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa
4b6(phal chen): mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa bdu 'byung ste/ 'dini ngo mtshar mdu 'thung ba'i chos bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sa das
4b7(phal chen): dpa' rnams ye shes mchog gis semasams kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rma du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa/ 
4b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin du rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting 'dzin de thob ma thag tu rnam pa'i dbyings chad med pa dang / dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas
5a1(phal chen): gnas par 'gyur te/ 'din ngo mtshar na du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sring po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las/ dus thams
5a2(phal chen): yang dag par gzhol zhing / ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
5a3(phal chen): rnams kyi ngo mtshar rma du byung ba'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go// kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnams bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par
5a4(phal chen): mthong nas/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul bston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa na/ 'thab mo dang / g.yul la mos
5a5(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba'i de yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'a dul ba ston to// yid gnyis dang / the tshom du gyur pa'i mi dang / lha rnam
5a6(phal chen): kyi yid gnyis dang / the tshom gcad pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// bdud kyi sde yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// 'thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang / mi rnams kunas bsdu ba dang / kunas 'dus pa'i lha
5a7(phal chen): mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dul ba snyen po byang chub sams dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yong su bstan pa'i phyir 'dud 'dul ba ston to/  ni gzhan pos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul bsten to// phyi ma'i skye bo rnamal snying
5a8(phal chen): ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba snyed ga/ stong po byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi la yong su bstan pa dang / byang chub sed ba bdud kyi lam thad las 'das pa yong su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston no/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis tham smad cing stobs med
5b1(phal chen): par byas pa yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag pa bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// kunas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa dag tu chos nyid rje su 'bras
5b2(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub senga' bdud 'dul ba ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag dbang mngon bla na/ byang chub se ba bdud 'dul ba ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
5b3(phal chen): dwed+hA kun gabye ba'i sdeb mngon par rlob par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub seng ba rnams bdud dang / las dang nyon mongs pa thang las 'das shing / byang chub sanga'i spyod pa thang yongasu rdzogs pa yin/ 
5b4(phal chen): ri hU~Mb sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo tha~Md la rnam par brtse ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byam klas pa thad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i cho Ta thang yang dag par bsags pa yin/ chos
5b5(phal chen): snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thed shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'adz+ra garten gyi khams thang du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thaMd la snyoms pa'i sems dang / dbyangasu ldan pa yin/ byin gyi rlabs
5b6(phal chen): thaMd kyis rab mchog por byin gyi rlabs pa yon/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gsheg ya kyi srung / gsungs dang / thugs ner mi rtog pa thob pa yi/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum nor 'chang rgya ba yin/ 
5b7(phal chen): shin du nar sangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshen pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang
5b8(phal chen): ldan pa yin te// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
6a1(phal chen): rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
6a2(phal chen): ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcur bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rje su bsgrags pa dang / 
6a3(phal chen): bangan pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjesu song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / grags pa med cing blta bar dag
6a4(phal chen): la yo ba med cing / sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang / sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jig rten gyi kham sa thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par ches
6a5(phal chen): ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / tinge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang // legs
6a6(phal chen): par spyad pas bskor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
6a7(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo nga ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang / mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang
6a8(phal chen): zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rna bar 'phrul pa bsam pa ji lta
6b1(phal chen): ba bzhin du sten pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul pa dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyi mi non pa dang / tshigs kyi/ 
6b2(phal chen): dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po nga dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
6b3(phal chen): ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyung la thogs pa med pa dang / mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rdzogs par
6b4(phal chen): mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas/ yo ngas mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar
6b5(phal chen): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bsta na ba dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro
6b6(phal chen): bas 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / 
6b7(phal chen): chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthu phyir mi ldeg par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang sgyur du med pa yongs su brtan pa dang / 
6b8(phal chen): gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sbru ma'i rnam pa lta bur yong su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po ngam pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa'i chos nying du yang dag par bstan pa dang / kun 'byung zhing 'jigs
7a1(phal chen): pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongasu bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ 
7a2(phal chen): dgongs pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang
7a3(phal chen): yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa
7a4(phal chen): med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par rdzog
7a5(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o// don tshad med pa khong du na nga par 'gyur ba'o// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam chen
7a6(phal chen): po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o// sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na
7a7(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi/ 
7a8(phal chen): nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le
7b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ ngan rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgol 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi las thams cad
7b2(phal chen): las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa chos thams cad kyi sgo sdang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang
7b3(phal chen): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di/ rim gror byas te mnyan par bya'o// blangs par bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// yongs su bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos
7b4(phal chen): yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa ra bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
7b5(phal chen): chub dkon pa ma yin no// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgor le 'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos
7b6(phal chen): kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos cing thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chang med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snad pa che
7b7(phal chen): bas rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i bu legs
7b8(phal chen): legs// ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yan tan gyi 'thung gnas don nam
8a1(phal chen): pa gang nami za pa'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag gnal ba/ ye shes kyi sgrol 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / 'an thos dang
8a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
8a3(phal chen): ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod/ chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin du byang ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / mthus mos pa'i chos
8a4(phal chen): kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de/ nged kyis kyang mngon bar bsngags so// de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngagaso// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos
8a5(phal chen): kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir/ nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa
8a6(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su
8a7(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' stsang ba// gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras// gang rnams de dag
8a8(phal chen): sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa// dpe zla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse cig mnyan par byos// gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni
8b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi gnas pa// gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa// de dag 'jig rten
8b2(phal chen): tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya// gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang // gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyug mchog spyod pa
8b3(phal chen): ston pa po// gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba// 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya// gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las
8b4(phal chen): rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa// 'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa ste/ tshogs tha dang mtha' yas rab tu ston// sems bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad sngon byed pa// de dag
8b5(phal chen): yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa badz+ra da par bya// srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen ci nga skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang / 'chi dang mya ngan ngag gis bcos
8b6(phal chen): shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun du gzir mthong nas// de dag thar par bya phyir snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa// de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse cig mnyan par
8b7(phal chen): byos// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen// shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lpags pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba'i chos la
8b8(phal chen): brtson zhing gtang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa// de dag spyod ldan yo rdzas kyi yon tan bstan gyis de dag nyon// gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skem
9a1(phal chen): pa// gang rnams byang chub zhi pa tshol zhing srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang // gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba// byams dang snying rje'i sems
9a2(phal chen): ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya// rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi// de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang // dpe
9a3(phal chen): bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang go// sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos// gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po/ 
9a4(phal chen): 'phel byed kyang // mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi ngaman chos tshol ngoms par long mi 'gyur// 'gro ba kun gnas don dganyer chu klung ye shes mtsha chen shes rab shing sdong ste// smon pa'i
9a5(phal chen): mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin// bya/ mas brgyan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste// ze ba ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang ba lo ma mthag pa
9a6(phal chen): na can// sangs rgyas 'od kyi rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dgar byed pa// de dang de dag pad mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la sdang // sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snang
9a7(phal chen): rje dang ni rtsa ba ste// sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga// bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste// chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul
9a8(phal chen): bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs// rims kyis dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste// dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par
9b1(phal chen): grol ba dge/ stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te// de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed// 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog
9b2(phal chen): dgon nyon mongs mi bzang 'khyams gyur te/ bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gi ta mug mdongs gyur pa// lam ni rab stor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni// lam
9b3(phal chen): gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god// 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nang btab cing // yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dpa/ 
9b4(phal chen): la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba// sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa'i nad pa kun gso zhing // nang rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag
9b5(phal chen): kyang ston// rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston pa// sdig pa spong la dge la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces// rkang gnyis dbang
9b6(phal chen): tho'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba// rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor// tshul khrims lte bcing 'dzin bu khrung brtan pa ye
9b7(phal chen): shes 'ong dang shes rab mtshon// ye shes rno ba'i gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa// chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin// 
9b8(phal chen): 'khor lo mchog rnams bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms// ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan// byang chub yan lag de bzhin bas pa
10a1(phal chen): gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par bka'// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lpags bsam dge/ de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho ma dungs
10a2(phal chen): med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa// bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi skul pa/ 
10a3(phal chen): gang dag de dag nyer phrang shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur// de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltos// lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra
10a4(phal chen): ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan// sangs rgyas chos dang ngag 'du na thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod las bsam pa mi phyed de// ba/ dung dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod
10a5(phal chen): rab brtan pa// de dang nga ngag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar bang ga las bzlog par byed// byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i klog chen rgyu zhing ldog/ thub pa rnams ni rdza
10a6(phal chen): 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog/ tha dad yang dag shes dang tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu'i char 'bebs pa// de dag de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon
10a7(phal chen): bar 'phags// shes rab dga' dang khrel yong dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng // ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo bye dran pa de dag sgo ba yin// bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin du dge ba'i
10a8(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa// srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu stom// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan/ gshog pa
10b1(phal chen): thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yin// ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra// srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan
10b2(phal chen): 'da' ba'i mchog la 'gong // tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes// 'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skam par byed/ 
10b3(phal chen): stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad+mo yong su rgyas byed pa// de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyug mchog 'gro ba kun du 'byung // chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis
10b4(phal chen): bldan mdzes pa ste// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'a dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan// sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston// de dang de dag ye shes rna
10b5(phal chen): ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa namakha'i mtha'// chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan// ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni mig sde chos la dbang chen
10b6(phal chen): sbyar gnas pa// lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste// chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin// srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang
10b7(phal chen): na mongs las las rab 'das kud dbang po// byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos// srid pa gsum po kun du tha dang lus stan chos kyi sbas kyang go byed pa// de dang
10b8(phal chen): de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel// 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang // phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dam
11a1(phal chen): rang tha dad la// chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba// thams cad mkhyen gyi yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang rnam pa
11a2(phal chen): mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba// 'gro ba kun du bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa med pa ste// 'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu
11a3(phal chen): mi gnas pa// de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab na mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra// de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos// chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon
11a4(phal chen): mongs ma ni rab tu sel// de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal// ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu// de dang de dag rin chen 'a
11a5(phal chen): su shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel// de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun du 'joms// de dang de ngag yon tan kun gyi phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes
11a6(phal chen): byed// ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin// de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse// phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig
11a7(phal chen): rten mgo la gnas// de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnams ngag dri ni dri rab zhim// de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'dra dang de dag stobs kyi
11a8(phal chen): bla res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed// ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga'ang dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan snyol// de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba ngan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun du 'phags
11b1(phal chen): gos 'dra de dang ngag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed// theg pa dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin// de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu du
11b2(phal chen): la gnas// de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'// klu'i dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs// de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum par
11b3(phal chen): mtshungs 'dra shin du dkon// dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrugs// mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu'i de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud// de dang de dag sgron ma
11b4(phal chen): lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can thams cad lam yang ston// de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan nged cing lam rgyun rje su 'a gro// de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu
11b5(phal chen): 'gro ba sgrol// gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed// de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bu ra 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god// de dag bskyed
11b6(phal chen): mos tshal gyi dga' ba rtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston// de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa// mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nang zhi byed cing
11b7(phal chen): nyon mongs rab tu sel// sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so// de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel// yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur
11b8(phal chen): gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed// de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra da ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas// de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang
12a1(phal chen): / zhugs// ni bsnyed pa dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la can// de dang dag rang gi ma shes yul dang thams cad ma khyen gyi skyong lul shes// dngang de dag chad med dpung
12a2(phal chen): 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med// de dag le shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes// gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji sed snang yod pa// kun tu gzug
12a3(phal chen): sems gzugs kyi rjesu song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin// gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston// de dag mthun 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam par kun du
12a4(phal chen): brjod par mi nus so// gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing // yong dang med pa'i mdung pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum tsam
12a5(phal chen): thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min/ de dag spyang 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar bya da ba bshad par bya// chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngom pa
12a6(phal chen): dben pa lta bur rab rtogs nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed// sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab snyan pa'i// byang
12a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse cig mnyam pa med pa legs par grags// lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston// sems med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on
12a8(phal chen): kyang 'gro ba kun du de dag ston// khru mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par brjod byed kyang // 'gro ba dag gis sgra skad ji snyed yong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dzang // na mangs chung thung
12b1(phal chen): lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang sbyar te// brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston// de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal na mkha' mtshungs par yang
12b2(phal chen): ngag shes// 'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston// de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthu gnas
12b3(phal chen): pa ji snyed pa// thams cad kun du skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med// rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste// mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus
12b4(phal chen): ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing // me tog dri dang thug pa phye ma sil snyan gdug dang ba ngan rgyal mtshan rnams// thams cad ma byed la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchongad byed
12b5(phal chen): cing // mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'dud byed mchog pa da ma pa kun du ston// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'a khong rgyal ba thams cad kyi// 'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs
12b6(phal chen): med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed// chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting nge 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing // blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med// 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur
12b7(phal chen): rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sbrum lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la stor// sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab
12b8(phal chen): tu ston// 'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med// 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la ngag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba ston// la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha'
13a1(phal chen): las rgya chen dag kyang ston// la lar sbyin dang rdul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams// la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdung kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu
13a2(phal chen): ston// mkhas pa rtog med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston// la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag
13a3(phal chen): tu rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las ldog pa med// de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur// de dag la lar lha'i bu mo brgyas
13a4(phal chen): bskar la lar gcig pu skyed pa ston// la lar dge slong rab tu ni na ying ni la lang rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur// la lar chos kying ga 'jug pa'i ye shes khru mchog gzugs kyang rab tu stom// la la byung
13a5(phal chen): med spu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dkara' thub can du 'gyur// la la ra 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thu ba pa byed// la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe'i sa dpal lar rgan dang byis
13a6(phal chen): par ston// de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur// la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston// la lar mnga' zhugs la lar rnam par sang
13a7(phal chen): rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor// la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob// la lar bud med tshogs kyi dpung gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar pad+mo rab 'byung // la lar khyu mchog byang
13a8(phal chen): chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs// la lar 'khor lo rab tu skor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongasu tshol// la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston
13b1(phal chen): byed kyang // byang chub don du spong pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma yin no// bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyang ga/ khru mchogs pas gcig nang ston sems
13b2(phal chen): gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston// stsogs pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu snyan/ 
13b3(phal chen): gang phyir rgyal ba ces rgyal de dga'i tshe'i phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na// 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul cig steng du mthong // sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi
13b4(phal chen): rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong // de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zang mi 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes/ 
13b5(phal chen): sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yang ba'i rnams// de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dgal rnam pa kun du ston pa byed// bslab pa 'di'i phyogs la pa
13b6(phal chen): rol phyin ta ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed// dbang ba rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba 'ang rab shes nas// 'gro bar bskal pa yong dang bsal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo bsor ba byed/ 
13b7(phal chen): dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang / dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab tu shes// de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs
13b8(phal chen): bag chags rnams kyang shes// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sems spyong nga ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te/ sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yang ma yin// ma nor spyod pa shes
14a1(phal chen): nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed// de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag/ sems gcig la ni khong du rung nas byang chub mchog mkhyen
14a2(phal chen): rnam sangs rgya// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas// sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god// rdzu 'phrul
14a3(phal chen): mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags// sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro/ de ltar ye shes dbang spur 'gro'ong bsal pa
14a4(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig zang byed kyang // swa rbung shin tu phra ba gcig la 'u gas par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med// 'tsho ba'i don du stu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang / sU
14a5(phal chen): makun btsal gzugasu mi dmi gzug yong ma yin par yang dmig sa pa med// de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya cha na sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams// sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig
14a6(phal chen): rten pal chen khyab par byas shing rab tu ston// nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams// ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de de du dang 'dres ma yin// de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i
14a7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams// 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin// la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed// 
14a8(phal chen): lan bye ba khrag khrig mang po thong bar mis kyang mtshan pa ma zang // nga ltar chos cing rang badzin mardungs par rjes rtogs bya ba snga tshogs kun ston te/ gang cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zang byed de dag pa
14b1(phal chen): shes zad mi 'gyur// ri'i dbang po ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra// kun nas sgra'i sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med// de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu
14b2(phal chen): mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag/ rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston// dpyid zla dag mi smig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas// de nas rku
14b3(phal chen): rnyeng mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je som rnam 'phel ba// de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can ngag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba'i rnams// shes pas rtog nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing
14b4(phal chen): bya ba rnam par 'phel// gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog s+ho na te tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'dra// 'du shes thams cad mig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra// sems ni sgyu 'dra
14b5(phal chen): sgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston// de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang sbur dag ni de la gnas pa ma de// skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya
14b6(phal chen): ba kun du 'byin byed dang // khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston// dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston// de ltar
14b7(phal chen): dag chas tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med// 'ong ba med cing phyog su 'gro ba med la rlung du gnas pa med pa yi// nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug bsngal nga lar
14b8(phal chen): lam gsum du// rkyen las rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa po// yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab tu ston// skang cig gcig la dus
15a1(phal chen): / gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston// 'dod dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston pa byed// sdom pa gsum gyi spyang dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa
15a2(phal chen): gsum yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin// khams dang mos pa
15a3(phal chen): ngag nga tsan mongs rnam 'byed kun du 'gro ba thob gyur pa// mig gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag/ sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin du yangs kyang stobs la sa
15a4(phal chen): pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun du mngon sum chos bzhed de// nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med// 'byung ba thus
15a5(phal chen): su chung ba'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad//  'i gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar / nga ba med// 'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang mi mnga'
15a6(phal chen): dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste// mos dang brtson 'grus cing 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams med pa// thams cad mkhyen mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la
15a7(phal chen): mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba// 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med bsnyes pa// chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog/ de dag yon tan mang
15a8(phal chen): ngan gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya// de dag spyong pa bskal pa khrag khrig pag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te// zan kyang jiltar sa las rdul 'ang ye shes spang ba phyags tsam brjod par
15b1(phal chen): bya// sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa'i rnams spyod pa// mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnams gnon cing // tshul khrims mi
15b2(phal chen): g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yong su smin par byed// lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed// sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems
15b3(phal chen): dang zhing la sems pa byed// bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med// gzungs kyi tshul dang yang ngag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal// bstan pa
15b4(phal chen): mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi pa rnam par 'chang yang rgya// sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang ba'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed// sring rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten
15b5(phal chen): byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan// brtson pas pha rol phyi na rtogs rab tu mkhas shing smyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas/ khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub
15b6(phal chen): dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya// mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa// yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyugs mchog tu 'gyur// dbang
15b7(phal chen): la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs// ye shes mchog dang de bzhin gshegs sprul sgrub cing byang chub zhi ba nye bar 'gro/ mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byam
15b8(phal chen): klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs byin rab tu thob// zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa'i rnams// ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi
16a1(phal chen): dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin// snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul lha zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'chang ba / ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pa
16a2(phal chen): phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse// rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra// gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po// 'gro
16a3(phal chen): kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba med// bsam pa shin du shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bas// mkhas pa dag ni ngag ring sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i
16a4(phal chen): ye shes kyis// 'gre ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra// ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan mi za nga ngon du spyod pa chen po spyod// de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje
16a5(phal chen): lnga bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas// shin tu rgya chen rtsam la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub pa med// byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas/ 
16a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zab thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'chang rgya'o// rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pa na// zhing rnams kun dang chog gi yul la rnam par
16a7(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyung la gnas// lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te// 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston// mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul
16a8(phal chen): stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse// khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa med// mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag cha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyi
16b1(phal chen): shin du rgyun// sangs rgyas sras ngag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan// de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin du rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge/ de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis
16b2(phal chen): rlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed// dam pa de dag sems bskyed cig las sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston// rgyal ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas// bsam
16b3(phal chen): pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur// mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston// bag chags thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu
16b4(phal chen): 'dzin// nan tan bya ba 'grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad ma khyen par 'tshang yang rgya// bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob// mkhas pa 'di lam
16b5(phal chen): shin du bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon dar sgo nas grags// mthab yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sleb pa byed// ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams
16b6(phal chen): la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin du ston// spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa lho yin snying po ye shes mchog/ snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin// shes rab mgo sde chos
16b7(phal chen): rtog mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin// tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te// spobs pa lce yon lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes ngam pa yin// spyad
16b8(phal chen): pargyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin// tshangs pa'i lam rnams ngag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo// gang gis de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i sdang babang bar ga
17a1(phal chen): kye ye shes yul// sems can spong la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog sde rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings// sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsres pa med pa'i tshul khrims
17a2(phal chen): dang // bzod pa mi 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang sgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin// rgyu ba me cing na mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren// skye meng snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga'
17a3(phal chen): bzhin mongs gnas las btang yang snyoms// don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos// ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po reg pa ste// 'gro ba rnams la thos pa
17a4(phal chen): ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med// nan ta na byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcang // rgyal ba rnams kyi phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod
17a5(phal chen): pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin// nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spang ste rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed// bdud rnams byi na gyis rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyis rlab
17a6(phal chen): kyis 'phags// chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lnga'i gnas su 'dong // lha rnams byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin du phra bar 'gro// skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan chos
17a7(phal chen): mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor ba byed// mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston// chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan
17a8(phal chen): kyang byed// stong pa stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bskye zhing yang dag bskul ba byed bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sangs rgyas sa yang ra
17b1(phal chen): tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud// gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god/ 
17b2(phal chen): kyang / rnam pa kun du sems can mi gnas chos la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i// de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin du rgya chen mdor bstan to// de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul pa/ 
17b3(phal chen): gis rnam par rtse// zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te// lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la'ang ngal dub gang yang med// mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i
17b4(phal chen): gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med// 'jig rten mkhye na pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa da ga/ kun kyang ba spu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab
17b5(phal chen): tu ston// mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chung rab ston kyang // 'phel zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston// khor yug khrag khrig
17b6(phal chen): shin du phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing // zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed// zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig
17b7(phal chen): byed de// de 'dra'i rje su dang bzang bar gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do// 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang // gang yang nor bu'i 'od me'i 'od bang rnams lha dbang 'ong // mang ba
17b8(phal chen): de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed // 'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston// 'gro ba ma lus sgra'i rnam pa sna tshogs skang rnams thams
18a1(phal chen): cad ji snyed pa// khyu mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sbran pas thams cad tshangs par brjod// srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ 
18a2(phal chen): rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur// gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs skal par sten// gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag
18a3(phal chen): 'das par ston// khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed// 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god// 'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na
18a4(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang sgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston// sprul pa'i byin gyis rlab sa la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems// de snyed
18a5(phal chen): lus rnams rdul dang bral ba sngon kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med// las rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing // brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon pa
18a6(phal chen): rnams dang de bzhin lnga dang mi'i rnams// gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la// sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/ 
18a7(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams// thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston// 'du shes dra ba rnams bsgoms blo ldan 'jig
18a8(phal chen): rten 'du shes rnams la dbang sgyur ba// bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang chub spyod pa ston// de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston// de dag gang la 'jig
18b1(phal chen): rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag bya ba ston// ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed// de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug/ lus
18b2(phal chen): nin mkha' lta bu ngag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso// tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs brgyan// chos kyi go 'phang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen
18b3(phal chen): ba yid bzhin nor bu ste// bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas// pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog/ 
18b4(phal chen): shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin// spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o// thabs la shin du mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de
18b5(phal chen): ngag 'khor los sgyur// stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o// shes rab ral gri yin te dran ba gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mnga' yang yin// 'jig rten
18b6(phal chen): mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng // de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi da pung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms// gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung
18b7(phal chen): ye shes lum shes rab shing // me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan rgyan// stong pa rnam thar brgyan brdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin// thar pa bdud rtsa
18b8(phal chen): bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyi rtse// de dag spyod pa de 'dra ying 'ongs khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang // gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su mi skye bas// ston
19a1(phal chen): / pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god// kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen bcid rgyas byed// zhing rnams rdul gyi 'bru
19a2(phal chen): glags re re nas kyang bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la/ bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang sba yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus sring ngo de// sad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni 'grang tshul shes par nus sring
19a3(phal chen): kyi// sangs rgyas sras rnams spyong pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nuso// gang zhig yon tan rnam ngag 'ong dga'i thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dong dang // gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro batha
19a4(phal chen): byas pa de la dgod par 'dod pa dang // gang zhig bde bar gsheg/ sa pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/ des ni rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i semasu gyis te yon tan bslab par byas/ 
19a5(phal chen): shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// 
19a6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal// skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba'i nang // pho brang brtsegs pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na// byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dang / 
19a7(phal chen): 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang // brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang // chags med dam pa'i
19a8(phal chen): shes dang // me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang // nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang // zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang // dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang // rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang // rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang // byang
19b1(phal chen): nub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dam pa'i ye shes dang // byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal
19b2(phal chen): mtshan dang / dri med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems
19b3(phal chen): dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / 
19b4(phal chen): ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjod dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid
19b5(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / na mkha'i sna nga po dang / pad+mo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po nga nga / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos
19b6(phal chen): mtsha' snying po dang // rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gdug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig dang / rnam par dag pa'i mig
19b7(phal chen): dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang / kun nas blta ba'i mig dang / shin du rnam par blta ba'i mig dang / ud pa la'i mig dang / rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang
19b8(phal chen): chub sems dpa' na mkha'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros cod ngan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs
20a1(phal chen): rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / 
20a2(phal chen): kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa med pa'i cod pan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings
20a3(phal chen): mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug pud
20a4(phal chen): dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug pung dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cang rab tu stogs pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug pung dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ra
20a5(phal chen): tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chan 'brug sgra'i gtsug phung dang / mamakha' dbyings thams cad tha mi dang bar rnam par dmigs pa'i chen min rgyal bas brgyan pa'i gtsug pung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
20a6(phal chen): thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug pung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug pung dang / byang chub sems dpa'
20a7(phal chen): dus gsum gyi ring thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug pung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang / gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / rin po'i che'i 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos
20a8(phal chen): kyi 'od dang / shi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'ong dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / 
20b1(phal chen): mngon par shes pa'i dngal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin pa che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dang la dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems
20b2(phal chen): dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyings dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sa sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun du rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya
20b3(phal chen): mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad
20b4(phal chen): sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / nga chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis la pags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri bos
20b5(phal chen): 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun du snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye shes brgya mchos 'phags
20b6(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i brgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / kun du 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i ral
20b7(phal chen): dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / namakha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 
20b8(phal chen): chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi gam pa'i dbang por
21a1(phal chen): rgyal po dang / khyu mchog dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa med pa'i spa dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi spangab
21a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i sgra dang / na mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongasu skul ba'i sgra dang khyad
21a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / na mkha'i blo dang / dri ma med pa'i blo dang / chags pa med pa'i blo dang / rnam pa
21a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun du snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi byingasu snang ba'i blo dang / de dag las sogs pa byang chub sems
21a5(phal chen): dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun du badz+rabaza' spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'ged pa chags pa med pa'i spyod du
21a6(phal chen): can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba la baspobs pa
21a7(phal chen): med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong ba rgyun mi gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes
21a8(phal chen): snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha ngang pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pas/ brgal ba mtha' yas par shin du ston pa mi zad pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa jil pa bzhin du gzugs
21b1(phal chen): kyi lus yongs su ston pas/ na mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongasu shes pas rab rib med pa/ chos
21b2(phal chen): kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas namakha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyis rang
21b3(phal chen): bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag dag pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chog su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas
21b4(phal chen): sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten pa namakha' ltar zhi ba la rna ma par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tsom dang / nem nur dang yid
21b5(phal chen): gnyis yongasu chud pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde
21b6(phal chen): don du zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs
21b7(phal chen): pa/ sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongasu bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas
21b8(phal chen): kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang
22a1(phal chen): yang thabs gcig go// de ras byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang brngas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang / 'jig rted kyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dga'
22a2(phal chen): swam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs
22a3(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhi/ 
22a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / 
22a5(phal chen): ngang pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bas/ pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa
22a6(phal chen): shing du smon cing / yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa 'am/ khong du chud pa 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ yongasu shes pa 'am/ rnam par rtogs pa'am/ gzung ba 'am/ rnam pa
22a7(phal chen): dpyang pa'am/ rnam par bsgob pa 'am/ rnam par dbye ba'am/ rnam par grol ba 'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol gyi drung du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub
22a8(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang brda' sna chog su gyur pa/ dbang sgyur ba'i sa mazhan pa
22b1(phal chen): gzhan la gnas pa/ dbang po sna tshog su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la
22b2(phal chen): gnas pa chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la/ sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par
22b3(phal chen): bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongasu mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par
22b4(phal chen): bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grangs/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon pa
22b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par stan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongasu dag par mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems
22b6(phal chen): dpa' dbyung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag
22b7(phal chen): par stan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ldam sangag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spos rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi
22b8(phal chen): 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthul yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa lta yang yang dag par
23a1(phal chen): / bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems cadan gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgos yang yang dag par bstan grangs/ ri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa thaMd kyi chos kyi grong khyer la
23a2(phal chen): mdzad pa lnga yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gan su gshegs
23a3(phal chen): shing / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon pazhes pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can tha
23a4(phal chen): kyi bsod nams dang / yod ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lha yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thamasadakyi sems kyi tshul la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs
23a5(phal chen): pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad blta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems
23a6(phal chen): can thams cad la yongasu bstan pa dang / rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis
23a7(phal chen): mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam pa/ 
23a8(phal chen): bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin namakha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan gzum
23b1(phal chen): rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par bzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho 'brang brtsegs pa/ rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus med par yangs
23b2(phal chen): shing / rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyan mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun du bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas chal par gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes
23b3(phal chen): par bkram pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos
23b4(phal chen): shin tu rgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta bab sa dang / pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing / khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad
23b5(phal chen): dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu
23b6(phal chen): bsgreng ba dang / sgo dang / rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis sa'i gzhi stegs bu
23b7(phal chen): brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skas kyi 'phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing / shin du rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ba'i tshal thams cad kyang chu zheng
23b8(phal chen): gab par shin du yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang / chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing
24a1(phal chen): yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang // nor bu rin po tshe grangs med pa'i rabs kun
24a2(phal chen): nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing rta la'i phreng bas mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung chang med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos
24a3(phal chen): kyi chus yongasu gang ba/ rin po sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur lag yas phyogasu 'khyil zhing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangasu sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par
24a4(phal chen): gyur te/ rin po che'i me tog put+tA ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo// rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin du 'phag sa pas mdzes par bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa
24a5(phal chen): brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pas/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan zhing mdzes pa dang nor bu rin
24a6(phal chen): pa che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos thams cad kyi ngang kun nas 'thung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan bdag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i rgyal
24a7(phal chen): mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna
24a8(phal chen): tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bzhin gshegs pa
24b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yi du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngor
24b2(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas brgyan du gyur
24b3(phal chen): pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal gyi namakha'i dbyings thams cad kyang / lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'dze ta'i tshal cing
24b4(phal chen): kyang / spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog/ cing brgyan pa dang / rdzong du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa 'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo brdung ba
24b5(phal chen): dang / dkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sprin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro sman pa 'byung ba sa kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+ma brjod du med pa'i sprin
24b6(phal chen): gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sku
24b7(phal chen): dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs bstan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar
24b8(phal chen): dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje la bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med
25a1(phal chen): pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir
25a2(phal chen): ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dgang po'i tshigs pasam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig
25a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams
25a4(phal chen): cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongasu ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin du phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs
25a5(phal chen): par yongasu ston pa mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de/ bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ yongasu
25a6(phal chen): ston pa mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshes
25a7(phal chen): pa rnams baspu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
25a8(phal chen): rnams ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongasu ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pas/ yongasu
25b1(phal chen): dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam pa'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang / yongasu dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa
25b2(phal chen): dang / shin du sdud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongasu rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
25b3(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho shin du rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa
25b4(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi bkod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yonapar brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi cha/ rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi
25b5(phal chen): sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun du rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang lnga
25b6(phal chen): ldi dang / sem po'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'phrul pa'i sprin dang / na bun gyi char tha cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs
25b7(phal chen): lngar mngon par 'bab pas btsun pa dang / rin pa mthams cad kyi me tog ga dra ba'i sbyin las rin pa cha'i rgyal bar phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun mi 'chang bar rab tu 'bab pa dang / rin po tshe thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / 
25b8(phal chen): ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'o lag na khyer ba/ nam pa'i dbyings kun du rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can/ chu ba 'thon po dang ldan
26a1(phal chen): ba'i be ba la rol mo bkod pa/ kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam patha
26a2(phal chen): ngang pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo ngos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/
