26a3(phal chen): de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
26a4(phal chen): pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam/ gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs
26a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mcho de nas 'phags te/ na mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi
26a6(phal chen): sprin gyi brdzun pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dartse ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bad+ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang / 
26a7(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po'i che'i bdun kyi sprin
26a8(phal chen): gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dngad cing shin du phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan gyi sprin namakha'i dbyings
26b1(phal chen): las byin gyi rlabs pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ongs pas na mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
26b2(phal chen): gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogasu brtan te khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rgyan kun dang ldan zhing / nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i
26b3(phal chen): khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas/ stsal
26b4(phal chen): mo krung bcas te 'khod ngo // lha phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 
26b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thug par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes
26b6(phal chen): bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
26b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lnga ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgya spyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang / dra ba chen pos kun du 'brel bar byin gyis
26b8(phal chen): brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang / lnga
27a1(phal chen): ldi dang se mo de'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi 'phreng bas yongasu gzung bar byin
27a2(phal chen): gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lnga ldis kun nas
27a3(phal chen): yongasu blangs shing bzung bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel par mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams
27a4(phal chen): cang nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang 'phreng ba'i dra bas su na nas 'brel par byin gyi brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham sa cang rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel
27a5(phal chen): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i dra bas yongs su 'azung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cig
27a6(phal chen): mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der ljags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su bstan te/ nor bu rin po
27a7(phal chen): 'gro ba lnga rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas
27a8(phal chen): brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod ngo // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
27b1(phal chen): pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes smon ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dbal
27b2(phal chen): kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyeng dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'al
27b3(phal chen): rgyamacho nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang
27b4(phal chen): bdang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad sras kha dag sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rirab kyi sbyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du meng pa rdum shin du phra bsring kyi rgyas par ba pa dang / rdzas kyi
27b5(phal chen): thams cad bdug ces kha dag dang dumar ldan pa'i rirab kyi smin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phrab srid kyi rnas par dgang ba dang / ngas kyi dbyings thams
27b6(phal chen): spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mngangs 'byung
27b7(phal chen): ba/ sa thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sang+yas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i
27b8(phal chen): rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil de 'khor sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i steng
28a1(phal chen): po la dog sna tshogs can/ bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang pa dang / chos kyi
28a2(phal chen): dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sbyin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par
28a3(phal chen): dgang pa dang / namakha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par
28a4(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa dang sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams ca nga nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma chan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du ma
28a5(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi na mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yos
28a6(phal chen): su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang pa dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po// 
28a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / mi
28a8(phal chen): 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyog su brtan te/ khang pa brtso
28b1(phal chen): pa/ spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa/ mu tig dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ 
28b2(phal chen): rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod ngo // byang phyogs kyi
28b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ rin po che'i gos yongasu snang ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings
28b4(phal chen): nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i
28b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba seng dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gan nga nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'phags te/ na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan
28b6(phal chen): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / namakha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyi brlab pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos/ spos sna tshogs kyis
28b7(phal chen): dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / namakha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 
28b8(phal chen): namakha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gsar gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis rgyan gyis brgyad par byin gyis brlab pa dang // nam pa'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyis sprin gyi
29a1(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyis sna tshogasu gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis
29a2(phal chen): brlab pa dang / nam pa'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas/ nor bu rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongasu rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / rnam pa'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal
29a3(phal chen): po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas
29a4(phal chen): phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongasu rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgya dal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yig par byin gyis
29a5(phal chen): brlab pa byed cing / mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogasu
29a6(phal chen): brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongasu 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri bai DUr+ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su
29a7(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khong ngo // byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
29a8(phal chen): khams kyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa chen po thang du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya
29b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyingasu shin tu 'phrul pa'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
29b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbeng dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i
29b3(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig
29b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad 'dug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 2jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa
29b5(phal chen): brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 
29b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis
29b7(phal chen): kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thang
29b8(phal chen): gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad pad+mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis
30a1(phal chen): brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang
30a2(phal chen): dang shar gyi phyogs mtshamasu brtan te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po
30a3(phal chen): can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi dra bas yongasu brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi nga ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lusu byin gyis brlabs nas/ 
30a4(phal chen): skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod ngo // shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sbyin
30a5(phal chen): bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
30a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil
30a7(phal chen): 'khor gsar gyi kha dog lnga bu'i sprin gyi khadag kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / rnam pa'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam kha'i dbyings
30a8(phal chen): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam pa'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil
30b1(phal chen): 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / rnam pa'i dbyings thams cad pad+ma'i song par 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam pa'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po// rin po che
30b2(phal chen): shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam pa'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis
30b3(phal chen): kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'o kha
30b4(phal chen): ngag lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam kha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / 
30b5(phal chen): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der ljags nas/ com ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang byacas pas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar dang lho'i phyogs
30b6(phal chen): mtsham su brtan te/ rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje'i pad+ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul
30b7(phal chen): nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// lho dang nub kyi byeg
30b8(phal chen): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du meng pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/ 
31a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal
31a2(phal chen): mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsha brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'bar gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mcho de nas 'phaH
31a3(phal chen): te/ ba spu ri bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'ong 'phro ba'i sprin/ nam pa'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'ong 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu
31a4(phal chen): dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba 'i sprin/ na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba/ 
31a5(phal chen): spos dang 'dug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdug pa'i sprin/ namakha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'ong
31a6(phal chen): 'gro ba'i ston/ rnam pa'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / baspu bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba 'ong 'gro ba'i sprin/ namakha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rib tu dgye ba dang / 
31a7(phal chen): baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/ rnam pa'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba sU'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi
31a8(phal chen): snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/ na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus
31b1(phal chen): gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/ na mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
31b2(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshamasu brtan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun du mngon pa
31b3(phal chen): gzhol ba'i thig les chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ 
31b4(phal chen): rin pa che'i rgyal po dzam meng ba'i spong ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin pa che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'jungad pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems
31b5(phal chen): dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khang do// nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi mas rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
31b6(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi sdong po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems
31b7(phal chen): dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ 
31b8(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cang dang / lus thar cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
32a1(phal chen): kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas/ dus gsum du zung ba'i byang chub sem
32a2(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brgyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang rab byang bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thabs cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhi/ 
32a3(phal chen): shegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad sa
32a4(phal chen): dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i/ tshogs kyis gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams
32a5(phal chen): cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzug sa brnyan mang po'i smon kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad
32a6(phal chen): bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du thung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang
32a7(phal chen): dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs
32a8(phal chen): kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po thams cad dang / bsdu'i so thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams dang kyi rnam pa
32b1(phal chen): 'phrul ba'i gzugs par na mang ba'i sngon kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cang
32b2(phal chen): kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du zung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag
32b3(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas skad cig tu na mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
32b4(phal chen): gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'ad sa la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang
32b5(phal chen): ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu ti ga 'ong thub pa med pa'i dra bas yongasu brgyan pa dang / rin po
32b6(phal chen): 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod // 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing
32b7(phal chen): brjod du meng ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
32b8(phal chen): namakha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon
33a1(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi kyil
33a2(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang / sgra dang / dbyangs dang / nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi byang chub
33a3(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / 
33a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa yo ngasu rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i
33a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par
33a6(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub pa'i
33a7(phal chen): snying por rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang / 
33a8(phal chen): ming rgya mtsha'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug snga skrag pa dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi snga rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams
33b1(phal chen): cad khong du chung bar bya ba'i phyir/ smon las ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang / dus dang / thabs dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
33b2(phal chen): gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogasu brtan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
33b3(phal chen): kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan du rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad+mo'i snying po yongasu
33b4(phal chen): gzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal ma chan gyi cod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
33b5(phal chen): lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil po krung bcas te 'khong ngo // ngagi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba srid kyi pha rol gyi 'jig
33b6(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyings kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs
33b7(phal chen): kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil
33b8(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang zhing lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / 
34a1(phal chen): gos dang smang g.yogs thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa tham
34a2(phal chen): cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad na bzhugs pa rnam
34a3(phal chen): kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po dang / baspu'i sgo dang / lus thams cad
34a4(phal chen): dang / yan lag dang / shing lag dang / tshig gi lam dang / gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
34a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongasu bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa yan lag dang zhing lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa da
34a6(phal chen): ldan par sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba
34a7(phal chen): mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongasu tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur
34a8(phal chen): pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongasu tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / 
34b1(phal chen): shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / 
34b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
34b3(phal chen): kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par mnan pa dang / rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po
34b4(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan ba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa
34b5(phal chen): byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyog
34b6(phal chen): su brtan te/ rdo rje dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / in dra ni la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po
34b7(phal chen): thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cong
34b8(phal chen): pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
35a1(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas par/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yod
35a2(phal chen): dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang mang sde'i tshul gyis gsung rgya mtshol rna ba yongasu gzhol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob pa
35a3(phal chen): bya ba la/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong pa/ skad cig skad cig tu yongasu bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus
35a4(phal chen): gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus su mdzan bar 'byung zhing rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig sa
35a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khong su chung par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 'tshwa ba thams cad yong su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la
35a6(phal chen): sdong par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug smra/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu spog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sprul
35a7(phal chen): lnga bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ srid pa'i rgyu du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes pas byung ba/ las dang rnam par smin pa
35a8(phal chen): thams cad gzugs brnyan lnga bu bshes pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad srog rgyu la bur mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa
35b1(phal chen): lta bur khong du chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/ mi zad pa'i
35b2(phal chen): rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos
35b3(phal chen): thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
35b4(phal chen): dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa chos thams cad la ye shes bad+ma bas pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas med pas namakha'i spyod yu
35b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa med pa/ na mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ chos kyi dbyings tha
35b6(phal chen): kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas
35b7(phal chen): byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyu thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongasu ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa
35b8(phal chen): shin tu phra bar rgya chen po yang dag par gzung ba'i ye shes khong du chud pa/ dmigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs
36a1(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu
36a2(phal chen): thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshangad med pa dang ldan
36a3(phal chen): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis/ 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung chen po dang / nam gru dang / rab 'byor
36a4(phal chen): dang / 'gag med dang / mos po dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / byams gang gi bu la sogs pas 'dze ta'i tshal na 'khong bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo // 
36a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs
36a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par sprul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis
36a7(phal chen): mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs
36a8(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogasu 'khod pa dang / 
36b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub
36b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / byang chub sems
36b3(phal chen): dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems
36b4(phal chen): dpa'i yas kyi lus yongasu rlob pa dang / byang nub sa de'i smon lam gyi lus nar dmi la dang / byang nu se de'i gzu kyi lus yo u grung padang byang chubs 'i mtshan phun su cho la lo mu ga padang byang du sa de'i ra kyi kyil 'bro bdog mam lba 'i shod pa dang byang nubs de'i 'od ze kying bra ba tu 'gyed pa dang
36b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa
36b6(phal chen): yang ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs pa'i phyir te/ de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsag so// de dag la ni sngan
36b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa ma mdzad do// 
36b8(phal chen): de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag brjod pa ma mdzad do// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams bla na
37a1(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma bya'o// de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rlung la byang chub tu bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma bya'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdu na
37a2(phal chen): mi 'chang pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin// de dag ni sems can thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma bya'o// de dag gis
37a3(phal chen): ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs pa ma byaso// de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags
37a4(phal chen): pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma bsgrub so// de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par
37a5(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud ngo // de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmig sa par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang
37a6(phal chen): chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba khong du ma chung ngo // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i
37a7(phal chen): shes kyi mig lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs
37a8(phal chen): yongasu 'dzin pa byin gyis rlobs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chung ngo // de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs
37b1(phal chen): pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de mi mthong ngo // mi thos so// ma shes so// khong du mi chung ngo // me tog so// mi ri go// yid mi che'o// mi semaso// rnam par mi blta'o// rtogs par mi blta'o// 
37b2(phal chen): nges par mi blta'o// nye bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i chal de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs
37b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste/ de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba me// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par ma dgo/ dmis
37b4(phal chen): pa chung ngu la rgya chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting 'dzin de lta bu med do// de dag shes pa dang lta ba 'am/ khong du chud pa ra bya ba 'am/ rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dgang bar bya ba 'am/ 
37b5(phal chen): 'jug par bya ba'am/ rnam par blta pa'am/ lasu myong bar bya ba 'am/ gnan pa 'am/ rnam par gnan pa 'am/ gzhan gyis tho sa par bya ba 'am bstan par bya ba 'am/ smos par bya ba 'am/ yang sa
37b6(phal chen): par bstan par bya ba 'am/ bstabs par bya ba 'am/ sbyin par bya ba 'am/ de la sems can rnams yongasu bskul bar bya ba 'am/ sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ rab tu dgod par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i
37b7(phal chen): chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do// de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do// de lta bu khru mchog gi mthu med do// de lta bu'i stobs med do// de lta bu'i dbang med do// de lta bu'i
37b8(phal chen): gnas med do// de lta bu'i 'du shes med do// de lta bu'i mig gi mthu med do// del bu'i ye shes med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongasu grub
38a1(phal chen): pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yong su rdzogs pa/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/ bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu
38a2(phal chen): zhi ba'i mthar thugs pa snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi lta mi sdod pa/ rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la/ bcom
38a3(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang / g.yas g.yon dang snam logs na/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang / 'dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thang
38a4(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams
38a5(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag ma btab pa dang / thang mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cang mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
38a6(phal chen): pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba 'am/ blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sem
38a7(phal chen): dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
38a8(phal chen): par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa'ang mthong ba ma gyur to// de'ang 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gang ga'i chu
38b1(phal chen): klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshu rol du yi dgas bkres pa dang / skom pas rab tu mnar ba gcer ba gos med pa/ lus kyi mdog dang kha dog tshig cing 'chums pa dang / rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/ bya rog mang
38b2(phal chen): pos gtse ba/ smang khyi dang / was thob tsam pa brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang / 'gang ga'i chu klung chen po mi mthong ste/ sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir/ la las ni skams te chu med par mthong ngo // la las
38b3(phal chen): ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling tog gis mig
38b4(phal chen): kun nas khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongasu ma bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta
38b5(phal chen): ste dper na/ 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po dbus su ma la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te log par gyur nas/ de gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du gnas de nyid na/ lha'i grong rdal brgya
38b6(phal chen): byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa/ 
38b7(phal chen): lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang / yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / se mo ngo sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil sran rnam
38b8(phal chen): pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongasu bskyod cing / sgra dbyangs yid du 'ongs la snyan pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i bkod pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la/ lha'i bu mo
39a1(phal chen): mang pos glu blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol ma byas pa'i sgra ming du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur te// bdag nyid kyang den 'dug pa snyam byed la/ lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag
39a2(phal chen): thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye ba'i tshogs mang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khong bzhin du mi mthong mi shes khong du mi rung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni skyes bu gnyid kyi log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin
39a3(phal chen): gyi gnas de nying na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs
39a4(phal chen): rgya chen po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu bas gas pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mdo na bar bsgrubs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams
39a5(phal chen): cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad maphye na pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du
39a6(phal chen): shin tu rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
39a7(phal chen): yongs su non pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med par rnam par spyod pa/ 
39a8(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la/ nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang
39b1(phal chen): bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mig med pas mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can/ sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la/ sngags dang / 
39b2(phal chen): rig sngags dang / sman gyi tshul dang / blang ba'i rgyus shes shing / rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa/ sman blang ba'i las byed kyang / ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i
39b3(phal chen): phyugs dang / ba lang dang / ra lug 'tsho ba dang / sngon pa dang / de ma yin pa'i mi sman gyi tshul mi shes pa bzhin dag gis sman de dag gi cho ga dang / sman gyi ro dang / mthu dang / yon tan dang / byin dang / thabs dang / 'phrong
39b4(phal chen): pa mi shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rna ma par 'phrul pa'i yul gyis byung ba/ de dag gis de bzhin gshe
39b5(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul de dag mthong yang / nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sog/ sa pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos pa
39b6(phal chen): yal bar gzhog pa/ btang snyoms can de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas/ bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las/ phar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par
39b7(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chung par/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/ gter brgya stong du mas gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas
39b8(phal chen): yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang ba'i mi/ rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gi blo shin tu byang ba/ gter gyi gtsug lag dang / rgyus dang / na
40a1(phal chen): rtags kyi nom par lobs pa/ bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis bstan pa dag/ de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing bdag kyang yongs
40a2(phal chen): tshim par byed/ pha dang ma la yang legs par rim gro byed/ bu po smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing / de ma yin pa'i sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang / gos kyis
40a3(phal chen): mi 'byor pa rnams la btud cing khyad par bgo bsha' byed pa/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyamasu myong bar byed kyang sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus mi shes pa/ bsod nams ma byas pa/ rin
40a4(phal chen): po che la shes pa'i mig yongasu ma dag pa/ de dag de nyid na 'khor kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang / rin po che'i gter de ngag khong du mi chung mi shes pas/ rin po che yang blang du med do// rin
40a5(phal chen): po che'i don kyang byar med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de ba zhin gshegs pa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ye she sa kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
40a6(phal chen): shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de dag 'dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/ chos kyi tshul rgya mtshol 'jug cing / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yong su sgrub ste/ 
40a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro la brtson zhing / dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba la mngon par brtson te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongasu sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin
40a8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu yang ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig mig gnyis gos kyis bkab ste/ 
40b1(phal chen): rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mi mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing dang / gos kyi rin
40b2(phal chen): po che dang / spos kyi rin po che dang / rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la/ rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin thang ngam/ yongasu spyad pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rin po
40b3(phal chen): che'i don kyang nyam su myong bar mi byed do// gang gi mig la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing sheso// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis/ bla na
40b4(phal chen): med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa mngon du gyur te/ 'dzi ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing // sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu
40b5(phal chen): ston pa mthong yang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gsheg sa pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag sa
40b6(phal chen): mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar ma gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / chu 'phrul
40b7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rigs pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bkab pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta
40b8(phal chen): bu med do// de dag gis chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chung ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ mig yongasu dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ 
41a1(phal chen): rab rib dang / mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yong de/ de mi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ de rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang / ldan pa'i mig yongasu dag pa dang ldan pas man
41a2(phal chen): mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing mun pa'i rab rib kyis mig yongasu
41a3(phal chen): 'khrigs par gyur pa'i mi'i khrod na 'dug cing / rnam par rgyul phan tshul 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang / mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyad pa de mi
41a4(phal chen): mthong mo shes so// smras bu nges ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen pa/ spyod lam dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs tha dang du mngon par bltas pa/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa/ kha dog gi rnam
41a5(phal chen): patha dad pa/ dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa tham cad kyang mi mthong bam ngo // de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems da 'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mang
41a6(phal chen): ba'i sman dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten thams cad ma khyen cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs
41a7(phal chen): pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ da
41a8(phal chen): slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/ chus khyab pa 'am/ mes khyab pa 'am/ rlung gis khyab pa 'am/ sngon pos khyab pa 'am/ ser po khyab pa
41b1(phal chen): 'am/ dmar pos khyab pa 'am/ dkar pos khyab pa 'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa 'am/ sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa 'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge
41b2(phal chen): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo // me'i snang ba de yang mi mthong ngo // sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis
41b3(phal chen): khyab pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste/ ting 'dzin de la soms par zhugs shing / rnam par spyongad pa rnams ni ma gtog so// de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam
41b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongasu bstan pa mdzad na/ nyan thos chen po nga ngag gis mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dang / 'a de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni// de bzhin
41b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo // khong du chung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sku ba grub pa'i mi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag tu// skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo // des ni 'gro 'am/ 
41b6(phal chen): 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ skye bo mang po thams cad mthong ngo // de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yongasu 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
41b7(phal chen): shes kyi yul du zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma
41b8(phal chen): mthong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ mi'i cher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjesu 'brang ba ni nges mi de mthong yang / mis lta de mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul
42a1(phal chen): la bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus su/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis/ 
42a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong sems thams
42a3(phal chen): cad la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gogs pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis kyang / byang ba gang yang nyam su mi myong ste/ 
42a4(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin la/ 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad gnas den yod kyang / snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs dang mthus des mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
42a5(phal chen): bzhin du/ nyan thos chen po de ngag 'dze ka'i chal de na yang rnam par spyod la/ de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin gan gas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog
42a6(phal chen): gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur/ shes par ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de
42a7(phal chen): ngag kyang khong du ma chung / ma mthong ma shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yangs la chang med de/ blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/ khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thang
42a8(phal chen): las yongs su 'das pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'dus pa'o// de bas na/ nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal du
42b1(phal chen): nying na 'khod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // 'dze ta'i chal 'jig
42b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang / bkod pa yong su 'dus pa yang ma mthong ma shes te/ de ni snong du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
42b3(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi tshong zer rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras pa// lha ma shig sems can dam pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub
42b4(phal chen): bsam mi khyab/ rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba/ 'dze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'di bstan to// rang byung rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs// 'grang du med par 'byung ba la/ sangs rgyas ches tshul mi shes pa'i// 
42b5(phal chen): 'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so// chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul ngag chang med bsam gyis mi khyab cing / shin tu zab pa 'byung ba/ naM/ de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khang sa
42b6(phal chen): mngag mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs// yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa 'i// chos rab de dag mtshan nyid med// rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus med pa/ tshig gi lam gyis brjod dka' ba'i// rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa
42b7(phal chen): ngag rkyal bas 'dze ba'i chal du bstan/ rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams/ zhing rnams bsam las bye ba nas// rdul ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste/ kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la skyes// smon lam yengasu phun sum
42b8(phal chen): tshogs/ spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa// de dag bsam pa shes par na// 'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so// de dag sems dang spyod yul dang / spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang / rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyis
43a1(phal chen): / kyang // rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i rnams// gzhan gyis thub dka' bam med la// dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing // ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa// ting 'dzin dpag tu
43a2(phal chen): chang meng la// grags chen mnyam par bzhag pa rnams// chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rdul
43a3(phal chen): pos// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsod nams snying po shes rab che// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing // 'jig rten kun la ba
43a4(phal chen): byed pa'i/ bang gshegs su las skyes pa ltos/ ying gzungs rbaT sa mtha' yas shing / shin tu mnyam gnag sems ldan pa/ mtha' dang dpung med zab pa yi/ ye shes rgya chen skyong yul can/ dran pa
43a5(phal chen): mang pos mdzes byas pa'i// 'dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba/ byang chub sem sa dpa' kun rgyas shig/ bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur par// gnas med mi gnas gyur pa'i rnams// phyogs rnams btsun
43a6(phal chen): kun 'dus te// pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag/ rgya mtsho mang la lta bgyis// gnas med len pa med pa'i rnams// spros pa med cing mi rten la/ rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa// chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang // ye shes
43a7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba/ rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing / grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la// mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa/ phyogs bcu'i zhing yang bye ba'i rnams// grangs kyis mi chos kun nas 'dus// yang dag sangs rgyas drung
43a8(phal chen): du lags/ gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs// rang byung ba seng ge yi/ rnam par 'phrul ba 'di dag mthong // de yi byin rlabs dam pa yos// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lpags// sangs rgyas chos la 'byed
43b1(phal chen): med// chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te// spyod pa tsam du yongs 'byed pa'o// pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras/ chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pa'i// mtha' la thugs pa de dag gnas// tshig rnams yongasu zad med pas// chos la dbya
43b2(phal chen): ba'ang rab tu byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// ltos shig samra
43b3(phal chen): can dam pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs// dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing // sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// mu stegs ldan pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i// rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sems can
43b4(phal chen): bsam pa ji bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu ston// phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams// sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi bzung / chang med pa dang tshang yod las// thub pa chen po 'angs pa mim/ khril
43b5(phal chen): mkha' las 'gro ba ni/ nyin par 'grangs pa smos pa byed// de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa// dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod// zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags pa
43b6(phal chen): snang / de bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i/ dgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin/ bar snang na mkha'i dbyings 'di las/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rtsu ba ni// gar yang thogs pa med par 'gro/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no// 
43b7(phal chen): ji ltar na mkha' phyogs rnams kyi// zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa/ de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya// ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na/ lus can kun gyi gnas yin pas/ 'jig rten
43b8(phal chen): sgron ma'i 'jig rten na// chos kyi 'khor lo da ltar gnas// ji ltar rlung ni chags med par// mkha' la mgyogs par rab rgyu ba/ de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang // 'jig rten khamasu rab tu rgyu// ji ltar chu'i phung po la
44a1(phal chen): zhing rnams 'grangs pa kun gnas pa/ de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang / ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos sangs
44a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bsdus te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji ltar rdo rje ri rab brag/ zang yag shin tu mtho yod pa// de ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i// sangs rgyas mngon par 'am
44a3(phal chen): pas mtho// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag/ chad med rnyog pa med pa ltar// sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten kun gyi sgom pa gcod// rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi// ri bo ri rab ci 'dra bar// de bzhin 'jig rten
44a4(phal chen): sngon ma yang / chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/ rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis// rgya mtsho rgyas pa ci bzhin du// rang thung ye shes de ba zhin te/ mi zad skad cig rab tu mkhyen// mgon po'i ye shes shin
44a5(phal chen): rgyazag / chang meng de bzhin bgrang du med// de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med ston// sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston ba li/ spu ma khan mkhas pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar sangs rgyas meche/ 
44a6(phal chen): dbang yang / rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa/ bsam ngon rdzogs byed ji lta ba// de bzhin bsam pa dag pa la// rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad/ 'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi rin chen
44a7(phal chen): rnam snang ji lta ba// de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dag/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad/ ji ltar phyogs la mngon lnga pa'i// rin chen zur brkyang rab gnas pa/ de bzhin chags med sgren ma yang // chos dbyings pa
44a8(phal chen): tu snang ba mdzad/ chubadang rin chen 'od gsal ba/ ji ltar dri meng chu'angang byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong ba kyang / 'gro ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su sman lam rab
44b1(phal chen): tu 'phrul ba'i zla ba'i rgyal pos/ sang+yas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// phyogs 'di in dra nI la yis/ kha dog mngag cig byas pa ltar/ sangs rgyas
44b2(phal chen): mthong bas skye dgu rnams// de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston// byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad// de ni smad
44b3(phal chen): zung shin tu zab/ mtha' yas bsgrub pa dka' ba ste/ blo ldan ye shes yul de la/ 'jig rten rnams ni babab mo rus/ byang chub sems dpa' ba spub don du// bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // sangs rgyas tshul gyis
44b4(phal chen): rnam spangs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa son// sangs rgyas zhing rnam sa bsam yas pa/ blo ldan bsor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/ kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang / rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad// chos kun
44b5(phal chen): mnga' sbyar ston pa ste/ shAkya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur// ngo'i tshe 'bru la tshad med pa// 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin// brtan pa'i rtswa/ da pa sna tshogs rnams/ chang meng rnam par gzigs gyur nas/ 
44b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa// tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad// 'jig rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams// chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad// chos rnam thams cad yongs la yang // chags med ye shes spyod
44b7(phal chen): yul 'gyur// skyes bu'i dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis// cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing // 'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang / ye shes
44b8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs sbyangs shing / shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams// 'jig rten thams cad 'grel bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das
45a1(phal chen): kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag smra'o// drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi/ dus gsum 'an thos gang byung ba/ de dag kun gyis bdas
45a2(phal chen): gshegs thabs 'jogs 'degs mi shes// dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi// ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba/ de dag gis kyang mgon po yi// gshegs thabs 'jog 'degs mi rigo/ ma rig mun pas bsgrubs
45a3(phal chen): pa rnams/ khyi ltar ldong la brkus pa yi// sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni/ mgon po mi shes spros mi dgos// rgyal ba tshang mas gnal ba min// de ni shes par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas chags med ye shes can tshig
45a4(phal chen): gi lam las shin tu 'das// zla banya rgyas 'od mnga' ba// brtan pam tshan gyis rnam par bris/ de ni bskal pa dpag yas par/ rnam 'phrul thog ming spyod pa mdzad/ tshul ske ra ras sangs rgyas la/ 
45a5(phal chen): shin tu mnyam bzhag bsams byas kyang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa// brjod du med pazang 'gyur gyi// rang byung rnams kyi yon+ta las// phyogs gcig cha'i mthar mi phyin// sangs rgyas pa
45a6(phal chen): khal bltas kyang // sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig de la smon byed cing // gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa// de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i// spyod yul blta dka' 'thob mi 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes mtha'
45a7(phal chen): yas shing // tshogs chen yangs pas rnam gnon la/ dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa/ de dag 'di'i tshul la 'jug/ de dag smon lam rgya che bas// sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste/ rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing // byang chub
45a8(phal chen): rgya chen gnon par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi kyil 'khor rnam par mthong ba'i ma shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po ga/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bskas pa/  'i ma
45b1(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras// chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas// rang byung rnams ni sku med de// bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' ba// de dag bsam par mi nus so// phrin las dkar po bsam yas pas// sangs rnaMs
45b2(phal chen): sku rab bsgrubs pa'i phyir// de la 'jig rten gsum mi 'gro// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas// 'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te/ ye shes
45b3(phal chen): kun gyi gnas chen no// chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pas// rdul med spros pa mi mnga'o// ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas// 'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra// khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyong bas// srid pa'i 'jigs pa
45b4(phal chen): rnam par gcong / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa mdzad// byang chub 'a byung gnas de bzhin no// kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang / kha dog kun la gnas pa med// sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i/ 
45b5(phal chen): kha dog chang med yongasu ston// skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na/ de'i ye shes mthar phyin par// brtag pas sus kyang mi nuso// ye shes brtan pa zang mi shes
45b6(phal chen): rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med// de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun/ skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod// rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste// shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas// sems la sems shes bya ba
45b7(phal chen): yang // de la sems skye med par bsam/ gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin// shin tu zab pas tshig lam spangs// de nas byang chub sem
45b8(phal chen): dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ rab tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ dran pa rmongs med pas
46a1(phal chen): pa'i rnams// chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing // blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la// byang chub rgya mtsho mi zad pa// de dag yid ni 'di la nges// de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// de dag shes pa 'dir mi
46a2(phal chen): g.yo/ nga dag 'di la the tsom 'chad// de dag skyo bar mi 'gyur te// de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar// de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung // de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing // yang dag 'phags
46a3(phal chen): pa rab tu skye/ dmigs med gnas pa meng pa yi// ye shes 'di la de dag dag la/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa yi// yongasu rdzogs pa dge ba'i chos/ ye shes 'di 'dod mtshungs med pa// de dag thams cad yongasu bsngo/ 
46a4(phal chen): 'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang // 'khor ba dag la gnas pa min// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas// sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse// sems can khams na ji snyed du// 'jig rten phun sum tshogs
46a5(phal chen): rgyu ba// de dag thams cad brtan pas spangs// sangs rgyas phun sum tsho/ gas la gnas// sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang // 'jig rten don meng rab tu gnas// chags med spyod pa de dag ni// rtag tu
46a6(phal chen): sems can don la gnas// de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de// lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas// de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog/ 'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing // byang chub
46a7(phal chen): ye shes rnam dag pas// de dag 'jig rten snang bar gyur// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
46a8(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang / sangs rgyas spa ni rab dkon na// the tsom thams cad gcod pa yi/ dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos/ 
46b1(phal chen): ngas kun thug su rung rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gsum pa'o bsad nams stegs/ sems can thams cad rnam skyong ba'i/ 'jig rten sngon ma mthong gis dga'/ sems can gtso bo ma spang ba'i// gzugs kyi sku ni mthong
46b2(phal chen): gyur na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ ngoms shing tshim pa ster mi gtub// mi'i dbang po'i sku gzugs la// rgyal ba'i sras rnams blta blta zhing / rang gi dge ba chags med pa// gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo
46b3(phal chen): thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku// de las tha dad yang dag shes// chags med ye shes 'byung 'gyur bas// de ni sangs rgyas byang chub spro// sems can bsam yas tshad med pa// snang bas mdzad de theg chen la/ 
46b4(phal chen): bcung nas thub pa chen po'i mchog/ byang chub dam par lung yang ston// bsad nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing // ye shes dkyil 'khor shar cing byung // 'jig rten chang med kun tu snang // bas
46b5(phal chen): rnams phung po rnam 'phel mdza // sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gca pa/ ye shes phung po rnam par spyong / gang gis rgyal ba bsti/ na bkur ba/ de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med// rkang gnyis das
46b6(phal chen): pa mthong gyur na shin tu yangs pa'i sems snan mang snang gsapa 'am mas rab mthu/ grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas skyes bu'i mchog mthong shing / byang chub ma par nges par 'gyur/ de bzhi
46b7(phal chen): par 'gyur bya zhes// de ngag kun kyang ngos par sems// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gan rab tu rtogs pas// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ngo'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag
46b8(phal chen): smras so// yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa/ shAt+ya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas// yongs su bsngo ba byed pa'i sems// theg pa che la rnam par 'dag/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// thugs rje che mnga' brtan
47a1(phal chen): ba'i rnams// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang // sems can don la brtson mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams la
47a2(phal chen): lus can rnams// kun gyis lan glan cis kyang nus// ngan song gsum po mi bzang par// bskal pa bye bar bcos bla yi// chags pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i// ston pa mi mthong ma yin no// sems can kun gyi
47a3(phal chen): rgyud rnams na// sdug bsngal phung po ci yod pa// ma lus nyam su bzod nus kyi// sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na// tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa// de dag yun ring gnas bla yi// 
47a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi thos ma yin no// sems can dmyal ba re rer yang // bskal pa tshad meng gnas bla yi// mtha' yas rgyal ba bsnyes pa yi/ byang chu ba mchog las ring gnas min// ci zhig phyir ni ngan song du// yun
47a5(phal chen): ring gnas par 'dod ce na// rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni// ye shes/ 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir/ rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na// sdug bsngal thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur/ rdzogs
47a6(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi// ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung // sangs rgyas mi yi mchog mthong zhing // sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi// bsod nams tshang med 'phel bar
47a7(phal chen): 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams// the tsom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi// bsam pa'ang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' se
47a8(phal chen): chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'a ting nge bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang / 
47b1(phal chen): char brjod pa dang / gsal bar bya ba dang / rab tu brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang / man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul nam
47b2(phal chen): dbyings dang mnyam pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa
47b3(phal chen): zing dang / sems can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad
47b4(phal chen): kyi dbang po masam bcing kyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin meng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di cing byang chub sems dpa' de ngag la bsan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te/ 
47b5(phal chen): gang shen/ 'dis ste/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i ma ngas rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa bstan pa dang / 'dis so
47b6(phal chen): yang ma dbyings kyis smras pa sangs rgyas mgang thams cad du phyi ma'i dpa'i rgyung thug pa'i bzhal pa sa bzhin gshegs pam yan tan nas su badzang pa bstan pa dang
48a1(phal chen): lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di la
48a2(phal chen): ste/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing / lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la/ sangs
48a3(phal chen): rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ dus gsum gyi
48a4(phal chen): zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phul ba dang / bsal pa rgya mtsho yongasu bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mche thad
48a5(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar bya na gyis brlabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par/ 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
48a6(phal chen): ba'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems pa'i snying po'i rgyan tha mi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis
48a7(phal chen): brlab pa bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po 'ang dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
48a8(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed de// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yulo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po sang
48b1(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du blta zhing / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas
48b2(phal chen): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi
48b3(phal chen): khyab par yang dag par gzhol ba la rnam par bltas nas/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
