48b4(phal chen): pa la rnam par bltas nas mthar dang dbus med pa'i ngag gau lam dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshul thams cad lanam par bltas te/ de tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// bsdu
48b5(phal chen): gcig la rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing // zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam// de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'a khor// kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/ 
48b6(phal chen): spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rnams/ snying po byang chub pad mo'i gdan gnas pas// chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing // shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang // zhing rnams kun
48b7(phal chen): gyi rdul phran rab mang snyeng // rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad// zhing mchog gcig na
48b8(phal chen): rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa// de dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas// rab 'byam zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran
49a1(phal chen): mnyam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od// phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas par kun bkang zhing // ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang // zhing rnams kun tu gzugs
49a2(phal chen): brnyan rab tu ston// chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho// de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong // rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing // byang chub sems
49a3(phal chen): dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te/ chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni// zhing gcig tu 'ang bskal pa bye bar spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa byed// chos kyi gang chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang // smon lam rgya mtsha
49a4(phal chen): kun la rab tu 'jug de dag sangs rgyas sa'i spyod yul gnas/ rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i// de dag kun tu ba zang po'i spyod pa shes/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgyam
49a5(phal chen): dang / rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug/ ba gsheg sa chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing // zhing rnams kun gyirdul phran ji snyed pa'i// sku'i sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdza
49a6(phal chen): cing // chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la gong// / bam po brgyad du ra brgyad pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par
49a7(phal chen): bsgyings pa 'di nyid la/ de bas kyang brnan te/ dgod par mdzad pa'i don du/ rmi mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas/ chos kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pas/ dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
49a8(phal chen): chen po/ 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha~Md kyi sadus kyi zhing 'jam klas pa thams cad snang
49b1(phal chen): ra mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad dang / sangs
49b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par
49b3(phal chen): dag pa dang / gzhi sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin
49b4(phal chen): tu mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'cha nga rgya ba mthong ste/ la lan ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
49b5(phal chen): tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi byings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong ngo // la lan ni lha'i gnas na
49b6(phal chen): 'dug/ la lan ni klu'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni gnod sbyin gyis gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la nA ni na mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug/ la lan ni mi 'am ci'i gnas na 'dug
49b7(phal chen): la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
49b8(phal chen): 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyang lam sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / 
50a1(phal chen): rigs dang rgyud sna tshog su byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
50a2(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / tshig dang / nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur te/ bya
50a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ji skad kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam kha'i mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs bcun rnam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas pas 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya ma
50a4(phal chen): thams cad du gtogs pa/ chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa/ phyag sa kyi ming du bya ba sna tshog su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba/ phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/ phyogs sna
50a5(phal chen): tshogs kyi rjesu song pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshog su gtogs pa/ 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / 
50a6(phal chen): shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / 
50a7(phal chen): sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcung ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang / nam pa'i khong thams cad skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs par
50a8(phal chen): phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs dang / las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongasu grub pa'i phyogs dang / 
50b1(phal chen): skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i namakha'i dbyings kyi ming du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khong su chung ba'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro
50b2(phal chen): ba thams cad tha mi dad pas sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangasu gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam
50b3(phal chen): pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus
50b4(phal chen): la mngon par blta ba dmigs par bya bas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa tha mas cad la ye shes tha mo dang pa/ zhing thams cad la kun tu sngam
50b5(phal chen): pas/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mdza na sum du bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin pa shegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
50b6(phal chen): cad yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa/ de dag thams cad ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ dge ba'i spyod pa bskal pa
50b7(phal chen): mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongasu bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyan pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongasu smin par byas pa ngag go// sngon bla na meng pa yang dag par
50b8(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcud pa dag go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yongasu bsdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba
51a1(phal chen): bskal pa mnyam pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis yongs shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
51a2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing / na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/ la la ni chos kyi sku la
51a3(phal chen): 'jug go// la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go// la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu bsgrub pa 'jug go// la la ri pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa la 'jug go// la la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yang
51a4(phal chen): dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i/ ma par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod
51a5(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya
51a6(phal chen): mtsho la 'jug go// de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho// sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug ste/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / lam sna tshogs dang / 
51a7(phal chen): sgo sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / rjesu 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod sna tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten
51a8(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya ma
51b1(phal chen): de dag la 'jug go// ting 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa
51b2(phal chen): med par yul sdang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gni tha mi dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la
51b3(phal chen): 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tinge 'dzin na mkha'i dbyingasu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
51b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsrings pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi glong gi snying ba
51b5(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cang du thogs pa med par sgra skrag pas rgyas par 'gengs pa 'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings
51b6(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyan pa'i 'od kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go// byang chub sem
51b7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sa
51b8(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub
52a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyis rje su 'jug pa sing rje'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi dragra
52a2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu ni la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tinge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmig su med pas/ kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzu
52a3(phal chen): brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongasu 'du ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 
52a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags
52a5(phal chen): pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tanaH
52a6(phal chen): mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas/ phyi ma'i mthar byin gyi rlob pa dang / byang chub sems
52a7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin
52a8(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho nga ltar byung ba thams cad yongasu dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
52b1(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig la/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub
52b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul ba mngon par bsgrub
52b3(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin
52b4(phal chen): gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas/ khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
52b5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad ngu zhing 'byam pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston pa 'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 
52b6(phal chen): byang chub se de'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang
52b7(phal chen): dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongasu shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems
52b8(phal chen): kyi skad cig la tha mi dang pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi sad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
53a1(phal chen): 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad chos
53a2(phal chen): kyi dbyingasu shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa
53a3(phal chen): thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
53a4(phal chen): tinge 'dzin glong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin chos cig la chos thams cad yongasu 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi
53a5(phal chen): lam la nges pa'i ngag gis tshig rab tu 'byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang ma dzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pargya ma do de dag
53a6(phal chen): la rab tu 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la khong mthar
53a7(phal chen): thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khong du chud
53a8(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun
53b1(phal chen): tu shugs kyis mngon du 'tshar ba'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis
53b2(phal chen): reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du na mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig la 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul
53b3(phal chen): pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od namakha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin
53b4(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad namakhar byin gyis rlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po 'i rgyan rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos thang
53b5(phal chen): kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub sem sa dpa'i ting 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal
53b6(phal chen): gyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin
53b7(phal chen): par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sam
53b8(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge sngar rab tu gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongasu bstan pas/ kun tu rnam
54a1(phal chen): par dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
54a2(phal chen): dus gsum gcig tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas
54a3(phal chen): thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi/ pad mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
54a4(phal chen): 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi na mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin phyogs gcig tu/ phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongasu sdud pa'i klong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
54a5(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams ca nga dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
54a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes pa dang / smon
54a7(phal chen): lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
54a8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan cig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ti
54b1(phal chen): 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis
54b2(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig pas/ chos thams cad tshul gcig par rnam par 'god pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs
54b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongasu bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa byin gyis
54b4(phal chen): rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi ga zhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzi na pad mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par
54b5(phal chen): gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin lus sems can thams
54b6(phal chen): cad la mngon du byin gyis rlobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skang yongasu 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa
54b7(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha mi dad pa'i snying
54b8(phal chen): po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
55a1(phal chen): thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par blta bas seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
55a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go// sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi
55a3(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa yang rje su dran no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan
55a4(phal chen): 'khod pa/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen
55a5(phal chen): po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes/ pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rje su thob pa/ ye shes kyi kun tu rnam par spyod pa/ shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rig su byung ba/ thams
55a6(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig ba rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rje su song
55a7(phal chen): ba rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas
55a8(phal chen): dad pa med par la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/ gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas thams cad la rten pa med par chos thams cad
55b1(phal chen): blangs du mang ba'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu
55b2(phal chen): 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa
55b3(phal chen): mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ tingange 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi
55b4(phal chen): tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ sgra skad dang / 
55b5(phal chen): dbyings thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos tham sa cad mngon par sgrubs pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtog sa pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i smod lam shin tu bsags pa/ ye shes
55b6(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gzugs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ngogs
55b7(phal chen): pa mang par kun nas rab tu gnan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa
55b8(phal chen): la rnam par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin
56a1(phal chen): gting 'dzin gyi pha rol gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la
56a2(phal chen): mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa/ spobs pa'i stobs dang chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyi dag
56a3(phal chen): ba la dga' bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa'i shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i rdul
56a4(phal chen): thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad la dbang po dang / ye shes
56a5(phal chen): kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu sgrol ba la da 'a ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro
56a6(phal chen): ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med pa/ zad pa med pa dang mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ku
56a7(phal chen): gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum can byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/ mi gnyis pa'i ya
56a8(phal chen): kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam
56b1(phal chen): par bral ba/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/ zas pa dang / mthong ba
56b2(phal chen): rang / smon lam ngor yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad char gcod pa la shin tu dpar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi
56b3(phal chen): zhing thams cad du sgra skang dang / dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba gdul ba dang
56b4(phal chen): 'thun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa thogs pa
56b5(phal chen): meng par 'gro ba yams chem mam theg pa'i klu dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thas cad du lus rab tu snang ba/ legs kyikyis 'gro ba thams cad du
56b6(phal chen): shar ba 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ chos thams
56b7(phal chen): cang bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa/ phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongasu bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i rdul
56b8(phal chen): nges par rtogs pa/ don zab pa 'o rig dang yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang yi ge dang don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzungs dang pha
57a1(phal chen): shes kyi lus rgya chen po byon gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par yong su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can/ sems kyi gcig gis bskal pa brjod du med pa
57a2(phal chen): gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa/ chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa
57a3(phal chen): dran zhing spobs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting
57a4(phal chen): nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ chags pa med pa'i ma tha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkha sa pa chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul
57a5(phal chen): pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/ dmigs paHmas cad la rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbying sa phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rje su 'brangs pas rab tu zhugs pa
57a6(phal chen): phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par gzhol ba/ shin tu phra ba ste yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongasu ston
57a7(phal chen): pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
57a8(phal chen): bstod pa/ bsngags pa/ bkur ba/ tshig dang / yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du 'dug ste 'khod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya
57b1(phal chen): mtsho la 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang / byang chub
57b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i stan de dag dang / 'dze ti'i tshal thams cad nas kyang / dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pas/ 
57b3(phal chen): dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to// 'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i
57b4(phal chen): sprin shin tu yangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus
57b5(phal chen): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang leg sa pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rje su bsgrags pas phyog sa bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams cad las 'gro
57b6(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa/ rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjesu sgrog cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems
57b7(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab
57b8(phal chen): tu spags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung
58a1(phal chen): gi dbyangs rje su brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyad pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ 
58a2(phal chen): shing thams cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas skye ba gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i
58a3(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongasu ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams
58a4(phal chen): cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par mthon nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi ngar rab tu 'bebs shing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i
58a5(phal chen): sngon mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems da ba kun tu bzang za' snang ba yang su brjod pa byed cing / bcu rdzas pa tha 'i lazhangs yang su dag parin pa thathams cad kyi
58a6(phal chen): bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de dag la sog
58a7(phal chen): pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i spring/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
58a8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongasu ston pa byed cing / phyogs bcur rnam pa
58b1(phal chen): bsdus nas ngo'i tshe gsu gcang pa 'di dag smras/ 'dra ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs/ mtha' yas rgya chen yongasu zung la bsngos// dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams// mngon par 'thon cing phyogs
58b2(phal chen): rnams kun tu khyab// bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa// stan dang dmigs pa yongasu bcas pa la// de dag thams cad gzugs brgyan byung ba snang // rgyan rnam
58b3(phal chen): sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phro'i spron/ bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las// sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing // zhing rnams kun gyi dbyingasu khyab par 'phro// tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzug
58b4(phal chen): 'dra lus rnams dang / spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzug/ sa// zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te// bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong // kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras/ 
58b5(phal chen): mngan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/ grangs med bsam yas bde bshegs pa spu las/ sprul pa de'i dra thogs pa med par 'byung // bde gshegs sras po dus gsum
58b6(phal chen): zung ba'i rnams// yon tan rgya mdo'i legs pa brjod pa dag/ brgya mdo che mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun// 'dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod// phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las// rgya ma
58b7(phal chen): chen po sna tshogs ma lus par// 'dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi// gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grags/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam
58b8(phal chen): 'phrul pa/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul sring de dag kyang / sa so dmigs kyis dmigs par gyur pa snang / sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin// sU rtse re rer sna chags rnams bye ba'i/ sa sa
59a1(phal chen): rgyas gnas rnams skad cig rje rer snang // de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs// 'gro dang ma'am par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sems can thabs kyis yongasu smin par byed/ 
59a2(phal chen): ngag 'od las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang // me tog phal chen rgya mtsho sprin kyang 'byung // mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang // ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa// de dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun khyab
59a3(phal chen): byed// zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no// dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i rnams tshul du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i// rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad
59a4(phal chen): med pa// phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams// bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa// de dag kun kyang 'dze ta'i chags tshal gyi/ bar snang mkha' la gzugs garnyan tshul du snang // de nas
59a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyis rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang // swA nga rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
59a6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / yongasu bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi/ ba spu'i sgo re re nas
59a7(phal chen): kyang 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur te/ 'od zer dag gi sgo re re nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul pa'i sprin// 'jig rten gyi dbang po thang
59a8(phal chen): dang 'dra ba'i lus dang // 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par blta ba'i lus dang // sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang // 'phrod pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te// mngon par 'thon nas
59b1(phal chen): kyang // phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas// sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yong su smin par bya ba dang // gdul ba byed do// lnga'i gnas nas shi 'phos pa yongasu ma ma
59b2(phal chen): tshul 'ja sa chos kya na bri 'khong mos su badran pa'i spong nga// / rmi lam yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongasu bsdu/ 
59b3(phal chen): ba byed do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu bskyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin
59b4(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub ba'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sa/ 
59b5(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin payongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / 
59b6(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ chos kyi tshig
59b7(phal chen): dang / yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongasu dri ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji
59b8(phal chen): ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i
60a1(phal chen): sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang phas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongasu bstan pa'i
60a2(phal chen): sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan
60a3(phal chen): pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs
60a4(phal chen): pa dang bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing mkhas pa ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongasu bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la sogs pa'i sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thab
60a5(phal chen): dang / bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnasu phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas
60a6(phal chen): su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni klu'i gan su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnasu phyin par snang ngo // la la ni dri za'i gan su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lha ma yin gyi gan su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni nam pa
60a7(phal chen): lding gi gnasu phyin par gnang ngo // la la ni mi 'am ci'i gan su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lto phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gan su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni mo'i
60a8(phal chen): gnasu phyin par snang ngo // la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni yid dgas kyi gnas thams cad du phyin par snang ngo // la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin
60b1(phal chen): bar snang // la la ni yi dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste/ mthong bas 'dul ba'i sem mongs dul rje 'du sa 'du pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'dul ba dang / ming gi chu klung
60b2(phal chen): gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul
60b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang / smon lam tha mi dad pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa dang / sems can yongasu bsdu ba tha mi dad pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par
60b4(phal chen): 'phrul ba'i rgyan pa sna tshogs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa byed par snang yang / de bzhin
60b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo ste/ la la ni rang ga~M gnas dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / stan dang 'khor du bcas pas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin ga
60b6(phal chen): pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo'o// la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang / la la ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i don tu gcig pu gnyi su med par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
60b7(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yo'o// la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang / la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs
60b8(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mi g.yo'o// la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la la ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byang dang / cho ga dang / chu zheng gi gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i
61a1(phal chen): / gzugs/ la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs/ la la ni than pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lnga khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugasu gra
61a2(phal chen): dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjesu 'brang zhing / ming dang / gzugs dang / lus mngon par bsgrub pa
61a3(phal chen): tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang / dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang / dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skang rnam pa tha dad pa dang / smang las rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pas/ byang chub sems dpa
61a4(phal chen): spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa ba rjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi
61a5(phal chen): rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'ong dang ldan pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pasar ba tu spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos
61a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas
61a7(phal chen): ngag tu phyin par snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las/ bskal pa 'thun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin
61a8(phal chen): 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje ngag dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyam blta ba la brtson zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi rig su gtogs pa'i lha dag
61b1(phal chen): dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis rje su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i ri su gtogs pa'i lha dang / chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha ngag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lum dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u
61b2(phal chen): dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha ngag dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i
61b3(phal chen): phyogs kyi lha dag dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi
61b4(phal chen): na mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i na mkha'i lha dang / 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen mtsho'i lha ngag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags
61b5(phal chen): pa la brtson zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa'i sem sa dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha
61b6(phal chen): khog dang / byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongasu bskyang par brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong
61b7(phal chen): khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dang / sems can thams cad yongasu bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po ngas 'ang / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya
61b8(phal chen): ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i
62a1(phal chen): smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i na mkha' lding gi dbang po ngag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongasu bsgrub par smon lam yongasu bskyed
62a2(phal chen): pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing / lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i ying dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha
62a3(phal chen): dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po ngag dang / lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i
62a4(phal chen): rnam par rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogasu bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnams pa du mas mchod de/ bcom
62a5(phal chen): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/ lho phyogs log su yul rgyu zhing song ngo //  rdza cu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan
62a6(phal chen): ba sha radwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas 'dze ti 'tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs log su 'gro ba mthong nas de 'a
62a7(phal chen): snyam du gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom
62a8(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsuM
62b1(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der/ dge slong ldan cig tu spyong pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa gsar du zhugs pa sha stags
62b2(phal chen): 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang / kun tu khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag spyod pa dang / lha'i dpal dang / dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs
62b3(phal chen): pa'i dam pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la sogs dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur pa/ ngang pa'i mig yongasu dag
62b4(phal chen): pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongasu spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par blta ba la mthu yod pa/ chos kyi nga za cing dang rang ba zhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la phan pa
62b5(phal chen): gyur pa'i blo can de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa sa 'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te/ sngor du ba
62b6(phal chen): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ de ltar lam du zhugs te/ 'dod pa'i tshe/ dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa/ 
62b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'dzum dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing yongasu dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang
62b8(phal chen): su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongasu skyed pa dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi
63a1(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan 'gron lam mig mangs ri su gnas pa dang / lam rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon
63a2(phal chen): par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par 'thon pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu 'thun pas
63a3(phal chen): shing gi bseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mngon mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs bcu nas de bzhin
63a4(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces/ de dag la sogs pa tshe dang
63a5(phal chen): ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs ba'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag dge slong de dag la mo ngasu bstan to// brjod do// bshad do// smos so// bkrol lo// 
63a6(phal chen): rab tu brjod do// rnam par phye'o// bstsal bar byas so// de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par dag par
63a7(phal chen): gyur to// rab tu dang par gyur to// dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// mos pa skyes par gyur to// de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to// dbang po rab tu dang par gyur to// yid bde ba
63a8(phal chen): rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// yid mi bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur to// sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to// slob pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to// sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par
63b1(phal chen): gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongasu dag par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i ngang pa'i shugs skyes par gyur to// snying rje chen po
63b2(phal chen): 'byung bar gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to// snying rje chen po yongasu skyes par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongasu snang bar gyur to// de ltar de dag thams cad
63b3(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer te/ mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dge slong
63b4(phal chen): de dag dang 'grogs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na der song nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
63b5(phal chen): nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ba'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par/ glang po'i lta stangs kyis gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de'i rjes la
63b6(phal chen): dge slong de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i
63b7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs
63b8(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra bar te/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog shig/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang
64a1(phal chen): khyod ji lta ba bzhin du thob par shog shig ces/ dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// dag
64a2(phal chen): slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo// theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi/ de bzhin ga
64a3(phal chen): pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la sogs yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed
64a4(phal chen): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing // yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / bya
64a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa la yongasu mi skyo ba'i
64a6(phal chen): sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongasu
64a7(phal chen): dag par bya ba la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa
64a8(phal chen): thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas/ 
64b1(phal chen): sems can gcig yong su smin par bya ba'i tshul du/ sems can thams cad yong su smin par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongasu bsgrub pa la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems
64b2(phal chen): bskyed pa'o// dge slong dag yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi du ma/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yong su 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
64b3(phal chen): 'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las yongasu 'da' bar 'gyur ro// 
64b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smor lam la yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
64b5(phal chen): yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par
64b6(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdud dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongasu gnon par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro// 
64b7(phal chen): nas dge slong dag gis/ chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gis yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha'
64b8(phal chen): yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de
65a1(phal chen): dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su
65a2(phal chen): mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ra rdul shin tu phra ba ji srid yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to// sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang longs spyod de dag kyang
65a3(phal chen): mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to// chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang ming dang brdas yongasu shes par
65a4(phal chen): gyur to// sems can de dag gi sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur to// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tsher bas bcu yang rje su dran par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
65a5(phal chen): gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phru la ba mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 
65a6(phal chen): bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rje su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad pa yang dag par
65a7(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// ti nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu/ byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yong su rdzogs par gyur to// tinge 'dzin stong phrag
65a8(phal chen): bcu yang yongasu non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang dag par gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis/ byang
65b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar mngon par shes pa'i mi gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyes pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal
65b2(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas de dag smon
65b3(phal chen): lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur to// de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongasu dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to// lus rnam dag pas
65b4(phal chen): lus yang rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgong dag shin tu yangs par byed pas/ mi nyams shing rje su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa
65b5(phal chen): rab tu thob par gyur to// mngon par shes pa de dag thob pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yeng su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs
65b6(phal chen): bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par sgrub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
65b7(phal chen): bkang nas/ mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing lde phyogs logs skyid pa'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logasu song ste phyin nas/ grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs legs
65b8(phal chen): mnags tshal chen po su la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa'i chod rten/ sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs
66a1(phal chen): pazhing mtha' yas par ming gi snga rje su grags pa/ sngan chad bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongasu btang bar dga' bdu ma yong su btang ste/ sa'i phyogs
66a2(phal chen): ngan lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod
66a3(phal chen): pa dang / 'khor dang bcas te byin nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to// de bstan pa'i tshe/ 
66a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mes par gyur
66a5(phal chen): nas klu'i rgyung rnam par bzlog ste/ lha dang mir skye ba yong su 'dzin pa ra gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// chos de bstan pa'i tshe/ 
66a6(phal chen): sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par dul bar gyur to// de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sgyid
66a7(phal chen): ba'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal du phyin te/ sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi mchod rten gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/ dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes chen po las sogs pa/ dge bsnyen pa dang dge bsnyen
66a8(phal chen): ma dang / khye'u dang bu mo mang po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas te/ skying pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de la dge
66b1(phal chen): bsnyen shes rab chen po ni/ dge bsnyen bzang pos byin/ lhas byin dang / bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang / grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba dga' bo dang / blo gros bzang po dang / 
66b2(phal chen): gros chen po dang / sgra gcan bzang po dang / dge bser bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 
66b3(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig du 'khod // de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab
66b4(phal chen): chen po no/ dge bsnyen ma'ang bzang mo dang / lus bzang ma dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'ang dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mong / 
66b5(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa dge bsred ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi
66b6(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhor nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod // de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ni tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang / tshul
66b7(phal chen): khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo bzang po dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon
66b8(phal chen): gyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing bdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang
67a1(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod // de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bza
67a2(phal chen): me mo bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / dpal bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byid pa dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'ong bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor
67a3(phal chen): bdud du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bas
67a4(phal chen): ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pas skying po'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag 'dus te 'khod
67a5(phal chen): par shes nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyis zil gyis gnan te/ byams pa chen po'i byin gyis sim par byas nas/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par
67a6(phal chen): sgrub te/ ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la blta so// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
67a7(phal chen): shes bya ba/ ci'i phyir nor bzang shes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang shes bya ba/ thog ma ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu/ khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thor
67a8(phal chen): par gyur to// rin pa che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yong de/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / a sma gar ba dang / mu sa ra gal pa dang / rin po
67b1(phal chen): chede bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang / gter de dag nas skyes te sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur to// de yan lag dang zhing la gnyis thams cad yong su rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu lon nas
67b2(phal chen): bcas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang / rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i stengs nas mngon par 'phags te/ snang bar byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to// khyim
67b3(phal chen): der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snong lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang / sbrang rtsi'i snod dang / mar bsar gyi sdong dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs pa
67b4(phal chen): kyis yongasu gang ba dag te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang spos kyi snong gos sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang / man shel gyi snod kha zas dang spyan gzigs snga
67b5(phal chen): tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongasu gang ba dang / nor bu'i sgo nga rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang / gser gyi snong dngul sil mas yongasu gang ba dang / dngul gyi snang
67b6(phal chen): gser phyes yongs su grang ba dang / phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai dUr+yas yongasu gang ba dang / shel gyi snong mu sa ra gal bas yongasu gang ba dang / mu sa ra gal ba'i snod rin pa cha shel gyis long
67b7(phal chen): su gang ba dang / a sma gar ba'i sdong mu tig dmar pos yongasu gang ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i snod a sma gar bas yongasu ga ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod/ nor bu ri/ 
67b8(phal chen): po che chu 'dang gis yongasu gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'ang gi snod/ nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis yongasu gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga brgya 'thon par
68a1(phal chen): gyur to// tshong dpor gyi bu nor bzangs de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang / bang ba dang / mdzod thams cad du nor dang 'bru dang / dbyigs dang / gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon pa
68a2(phal chen): bab par gyur to// de la bram ze'i bltas pa dang / pha dang ma dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di bcas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bzangs nor bzangs shes de ltar ming du
68a3(phal chen): btags te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzangs de ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rje su 'brang ba'i bsam pa can no// 
68a4(phal chen): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongasu sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos
68a5(phal chen): kyi snod du gyur pa'o// bsam pa'i na mkha' yongasu dag pa'o// byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongasu rdzogs pa'o//  nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
68a6(phal chen): la bltas te/ dga' ba'i gtam byas nas/ de la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing 'thob par bya ba las kyang brtsam/ 
68a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
68a8(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyan las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan
68b1(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongasu grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams/ 
68b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/ chos kyang bstan par gyur to// de nas 'jam
68b3(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dang / skye ba'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang 'thun pa'i gtam gyis bstan te/ yang dag par skul nas spro ba bskyed de dga' bar byas
68b4(phal chen): nas/ bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems pa skyed du bcud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam
68b5(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas byin gyis brlabs te/ bde ba ra byas nas de nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sa kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las/ rnam pa de lta bu'i
68b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas/ phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chag su bcang de mngon par bston
68b7(phal chen): / blo gros chen po mtha' yas spyod yul can/ khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slang du// bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/ de la nges pa gang mchis bdag la gsen// dga' ba'i chus bkang
68b8(phal chen): 'obs kyis kun nas bskor// nga rgyal dreg pa'i ra ba mtho bar brtsegs// sems can lam brgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdangs/ de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che// de ni gti mug ma rigs
69a1(phal chen): gzings pas khebs/ 'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs// rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du gyur// de la byis pa mi rig rten kyang 'chal// srid pa'i sprog dang zhags pas
69a2(phal chen): shin tu glags// g.yo dang sgra yi skyon gyis tho brtsams shing // the tsom yid gnyis ngag gis mig mdongs pa// log pa phyin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs// pra dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings/ 
69a3(phal chen): yi dgas byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu// rga shi nang dang skye bas rab tu mnar// mgo rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor// de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i// dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od zer snang ba
69a4(phal chen): mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho skam par shar te 'phags// nyi ma 'dra bas pa dag la snang ba mdzod// byams pa bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzo gas shing nya/ bsod nams zla 'od bde ba'i gzer 'gyed pa/ 
69a5(phal chen): sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyis// zla ba nya ba lta bus pa gasnang mdzod// dkar mthu thams cad yongs bsags bsgo ra mnga' shing // chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa mi mnga'
69a6(phal chen): ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas// rgyal por gyur pas bdag la bstan du gsol// byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthur mnga' ste// bsod nams ye shes shin tu yang bsags shing // sems
69a7(phal chen): can kun la phan pa'i don bzhugs pa'i// ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol// bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te// ye shes bshan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas/ bdud kyi dmag
69a8(phal chen): dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar// dpa' ba chen pos bdag gi sel yang mdzod// chos kyi ri rab spo la brtan bzhugs shing // ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor// nyon mongs sgra gcan
69b1(phal chen): lha min 'dul mdzad pa// brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigasu gsol// byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa na// nyon mongs las rnams par bsal ba mkhyen// rgyu yis dang lam rgyud 'khor rmong
69b2(phal chen): par// me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol// ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing // bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam sbyong ba/ 'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das// bdag
69b3(phal chen): la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol// rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan// log 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis bcang gyur gyis// bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas// thar sgo bdag la'ang
69b4(phal chen): myur du dbye bar gsol// yang dag log pa'i lam la mkhas gyur ci nga // lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bsnyengs mi mnga'// lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chung pa/ bdag la byang chub shul
69b5(phal chen): ni bstan tu gsol// yang dag lnga ba'i sa'i thab la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyis bskrun// sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa/ byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan
69b6(phal chen): tu gsol// rgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnams dang // da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa// sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs// de yang lam ston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol/ 
69b7(phal chen): las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa/ chos thag shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor ma khyen gyur cing / ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa/ byang chub theg pa bdag la bshang du gsol// mos shing smon
69b8(phal chen): pa'i 'khor lo'o mu khyud can// bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing rten// ngang pa'i gnya' shing rin chen legs spras pa'i// byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// gzungs rnams kun gyis rnam
70a1(phal chen): dag dkyil 'khor can// byams pa brtsegs pa'i dgab pas rab brgyan pa/ tha dad yang dag shes pa'i dril 'phreng can// theg mchog bzang pos bdag la bstung du gsol// tshangs pa'i
70a2(phal chen): spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par rgyan// ting nge 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu/ chos kyi rnga'i dbyangs chen rab bsgrags pa/ theg pa'i dam pas bdag la bltab su gsol// bsdu ba bzhi'i mi zad mdzad
70a3(phal chen): ldan pa/ ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gis brgyan// khrel yong dul ba'i 'breng bas mchog bsdams pa'i// theg pa'i dam pas bdag la bstabasu gsol// sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can// tshul
70a4(phal chen): khrims tsan dan snying rje'i byug ldan zhing // bzod pa'i gzer gyis mtshams rnams ngam sbyar ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la myur du bdag bzhag gsol// sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa/ bsam
70a5(phal chen): gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthong sbron cing // shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor 'thun 'gro rgyu ba'i// chos kyi theg pa mchog la bdag bzhag gsol// smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba/ 
70a6(phal chen): chos kyi gzugs ngam mthu brtan che ldan zhing // ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas pa'i// chos kyi theg pa de la bdag bskyon gsol// kun tu bzangs po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing // sems
70a7(phal chen): can lta bas rgyal mthogs med pa// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon 'gyur ba'i// ye shes theg pas bdag la bstung du gsol// de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa/ ye shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs la
70a8(phal chen): byas shing / spobs dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa yi// bzang po'i thig la bdag kyang bskyon par gsol// 'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pa/ sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing / 
70b1(phal chen): chos dbyings shin tu rgya can rnam snang ba'i// byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsal// sdug bsngal phung po rab 'gyur gtsang byed pa/ nyon mongs las kyi rdul mang skyong sel cing / bdud dang phas kyi rgol
70b2(phal chen): kun 'jom pa'o// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes rab snang ba/ chos dbyings na mkha' rnam par grub byed cing // sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing // chos
70b3(phal chen): kyi thegs la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa/ sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing // sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon
70b4(phal chen): du gsol// rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas// smon lam mthu yis 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing // zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ sa
70b5(phal chen): chan gzhi'i stobs kyi stobs ldan pa// snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing // ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho ba'i / theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// nyi ma lta bu
70b6(phal chen): 'gro ba nyer 'tshe zhing // bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can// gzungs kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzangs pa'i// ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan tu gsol// bskal pa mang po du mar rab bas
70b7(phal chen): ba' rgyu'i tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa/ gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i// shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la sul du gsol// sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum
70b8(phal chen): gyis// ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la/ tshangad med rgya mtsho'i blo mangs bslabs gyur pa// de legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol// gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs
71a1(phal chen): shing // ye shes rgyal po'i cod par legs brgyan te// chos kyi dbu thod dam pas dbu bcings pa'i// chos kyi rgyal po'i phro brang bdag kyang ston// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// glang
71a2(phal chen): po'i lta stangs kyis bltas te// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// dge ba'i bshes
71a3(phal chen): gnyen gyi rje su 'brang zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongasu rdzogs par 'dod de// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dri bar bsam pa leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes
71a4(phal chen): gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang // rim gror bya ba 'di ni tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu grub par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te/ 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod
71a5(phal chen): kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur bas yongasu ma skyo bar gyis ni ga/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa la bslab par
71a6(phal chen): bgyid/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams par bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar byang
71a7(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su rdzogs par bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyang bar bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
71a8(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes
71b1(phal chen): 'brang bar bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas par bgyi/ ji ltar byang
71b2(phal chen): dub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan tu gsol// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigasu bcad
71b3(phal chen): de smras pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams gangs chen mtsho// de ltar khyod ni nga'i drung du nyer phyin te// snying rje'i snying rtse rgya chen gyi// yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol ba legs// 'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du// spyod pa
71b4(phal chen): mtshungs med don du smon lam rab 'debs shing // 'gro ba kun gyi skabs 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di yi na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i rnams// 'khor ba'i nang
