71b5(phal chen): na smyo med yid kyis spyod byed pa/ de dag kun tu bzang po yi// spyod pa thub med chags med 'thob par 'gyur// bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal// de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po
71b6(phal chen): spyod pa la// 'gro la phan phyir smon byed pa// bsod nams rgya mtsho dge gzhi dag pa'i mtshan// mtha' dang dbus med tshad med pa'i// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur// dran pa'i
71b7(phal chen): mthu dang stobs kyis kyang // de dag chos kyi sprin kyang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur// de ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang // byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir
71b8(phal chen): de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho dag byed 'gyur// 'jig rten gtso la slob byed cing // gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni bcar byas shing / 'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa// de dag kun kyang
72a1(phal chen): thams cad gzigs par 'gyur// khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu// bskal mang zhing rdul snyeng du kun tu bzang po yi// spyod pa'i dam pa spang byas shing // byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob
72a2(phal chen): par 'gyur// zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa/ ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par gyis// kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir// smon lam rgya chen yongasu rdzogs par byos// khyod kyi smon
72a3(phal chen): lam thos gyur nas/ sems can khrag khrig dga' ba yongs skyes gyur cing // kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 
72a4(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzang po la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskrad cing / 
72a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu btsal bar sems dpa' la gso lag so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i
72a6(phal chen): sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni
72a7(phal chen): ches dkon no// rigs kyi bu de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs pa thob par
72a8(phal chen): gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongasu brtsal ba la yongasu skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen blta ba la ngoms pa med par gyis shig/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis
72b1(phal chen): bstan pa la 'thun par 'dzin par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di shing na/ yul mi mo gya rol mchog
72b2(phal chen): ces bya ba yod de/ de na mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa/ de la dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
72b3(phal chen): la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya ba dang / ji
72b4(phal chen): lngar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yong su dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar rje su 'brang bar bya ba
72b5(phal chen): dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris
72b6(phal chen): shig dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyed la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes
72b7(phal chen): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lar brgya stong du mar
72b8(phal chen): phyir bltas te/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod de gdong mchi mas gang bar du zhing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
73a1(phal chen): drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis yul mi ma gya nom mchog ces bya ba der song ste/ phyin nas yul mi mo gya nom mchog nas rnam par nus
73a2(phal chen): te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen byin gyis brlabs pa'i longs spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongasu spyod cing / ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ mgul legs pa'i
73a3(phal chen): ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol zhing shar phyogs log su byung ngo // de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi
73a4(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtsham su'ang 'byung ste/ bla 'og tu 'ang lta zhing / dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol ba las// des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse
73a5(phal chen): gcig cig sman ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi
73a6(phal chen): dpal la g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pas thug su chud par mdzad du gsol// bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
73a7(phal chen): tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams pa dang / ji ltar byang
73a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu spyod rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar yong su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
73b1(phal chen): rjesu 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'a
73b2(phal chen): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjesu ston pa mdzad ces thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang
73b3(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
73b4(phal chen): bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dri ba leg/ se leg so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
73b5(phal chen): pa yongasu btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongasu btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam
73b6(phal chen): par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub pa rnam par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang / 
73b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjesu 'brang
73b8(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yong su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pas mo gro
74a1(phal chen): pa'i rgyud yongasu btsal ba 'di ni da ka'o// shin tu dka'o// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis/ mig gi blo gros dang / dang pa'i mig rnam par dag pas/ kun tu mngon par
74a2(phal chen): blta ba'i ye shes kyi 'o snang ba phyin phyogs med pa dang / yul kun la thogs pa med cing bsgrubs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun nas yong su dag pa'i lus
74a3(phal chen): rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyis 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis/ 
74a4(phal chen): phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad kun nas mngon du gzigs pa'i de ba zhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas gnyis dang / 
74a5(phal chen): bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas stong dang / sa sa rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas
74a6(phal chen): bye ba brgya brag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa chang med pa dpag tu med pa/ grangs mang pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu
74a7(phal chen): mtha' yas pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin
74a8(phal chen): gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong
74b1(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gas
74b2(phal chen): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
74b3(phal chen): bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi
74b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi shing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
74b5(phal chen): ba snyeng dag kyang mthong ste/ shar phyogs logs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs
74b6(phal chen): mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub kyang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa cig kyang mthong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi
74b7(phal chen): shing brjod du med pa'i yang brjid du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba steng dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer rnam par bltas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs
74b8(phal chen): sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga'
75a1(phal chen): bdang / 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sku
75a2(phal chen): tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa
75a3(phal chen): sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo // de ltar rigs kyi bu khro bos ni sgo kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol
75a4(phal chen): ba'i sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub seMs dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs
75a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing dang / pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par ma thong bas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo nas kun nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta
75a6(phal chen): ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin sa
75a7(phal chen): pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjesu 'brang bas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo stobs kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
75a8(phal chen): kyi sku'i sprin la blta bas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'jug pas/ 
75b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la rab tu phra bar dmi/ 
75b2(phal chen): shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang mi 'bral
75b3(phal chen): bas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo bskal par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang / mi 'bral bas sangs rgyas
75b4(phal chen): rjesu dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas/ mngon par phags shing / zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu
75b5(phal chen): mthong zhing rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i shing du spro gtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gis
75b6(phal chen): dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo dus gsum du spro gtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas
75b7(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo dmigs par sgro gtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skad cig gcig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams
75b8(phal chen): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas spro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis nyin cig tu gnas
76a1(phal chen): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo 'bral bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis
76a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo shin tu yangs pa
76a3(phal chen): sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro btags pa rab tu
76a4(phal chen): thob pa dang / skang cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'chang rgya zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par migs pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo rgyan tu sgra
76a5(phal chen): btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes snga nga ba rab tu thob pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i
76a6(phal chen): sgo dgos par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / rang gi sems dang bsam pa la bltas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu snang ba thob pas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo sems kyis spro bta
76a7(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi las rnam pa ji lta bur bsregs pa'i gzugs brnyan yongasu ston pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i sgo las kyi sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa
76a8(phal chen): dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i tshal gyis rgyas par/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs pas gang gis sangs rgyas
76b1(phal chen): rjesu dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrog pas chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' kun tu snang bas/ gang gis
76b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sgo na mkhas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re sa na/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs kyi ljongs rgya
76b3(phal chen): mtsho'o sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i smon ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan
76b4(phal chen): tan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu dge ba'i gshes gnyen de khrod la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang / rgyu yongasu ston par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyis rgya chen po yang khong du chud par byed do// dge ba'i
76b5(phal chen): rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs rgya chen po yang yongasu skyed par byed do// byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang rgyu rgya chen po yang yod su rjod par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang / 
76b6(phal chen): sdang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po yang skyed par byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po yang rab tu rtog par byed do// spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po yang rab tu rjod
76b7(phal chen): par 'gyur ro// smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yang yongasu spong bar 'gyur ro// sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje'i chen po'i stobs rgya chen po yang
76b8(phal chen): yongasu 'phel bar byed do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
77a1(phal chen): phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu thab pa
77a2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de rje su bsam pa dang / ye shes snang ba rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad
77a3(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de rje su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de blta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon par mos par bya ba dang / 
77a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjesu bsam pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de rjesu dran par bya
77a5(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi na mkha' de la rje su blta bar bya ba byed cing mthar gyis phyogs kyis ljongs rgya mtsho
77a6(phal chen): sgo gang na ba dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i'o sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtshor smon la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
77a7(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa
77a8(phal chen): zhugs te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal na/ ji ltar bya chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su 'grub par 'gyur/ 
77b1(phal chen): ba dang / 'khar ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byis pas sa'i spro ba'i sa las kun du 'phags par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su
77b2(phal chen): 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing / 
77b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jom zhing / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu
77b4(phal chen): ston pa dang / sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongasu skams shing snying rje chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing
77b5(phal chen): mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byed pa dang / khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing / thams ca nga mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang / 
77b6(phal chen): yo byad thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i smon lam yongasu skyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to// de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu no
77b7(phal chen): bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubatu sems bskyed pa legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can
77b8(phal chen): rnams ni/ byang chub tu sems kyang mi skye'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob dang / thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar gyur pa dang / 
78a1(phal chen): bsod nams rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa dang / dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongasu
78a2(phal chen): skyo ba med pa dang / lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mthon dman med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis snying
78a3(phal chen): rje zhing byams par sems pa dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang
78a4(phal chen): chub tu sems skye ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir/ khya
78a5(phal chen): pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ bde ba'i sems dang / ming ge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa
78a6(phal chen): phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang
78a7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang / namakha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin
78a8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ dri ma med pa'i sems dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par
78b1(phal chen): dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo 'dar
78b2(phal chen): lo bcu gnyi su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/ mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshang med pa rje su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / bags kyis
78b3(phal chen): gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang / chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 
78b4(phal chen): 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / sprir chen po'i char yongasu 'dzin pa dang / gang zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su
78b5(phal chen): sems pa byed cing gnas gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bo sa 'di snyam du bsam so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'ang
78b6(phal chen): bas kyang yangs shing / 'di bas kyang tshad med la 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/ de de ltar kho bos tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la mcho
78b7(phal chen): bar gnas pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las pad ma chen po nor bu rin po che in dra nI la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya dam pa'i rgyan dang
78b8(phal chen): ldan pa/ 'jam bu chu klung gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can/ dus dang 'thun pa'i can dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che a sma gar ba'i ze ba can/ rgya mtsho tsam du
79a1(phal chen): yangs shing rgya che ga lnga ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdong ba'i lhun nas bzung ba rin po che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yogs pa/ klu'i dbang po brtsa
79a2(phal chen): stong phrag bcus spos chu'i char mngon par phab pa/ na mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya phrag bcus/ rin po che'i lnga ldi dang / sen mo do mang po mchus gzung zhing rab tu sbyangs pa/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong
79a3(phal chen): phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcu 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa/ srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod
79a4(phal chen): pa dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs srun pas bstod cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcu swa lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / sbas dang / phreng ba dang / 'dug spos dang / 
79a5(phal chen): drug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal maHna dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa/ nges pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos btugs te/ 
79a6(phal chen): phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba mi'i dbang po 'khor los sbyor ba brgya phrag bcus rin po sna bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par
79a7(phal chen): mchod pa/ brgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'thon cing phyag bya ba/ nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngang brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod
79a8(phal chen): nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus 'khos su khebs par 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che/ 
79b1(phal chen): dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa/ nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i ru
79b2(phal chen): klung brgya stong phrag bcus yong su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa/ nar bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po chenyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus
79b3(phal chen): rgya cher gsal ba bsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshog su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang / 'od 'bar bar
79b4(phal chen): byas pa byung ste/ pad mtshan po ngan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongasu brtan pa'o// phyogs
79b5(phal chen): thams cad du mngon par dmig su yong pa'o// sgyu ma'i rnam par chos kyis byung ba'o// rjen pa'i dri med pa'i las kyis byung ba 'o// nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o// rmi lam
79b6(phal chen): lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongasu byung ba'o// mngon par 'du bya ba meng po'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o// chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o// phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
79b7(phal chen): 'gengs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang 'thun pa ste/ de'i rnam pa dang yon tan dang dbyibs dang / kha dog dang / rgyan gyi mthar phyin par ni/ bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par
79b8(phal chen): mi nus te/ pang mtshan po nga yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing / yongasu rgyas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sku de yang 'di nas bzung ba nas/ srid pa'i rtse
80a1(phal chen): mo'i bar gyi mthas klas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab
80a2(phal chen): pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu
80a3(phal chen): mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong pa
80a4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa
80a5(phal chen): yang thos so// stobs tshang med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rma bsnyengs pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab par nga/ tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon
80a6(phal chen): bar bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su shes so// sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rje su dran no// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
80a7(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo // chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yongasu bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang / rgyan
80a8(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang thos so// g.yas g.yon gyi sku'i rnam par chad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don dang / dgos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu grub par gyur pa
80b1(phal chen): yang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang / phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing / kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs kun ras mig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul byang
80b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang / rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing snang bar byed pa
80b3(phal chen): zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang / rnam pa thams cad rnam par dag pas yongasu snang ba/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
80b4(phal chen): rab tu 'joms pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
80b5(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'o 'khor lo'i rgyud dang mthu snang bar byed pa yang dag par bstan te/ kho bos kyang kun nas mig gi chos
80b6(phal chen): kyi rnam grangs de blangs so// bzung ngo // spel to// bsam so// de ltar bzung ba de la yang brin ni snag cha rgya mtsho chen po'i'o chu'i phung po tsam dang / spyi gu'i phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur
80b7(phal chen): kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de las le'u re re dang / skor re dang / chos kyi tshul re re dang / chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba re re las kyang zad pa 'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ mthar thug pa 'am/ 
80b8(phal chen): mtha' zad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gis lo bcu gnyis chang par chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig cing yang thos pa
81a1(phal chen): 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du rung ngo // zhi ba'i sgo'o gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la zhugs so// glong mtha' yas
81a2(phal chen): ba'i gzugs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go// sa la rnam par dpyod cing rje su rtogs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam
81a3(phal chen): par bsgoms te rnam par dbye ba byas so// gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongasu blang so// pad mo'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs
81a4(phal chen): med pa zhig mngon par bsgrubs so// dbyangs kyi tshul gyi ga/ zungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par bshad do// namakha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas
81a5(phal chen): le'u grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye'o// skar ma brtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byas so// rgya mtsho'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'ong
81a6(phal chen): snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongasu bkod do// kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs nas/ lha dang lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu dang klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ dri za
81a7(phal chen): dang dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ na mkha' lding dang na mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci dang mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye
81a8(phal chen): chen po'i dbang po 'am/ mi dang mi'i dbang po 'am / tshangs pa 'am tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems
81b1(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab tu bkang cing bcung ngo // de dag kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byas so// rtog tu
81b2(phal chen): bcung ngo // yongasu bstan to// yang dag par brjod do// yongasu gsal bar byas so// rnam par phye'o// rgyas par byas so// mngon par bstan to// rnam par bkrol lo// rab tu phye'o// shin tu snang bar byas so// 
81b3(phal chen): ltar shar phyogs la ci lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'o phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / 
81b4(phal chen): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang tha'i phyogs nas/ sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ kun la yang snga ma bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kha bas
81b5(phal chen): ni chos kyi rnam grangs gcig cig yas par zad na/ byang chu ba sems dpa' smon lam yongasu dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa
81b6(phal chen): dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa rgyun mi gcang ba'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rje su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams
81b7(phal chen): cad la zhugs pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongasu bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i dus
81b8(phal chen): las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad
82a1(phal chen): la zhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho dad
82a2(phal chen): la zhugs pa dang / nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i skad rgya mtsho thams cad la
82a3(phal chen): zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag chang drug cu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na/ lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes
82a4(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi sa/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' byang dub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyang bar bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong
82a5(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi nga pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho sprin la lan brgya stong du par g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas yang
82a6(phal chen): dang yang bltas te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de dang / kun nas mig gis chos kyi rnam grangs de yang rjes
82a7(phal chen): dran par byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rje su bsam pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongasu bzungs pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug
82a8(phal chen): par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul de la'ang rje su rnam par blta ba dang / chos kyi le'u dang / glong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi namakha' de la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / chos kyi
82b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor de yang rjes su sbyang bar bya ba dang / chos rin po che'i gling de yang rje su sems shing mthar gyis lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa
82b2(phal chen): mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyog su bltaso// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
82b3(phal chen): dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / bla dang 'og tu yang dge slong shin tu bstan pa mthong bar dga' ste kun tu bltas pa dang / des dge slong shin tu brtan pa na mkha'i dbyings la lnga brgya stong grangs med
82b4(phal chen): bas yongasu bskor cing phan tshun 'chag pa mthong ngo // na mkha'i dbyings de yang lha'i dbang po rnams kyis/ dge slong shin tu ba snyan pa la mchod pa'i lasu bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sil
82b5(phal chen): ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi spa dang / dar gyi ba ngan grangs med pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ brgyan par mthong ngo // klu'i dbang po rnams kyis na mkha' de la/ 
82b6(phal chen): a ka ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin tu mtho ba las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo // mo 'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis na mkha' de la lha rdzas kyi ngag stan
82b7(phal chen): ba'i rgyud kyis stong pa'i rol mo brdung pa dang dkrol ba dang / glur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad sbyar cing blangs pa thos par gyur to// lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis na mkha' de la gos shin
82b8(phal chen): tu phra zhing mdzag shin tu phra zhing mdog bzang ba'i smon bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag ying dgar bas bkye ste/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la dad cing mos pa'i gzugasu phyung ba mthong ngo // lha ma yin
83a1(phal chen): gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang na mkha' de la/ nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ldan par byas pa
83a2(phal chen): mthong ngo // na mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po yang mi'i gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibasu 'khod cing / namakha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos kun nas bskor te bsod pa med la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te/ gnas
83a3(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang na mkha' de la shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugasu/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams
83a4(phal chen): pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khor ba mthong ngo // srin po'i dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang / namakha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa yongasu srung ba byed cing
83a5(phal chen): kun tu rtsu ba mthong ngo // tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang namakha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rgyud kyis bstod pa rab tu
83a6(phal chen): brjod pa mthong ngo // gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang na mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i la su bya ba'i phyir/ thal mo sbyar cing gzhal mang khang nas
83a7(phal chen): gnas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong shin tu brtan pa de ltar na mkha'i dbyings la 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing
83a8(phal chen): yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
83b1(phal chen): na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas
83b2(phal chen): kyi chos yongasu bsdu bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsten par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang
83b3(phal chen): chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rje su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu brtul bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas
83b4(phal chen): kyi chos yongasu bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dbas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bya/ nga chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyangs
83b5(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rje su bstan
83b6(phal chen): pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang bskol bar mi 'gyur
83b7(phal chen): ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi
83b8(phal chen): 'bral ba dang / ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongasu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sam
84a1(phal chen): dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas yongasu mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba
84a2(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu dag par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam
84a3(phal chen): par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul pa lta bus/ srid pa'i
84a4(phal chen): rgyud thams cad du skye zhing shi 'pho ba'i skye mched rang gi lu sa kyis nyam su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'dus byas kyi gan sa dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
84a5(phal chen): chos kyi sprin yong su gzung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjesu 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ ye shes snang ba dang mi
84a6(phal chen): 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong shin tu brtan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag
84a7(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dang rang byung gi chos 'dri ba legaso lag so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
84a8(phal chen): par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo thob pa med ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo de kho bos blangs te/ yongasu bzung nas rjes su 'brang zhing rnam
84b1(phal chen): par dbye ba dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / rnam par brtag pa dang / snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byas pas thogs pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba thob bo// de thob pas kho bos ni sem
84b2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / shi 'pho yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran par bya ba'i
84b3(phal chen): sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'grogs par bya ba la thogs pa med do// nga ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rig par bya ba la
84b4(phal chen): thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi sgra skang dang kun rdzob yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems ca na thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par bya ba la thogs pa mang ngo // 
84b5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad yongasu ni/ na par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus su 'gro bar bya ba la thog
84b6(phal chen): pa med do// nyin mtshan dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa mang ngo do// dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rlung du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// 
84b7(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang par bya ba la thogs pa med do// de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob par phyin te
84b8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu dngos po meng pa la gnas shing / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul de'i byin gyis/ kho bo rnam pa'i dbyings 'di las phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang / bsres pa dang
85a1(phal chen): smod lam sna tshog su spyod ngo do// ma snang bar byed do// snang bar 'byung ngo // du ba 'thul bar byed do// me lce 'bar bar byed do// gcig tu byas shing mang por skur ro// mang por byas shing
85a2(phal chen): gcig tu bskur ro// snang ba dang mi snang ba 'ang nyams su myong bar byed do// rtsig pa la'ang thags thogs med pa dang / ra ba la thags thogs med par 'gro ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// na mkha'
85a3(phal chen): la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na/ mdab chags bya bzhin no// sa la yang byi'u zul dang steng du 'byung ba byed de/ dper na/ chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la d+ya
85a4(phal chen): ba bzhin no// du ba 'thul ba dang / me lce 'bar bar byed de/ da ra na/ me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// sa yang yongasu g.yos par byed do// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar mthu
85a5(phal chen): tshal/ de ltar gzi brjid che yang lags pas kun nas yongasu zhug go// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu'ang lus kyis da bang sbyar ro// 'jig rten na spos kyi dung pa na bun du chags pa
85a6(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byas shing rab tu 'bar bar byed do// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun nas khebs par byas shing / 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sprul
85a7(phal chen): pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed do// kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i sprin rab tu bkye zhing / phyogs kun tu'ang 'gro ste/ 'di ltar shar phyog su'ang 'gro'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byung
85a8(phal chen): phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyog su 'ang 'gro'o// samra
85b1(phal chen): kyi skad cig re re yang / shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'anga'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
85b2(phal chen): stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
85b3(phal chen): bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams chad med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par/ 
85b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kha mas mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / 
85b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sa mtshams med pa dang / 'jig rten khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten/ 
85b6(phal chen): kyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dang de dag dang / 
85b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yong su 'du ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dang
85b8(phal chen): ngag dang / 'jig rten gyi khamasu bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rte gyi ngas kyi sgo de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal par bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'jug pa de
86a1(phal chen): de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji skad cis
86a2(phal chen): chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
86a3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o// de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / phye ma tham
86a4(phal chen): cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / na bza' thams cad dang / rgyal ma chan thams cad dang / lha'i ba ngan thams cad dang / tha re thams ca nga dang / dra ba thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad kyi mchod
86a5(phal chen): pa rgyun ma chad par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa dang bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bshad pa dang / yang dag par smos pa dang / yongasu
86a6(phal chen): brjod pa dang / man ngag tu gsungs pa dang / shin tu bstan pa dang / rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa ji snyed pa
86a7(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang rje su dran no// shar phyogasu ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs
86a8(phal chen): mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogasu yang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brgyan
86b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snying dag kyang 'anga'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la/ 'jig rten
86b2(phal chen): gyi khams mchod dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dga' nga dag nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa
86b3(phal chen): de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas/ gzugs thams cad kyi bar gyis mchod pa byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis nga ji snyed du gsung ba nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongasu
86b4(phal chen): shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjesu dran no// sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / gang dang
86b5(phal chen): 'grogs par gyur pa de dag kun kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur to// sems can phra mo 'am/ rags pa 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ bde ba'am/ 
86b6(phal chen): mi bde ba gang ji snyed cig kho bos mthong bar gyur pa de dag kun la yang yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ khong te de dag gi lus kyi tshang dang mnyam par lus byin gyis rlob
86b7(phal chen): bo sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rnam par gnon pa don yod pa la
86b8(phal chen): rab tu gzhog go// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro rab tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams
87a1(phal chen): cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'thun pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang
87a2(phal chen): mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ thogs pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying po chung mi son pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub kyi sems yongasu mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
87a3(phal chen): la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/ thams cad mkhyen pa yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chung mi
87a4(phal chen): gson pa'i ngang tshul dang / ma nyams pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma gong pa'i ba nga tshul can/ glags med pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnyog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'gyod pa med pa'i
87a5(phal chen): ngang tshul can/ rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa 'ardul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus de skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di
87a6(phal chen): nyid na/ dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer ces bya ba yod de/ de na dra byi la sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / 
87a7(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ yang
87a8(phal chen): dang yang du bltas nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs chos kyi dngang pa'i shugs dang byin gyis non pa sangs rgyas yod la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan gang na
87b1(phal chen): mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa la rab tu brtson pa/ dus gsum snang bas sems snang bar gyur pa smon lam chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i thabs
87b2(phal chen): la zhugs pa/ 'dus byas kyi dga' ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu sbyang
87b3(phal chen): ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa/ chos kyi snang ba rjesu dran par bya ba dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen rjesu dran par bya ba dang / 'dod
87b4(phal chen): chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongasu rjod pa byed cing / mthar gyis dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer du phyin nas/ dra byil sprin yongasu tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi khyams shig na/ chos
87b5(phal chen): bstan pa'i don du/ seng ge'i khril 'dug cing / srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la/ chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongasu ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 
87b6(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dra byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dra byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar
87b7(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba
87b8(phal chen): dang / ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems srid pa'i lam rgyud thams cad du chab mi 'tshal pa dang / ji ltar yongasu skyo ba ma mchis shing / bsam pa brtan
88a1(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasasu dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongasu skyo ba ma mchis shing / snying rje chen po'i stobs yang dag par skye bar 'gyur
88a2(phal chen): ba dang / ji ltar sgo kun nas rnam par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib dang sgrib pa rnam par 'thor zhing / shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis
88a3(phal chen): pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar don dang chos nges pa'i tshig dang sgrub pa la mkhas pa dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs shing tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / 
88a4(phal chen): ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo tha mi dang pa yang dag par 'a zin cing dran pa'i stobs yongasu gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rig pa'i snang ba rje su rtogs shing rig
88a5(phal chen): pa'i stobs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams cad kyi don rnam par bya/ don mi za bar rab tu dbye ba la brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur
88a6(phal chen): ba ma 'tshal to// de nas dra byil sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gror bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri de las langs te/ babs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas/ tshang
88a7(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par gtor to// nor bu rin po cher na thang med pa mang po dang / can dan gyi phye ma dam pas kyang mngon par gtor to// gos tshon sna tshogs rnam pa thang
88a8(phal chen): pas kha dog bsgyur ba/ brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mngon par bkab bo// spos kyi me tog kha dog rnam pa tha dad cing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon par gtor nas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
88b1(phal chen): gzhan dag gis kyang mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang cher byas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
88b2(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so// legs so// rigs kyi bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir
88b3(phal chen): zhugs pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rigs par bya ba la brtson pa yin/ zhing gi rgyud thams cad yong su dag par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ sems can gyi ri/ 
88b4(phal chen): thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la sta gon du gan sa pa yin/ chos kyi rigs thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bani/ na du brtag pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rigs thams cad dang mi
88b5(phal chen): 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyong pa'i rigs thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa ma na/ smon lam gyi rigs thams cad rdzun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ ya
88b6(phal chen): dag par zhugs pa yin/ dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chung par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ mos pa'i rigs shin tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang
88b7(phal chen): po thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa thams cad
88b8(phal chen): kyis rje su dgyes par bya ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba yin/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad
89a1(phal chen): kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa yin/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsdu ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod
89a2(phal chen): pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa yin/ des ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang / ngan song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongs su bcad pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan
89a3(phal chen): 'gro'i lam thams cad bzlog pa dang dbul ba'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / 
89a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po mnyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yong su dag par bya ba byang chub kyi sems kyi 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sam/ 
89a5(phal chen): dpa'i lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ya shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa/ la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par bya ba yid/ rigs kyi
89a6(phal chen): bu de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dka' ba byed pa ste/ 'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka' ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar
89a7(phal chen): byed pas pha dang ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan tu gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis mnar pa rnams la skyabasu gyur pa'o// byang chub se
89a8(phal chen): rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la dpung gnyen du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
89b1(phal chen): rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las/ yongasu ston pa'i phyir rlung gi 'khor lo lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed
89b2(phal chen): pas sa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gtos dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i
89b3(phal chen): phyir nyi ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho bas ri rab lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba
89b4(phal chen): lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpar rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang thung gi chos kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas rtul bod pa lta bu'o/ 
89b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la byas sa pa'i rlan yongs su skems pas me lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos sprin rgya chen po'i char mngon par
89b6(phal chen): 'bebs pas sprin lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dang pa la sogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas char ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos rgya mtsho'i
89b7(phal chen): 'gram yongasu ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par sgrol ba'i phyir zam pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can
89b8(phal chen): thams cad kyis mngon par bgrod par bya ba'i phyir/ mu stegs lta bu'o// de ltar dra byi la sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshig gi rgyud de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnam
90a1(phal chen): la yongasu bsngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la legs so// zhes bsngag so// de ltar nges byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir// tshig bcwo
90a2(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang par gyur nas/ lha dang / lha rdzu 'phrul
90a3(phal chen): chen po 'am/ klu dang / klu rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ dri za dang / dri za'i rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ lha ma yin dang / lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ na mkha'
90a4(phal chen): lding dang / nam mkha' lding rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi 'am ci dang / mi 'am ci rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi dang / mi rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ 
90a5(phal chen): mi ma yin pa dang / mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ tshangs pa dang tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste/ snang ba des yongasu snang bar byas pa de dag
90a6(phal chen): dra byi la sprin gyi drung du 'ongaso// de nas da ltar dra byi la sprin gyis bsam pa byin gyis brlabs shing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa/ lus dang sems sim par gyur pa dga' ba rgya chen po skyes pa/ sr-i zhu chen po la
90a7(phal chen): gnas pa/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bcom pa g.yo sgyu dang bral ba/ dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la dra byi la sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba de nyid rgya cher yang
90a8(phal chen): dag par bstan te/ khong du chud pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes pa dang / rig par byas so// de nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// 
90b1(phal chen): nas de'i phyir chos kyi stad la 'dug nas tshong dpon gyi bu dor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
90b2(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'di'i lha rnams kyi lha'i sad kyang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / 
90b3(phal chen): tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / maM 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
90b4(phal chen): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad gcig pa yang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
90b5(phal chen): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i sang gcig pa yang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skang tha dad pa ya
90b6(phal chen): shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad tha dad pa
90b7(phal chen): yang shes so// byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi brda' dang / skad dang / ming tha dad pa yang shes so// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang ming rnams kyang
90b8(phal chen): sa/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang ming rnams kyang sheso// 'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang she so// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so// byang
91a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshigs dang bda' dang nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang shes so// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
91a2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang tshig tu ldan pa yang rtogs shing khong du chud ngo do// ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po
91a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi brda' dang nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang ming rgya mtsho la 'jug cing shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med
91a4(phal chen): pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ ku na tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal me da pa/ brjod du meng pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / de bzhin du
91a5(phal chen): lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
91a6(phal chen): dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda' dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / skad
91a7(phal chen): dang ming rgya mtsho thams cad la yang 'jug cing shes te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so// tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang sheso// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
91a8(phal chen): kyi gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes pas zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dad ming rgya
91b1(phal chen): mchol zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa brgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 
91b2(phal chen): tshigs thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig lhur blangs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs pa gcig tu rnam par
91b3(phal chen): spyod pa rgya mtsho gangs chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gis brtsegs te brtan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gnyis nas brtsegs te brtan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig rab
91b4(phal chen): tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / chos thams cad ra ba tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de ngag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag
91b5(phal chen): dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyun thams cang la zhugs pa de dag dang / yi ga'i 'khor lo'i mthar byin par bya bas rab tu dbye ba la byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa
91b6(phal chen): 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re san/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyung 'di nying na yul nag tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dben btang brjod ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la
91b7(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'byung bar bya ba dang / ji ltar sems nges par gzhag par bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
91b8(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis/ dra byil sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim gro byas nas/ ngang pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba tshugs pa la rab tu brtag pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen las
92a1(phal chen): / 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nying la yang dag par bal zhing gang mchims gang bar ngus te/ dra byil sprin la la brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/ yang da
92a2(phal chen): yang du bltas phyag 'tshal zhing dra byi la sprin gyi drung nas seng ngo // / dam po dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang
92a3(phal chen): ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjesu bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de nyid rje su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
92a4(phal chen): dpa'i sems rnam par byang bas/ rnam par dag pa nyid kyi rje su'i brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub
92a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo nyid rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de zhing shin tu byed par bya ba dang / byang chub sam
92a6(phal chen): dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam par dag par bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs de nyid nye bar brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de
92a7(phal chen): yang yongasu sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam chen po de nyid mthar phyin par byed cing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
92a8(phal chen): yid dam la brtan zhing smon lam gyi sems kyis yongasu skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/ yid kyis rtul ba las mi zlog pa dang pa mi 'gro
92b1(phal chen): pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i mthu bo ches mi byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag 'thun par len pa/ shes rab kham bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sgo kun
92b2(phal chen): nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa/ kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/ sa'i gzungs kun nas snang ba rab tu thob pa/ chos
92b3(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhi kun la rten pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dmigs pa gnas med pa dang / bdag gi med pa dang gnyisu
92b4(phal chen): med pa'i spyod yul la rab tu brtsor pa/ 'du shes thams cang las 'da' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtog pa med pa
92b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi lnga ga pa/ chos kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi hA ga pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs dang ga'i tha dad pa mthong ba dang rnam
92b6(phal chen): par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba/ dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can/ chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas
92b7(phal chen): snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa/ yid kyi lus yul kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar
92b8(phal chen): byas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dang pa'i dba' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu slob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs dang 'bral ba mang ba/ de bzhin ga shegs pa'i byin gyi
93a1(phal chen): rlabs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud du khong du chud pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dag
93a2(phal chen): ba'i smon lam dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang mngon par bsgrubs pa la brtson pa de/ mthar gyis song song ste/ lo bcu gnyis kyis yul nags tshal na gnas pa
93a3(phal chen): phyin nas/ des tshong dpon btang brjod de btsal btsal de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyi phab ste/ phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag
93a4(phal chen): de ring dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang mjal bar gyur pa ni/ bdag gi sa 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob po// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dka' ba'o// / 
93a5(phal chen): 'byung bar dka' ba'o// mjal bar dka' ba'o// bgrod par dka' ba'o// bsnyen bkun bgyi bar dka' ba'o// mnyes par bgyi ba dka' ba'o// 'grogs par dka' ba'o// rim gror bgyi ba
93a6(phal chen): dka' ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjesu 'brang bar dka' ba lags na/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par gyur to// 'phags pa bdag gis 'di
93a7(phal chen): lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gror bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs
93a8(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongasu
93b1(phal chen): rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thad
93b2(phal chen): kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa rang gi spyod par mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams
93b3(phal chen): cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa yongasasu dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa mnyan cing
93b4(phal chen): blangs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang nga ga par gzung bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos baH/ na pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
93b5(phal chen): bstan pa yongasu gzungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cang dang / tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par bgyi ba dang / 
93b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongasasu dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
93b7(phal chen): smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / 
93b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi gter dang mdod khong du chud par
94a1(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod chad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang mdzod sems cad 'dul ba
94a2(phal chen): mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gter dang mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gi gter dang
94a3(phal chen): mdzod rang gi sems kyi dbang du bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang / mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
94a4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'phags pa de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag 'dir mchi so// bsam pa de lta bu dang yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang / sems
94a5(phal chen): dpa' de lta bu dang / gdon mi 'tshal par bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang / chu la khong du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag
94a6(phal chen): pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang / rnam par dpyad pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis
94a7(phal chen): te/ 'phags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjesu ston pa mdzad cing / tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad/ rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad/ lam ni bstan par mdzad/ mu stes
94a8(phal chen): la ni 'jog par mdzad/ chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad/ the tsom ni yongasu gcod par mdzad/ neb nur ni sel bar mdzad/ yang gnyis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/ ngogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar
94b1(phal chen): mdzad/ sems kyi thibs po snang bar mdzad/ sems kyi dri ma ni yongasu sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi rgyud ni rab tu dang bar mdzad/ sems kyi g.yo spu ni yongasu sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi gdung pa
94b2(phal chen): sim par mdzad/ 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/ mi dge ba las ni phyir bzlog par mdzad/ sems can dmyal ba las ni ldog par mdzad/ gnas dang ni dpral bar mdzad/ mngon par 'ar
94b3(phal chen): las ni gyen tu bskyod pa mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongasu 'grel pa mdzad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i sladadu ni mngon du gyur pa ma
94b4(phal chen): snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/ byams pa chen po ngal rab tu gzhog pa mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la 'jud
94b5(phal chen): pa mdzad/ rtogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo la ni gnas par mdzad/ rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni gzhog pa mdzad/ stobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa
94b6(phal chen): nyid du ni sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad do zhes thos// 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar brtson par bgyis na byang
94b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol// de nas tshong dpon btang brjod kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas zhing
94b8(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo glong mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jam dpal
