95a1(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsam shing / ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par zhugs so// tshong dpon btang brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs
95a2(phal chen): kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bur gnas par gyur te/ lus yongasu dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas
95a3(phal chen): kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang bcas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ sngon spyod pa la bzhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ smon lam gyi
95a4(phal chen): tshogs dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongasu ston pa dang bcas/ chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas// 
95a5(phal chen): sems can yong su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/ chos kyi mu'im/ thar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongasu chud rtsa nga 'dus par snang ste de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / 
95a6(phal chen): phan tshun mchod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par bye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su bzhugs pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang / 
95a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogasu yongasu ston par snang / 
95a8(phal chen): ngo // thag pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi phrin
95b1(phal chen): las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo // la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba dang / la la na ni yum gyi sku na bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongasu ston pa dang / la la na ni skye ba dang / la lan
95b2(phal chen): ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang / la la na ni tsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la la na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan
95b3(phal chen): chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa dang / la la na ni lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri zas yongasu bskor cing tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / 
95b4(phal chen): la lan ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang / la lan ni sem sa can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni yod su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams la
95b5(phal chen): lan ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring ba srel rnam par 'gong par snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na ni/ lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
95b6(phal chen): rten la rgyad kyis grub pa byed par snang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam rnam pa
95b7(phal chen): tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud
95b8(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dus kyi rgyud rnam
96a1(phal chen): pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa
96a2(phal chen): dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa
96a3(phal chen): dang / nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongasu bstan pa dang / yul sna tshogs
96a4(phal chen): kyi nges pa'i tshig dang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung nadam pa sna tshogasu bsgrub pa dang / mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang
96a5(phal chen): tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i'ang ro
96a6(phal chen): rab tu bsgrags pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongasu bstan pa dang / dran pa sgo sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
96a7(phal chen): lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dpung med pa/ mtha' yas par rnam
96a8(phal chen): pa tha dad pa/ phan tshun mchod pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'khor dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yangs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang / dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam
96b1(phal chen): dang dpag tshad bcu'i chang tsam dang / dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
96b2(phal chen): chang tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skang thams cad kyi rdzasu 'gro bas/ chos ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad
96b3(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis thos so// blangs so// yang dag par bzung ngo // bsams so// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi
96b4(phal chen): mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon btang rjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu
96b5(phal chen): kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa/ thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongasu blangs shing 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
96b6(phal chen): thar pa thogs pa mang ba'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi ma ngag dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
96b7(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po las sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
96b8(phal chen): dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo // lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
97a1(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
97a2(phal chen): thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
97a3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thatha
97a4(phal chen): gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smig rgyal mtshan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
97a5(phal chen): rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig
97a6(phal chen): tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
97a7(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
97a8(phal chen): thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
97b1(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thos kyi mar ma zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chu
97b2(phal chen): 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
97b3(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug phung rab tu 'phyang ba la sogs pa/ 
97b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig go lam du snang ngo // nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi
97b5(phal chen): rgyan yong du 'ongs pa dge ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems
97b6(phal chen): dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal ba blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du
97b7(phal chen): snang ngo // 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge'i snang zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyingasu snang
97b8(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'ong 'phro zhing rnam par snang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thang dang thabs gcig tu
98a1(phal chen): bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas
98a2(phal chen): yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
98a3(phal chen): 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la sogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
98a4(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon/ kho bo yang der 'gro ba med de/ nam 'dod pa de na// 
98a5(phal chen): bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha' yas bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // tsan ngan yod pa'i 'jigs rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
98a6(phal chen): snang rdo rje bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // pad mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin
98a7(phal chen): gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen pad mo bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // mngon par dga' ba'i
98a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi skul ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // ma
98b1(phal chen): long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // rin chen dpal gyi ngang pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 
98b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bas ni phyogs gang dang gang dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang
98b3(phal chen): gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo // dus gsum gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
98b4(phal chen): mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi ngo na dang / sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin ga
98b5(phal chen): pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/ bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las
98b6(phal chen): kyang byon pa med par shes la/ gang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang / rmi lam lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par
98b7(phal chen): dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang chu'i snod
98b8(phal chen): gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang / sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang / snga ma lta bur shes pa
99a1(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang smra brnyan ri'i brag ca lta bur brjod par shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang / sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas/ byang chub sems
99a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni/ rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ngo zhes bya bar rjesu rtogs shing khong du rung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa thams cad kyang / rang gi sarba
99a3(phal chen): kyi byin gyis brlabs so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlab so// sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba yang zang gi sems kyi byin gyis rlabs so// 
99a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// 
99a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba yang nga gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang / rang gi sems kyi
99a6(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs so// chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung zhing / rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye
99a7(phal chen): shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlab so// zhes bya bar khong du chud cing rje su rtog so// rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang gi sems tha~Mng nye bar brtan pa
99a8(phal chen): bya'o// chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su brtan par bya'o// sgrib pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems nyid brtan
99b1(phal chen): bar bya'o// bzod pas ni rang gi sems nying mnyam par bya'o// ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol bar bya'o// shes rab kyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// rnam par dbang
99b2(phal chen): rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar
99b3(phal chen): bya'o// snyam mo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/ blangs shing yongasu 'dzin par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'chags pa
99b4(phal chen): mang pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chags med par rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ 
99b5(phal chen): mya ngan las 'da' ba meng pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rnam ting nge 'dzin rab tu thab pa/ dus pa/ sum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ gzhi kun nas byed pa'i ting
99b6(phal chen): 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i
99b7(phal chen): spyod yul dang ldan pa/ phyin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs cing 'du bar snang yang / de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten gyi
99b8(phal chen): khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'jam bu'i gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas/ 
100a1(phal chen): par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
100a2(phal chen): bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon btang rjod la lan brgya
100a3(phal chen): stong du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon btang rjod kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par brjod de brtag pa dang / mos par bya ba dang / mi gtang bar bya ba
100a4(phal chen): sems shing du ste/ smre sngags bton nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rje su 'brang ba dang / dge
100a5(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang mi 'ga' bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i gshes gnyen la rag
100a6(phal chen): lus par rje su lta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjesu bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pa
100a7(phal chen): dge pa'i bshes gnyen rnams gnod pa thams cad yongasu spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pas pa tsam du sems shing / tshong dpon btang rjod kyi drung nas so/ 
100a8(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjesu sems shing tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag la nan tan bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
100b1(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rje su dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong
100b2(phal chen): du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab
100b3(phal chen): pa rjes su blta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rjesu sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
100b4(phal chen): dang / rnam par thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yongasu brtag pa dang / 'jog te na gyi khams tha dad pa la bsgribs pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab
100b5(phal chen): pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam ba na tu brtan pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems pa'i las dang smon lam gyi rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
100b6(phal chen): rjesu spyad cing / mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba/ gang na ba der phyin nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las 'chag pa'i gnas shig
100b7(phal chen): gi/ 'chagasa'i mthar 'dug ste/ ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhag nas/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing mi g.yo la/ byed pa med cing lus drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du byas nas/ ting 'dzin gyi
100b8(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis pa khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing / g.yas g.yon dang steng log su lus mtha' yas la/ chang med cing bsam gyis mo khyab pa/ spyi gtsug balngar mi mthong ba/ kha dog
101a1(phal chen): / du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi sad cig re re la kha dog rnams pa thadang 'chang med pa yongasu ston ga/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhi ste/ g.yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la
101a2(phal chen): bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pa byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // rnam par thar pas
101a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yod
101a4(phal chen): su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi lam thams cad yongasu bcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i
101a5(phal chen): lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sems
101a6(phal chen): can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / de'i rkang pa'i mthil
101a7(phal chen): gnyis nas/ tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang rim gro sna tshogs byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/ 
101a8(phal chen): can tha chags kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ thar rmugs dang bdun ga tshan pa tshang dang / cang pan rna tshogs thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs yang pa'i dus shin tu phrab srid/ rgyas pa rgya
101b1(phal chen): pa'i 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba mthong ngo // bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag sna tshogasu sbyar ba thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / 
101b2(phal chen): me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / snod rnam pa rna
101b3(phal chen): tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongasu sdud cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyi sems tshim par
101b4(phal chen): bya ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yong su smin par byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // pus mo'o lha nga gnyis nas rgyal riH
101b5(phal chen): mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram tham khas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten namakhas pa'i gzugs dang / bzo sna chags la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyung na mkhas pakyi
101b6(phal chen): gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang / rgyus la gsal zhing ma khas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs
101b7(phal chen): byang rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyings dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas mi mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing / chos kyi nar gyis dbus
101b8(phal chen): 'i sems sa rnams la phan 'dags pa dang / drug bzlas pa'i sems can rnams pa bar bya ba dang / lags par srung ba'i sems can rnams sangan par ga na pa nga / theg pa'i
102a1(phal chen): la zhal nyesu gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyungs pa dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grag par bya ba dang / sdig pa las bzlog
102a2(phal chen): nga'i sgra yongasu bsgrags pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la sems can gzung ba dang / don spyad pa la sems can dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs yongasu bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i
102a3(phal chen): dngos po yongasu brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don 'thun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi
102a4(phal chen): lus dbyibs su 'khod pa/ lpags pa dang / shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs pa/ gzugs dang / cha byang dang dbyibs sna tshogs can/ spyod lam rab tu zhi bdag byung nas/ steng gi bar snang las sas
102a5(phal chen): rgyas kyi yon tan brjod cing / chos kyi sgra yongasu bsgrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongasu brjod pa
102a6(phal chen): dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongasu brjod pa
102a7(phal chen): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // rtsib lo// 
102a8(phal chen): gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyi mi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bstan pa/ 
102b1(phal chen): dang / spos kyi sprin gyi rgyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa na mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin bsam
102b2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs thams cad rnam par grub pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongasu khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
102b3(phal chen): gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang rin po che'i phyang phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po
102b4(phal chen): che dab pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i sen mo ngo sna tshogs dang me tog gi sprin gyi bas ma gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i khril dkyil mo dkrung du
102b5(phal chen): 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi smon kyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan/ rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang
102b6(phal chen): chos kyi klu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad mo za ba mtho ba/ mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char
102b7(phal chen): rnam par 'thor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa/ bsam gyis
102b8(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba ngan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lnga'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar
103a1(phal chen): te/ gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'thor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
103a2(phal chen): rgyan/ nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pa dang / bdug spos kyi na bun dang / sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
103a3(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor la 'khar mngon par khebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
103a4(phal chen): mchod pas/ skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtho rang ngo // thong ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas
103a5(phal chen): kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ lam yin gyi sbrus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab parab tu ston cing / chu 'dzin chen po yongasu bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
103a6(phal chen): khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongasu bskyob pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang bdud
103a7(phal chen): kyi snga thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems dpa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / tho mtshams pa'i sems bya
103a8(phal chen): bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lham yin gyi/ 
103b1(phal chen): sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang / sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas
103b2(phal chen): gyen du bskyod de gnas meng pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag
103b3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas
103b4(phal chen): kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis/ sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
103b5(phal chen): mthong ngo // rgyab kyi gzhung nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul
103b6(phal chen): sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la/ bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yong su rjod pa byed cing / rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yong su bstan pa
103b7(phal chen): dang / 'dod chags kyi smod pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la/ byams pa dang / gti mug gi spyod pa rnams la rkyen las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung brjod pa dang / 
103b8(phal chen): cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la/ ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / shi ba la gnas
104a1(phal chen): su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du brjod
104a2(phal chen): pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i dbang po'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / lus mo sdug
104a3(phal chen): pa dang / kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba sems can gyi khams yongasu bskyang ba la rtson
104a4(phal chen): ba/ 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma
104a5(phal chen): 'dres pas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi na mkha 'a rgyas par 'gengs shing / dge ba'i spyod pa thams cang yongasu bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
104a6(phal chen): yongasu bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongasu gzung ba dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyis yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongasu bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas
104a7(phal chen): thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 
104a8(phal chen): 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa/ sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongasu bskyang ba la rtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / 
104b1(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod pa byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / 
104b2(phal chen): mdun gyi lto nas mi 'am ci'i dbang po// sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
104b3(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo 'khor brgya snad grangs meng pa can dag byung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / klu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang
104b4(phal chen): ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa brjod pa byed cing / byang chub kyi sems yongasu bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i
104b5(phal chen): sa thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'kho ra lo'i sngo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrulaba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spo bar bya ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las
104b6(phal chen): 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongasu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongasu gzung ba dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad
104b7(phal chen): yong su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sku thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yong su bskyed pa byed cing chos
104b8(phal chen): kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // kha'i sgo nas 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po/ rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing / stobs kyi yan lag bani tshe chags kyi 'khor
105a1(phal chen): dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongasu gtang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dngul ba
105a2(phal chen): rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems cad rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dpral ba dang / rgyan gyis shing
105a3(phal chen): tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongasu gtang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang brdzun du smra ba las rnam par bzlog
105a4(phal chen): pa dang / slu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / pra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum par ba rtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten
105a5(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig ra tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las/ sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / den zab man tshig
105a6(phal chen): rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba las yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri ma
105a7(phal chen): yongasu sel cing / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la
105a8(phal chen): rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tshoms kyi spro thams cad rab tu gzhol pa dang / nam
105b1(phal chen): nur dngas pa pa'i rab ring song su bskul ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu rjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i dul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 
105b2(phal chen): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tsheng dpan kyi
105b3(phal chen): thunor bzangs kyis mthong nga// mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sdeng thung ste sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongasu snang
105b4(phal chen): bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sem sa can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba 'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khong pa'i sems can rnams kyi grangs
105b5(phal chen): ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa'i rang ba ni na gyi zhing rnamasu 'ong kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'ong bai dUr+ya'i kha dos
105b6(phal chen): can rab tu 'gyed ba dang / baidu rgya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong gser gyi kha dog can rab tu bskyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams 'ong gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa
105b7(phal chen): dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'ong shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'ong mu tig dmar po'i kha drog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / a smra bar
105b8(phal chen): ba'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'ang gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'byed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'ong a sma gar ba'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa'o// in dra nI la'i rang / 
106a1(phal chen): bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed // rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'od rin po che'i in dran
106a2(phal chen): la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po
106a3(phal chen): che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'ong mu tig dmar po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'od rin po che
106a4(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'ong rin po che gcig gi kha dog tsan rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
106a5(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don chad med pa la/ brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpo na gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // smon mtshams kyi mdzod su
106a6(phal chen): nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / 
106a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rje su bsngags par byed cing / sems can tshad med pa gdul ba las brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // 'phral ba nas tshangs pa chen
106a8(phal chen): po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba seng byung nas tshangs pa'i dbyangasu brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / byang chub sems
106b1(phal chen): dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshang med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mgo nas
106b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyis/ brgyan pa'i lus yongs su ston cing / dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris
106b3(phal chen): pa'i lus rab tu bstan pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dpung med pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas
106b4(phal chen): bzung ste/ gtong ba dang len pa dang / dngos po yongasu gtang ba 'i rnam pa'i sprin mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya mtsho yongasu bstan pa
106b5(phal chen): dang / sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongasu brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / mas ma me gas na zhin na ga min ci can kyi rgyud yo rkye med go 'amatshan ma rgya
106b6(phal chen): tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sbeng byung nas/ tshul khrims kyi
106b7(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya mtsho yongasu bstan pa dang / sems can thams
106b8(phal chen): cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling
107a1(phal chen): tog rnam par bstsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongasu ba
107a2(phal chen): cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam na du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sring pa'i lam gyi rgyu rmi lam lta bur sems can rnam
107a3(phal chen): la rab tu brjod cing / rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongasu gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir/ yul yongasu 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa la dbang spur ba sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub
107a4(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba steng byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lnga bur mngon par ston cing / khro ba med pa dang / khrug pa med pa dang / 
107a5(phal chen): shar gnyer ba med pa dang / zhe sdang ba med pa dang / chung smon pa ma pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab tu ngaH/ da pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad
107a6(phal chen): yosu bcad ba'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed cing / bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang
107a7(phal chen): chos la dbang bskur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi
107a8(phal chen): stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongasu btsal bas mi spyod byol yongasu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
107b1(phal chen): thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzung ba/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'azlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
107b2(phal chen): byin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu bstan pa dang / sems rnams kyi le le
107b3(phal chen): ri rnam par gtor ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / las la dbang sgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzung ba dang / rgyun mi chad pa brtson par byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub
107b4(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba srong thung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjesu dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing sgrib pa dang / bar
107b5(phal chen): du gcod pa dang rab rab thams cad rnam par bstsal ba dang / rnam ba dang bag med pa thams cad las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / 
107b6(phal chen): khengs pa 'gying ba dang nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu gzhom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su bsngags pa
107b7(phal chen): dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / sems can la dbang sgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / skad cig
107b8(phal chen): re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyeng thung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos/ 
108a1(phal chen): yongasu tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug
108a2(phal chen): sgra sgrog pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i r-i 'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang / lta ba thams
108a3(phal chen): cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab rib rnam par bskul ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas
108a4(phal chen): par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor
108a5(phal chen): rab tu brjod pa byed cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs ma/ khas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i smon rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod
108a6(phal chen): pa rab tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa tha mi dad pa'i
108a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems
108a8(phal chen): dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing / sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
108b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba steng thung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sba sgrog cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' thams
108b2(phal chen): cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i smon rab tu dbye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang
108b3(phal chen): thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril ba/ chos thams cad kyi rjesu 'brang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par
108b4(phal chen): zlog pa/ mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong
108b5(phal chen): ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa 'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang ba bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
108b6(phal chen): stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu byung ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sngon rab tu dgye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi
108b7(phal chen): rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongasu bstan pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang minyam pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas 'tshig pa
108b8(phal chen): kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis na mkha'i dbyingasu ston pa'i
109a1(phal chen): stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'gengs pa rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
109a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba sbed byung nas sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po
109a3(phal chen): sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon
109a4(phal chen): bar shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang / slo na lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongasu brjod pa dang / sems
109a5(phal chen): can thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bdag
109a6(phal chen): med pa'i rang bzhin la gzung ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
109a7(phal chen): kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / 
109a8(phal chen): mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yang dag par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / 
109b1(phal chen): ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu bstan pa byed cing sems kyi skad
109b2(phal chen): cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // smra zar gtsug tor gyi gseb nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul
109b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu nu klung gi gser gyi rnga ba shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spa zhing chang mang
109b4(phal chen): par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yongasu ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad la
109b5(phal chen): tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/ de ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag
109b6(phal chen): mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la/ gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
109b7(phal chen): char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal chab du dbang bskur ba rnams la/ sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang
109b8(phal chen): nub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i
110a1(phal chen): tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi smin gyi char mngan par bab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam bdag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin tu
110a2(phal chen): brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi mar mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la/ 'gro ba yong su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos
110a3(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos
110a4(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dab pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
110a5(phal chen): dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la/ snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 
110a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la/ dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yangs pa la
110a7(phal chen): mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod
110a8(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes
110b1(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang spur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'thung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi
110b2(phal chen): lha rnams la thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi chags rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lnga rnams la ye shes
110b3(phal chen): kyi rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i
110b4(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mtshe ma'i lnga rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rje su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
110b5(phal chen): byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnasu chos kyi dbyings kyi
110b6(phal chen): nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gan su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
110b7(phal chen): yang dag par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 
110b8(phal chen): nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su
111a1(phal chen): chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
111a2(phal chen): sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs
111a3(phal chen): shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sngon gyi char mngon par dab
111a4(phal chen): pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon pa
111a5(phal chen): dbab pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho/ ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshe gas pa rje su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba
111a6(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba
111a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs dbyung ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya
111a8(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las/ ba spu'i sgo ra re nas/ 
111b1(phal chen): kyang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor kha dog dang gzugs kyi grong dang rgyan grangs med pa can/ dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la sta gon du gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
111b2(phal chen): steng byung nas phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongs
111b3(phal chen): gtong bar rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs/ yid dam ngang tshul gyi dkyil
111b4(phal chen): 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub semra
111b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams rkang lag dang yan lag gi dam pa gcad kyang / nyam su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khu tshur dang da byig pas bsnun te mtshon gyis lus la btab kyang / khams
111b6(phal chen): su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad gshegs sam stong dang mig phyung yang nyam su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du thung ba/ 
111b7(phal chen): rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongasu btsal ba'i ched du lus dang sems la gnod pa thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcad pa thams
111b8(phal chen): cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyam su bzong bar byas pa dang / bag la zha bar byas pa dang / gtang snyomasu bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa
112a1(phal chen): gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa
112a2(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa/ rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho yongasu
112a3(phal chen): bsam pa dang / sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad yongasu char gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad spa dkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i
112a4(phal chen): mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang / lus te
112a5(phal chen): bar len pa ji skad pa dang / rigasu skye ba yongasu gzung ba ji snyed pa/ dang / gzugs kyi lus yongasu grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjesu bstan pa yongasu gzung ba
112a6(phal chen): snyeng pa dang / dge ba'i pha shes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongasu bsgrub pa dang 'thun pa'i gtsug lag dang gnas
112a7(phal chen): dang / gzhal mad khang dang / yul dang ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongasu bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'byung ba la
112a8(phal chen): mngon par mos pa ji sbed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang / tshul dang / spyong lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang kyis mthong ngo // bsu'i sgo'i 'ong gzer gyi dra ba dang / 
112b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad yongasu tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yong su bzung ba mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig
112b2(phal chen): gi don du yang bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang ste/ sems can thams cad las yongasu btsal ba dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongasu
112b3(phal chen): btsal ba dang / dad pa dang sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongasu btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
112b4(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyis yod su btsal ba de de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi thun
112b5(phal chen): bzangs kyis/ ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / nga kyil 'khor las mthong ngo // baspu'i sgra'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
112b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pas sems can thams cad yongs su brngu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo // sems can re re la yang lus dang
112b7(phal chen): spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa yang ba spu'i ska'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil
112b8(phal chen): 'khor gcig las mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa thams cad du/ smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / 
113a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad yong su smin par bya ba'i smon lam/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang zhing thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa ji skad
113a2(phal chen): pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor rje skasnyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las 'khor ba'i skyon so so ra re'i
113a3(phal chen): gnyen por mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcag las mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i
113a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor la la las no// stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ 
113a5(phal chen): ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa 'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sang par byed pa'i ra nga bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar
113a6(phal chen): gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su
113a7(phal chen): dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rje su rnam par bsam pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du
113a8(phal chen): bya ba'i sgo chung kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nga la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs
113b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs yang dag par mnod par ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan
113b2(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no// na zhag gnyis dang bdun yang yon no// 
113b3(phal chen): zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig dang / zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag kyang drug tu/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang / nyin zhag drug 'das nas/ dge slong
113b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las lang so// de nas nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ting 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar chad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 
113b5(phal chen): ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrog pa'i spyod yul
113b6(phal chen): dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub pa ni ngo mtshar te// 
113b7(phal chen): de nas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so// 
113b8(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyis rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongasu bskyab pa dang / mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad bcad pa dang / mtho ris kyi
114a1(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud tu phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi yul gyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang / 'dus byas la spyod pa
114a2(phal chen): bde ba yong su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongasu bstan pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// 
114a3(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs yongasu bskyed
114a4(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu 'thob/ par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par
114a5(phal chen): bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang b.rabagyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
114a6(phal chen): kyi spyan lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongasu bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba sta gon du gnas pa'o// 'phag
114a7(phal chen): pa ting 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa rigs kyi bu// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongasu thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/ 
114a8(phal chen): sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo gun nas
114b1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pa ting 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu chang ba yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 
114b2(phal chen): 'phags pa'i tinge 'dzin 'di'i yul der bsams pas/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig
114b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnan pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu brgyan pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams
114b4(phal chen): yongasu sbyang ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khamasu dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi bdag
114b5(phal chen): nyid che ba brtag pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'bru la ba yang su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas byi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med
114b6(phal chen): // sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba ma 'dres pa shes shing
114b7(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su bgrang bar bya ba la tho
114b8(phal chen): pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rje su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rje su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs
115a1(phal chen): pa med do// byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can rgya mtsho thams
115a2(phal chen): cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang po thams cad shes par bya ba la
115a3(phal chen): thogs pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos
115a4(phal chen): kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rig pa rje su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs pas chad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzungs chen po
115a5(phal chen): snang ba la dbang sgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba tham sa cad shin tu dag pa mngon par shes pas rnam par 'bru la ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu 'byung ba/ 
115a6(phal chen): tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pa sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyo rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa
115a7(phal chen): 'am/ spyod yul bstan pa 'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa 'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon
115a8(phal chen): bar rjod pa 'am/ lam yongasu bstan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rje su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ sems kyi yul shes par bya ba 'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya bar nus res/ 
115b1(phal chen): mang rigs kyi bu rtswa phyogs kyi rgyud 'di cid na/ phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig/ grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba
115b2(phal chen): shar phyogs log na yod de/ de na shes las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'ang bzangs kyi chung ma/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as/ byang chub sems
115b3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs ste/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho
115b4(phal chen): rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te/ chos kyis nye bar 'tsho bar byas pa/ ting 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa ye shes snang bar 'gyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa mos
115b5(phal chen): pa rnam par dag pas khong du chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyi sna nga ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/ phyogasu ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu 'dal ba
115b6(phal chen): des/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ 
115b7(phal chen): yang dang yang lnga zhing / yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang rab tu gdung pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yod la bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongasu
115b8(phal chen): bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa dang / rje su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba
116a1(phal chen): dang / mi gtang ba dang yid la bsam pa dang / rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rje su 'jug par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang / 
116a2(phal chen): gzungs kyi rjesu bsam pa dang / ming yongasu gzungs pa'i rjesu song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs rje su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjesu bsam pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi yul la
116a3(phal chen): rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rje su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba yongasu gzung ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan
116a4(phal chen): gyi drung nas song ngo // / bam pa dgu bcwa sa pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
116a5(phal chen): ni yang dag par bsngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma/ thong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brlabs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes
116a6(phal chen): gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rje su sems/ dge ba'i bshes la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam du lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i
116a7(phal chen): bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas na mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas/ rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa
116a8(phal chen): bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ des mthong mthong ba/ bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa rin po che thams cad kyi rabs kun nas bskor ba/ rin
116b1(phal chen): po che'i shing gi 'phreng ba spel legs pas yongasu brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi 'phreng ba'i me tog srang bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'phrul pas gzhi rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing
116b2(phal chen): gis yang dag par brgyan pa shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi 'phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngang zhim pa/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i
116b3(phal chen): shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba 'phyang ba rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes
116b4(phal chen): shing sbal rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can/ yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing mdzes par brgyan pa/ sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las/ 
116b5(phal chen): lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sol snyan rlung gis bskyod cing spra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi maHna dman med par gnas pa/ rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gas
116b6(phal chen): nas rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad par rgyun du 'byung zhing 'phyang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na/ khang pa bye ba brgya
116b7(phal chen): stong phrag bcu kun kyang / nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang pa brtseg pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'jam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i ba dang ldan pa
116b8(phal chen): dang / gzhal mad khang brgya stong phrag bcu ka gdung rin po rnam par snang ba las bres pa dang / rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te/ rin po me sna tshogs kyi pha gus
117a1(phal chen): mu khyud byas pa rin po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ gser gyi bye ma kun tu
117a2(phal chen): gram pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bres pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang ngur dang rma bya dang / khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / 
117a3(phal chen): ka la bing ka dang / ku na la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong
117a4(phal chen): ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po cher bla re chen po bris pa/ rin po sna tshogs kyi shing gi rabs yongasu bskor ba/ rin po ma'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan legs pa
117a5(phal chen): bsgreng ba/ lum brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan da/ na gyi 'dam gyis mtha' 'khor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad mos yongasu khyab pa/ rin po ma
117a6(phal chen): pad mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba sa'i gzhi rin po che
117a7(phal chen): mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa/ 
117a8(phal chen): gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po mi 'pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i dang
117b1(phal chen): kun tu ldang ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas/ dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs der stan grangs
117b2(phal chen): med cing chang med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ pad mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po can
117b3(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin po che 'gro ba ying du 'ong ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i shing thags pad mo'i snying po can dang / 
117b4(phal chen): nor bu rin po dri ma med pa'i pang ma'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po chas brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad mo'o sdong po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyi
117b5(phal chen): rgyan gyi pad mo'i sdong po can dang / nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od ra kun tu 'byung ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin
117b6(phal chen): po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dag bsha mas shing bting ba ste/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang rin po tsha bsapa gyis ma
117b7(phal chen): khyab pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ kha rog bsam gyi mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag go// bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po
117b8(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcus khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang / 'khri shing gi bla re dang / me tog gi bla re dang / 'phreng ba'i bla ra dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi
118a1(phal chen): bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i zlar
