118a2(phal chen): dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas pa'o// rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po
118a3(phal chen): che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dra ba dang / seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu shel
118a4(phal chen): gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin pa che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i dra ba dang / de dag lasogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa'o// snang ba chen
118a5(phal chen): po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar no/ ra bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po
118a6(phal chen): zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che tho nga ba da na tsu dal gyi nyi mo'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che pad mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba
118a7(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po'i snang ba dang / glog gi 'phreng ba 'byung
118a8(phal chen): ba'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o// bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcur
118b1(phal chen): char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus dang 'thun pa'i can ngan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sba rab tu 'byung ba lha rdzas las 'das pa'i 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched pas
118b2(phal chen): rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa
118b3(phal chen): klubs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pas
118b4(phal chen): rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcus chos mnyan pas so/ ma zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste/ de na dge bsnyen
118b5(phal chen): ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing mud+ha ga rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thog sa pa/ lag pa la lnga rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dadung
118b6(phal chen): rgyan dang / gdu bu thogs pa lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna marin po che mthon thing dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mag na
118b7(phal chen): bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas
118b8(phal chen): yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu btud de/ phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha1
119a1(phal chen): phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ dbang byed dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am rab 'phrul dga' 'am/ 'phrul dga'i ri su gtogs pa 'am/ 
119a2(phal chen): rab dga' ldan nam/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab mche ma 'am/ mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dang
119a3(phal chen): po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po 'am/ dri za'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po 'am/ grul bum 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am
119a4(phal chen): nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gshin rje 'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ 
119a5(phal chen): yi dgas sam/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi yang rung / sems can tshad meng grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs
119a6(phal chen): mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang / tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ 
119a7(phal chen): tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ro su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang po 'am mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag/ nang sna tshogs shig gis btab bam/ nyon mong/ 
119a8(phal chen): pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang / de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu
119b1(phal chen): nang thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar 'gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang byin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par shigs par 'gyur/ rnam
119b2(phal chen): par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa yang khong du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar 'gyur dbang po'i myi gu thams
119b3(phal chen): cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
119b4(phal chen): sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du 'gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ spyod pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan
119b5(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyu ra/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad du nga ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lus thogs pa mang
119b6(phal chen): pas kyang thams cad du rje su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug
119b7(phal chen): pa mthong nas de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
119b8(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems
120a1(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad do// zhes thos na/ 
120a2(phal chen): ma dzaM ltar/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa
120a3(phal chen): rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa/ bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni nga'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o// mnyan na don yod pa'o// rim gror byas pa don yod pa'o// gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don
120a4(phal chen): yod pa'o// rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo na sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu ma zin pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma
120a5(phal chen): dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzob
120a6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing / gdan rin po che'i khri la bzhugs nas chos ston to// shar phyog
120a7(phal chen): nas ji lta ba bzhin du/ phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho mo no de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o// chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// byang chub sems dpa
120a8(phal chen): dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan
120b1(phal chen): ba 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang / bla na med pa
120b2(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go// smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyis/ bla na med pa
120b3(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni/ sngon gyi gnas rje su dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
120b4(phal chen): rgyas par me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de drung na/ kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos mchod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa
120b5(phal chen): kha mos yongasu bzung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu zung ngo // chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos bzung ngo // de'i snga rol tu
120b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to// de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes
120b7(phal chen): bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs
120b8(phal chen): pa dag pa zhes bya ba thung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba thung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa chu ba'o lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshe gcig
121a1(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bsal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams mang ba chags su bsams can
121a2(phal chen): bar byas na/ gang kho mos rim gror byas te bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan pa la khoms tshangs pa'i spyod
121a3(phal chen): pa spyang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung 'ga' 'ga' sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rje su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan cad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni de bzhin gshegs
121a4(phal chen): pa rnams kyis mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongs
121a5(phal chen): su 'gro ba thams cad chung pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnacha nga med pa'o// rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu 'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zang zang du 'gro bas/ byang chub sem
121a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
121a7(phal chen): pas/ zhing thams cad du/ bskal pa thams cad yongasu sdud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chang med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas/ 
121a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chang med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yong su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chang med
121b1(phal chen): pa'o// rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes
121b2(phal chen): pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chang med pa'o// rigs kyi bu thadang
121b3(phal chen): pa yang dag par shes pa'i spobs kyis/ tshig gcig rjod kyang / 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chang med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas
121b4(phal chen): kyi zhing thams cad/ rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ci srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag
121b5(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig la dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang smon par bya ba'i phyir
121b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba'i phyir ma
121b7(phal chen): yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sos can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du/ byang chub sems dpa'
121b8(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sa
122a1(phal chen): can phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal byol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sa
122a2(phal chen): can ldang sdod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyong zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyang byed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lham ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can chos ma
122a3(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nab nub kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma
122a4(phal chen): yin/ sems can bsku yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gzha la brtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lum gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib
122a5(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thab thib kyi phyir ma yin/ sem sa can 'grib yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can them 'phyo 'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
122a6(phal chen): 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brang breng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyal 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsngo yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang
122a7(phal chen): yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phro bkye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rtse 'phyo'o phyir ma yin/ sems can yod than gyi phyir ma yin/ sems thug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir
122a8(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can thing yul gi phyir ma yin/ sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yid 'phye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can na ba neb kyi phyir ma yin/ 
122b1(phal chen): sems can khrig thams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yang yud kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
122b2(phal chen): can phye ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig ge'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rig yas
122b3(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyad med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog 'phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yin/ sems can spu 'phyes kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel
122b4(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod bos kyi phyir ma yin/ sa mas can lhong yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ni srad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
122b5(phal chen): ngag thim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can thal zul gyi phyir ma
122b6(phal chen): yin/ sems can sa la sal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can re ma 'drol gyi phyir
122b7(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can rdzi ngad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dang dad kyi phyir ma
122b8(phal chen): yin/ sems can bgrang brtsi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dga' rgyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod
123a1(phal chen): yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thol byed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gad ba yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gsal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrangs yas
123a2(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khyim 'byo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yam me'i phyir ma yin/ sems can skal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lngapa ldeb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ban chad
123a3(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phung gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyud lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi
123a4(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems can lngapa ldib
123a5(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'byam yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nga 'grang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can spos las kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ba
123a6(phal chen): tshal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can la lo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can byam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'byes kyi phyir ma
123a7(phal chen): yin/ sems can bgrang 'phyos las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/ 
123a8(phal chen): sems can yal 'phyong las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
123b1(phal chen): pi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam gyi phyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam gyi
123b2(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma
123b3(phal chen): yin/ sems can brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma
123b4(phal chen): yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnam sa kyi phyir ma yon pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du ma rang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi
123b5(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul na tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa 'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ steng gi 'jig rten gyi 'a
123b6(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
123b7(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir
123b8(phal chen): ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi
124a1(phal chen): den du 'di lta ste/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa/ k+Sha
124a2(phal chen): ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
124a3(phal chen): gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems/ byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes
124a4(phal chen): par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes
124a5(phal chen): par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sa mas dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'dzi ga rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud
124a6(phal chen): bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtog
124a7(phal chen): pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
124a8(phal chen): gcig yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
124b1(phal chen): sbed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yong su gzungs pa'i phyir/ byang chub ses
124b2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ 
124b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu
124b4(phal chen): skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang ba rjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ 
124b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yi na no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
124b6(phal chen): sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ 
124b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
124b8(phal chen): chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sem
125a1(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba
125a2(phal chen): ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yong su gzungs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisarba
125a3(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
125a4(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa mas byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang por
125a5(phal chen): 'khor lo yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgya/ sa kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
125a6(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du rung
125a7(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya
125a8(phal chen): mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ 
125b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas
125b2(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bags
125b3(phal chen): kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
125b4(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba
125b5(phal chen): ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sem sa can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'a drug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
125b6(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya
125b7(phal chen): mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams
125b8(phal chen): cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
126a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsha thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 
126a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 
126a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chung bar bya ba'i
126a4(phal chen): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi sems can gyi khams ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa mtha' da ga thams cad yongasasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir/ 
126a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// sang / sa rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
126a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ 
126a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur
126a8(phal chen): ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam/ 
126b1(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rje su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan
126b2(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi dam brtan pa skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par
126b3(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/ 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam
126b4(phal chen): yongasu skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang
126b5(phal chen): po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ bya nga chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig
126b6(phal chen): tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongasu gcad pa'i phyir/ 
126b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus yongasu skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen
126b8(phal chen): thab nyi ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad tu spyod pa yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa 'alnga
127a1(phal chen): cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu mdor na de dag las
127a2(phal chen): pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul dang / sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongasu bsgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sem
127a3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ zhing thams cad
127a4(phal chen): la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam namakha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gagang byag gas nod / 'i rlo pa zhen gi ya na da gdug de mas
127a5(phal chen): gi ga gi rlon ma sems can da kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig ces/ de ltar smon lam
127a6(phal chen): btab bo// smras pa/ 'phags ma rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa/ bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos
127a7(phal chen): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha de gcig pu shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir/ sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ lhag
127a8(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i phyir/ ri rab dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nang rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir/ sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu sems can thams
127b1(phal chen): cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir/ nyi mar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pas/ sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir/ rlung du gyur
127b2(phal chen): pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir/ mar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bebs pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa/ bsad
127b3(phal chen): nams kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir/ brgya byin lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ 
127b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang / dpung med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs
127b5(phal chen): kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na/ yul chub gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na drang sro nga 'jigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du
127b6(phal chen): song la dris shig/ de rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyid la spyi bos phyag 'a
127b7(phal chen): te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ ngo mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa
127b8(phal chen): rjesu sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par
128a1(phal chen): bya ba rje su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pa dkon par rjesu bsam pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa
128a2(phal chen): dang / byang chub du yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gzhog pa dkon par rjesu bsam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rje su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjesu
128a3(phal chen): bsam pa dang / sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rje su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon
128a4(phal chen): bar rje su bsam pa byed cing / dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dra pa'i gdams ngag gi rjesu song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang
128a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su dag par bya ba'i rjesu song ba 'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sang+yas
128a6(phal chen): blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter 'thob par bya la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs
128a7(phal chen): drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams
128a8(phal chen): cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches mi tshogs pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 
128b1(phal chen): bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing / thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de/ mthar gyis yul chu ba gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ 
128b2(phal chen): de'i tshe drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs/ dge ba sbyangs pa'i gnas shing dang shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas 'grigs pa/ rtag tu me
128b3(phal chen): tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing rtog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung / nor bu rin po che'i srang leb kyis rtag tu gagis
128b4(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/ tsan ngan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa/ a ga ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brtan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par
128b5(phal chen): mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa/ n+ya gro dal shing dbyang sa yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog smon pa 'phrul ba/ me tog gi chal pad mo dang / 
128b6(phal chen): ud pa la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs/ drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing / tsan dan gyi yal ga
128b7(phal chen): shin tu 'brel ba'i bya sgribs shig na/ thor tshugs kyi cod pan can/ lpags pa dang / rtsa'i gos gyon pa shing shun gyi smang g.yogs can/ rtsa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs
128b8(phal chen): mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
129a1(phal chen): 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag
129a2(phal chen): par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes/ rin po che'i gling du skyel bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang
129a3(phal chen): dag par skyed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/ nyam nyes med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/ 
129a4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin bar yang dag par lta/ mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa yongasu ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar ma ni/ dge ba'i
129a5(phal chen): bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag
129a6(phal chen): par lta/ byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis/ sim pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying rje chen po yongs
129a7(phal chen): su skyed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
129a8(phal chen): gsal bar mthong ba ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/ lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag byas nas langs ste/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la/ lan brgya stong
129b1(phal chen): du mar skor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
129b2(phal chen): pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems
129b3(phal chen): dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rje su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du
129b4(phal chen): bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mtsho ga dbyangs kyis/ bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu
129b5(phal chen): 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se/ mas skyed de/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med/ pa la mgron du gnyer to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can tha
129b6(phal chen): la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don tu sta gon du gnas pa ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho mngon du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho
129b7(phal chen): thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o// ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o// snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o// ya
129b8(phal chen): shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod
130a1(phal chen): pa'o// de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/ me tog dri zhom la yid du 'ong zhing / kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gtor to// 
130a2(phal chen): mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// mngon par phyag 'tshal to// rab tu btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'di ni sems can thams cad yongasu
130a3(phal chen): skyob par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig
130a4(phal chen): rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro// mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongasu skems par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i 'chang ba gcod par
130a5(phal chen): 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi kho ra yug gis 'jig rten yongasu bskor bar 'gyur ro// 
130a6(phal chen): shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs su ston par 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa
130a7(phal chen): yang dag ston par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems
130a8(phal chen): bskyed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu skyed de/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis
130b1(phal chen): ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ 
130b2(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ byang
130b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi
130b4(phal chen): mgo la byugs nas/ lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo // tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas bzung ma thag tu/ de'i mod la/ tshong dpon gyi
130b5(phal chen): bu nor bzangs kyis/ phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi
130b6(phal chen): zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na/ bdag nyid 'dug pa shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang / rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par
130b7(phal chen): mthong ngo // de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can/ rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag
130b8(phal chen): na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang / phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan
131a1(phal chen): pacan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to// chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag
131a2(phal chen): kyang yang dag dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam/ mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba spen
131a3(phal chen): lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhug so// sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs
131a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang
131a5(phal chen): ldan pas zhugs so// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par/ thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi'o// da kyis snang bar gyur pa/ tingange 'dzin gyi rnam par snang mdzad
131a6(phal chen): kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes mi zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba/ phyogs kun gyi dra ba/ rab tu thob pa gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu
131a7(phal chen): gsal bar byas pa/ ting 'dzin gyi ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa/ gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying
131a8(phal chen): po yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas namakha'i sdong po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu/ 
131b1(phal chen): snang bar byas pa/ ting 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyon zhag gcig lon par shes// 
131b2(phal chen): la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa sam/ la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa sum/ la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam/ 
131b3(phal chen): la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa sam/ la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa sum/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la la
131b4(phal chen): ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa sam/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon ba sam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa sum/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa
131b5(phal chen): sngam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la la ra ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa sngam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong 'on
131b6(phal chen): bsnam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa sum/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa sngam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ bskal pa
131b7(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sred lon par gyur pa sam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ bskal paM 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba sbeng len pa sam byed pa nas
131b8(phal chen): bsal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur to// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
132a1(phal chen): bzangs btang ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs patsho dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug par shes par gyur to// de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
132a2(phal chen): dran pong smras pa/ 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran no// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes
132a3(phal chen): par zad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus thams cad du 'khor lo skor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi
132a4(phal chen): mtshan dang ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshe gas pa byung ba'i nyi ma la/ rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu 'god pa/ dus gsum gyi yul skad cig gcig gis ye shes su yang dag pa
132a5(phal chen): sdud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la/ ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta
132a6(phal chen): ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med la/ 'od dang ldan pa'i
132a7(phal chen): ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa 'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa 'am/ ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par
132a8(phal chen): bya ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par rtse ba'i
132b1(phal chen): rjesu 'brang bar bya ba'am/ lus ram par phye ba'i mtshan pa gzung bar bya ba 'am/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bstan par nus resan/ song rigs kyi bu mo byag
132b2(phal chen): kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul yongasu rol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
132b3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar nar tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi rkang
132b4(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'ja la te/ drang song 'jig mchog dbyangs la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dang
132b5(phal chen): kyi drung nas song ngo // ma pa pas pa pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa
132b6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis
132b7(phal chen): mi khyab pa/ mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa/ dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug
132b8(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las byung par du 'phags pa
133a1(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa/ gnyi su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du bstan
133a2(phal chen): pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyan pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa/ rang
133a3(phal chen): bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa/ khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
133a4(phal chen): shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs pa cu'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings pa rjod pa la mngon par mos pas/ ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang
133a5(phal chen): ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i
133a6(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dpung med
133a7(phal chen): pa mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongasasu smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul mtha' yas pa
133a8(phal chen): la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par
133b1(phal chen): blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang / yangs pa'i khongasu chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs
133b2(phal chen): yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa/ rnam par gdags pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha'
133b3(phal chen): yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 
133b4(phal chen): 2 dzum pa khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / sarma
133b5(phal chen): can dang phyogs dang dus mtha' yas pa'i ming gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang / dge ba'i ga shes gnyen ma/ don du bya ba byed cing / mthar gyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gang
133b6(phal chen): na ba dang / bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der phyin to// der tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dkar thub drag po la spyod de// de'i
133b7(phal chen): phyogs pa'i nas mo'i phung por tsam du che ba bus pa dang / bshin tumatho ba'i g.yang ma'i lam gyi rgyung spu dror sos gshebs pas 'khor bar snang ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu na bzangs kyis/ bum
133b8(phal chen): ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
134a1(phal chen): byang chub du sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ gdams
134a2(phal chen): ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bcang
134a3(phal chen): du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu song la spu gri'o so dang ra ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te/ me'i 'o bas 'dir mchongs shig dang / des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur zhes na/ 
134a4(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par ldog pa yang shin tu dkon/ mi 'gyur te/ khom pa phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa yang yin
134a5(phal chen): tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon/ dbang poHmas pa med pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shin tu dkon/ skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang shin
134a6(phal chen): tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dko na/ yang dag pa'i tshul rjesu bstan pa de brdzung shi yo / la 'o byabs bzhin tu dkon/ mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyer ba'i chos lan/ 
134a7(phal chen): tan byed pa yang shin tu dkon na/ de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la/ de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam cog ma yin nam/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlab
134a8(phal chen): pa'am/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar rdzus pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi gcags pa byed pa zhig ma yin grangs/ bdag gi thams cad mkhyen
134b1(phal chen): nyid la gegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag lam rgol ba ngan par gzhugs par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la gegs byed
134b2(phal chen): pa zhig ma yin grangs snyam nas/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems brtan par ma
134b3(phal chen): byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o// brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba la zhugs pa'o// 'gro ba
134b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi sred pa'i ldan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o// / lta ba'i rnam pa dang / dra ba thams cad gtubs pa la brtson pa'o// nyon mongs pa'i lcug ldog thams cad zad par bsreg pa la sna
134b5(phal chen): gon du gnas pa'o// mi khom mi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dge/ na ba thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o// sems/ can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa rnam par
134b6(phal chen): bzlog pa la yid ma brtan pa'o// dus gsum gyi mun pa bskul ba la mngon par brtson pa'o// chos thams cad kyi 'od zer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yo
134b7(phal chen): gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ji srid cig mkhan po dang / dbang sbyar ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing / sems pa blta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la/ mngon par zhan po
134b8(phal chen): de ga thams cad/ 'phags pa 'di dkar thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi thugs ngam kyi mthus/ rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing / de dag pasam gtan gyi yong gar ba myong ba ma ngas
135a1(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de dag phyin pa dang / 'phags pa 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin dang / drag shug kyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyis zil gyis mnan te/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad
135a2(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa dang / brtul dang / rlom sems thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i phyir chos ston to// 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang srong rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa ba
135a3(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya
135a4(phal chen): ba yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing / bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang
135a5(phal chen): la 'khong nas/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gto/ ra te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yong su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'od 'dra ba
135a6(phal chen): po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing / kho bo cag gi khyim dang / lus dang / rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang so so'i gnas gnas na/ bag dga' ba med pas 'khor
135a7(phal chen): dang bcas te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la ci nas kyang / rang rang gi sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med
135a8(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba/ de lta de lta chos ston to// dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcus kyang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad
135b1(phal chen): ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di/ dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba byed pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas
135b2(phal chen): te 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya
135b3(phal chen): ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / las kyi slob pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang
135b4(phal chen): sbur ba thob par bya ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba'i rgya ni yong sung ga par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshe la dbang sbur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ros ston to// rab 'phrul dga'i lha
135b5(phal chen): rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang / steng gi bar snang la 'khod de/ lha rdzas kyi klu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dpya ngas bsgrags te/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzar to// rigs
135b6(phal chen): kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las de dang 'dra ba'i 'od byung zhing des kho bo cag gi gzhal med khang 'di dag rnam par dag ste/ gsul ba dang 'od
135b7(phal chen): shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro// rgyan 'di dag dang / lha'i bu mo 'di dag kyang / rnam par dag cing gastsal la 'od shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro// de bas na bdag cag kyang lha'i bu dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor
135b8(phal chen): dang 'das pas/ 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med de/ 'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba med pas/ lus dang sems sim par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ba yin/ 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag
136a1(phal chen): cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la/ sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// sems kyi 'od dang bar bya ba dang / sems shin tu dag par bya ba dang / sems la su rung bar bya ba dang / sems
136a2(phal chen): kyi dga' ba yongasasu bskyed pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes 'thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus
136a3(phal chen): rnam par dag par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston
136a4(phal chen): / rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par
136a5(phal chen): phab pas mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'arje ra to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas nas
136a6(phal chen): dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la/ 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// tshig shes pa'i semasu
136a7(phal chen): bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyod pa dang / byang chub du sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal
136a8(phal chen): po stong phrag bcu lnga'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man nga ra ba'i char mngon par phab te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di
136b1(phal chen): dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin nas kyang / 'phags
136b2(phal chen): pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu/ so so nas nye ba'i
136b3(phal chen): dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / lha'i bu dang / lnga'i bu ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha rdzas kyi gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dang / me thog gi sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste 'di skad ces la
136b4(phal chen): to/ rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dkar thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / rtse ba'i nags tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi
136b5(phal chen): rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang / gam yon glu len pa longs spyod la dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag der phyin nas
136b6(phal chen): kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/ mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i
136b7(phal chen): tshig brjod pa// dreg pa dang / bag mang pa thams cad yong su gcad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo bcwa
136b8(phal chen): cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdag cag gshegs pas sems skyo bar gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su smon lam mngon par sgrub bo// klu
137a1(phal chen): rgyal po shugs ldan dang / dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo las sogs pa/ klu rgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing / dus dang 'thun pa'i lha rdzas kyi can dan gyi sprin dang / klu'i bu
137a2(phal chen): mo glu blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'ang dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i
137a3(phal chen): tsha/ ma'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste/ nges klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ bye ma'i char dang na mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongasu sel to// khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/ lus
137a4(phal chen): sim par byas shing / yid shin tu mos par byed do// de sems shin tu mos par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag cag la chos ston to// 'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang / sgrib
137a5(phal chen): pa'i las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se mas bskyed du btsud de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'ged// / 
137a6(phal chen): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam kha'i dbyings la 'khod ba/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bram ze rtul ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad ces
137a7(phal chen): 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang / mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum
137a8(phal chen): thams cad kyang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tsho ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo // kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i
137b1(phal chen): dbang gis zil gyis non pas/ rang rang gi gnas de dang de dag na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye ba'i khor dang bcas te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams
137b2(phal chen): la/ 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis/ lus thams cad snang bar byas shing / de bas khyab par mdzad de/ de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang / bdag
137b3(phal chen): cag la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / lus srul po mang po byang chub du sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// dri za'i dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang / steng gi bar snang la 'khong nas 'di
137b4(phal chen): skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu la po cag kyang / rang rang gi gnas na 'khor ba'i cha/ 'phags pa 'od dka' thub lngas yong su gdung ba mdzad pa'i mo'i phung po 'di las 'ong thung ste/ bdag cag gi
137b5(phal chen): gnas snang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag cag 'ong des phog te/ bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ 'pha gas pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag drung du phyin nas kyang / 
137b6(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag ci nas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang / rgya mtsho'i nang
137b7(phal chen): nas mngon par 'thon te/ nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga gtsug te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad
137b8(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad brtul
138a1(phal chen): zhugs dang dka' thub kyi zil gyis non te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // der phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / chos zab mo'i
138a2(phal chen): bzod pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// namakhar lding dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa namapa' lding gi dbang
138a3(phal chen): po stong phrag bcus kyang / bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugasu mngon par sprul te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di/ dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag
138a4(phal chen): las 'od chen po byung ste/ bdag cag gis gnas snang bar byas nas// yongasu g.yo bar byed do// ngas bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/ smyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i
138a5(phal chen): drung du 'dong ngo // 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cibyams pa chen po la yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad do// snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do// 'khor ba'i rtsa
138a6(phal chen): mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do// 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la yang / yongs su sbyong bar mdzad do// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag
138a7(phal chen): par bya ba la yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// shes rab dang thabs shin tu bsngal ba la yang / yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do// rnam pa ji lta bur yongasu smon pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba la yang / 
138a8(phal chen): rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// mi 'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang / steng gi bar snang la 'khod // 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe lo
138b1(phal chen): bocag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srang bus lnga ldir brgyus pa'i sil sman dang / rol mor yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las
138b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya
138b3(phal chen): ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba
138b4(phal chen): zhig/ dka' ba yongs su gtong ba byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
138b5(phal chen): yongs su sbyong ba byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig sdong po byang chub du 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
138b6(phal chen): grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
138b7(phal chen): 'chang rgya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo
138b8(phal chen): zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan no che ge mo zhog/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ 
139a1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtsa dang / shing dang yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blags pa'i mur thug par ni rung yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa
139a2(phal chen): de dag gi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i shing ta la'i 'phreng ba las rol mo'i yo
139a3(phal chen): byang dang / rin po che'i sman dang / khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing / nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam du grag pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo // de ltar bdag cag kyang / sangs rgyas dang / chos
139a4(phal chen): dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / mtshan gyi chu klung gi sbas/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos/ nyams bde ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i
139a5(phal chen): du 'dong ngo // de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang / 'phags/ pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang / kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
139a6(phal chen): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa/ kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang na mkha' la 'khod cing / yid kyis sprul pa
139a7(phal chen): mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ mo'i phung po 'di dag las/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'ong 'byung ste/ 'od nges mar na mnar med pa
139a8(phal chen): yan chad du/ sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi mig lam du
139b1(phal chen): snang bar bstan pas/ de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar skyes so// de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la
139b2(phal chen): drin du bzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongasu spangs te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // der bdag cag phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di na ci nas kyang / sems can
139b3(phal chen): ched med pa'i rnams byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas/ dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing
139b4(phal chen): thams yid bde ba skyes te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de/ bram ze rgyal ba 'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
139b5(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa de ltar bdag gos dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nong sa pa la nongs par bshag so// de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi
139b6(phal chen): kye mched kyis/ tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rje su bstan dang 'thun byed cing // dran pa nye bar bzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/ 
139b7(phal chen): de phyir de'i don rnams thams cad 'thun par 'grub par 'gyur/ 'thun pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'chang yang rgya/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ rig yang sa'i lam spu gra
139b8(phal chen): so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te/ me'i phung po chen po dang mchongs so// de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to// me nges reg nas kyang
140a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas/ des 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa'i me'i phung po
140a2(phal chen): la de ltar reg na bde ba dang / ro'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang / de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ dkyil
140a3(phal chen): 'khor mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu des kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung
140a4(phal chen): po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad du yongasu zad par bya ba'i smon lam can/ ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la thub pa
140a5(phal chen): med cing / sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/ yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta/ bu/ brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug
140a6(phal chen): pa med pa/ sbyor ba lhong pa med pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/ brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi spyod
140a7(phal chen): pa shes pa/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byam
140a8(phal chen): ma zhes bya ba/ bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris
140b1(phal chen): shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bram ze rgyal pori drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
140b2(phal chen): phyog su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyis mi
140b3(phal chen): khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa/ theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa/ sangs rgyas chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dge ba'i
140b4(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi rje su 'brang bar spro ba/ chos kyi rim gro la na ma par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mtha'
140b5(phal chen): la mi gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa// namakha'i mtha' ga/ nyis su mngon du gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par
140b6(phal chen): gnod mi za ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa/ chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar
140b7(phal chen): bya ba la gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtogs par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes
140b8(phal chen): kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba/ zhing la mngon par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa
141a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yong su dag par bya ba gnas pa med par spyod pa/ sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad
141a2(phal chen): tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa/ gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la/ gzhol ba de mthar gyis seng ge rnam par bgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der
141a3(phal chen): phyin te/ bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongasu rmed med pa las/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams ma/ 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na/ khri tsan dan
141a4(phal chen): sbrul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas le gus par blas pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to zhes thos nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song
141a5(phal chen): ste/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo gang na/ bu mo byams ma mthong bar dang / ga' ba'i phyir/ stong cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / nges der srog ma
141a6(phal chen): brgya phrag du ma dang / srog chags stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas/ khyeng gang nas 'ong da gang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang / de dag na re deng ni/ bu mo byams ma'i drung
