141a7(phal chen): du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas nges bsam pa/ 'dir ni su 'gro yang dag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/ de yang nang du phyin to// de ltar phyin te bltas na/ khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de
141a8(phal chen): yang / gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/ bai DUR+Ya 'iri ka ba bkye ba rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa 'dzam bu chu klung gi lhun dang ldan pa ba gam brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs
141b1(phal chen): med pas rnam par bris pa/ rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu smra bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas/ rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing ta grangs med
141b2(phal chen): pas yongasu bskor ba/ gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan par 'dug par mthong ngo // bu mo byams ma des yang mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ 
141b3(phal chen): skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar
141b4(phal chen): mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sem sa bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
141b5(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos
141b6(phal chen): na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la
141b7(phal chen): ltos shig ces nas/ ngas kun tu byung te bltas pa dang / rtsig pa re re dang / ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin po che re re dang / gsar
141b8(phal chen): gyi dril bu re re dang / rin po che'i shing re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re dang / rin po che'i sen mo do re re dag las kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad na/ bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ thog ma thugs
142a1(phal chen): bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bad
142a2(phal chen): bcas pa/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to// dmigs pa de dag re re las/ ji lta ba de bzhin du/ dmigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to// 
142a3(phal chen): 'di lta ste dper na/ chus yongs su gang ba'i mtsho dang zhing rnyog pa med pa la rnam par gastsal ba la ni/ namakha'i nyi zla dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongasu snang ngo // de bzhin
142a4(phal chen): du khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i dmigs pa re re las kyang / chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang bar gyur to// de ni bu mo byaH
142a5(phal chen): ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltaranam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma de yongasu bzung ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bu mo byams ma'i gdong
142a6(phal chen): du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/ 
142a7(phal chen): mes de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung 'gang 'ga' sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongasu brtsal ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyung kun nas rnam
142a8(phal chen): par brgyan pa 'di/ sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad de/ gcig gis gang du gsungs pa de yang gnyis kyis ma gsung so// smras pa 'phags ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
142b1(phal chen): phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par rgyan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di la/ kho mo mngon du byed
142b2(phal chen): cing / sems dpa' dang / rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjesu sems pa dang / dran par bya dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / rnam par brtags pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag
142b3(phal chen): par brgyan par bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongasu skye ste/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongasu 'du'o// khong
142b4(phal chen): su rung ngo // mngon du 'gyur ro// mngon par 'du'o// khongs na 'khor/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi nong gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i
142b5(phal chen): dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / bsod nams kyi sgo dang / bso da nams kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs
142b6(phal chen): kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongasu 'byung ba'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang / 
142b7(phal chen): las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang / lam mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi mnyam pa'i las yongasu spang ba'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya
142b8(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / las la dbang sgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ting 'dzin gyi khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 
143a1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin la rnam par snang ba'i tshu nga / ting 'dzin skyong yul gyi rgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang zab sgo nga / mngon pa shes par sgo nga / sems rgya mtsha'i sgo dang / sems kyi
143a2(phal chen): grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rlung yong su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thobs pa snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi mtsho ngang bar bya ba'i sgo nga / sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rdzu
143a3(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang / mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems
143a4(phal chen): can gyi spyod pa rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi phyog
143a5(phal chen): kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par phye ba'i spo nga
143a6(phal chen): yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang / chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas
143a7(phal chen): kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam
143a8(phal chen): par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khamasu kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par ngag la kun
143b1(phal chen): nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khas gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du
143b2(phal chen): rgud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / mig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang / 
143b3(phal chen): gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang / phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'o sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs
143b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ga sung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
143b5(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
143b6(phal chen): 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang / 
143b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ti
143b8(phal chen): 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / 
144a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thug su chung pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa
144a2(phal chen): sgo nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi don chang med pa mdzad pa'i sgo dang / chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi spo nga / byang chub kyi sem
144a3(phal chen): kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 
144a4(phal chen): mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab yongasu gapa rnam pa'i
144a5(phal chen): sgo dang / byang chub tshang med pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam pa ra dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho ma sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud dran pas
144a6(phal chen): kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ blo gros chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/ rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan
144a7(phal chen): ba 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos yongasu mi rgyu ga ye shes snang ba'i mig rab rib med pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud
144a8(phal chen): pa/ blo na mkha' ltar tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i mig can/ chags pa med pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye
144b1(phal chen): ba la mkhas pa zil gyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i rdul rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rjen gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma thob med pa/ 'jig rten gyi don byed
144b2(phal chen): pa la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi rdul dang rnam pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa ston pa/ dus kyi 'khor
144b3(phal chen): lo thams cad la dbang sgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re san/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyung 'di cid na/ yul mig gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de// de na dge slong ba la
144b4(phal chen): na sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sa mas dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon gyi
144b5(phal chen): rang bzangs kyis/ bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phya ga 'tshal te/ bu mo byams ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.ya sa phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te du
144b6(phal chen): me byabs pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zab mo khong du chud par bya
144b7(phal chen): brjesu bsal ba dang / sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjesu bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo rje su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes
144b8(phal chen): su bsam pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjesu bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rje su bas
145a1(phal chen): ba dang / 'gru ba thams cad rnam par srung pa'i bden pa'i dbyings pabs rna su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi dbyings rab ma rdzasu bsam pa dang / lus
145a2(phal chen): 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab po'o rjes su bsam pa dang / las kyis sna tshogs kyi dbyings zab mo rje su bsam pa byed cing / mthar gyis yul mig gsum pa gang na ba der phyir te/ yul gyi
145a3(phal chen): 'khor dang grong khyer gyi 'khor dang / tshong 'dus kyi 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi 'khor dang / yul gru'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi 'khor dang / drang srong dge ba sbyong ba'i gnas kyi 'khor dang / yul da
145a4(phal chen): phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang / rig sa la sul gyi 'khor dang / nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu/ dge slong bldan sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ des dge slong bstan
145a5(phal chen): sdug pa/ nags chal stug po zhog na gzhon nong ngar la bab pa/ thugs mdzes shing sdug la bltan yid du 'ong ga/ su mthon ting g.yas phyogasu 'khyil pa dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs
145a6(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can 'phral ba yangs pa/ mig dkar gnag 'phyes shing ril la/ rdzi ma pa'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzad la/ ra bar mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ 
145a7(phal chen): mdu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so ma'am zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshong ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lhang seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur bshas
145a8(phal chen): gang zhing rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la/ shin tu mdzes pa mdzod spu'i zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin
145b1(phal chen): yadangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stong seng ge'i stong ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing
145b2(phal chen): zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rkeng pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing
145b3(phal chen): drang ba/ brlar zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i byin ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang / mdog gser gyi kha
145b4(phal chen): dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogasu gyen du 'khyil pa/ shing n+ya gro nga'i rgyal po ltar chu zhing gab pa/ lus mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mig mo 'gebs shing
145b5(phal chen): mi rgod pa/ dran pa nye bar gnas pa/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar rtsa dang // nags tshal dang / sman dang shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyan ba/ blo shin tu yangs pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / yul
145b6(phal chen): la thub pa med pa/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba dang rlom sem dang g.yeng ba dang spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres
145b7(phal chen): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'o snang ba thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i bsam pa'i rgyun mi 'chad pa snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa skyes pa/ 
145b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongasu gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rje su dran zhing / 'gro
146a1(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi don du 'chag pa la zhugs te/ drag ngal med cing pad ral med la/ shin tu mdzes par 'chag pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
146a2(phal chen): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 
146a3(phal chen): dge slong blta na mdzes pa de 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu sgrub par byed do// rkang gis 'gro'i rnams rin po che'i pad mos gom pa 'dor
146a4(phal chen): ba'i tshe/ yongasu blangs pa byed do// me'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad mi shes pa rnams kyang / mun pa dang / rab rib rnam par sel to// 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lha rnams kyang / me tog mang
146a5(phal chen): po'i char mngon par 'beb so// sa'i lha mi g.yo ba'i snying po can rnam sa kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang ba stan to// na mkha'i lnga kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyang / 
146a6(phal chen): rnam pa'i dbyings yongasu brgyan pa byed do// rgya mtsho'i lha dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang / rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor ro// ri rab kyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo
146a7(phal chen): sbyar cing phyag 'tshal lo// rlung gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang spos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'thor ba'i rlung rab tu 'byed ngo // mtshan ma'i la gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa
146a8(phal chen): rnams kyang / lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal lo// nyin mo'i lha rtag tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can rnams kyang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing snang ba bskyed
146b1(phal chen): pa'i phyir na mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge slong blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la/ spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal
146b2(phal chen): nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la bzhin sbyar te/ legs par phyis nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo/ 
146b3(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu tshol ba zhig lags te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjesu bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag
146b4(phal chen): gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kha
146b5(phal chen): ni/ chos btab na ngang la bab pa/ rab tu byung bas btab na gsar du zhugs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos na/ tshe de 'dra ba gcig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang gsum cu
146b6(phal chen): brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi drung du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni nyin gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do// la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du/ la lar ni zla ba
146b7(phal chen): byed du/ la lar ni zla ba gcig tu/ la lar ni lo gcig tu/ la lar ni lo brgyar/ la lar ni lo stong du/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong du/ la lar ni lo bye bar/ la lar ni lho bye ba khrag khrig du/ la lar na
146b8(phal chen): me brjid du med pa'i yang brjod du meng par/ la lar ni bskal pa bar mar/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed du/ la lar ni bskal bar/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni/ bskal pa
147a1(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'ang nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las chos bstan pa thob te/ gdams ngag
147a2(phal chen): dang / rjesu bstan pa yang dag par blangs so// smon lam gyi rgyan yongasu sbyangs so// yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu sbyangs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongasu rdzogs
147a3(phal chen): par byas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu shes par byas so// de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su gzung ngo // de dag gi
147a4(phal chen): stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byas so// de dag gi bstan pa yang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du yongasu bzung ngo // kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi
147a5(phal chen): smon lam rnams kyang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis/ rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so// 
147a6(phal chen): kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rang gi spyod pa yong su dag par bya ba'i phyir
147a7(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub so// kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'ang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs so// gzhan yang
147a8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo 'chags 'di na 'chags pa'i tshe/ phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi spos mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang
147b1(phal chen): sngor lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'da' zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
147b2(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig la/ sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stong
147b3(phal chen): kyis/ stobs bcu'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa dag kyang snga phyi'i de
147b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
147b5(phal chen): la/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la de bzhin gshe gas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char
147b6(phal chen): rnams kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis chos kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa la
147b7(phal chen): mngon par 'bab bo// sems bskyed pa gcig la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du mang ba dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mig 'phrul lta bu yong su rdzogs par
147b8(phal chen): bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yong su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la/ ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod
148a1(phal chen): / du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gcig tu/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spos kyis/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
148a2(phal chen): 'khor thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la dbang po rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / dran pa'i mthar phyin pa'i dbang po thob par
148a3(phal chen): bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ dbang po'i 'khor lo dang / dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rje su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la/ dus kyi 'khor
148a4(phal chen): lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / sems can zad mi shes pa zang par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir
148a5(phal chen): mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la/ dus rgya ma tshe brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyang dus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa'i ye shes snang
148a6(phal chen): ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir ma don sum du 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
148a7(phal chen): rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kha bos byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs
148a8(phal chen): dang ldan par byung ba/ srog gi dbang po la rgyun 'chang pa med pa ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi bar 'gyur ba med pa mi shigs mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub
148b1(phal chen): pa cu'i chos dang mnyam pa'i yan lag dang nying lag du ldan pa'i lus can/ 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam paji la pa bzhin du/ rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i gzugs
148b2(phal chen): dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng yongasu ston pa/ me mngag dang / me lce dang / dug dang / mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing khor yug ltar thub pa med pa'i lus can/ 
148b3(phal chen): bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad
148b4(phal chen): du rnam par dmigs pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo thams cad du na ma par dmigs shing thos par 'gyur ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis ngor blta ba/ chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas su gyur
148b5(phal chen): pa phyogs kun du rnam par snang ba/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad na ma par gtong bas/ blta na mdzes pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba tha mas cad shin tu dpa' bar snang ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i rgyu 'thun
148b6(phal chen): ba las byung bas blta na dga' ba/ 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog u dum par lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nu re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di
148b7(phal chen): shing na/ yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ 
148b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nar bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / nan tan rnam par dag
149a1(phal chen): par bya ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang bas/ sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub cing / brgal thag chang pa'i sing
149a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa brtan pas/ kun tu gnas shing yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brtson pa/ byang
149a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sprin gyi char yongasu 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char yongasu mi ngoms pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad la
149a4(phal chen): 'jug pa'i smon lam mngon du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha lo sgyur bas/ yongs su sdud par bdag nyid yongasu gtong bar 'dod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha'i dgon pa pa chen po las
149a5(phal chen): bzla bar 'dod pa/ dge ba'i gsheg nyen blta ba dang / ma/ nA ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas/ yongasu mi ngoms pas/ chos kyi rim gro tshang med pa skyed pa dang ldan pa des/ dge slong bldan sdug
149a6(phal chen): pa'i rka pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong balnga na sdug pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas// yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong blda na sdug pa'i drung nas song gi/ 
149a7(phal chen): 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// / bapa po dgu bcu rtsa ba'i pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong blta na sdug pa de'i gdams ngag rdza su zlos
149a8(phal chen): shing / spel ba dang / bstud ba dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / bshad pa dang / so sor rnam par sgom pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'jug par
149b1(phal chen): bya ba dang / bkur ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yang dang yang bzlas pa dang / shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / snang bar bya ba dang / rje su rnam par
149b2(phal chen): blta bar byed cing / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis/ yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer sgo bzang po gang na ba der phyin te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug
149b3(phal chen): yongasu tshol tshol ba las/ ngo'i steng gi bar snang las/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis bos pa rigs kyi bu khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ni chu klung gi chu 'dus dang nye ba zhig na/ byis pa stong
149b4(phal chen): phrag bcu rtsam gyis bskor te/ bye ma la rtse bas pa zhing du'o/ zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba phangs grong khyer sgo bzang po dang / nye ba'i chu klung gi chu 'dus gang na ba der song ste phyin pa nga/ 
149b5(phal chen): des khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing / bye ma la tse bas tse ba mthong ngo // mthong na sa kyang khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gan ba der song ste/ khye'u dang
149b6(phal chen): po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug
149b7(phal chen): ste thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa
149b8(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos
150a1(phal chen): na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu
150a2(phal chen): kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ yi ge dang grangs dang / brda' dang / rtsis kyi tshul bslabs te/ bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go// de ltar
150a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bos ni 'jig rten na yig ge dang ming gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / brda' dang / shol thabs shes par bya ba dang / bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / khams kyi cho ga dang / dugags
150a4(phal chen): ba'i thabs dang / skem pa dang brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i ga don gyis btab pa gso ba dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / tshong 'dus dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / 
150a5(phal chen): gnas rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang rab dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i tshad shes par bya ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / shing rta sbyar ba'i tshul sna tshogs
150a6(phal chen): shes par bya ba dang / dge mi dge dang / 'jigs mi 'jigs kyi bltas dang / mtshan ma shes par bya ba dang / chos dang / tshong dang / rnam par spyad pa sbyar ba'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang / sems can gyi yan
150a7(phal chen): lag dang / nying lag gi mtshan gyi rgyud dang / rgyus dang / rnam par spyad pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan song gi las kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i tshul shes par bya ba dang / dge ba dang mi
150a8(phal chen): dge ba'i chos dang tshogs mchod pa shes par bya ba dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan song gi tshogs shes par bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin ga
150b1(phal chen): ba'i sa'i tshogs shes par bya ba dang / rgyu dang byed pa dang / sbyor ba'i rgyud shes par bya ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shes te/ de dag la sems can yongasu gzud bar byed do// rab tu dgod pa byed do// yong su
150b2(phal chen): gzhog par byed do// slob du 'jungad ngo do// skyong du 'dzud do// brtan par byed // lhur len par byed do// rdzogs par byed do// yongasu sgrub par byed do// yongasu spyod par byed do// gsal bar bstan pa byed do// rnam
150b3(phal chen): par 'phel bar byed do// mtshan mar byed de// mthar phyin par byed do// rnam par spong bar byed do// dri ma med par byed do// shin tu dag par byed do// 'od gsal zhing ngang bar byed do// shin tu langs par byed do// 
150b4(phal chen): de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi tshul shes pa de gang zhe na/ brgya stong phrag brgyan bye ba'o// bye ba bye ba na khong khong do khong khong khong khong na thang dgu'o// thang dgu thang dgun khrig
150b5(phal chen): khrig go// khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams so// thams thams thams thams na myang mying ngo // myang mying myang mying na gang ya'o// gang ya gang ya na ban bun no// ban bun pan bun na phyar phyur ro// 
150b6(phal chen): byar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go// lcug lcig lcag lcig na byang bying ngo // byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo// cham tsham tsham tsham na phyal phyol lo// phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do// khyud khyud khyud khyud na zar
150b7(phal chen): zer ro// bar zer zar zer na khrib khrib bo// khrig khrib khrib khri ba na ya gangs so// ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o// cho mcho ma na khram khrim mo// khram khrom khram khrim na nab nub bo// nab nub nab nub na sang
150b8(phal chen): sang ngo // sang sang sang sang na brgyud ya so// brgyud yas brgyud yas na btang yas so// btang yas btang yas na bkra yar ro// bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so// gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs
151a1(phal chen): med do// mdungs med mtshungs me na lam sum mo// lam lum lam sumanalal tshal lo// lal rol la ma yol na tha' khrul lo// thal khrul bral thul na thung thu / nga dru chu
151a2(phal chen): thung na bsam phyong ngo // bsam phyong bsam phyong na brang breng ngo // brang breng brang breng na bgrod yas so// bgrod las bgrod yas na bsngo yas so// bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go// zang ya gzang yag na 'phro brtse'o// 
151a3(phal chen): 'phro ba kye 'phro bkye na rtse 'phyo'o// rtse 'phyo rtse 'phyo na yong tan no// yong tan yong tan na drug g.yos so// drug g.yos brug g.yos na sang yal lo// sang yal sang yal na 'thing yug go// 'thing yug 'thing
151a4(phal chen): yug na yid 'phyo'o// yong 'phye yod 'phyon nab neb gon pa ne ba nab ne ba na khrig thams so// khrig thams khrag thams na yal yal lo// yal phal yal yal na bgrang yas so// bgrang yas 'grang yas na
151a5(phal chen): thug yal lo// thug yal thug yal na shang shang ngo // shang shang sha !ngan yag yag go// yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo// tham thim tham thim na rlom bskal lo// rlom bskal rlom bskal
151a6(phal chen): na gzhal 'phyos so// gzhal phyos gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo// gzhal yal g.yal yal na gzhal med do// gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to// gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim
151a7(phal chen): mo// gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo// gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so// gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go// gzhal thag gzhal thag na gzhal phul lo// gzhal phul gzhal
151a8(phal chen): dul na gzhal zhi'o// gzhal zhi gzhal zhin 'phyo 'gyur ro// 'phyo 'gyur 'phyo bgyur naka nyer ro// 1ra nye nyar nyer na phyag phyig go// phyag phyig phyag phyig na thal thul lo// zal zul bral thul nas las pa
151b1(phal chen): lo// sal sa la sal sal na g.yo ldag go// g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no// phan phun phan phun na brnang ya'o// brnang la brnang ya na rem 'drol lo// ram 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngang do// rdzi dang rdzi dang na rdzi
151b2(phal chen): rdul to// rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo// phun yol phun yol na dang ngang do// ngang ngang ngang ngang na bgrang brtsi'o// bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsin zab bgrang ngo // zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo // dga' rkyang
151b3(phal chen): dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal lo// gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug phyad do// khrug phyang khrug phyad na 'ol phyod do// 'ol phyod 'ol phyod na gdab yas so// gdab yas gang ba yas na gcal yas so// gcal
151b4(phal chen): yas gcal yas na bgrang yas so// bgrang yas bgrang yas na byaM/ ma 'phyo'o// byim 'phyo byim 'phyo na ya me'o// ya me ya me na ba/ stsal yas so// bsngal yas bskal yas na lngapa ldeb bo// 
151b5(phal chen): lnga pa lde ba lnga pa ldeb na 'ban chad // 'ban chang 'ban chad na phang phung ngo // phang phung phang phung na khye'u tsang ngo // khye'u tsang khye 'u tsang na zhung zung ngo // zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yalo// 
151b6(phal chen): mchog yal mchog yal na mthara' rdul to// mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so// yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo// bun lob bun lob na lam lam mo// lam lo ma lam lom na
151b7(phal chen): bskad yas so// bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo // lang ling lang ling na lnga pa ldib bo// lngapa ldib lngab ljib na mi brtsal to// mi brtsal mi brtsal na 'byam yas so// 'byam yas 'byam yas nang
151b8(phal chen): 'grang ngo // nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo// smos yal smos yal na bkra tshal lo// bkra chal bkra chal na lo rgyas so// lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo// 'bum rdib 'bum rdi ba na gam gu mo/ 
152a1(phal chen): gam gum gam gum na la lolo// la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos so// bgrang 'phyos bgrang 'phyol na 'grang 'phyos la bsgres pa'o// 'grang 'phyos la bsgres pa/ bgrang 'phyos la
152a2(phal chen): bsgres pa na/ dpag yas so// dpag yas dpag yas na/ dpag yas la bsgres pa'o// dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres pa na yal phyong ngo // yal phyong yal phyong na yal phyong la bsgres pa'o// 
152a3(phal chen): yal phyod la bsgres pa yal phyong la bsgres pa na/ mu yal lo// mu ya la mu yal na mu yal la bsgres pa'o// mu yal la bsgres pa/ mu yal la bsgres pa na/ bgrang yol lo// bgrang yol bgrang yol na/ 
152a4(phal chen): bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o// bgrang yol la bkres pa/ bsgrang yol la bsgres na/ mi 'jal to// mi 'jal mi 'jal na/ mi 'jal pal bsgres pa'o// mi 'jal la bsgres pa/ mi 'jal la bsgres
152a5(phal chen): na/ bsam phyod do// bsam phyod bsam phyong na/ bsam phyod la bsgre sa pa'o// bsam phyod la bsgres pa/ bsam phyod la bsgre sa na/ mtha' 'byam mo// mtha' 'byam mtha' 'byam na
152a6(phal chen): dpag thag go// dpag thag dpag thag na/ dpag thag la bsgres pa'o// dpag thag la bsgres pa/ dpag thag la bsgres na/ brjod du med pa'o// brjod du med pa/ brjod du med pa na/ brjod du med pa la
152a7(phal chen): bsgres pa'o// brjod du med pa la bsgres pa/ brjod du med pa la bsgres na/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o// de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung po chen po/ dpag tshad du ma'i
152a8(phal chen): tshang dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do// zhes bya ba nas/ bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang / brjod du med pa la bsgres pa/ 'di snyed cig yod do// zhes
152b1(phal chen): rab tu phye nas bgrangs brtsis ste grangs su bcang ngo // des bye ma'i phung por rtsis kyi brdar bstan pas shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'dzin/ 
152b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa kun na'ang yod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bya ba klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing
152b3(phal chen): rtsi'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
152b4(phal chen): ngag 'og dang steng gi phyog su'ang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag bgrang zhing rtsi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
152b5(phal chen): bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du bya ba/ gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
152b6(phal chen): ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing rtsi'o// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
152b7(phal chen): bsngar tu yod pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i bsal pa'i ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan tu yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brgyud pa bstan tu yod pa dang / chos kyi ming gcig nas
152b8(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa/ sems can gyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa de/ las kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yong pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub
153a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/ phyogs bcun ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bsan tu rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa
153a2(phal chen): rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ phyogs bcun ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ji skad yod pa thams cad kyang / bgrang zhing brtsi'o// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes sna chog
153a3(phal chen): chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs
153a4(phal chen): pa/ dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gra ngas la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
153a5(phal chen): cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo dbang sbyar ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'a ma/ spyod yul smos pa 'am/ yul brjod pa 'am/ stobs bsngag
153a6(phal chen): pa 'am/ bsam pa bstan pa 'am/ tshogs yongasu brjod pa 'am/ smon lam bshad bar bya ba 'am/ spyod pa yongs su bstan pa 'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa 'am/ yang dag pa
153a7(phal chen): bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa 'am/ ting 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa 'am/ ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer rgya
153a8(phal chen): mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma phul du zung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub bya nubs nga'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba
153b1(phal chen): dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas/ spu g.yos te/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur pa/ ngo mtshar gyi bsam
153b2(phal chen): rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang / bsam pas byung ba/ sangs rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang sgyur ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
153b3(phal chen): dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa/ thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rigs pa rnam par phye bas 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams
153b4(phal chen): mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dbang sgyur ba khams gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcog pa des/ khyi'u dbang ba'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa
153b5(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la la na brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ nga dang yang bltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung
153b6(phal chen): nas song so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge bar bshes pa/ nyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongasu 'dzin pa byed cing / gangs chen mtsho lhur sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms mi shes
153b7(phal chen): pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis/ dge ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las/ dbang po'i myu gu 'thon cing skyes pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i
153b8(phal chen): gdams ngag gi 'od zer gyi dra bas/ lus dang sems shin tu tshim par byas pa/ dpyid kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdung pa'i ri dgas kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la 'thung bar 'dod
154a1(phal chen): pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi rdul 'thung bar 'dod pa/ zung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang ldan pa'i pang mo
154a2(phal chen): ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis/ sems kyi me tog phun da ri ka kha bye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams
154a3(phal chen): ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag
154a4(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo ngam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i rnam pa'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
154a5(phal chen): gdams ngag thos pa'i chog su gyur pa'i bang shin tu ma ga/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyis brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi sgo ltar dge ba'i tha shes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las
154a6(phal chen): byung ba'i chos/ dri ma med pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms bltar dge ba'i
154a7(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi yongs su bskor cing / zil gyis mi non la gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de/ mthar kyis grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa gang
154a8(phal chen): na ba der phyin te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba yongasu tshol tshol ba las/ de la skye bo mang pos bstan te/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma phul du thung ba de/ grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug
154b1(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i gnas gang ba der song ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ sgo gang na sdong sdod pa dang / des dge bsnyen ma phul du thung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la/ yangs
154b2(phal chen): shing / rin po che'i ra bas yongasu bskor ba/ phyogs bzhi nas shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ga rin po che tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub
154b3(phal chen): pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste/ kun tu bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba/ phyugs cing shin tu gzhon la/ thog ma dar la bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog dam
154b4(phal chen): pa pri la pa/ shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ sa phye mar bzhag pa/ lus la rkyen med pa/ gos dang / smad g.yogs dkar po bgos pa/ rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa 'thob ste/ sangs rgyas dang / 
154b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par de'i lus sam/ sems kyi dbang ngam/ gzi brjid dam/ kha dog gis zil gyi sa mnon pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang med de/ lha 'am mi
154b6(phal chen): 'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba mthong ba gyu la de dag thams cad kyis kyang / dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig/ rin po che'i khri
154b7(phal chen): la 'dug pa mthong ngo // gzhan yang khyim de ni/ stan lha rdzas dang / mi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par smin pas yongasu grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba dang / 
154b8(phal chen): mdun du phru ba gcig cig bzhag pa las/ kha zas dang / skom gyi bag gam/ gos dang / rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci'ang mi snang ngo // bud med stong phrag bcu rtsa ma zhig mdun na 'dug
155a1(phal chen): par mthong na'ang / de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo spyod pa dang ldan pa ny+tsa
155a2(phal chen): bu me'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shis pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi lngab lhub kyis shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs
155a3(phal chen): snyan pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu moro chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang / ngas ci bsgo ba bzhin byed cing mdun na 'khod do// rim gro byed do// bkur sti byed do gdong
155a4(phal chen): du lta'o// ci bsgo banyan cing gnas so// rjesar 'khod do// yongs su lnga'o// rnam par lnga'o// 'dud ngo // rab tu 'dud ngo do// phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngang ldang bas ni/ grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad
155a5(phal chen): du/ dri zhim pas khyab par 'dug ste/ sems can gang gis dring tshor bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems ma dpa'i sems dang / shar gnyer med pa'i sems dang / 
155a6(phal chen): 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / zhum pa dang
155a7(phal chen): gzong mtho ba med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba med pa'i sems su gyur te/ gang
155a8(phal chen): gis de dag gi skang thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du
155b1(phal chen): rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar
155b2(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang
155b3(phal chen): dub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad
155b4(phal chen): // zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras
155b5(phal chen): pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba tho ba ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo no phru ba gcig po 'di las mos pa sna tshog
155b6(phal chen): can rnams/ kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du/ tshong ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha zas sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo na phru ba gcig po 'di las
155b7(phal chen): la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya'ang yongs su tshim par byed do// sems can stong dang / sems can brgya phrag stong dang / byed snre la/ kyadang/ sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sems can byed
155b8(phal chen): brgya phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang / ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs
156a1(phal chen): su tshims par byed do// yong su stobs par byed do// yongasu dga' bar byed do// yongs su mgu bar byed do// yongs su spro bar byed do// shin tu tshim par byed do// yang bde bar byed do// 
156a2(phal chen): 'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med de/ 'grib pa med do// dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// zang par mi 'gyur ro// 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro// sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro// mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// mu
156a3(phal chen): thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi
156a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba sbeng nas/ 
156a5(phal chen): sems can mos pa sna tshogs can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'ongs kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / 
156a6(phal chen): ro sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis yongasu tshim par byed do// yongasu dga' bar byed do// nyams bde bar byed do// shin tu tshim par byed/ yid shin tu bde bar byed do// 'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'god par
156a7(phal chen): 'gyur ba med de/ 'grib pa med do// dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// zang par mi 'gyur ro// sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro// mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// mur thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te/ phyogs
156a8(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang / bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ong bar gyur na yang / de dag thams cad ci la dga' ba'i kha zla
156b1(phal chen): kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas yid bde bar bye ba'i bar du byed do// kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs de/ ro dam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha
156b2(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs
156b3(phal chen): dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs
156b4(phal chen): kyis yongasu tshim par byed pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'a jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i
156b5(phal chen): tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed gcig bzhugs pa de dag tham sa cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos da nga / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu bsnyes par mdzad do// shar
156b6(phal chen): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig
156b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
156b8(phal chen): 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu zab steng dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi
157a1(phal chen): khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
157a2(phal chen): yang / brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing
157a3(phal chen): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu bsnyes par mdzad do// shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / 
157a4(phal chen): lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs na/ ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs
157a5(phal chen): kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu tshe gcig gis thog/ sa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de nga/ thams cad kyi/ kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po bya
157a6(phal chen): nub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba
157a7(phal chen): bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi
157a8(phal chen): khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
157b1(phal chen): dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba bsnyed dang / stong
157b2(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub
157b3(phal chen): sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas gsol cing snying po byang chub la bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med
157b4(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / 
157b5(phal chen): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang // steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ byang
157b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pham par
157b7(phal chen): mdzad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig
157b8(phal chen): rten gyi khams stong dang // 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
158a1(phal chen): stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag song dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
158a2(phal chen): dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong
158a3(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
158a4(phal chen): phra ba steng na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang
158a5(phal chen): bcas par pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs para'i bya nga chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo 'o 'khor bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ 
158a6(phal chen): smras pa/ 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bud med 'di dag la sogs pa brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i
158a7(phal chen): rtsa ba gcig pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i lam rnam par dag pa gcig pa kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo tshad
158a8(phal chen): med par gyur pa/ skal ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/ skal ba mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ skal ba mnyam par spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi tshul
158b1(phal chen): la zhugs pa/ skal ba mnyam par don nges par rtogs pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/ skal ba mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ skal ba mnyam par
158b2(phal chen): brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ skal ba mnyam par dbyangs rnam par dag pa/ tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas rnam par spyod pa/ thams cad la skal
158b3(phal chen): ba mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba med cing / rnam par dag pas bskal ba mnyam par las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu skyob
158b4(phal chen): par skal ba mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin par byed pas/ mi skye ba'i phyir/ skal ba mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa
158b5(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i lus yongasu ston pas/ skal ba mnyam par lus kyi las rnam pa ra dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha snyad la
158b6(phal chen): skal ba mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skal ba mnyam par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
158b7(phal chen): thams cad du skal ba mnyam par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob pa
158b8(phal chen): bya ba la skal ba mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa sha stag gcig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' su che
159a1(phal chen): gcig gis thogs pa rnams la/ zhal zas yongasu dbul ba'i phyir// phyogs bcu rgyas par 'dong ngo // phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing srong par tha ma pa dang / nyan thos dang / ra
159a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi thag pa pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo // phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad
159a3(phal chen): kha zas kyis yongasu tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo no// phru ba 'di nyid nas/ lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongasu tshim par byed do// klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/ gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod
159a4(phal chen): sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/ dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyis/ lha ma yin rnams ni/ lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyis// na mkha' lding rnams ni na mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/ mi 'am ci rnams ni mi 'am ci'i kha zas
159a5(phal chen): kyis/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/ mi// ma yin pa rnams ni/ mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongasu tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang
159a6(phal chen): de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro// dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i modo la 'di lta ste/ dge snyen ma phul du byung bas sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhig
159a7(phal chen): shar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhig/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyog
159a8(phal chen): dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag dge bsnyen mo phul du byung bas/ stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / 
159b1(phal chen): ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so// yongasu bstabs par byas so// yongasu dga' bar byas so// yongasu mgu bar byas so// yongs su spro bar byas
159b2(phal chen): so// shin tu tshim par byas so// yid bde bar byas so// kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro dam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs
159b3(phal chen): dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / 'dug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin
159b4(phal chen): po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs
159b5(phal chen): kyis yongasu tshim par byas nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongasu tshim par byas so// klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / 
159b6(phal chen): namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang / mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// 'on kyang
159b7(phal chen): phra ba de las god par gyur pa med/ 'gribs pa med/ dmas pa med/ zad par gyur pa med/ sa mtsham su gyur pa med/ mthar thug pa mang / mur thug pa med do// de nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba
159b8(phal chen): nges/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ 
160a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi zad pas/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bsags pas// na mkha' lta bur gyur
160a2(phal chen): pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu srung bas/ bsod nams chen po'i khor yug dang
160a3(phal chen): ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas/ bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pas/ bsod nams chen po'i mdzod la mngon sum du lta ba/ 'gro
160a4(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas/ bsod nams chen po'i'o sgron mar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon kan brjod par dus re san/ mang rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyung 'di cid na/ 
160a5(phal chen): grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag ma khas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji lta ra byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
160a6(phal chen): la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong da bon gyi bu nor bzangs dag bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung
160a7(phal chen): ba laM lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du rdung ba'i drung nas blta bas ngoms bzhin du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ 
160a8(phal chen): bsod nams kyi mdzad mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ bsod nams rgya mtsho la ni rje su sems/ bsod nams kyi namakha' de la ni kun tu lta/ bsod nams kyi phung po ra
160b1(phal chen): ni yongasu 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de la ni mngon par 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par sdud/ bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yongasu 'bog/ bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni rab tu
160b2(phal chen): 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongasu sbyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par lta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de la ni rje su dran par byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongasu 'dzin/ bsod nam
160b3(phal chen): kyi rgyung de ni yongs su sbyong ba byed cing / mthar kyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyung dang / 
160b4(phal chen): dge pa'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas/ skyo ba med pa'i btsun
160b5(phal chen): 'grus dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba tha mas cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / dag pa'i
160b6(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mo 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thad
160b7(phal chen): dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongasu smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
160b8(phal chen): thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag
161a1(phal chen): par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas/ chos kyi snang ba yang dag pa blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba
161a2(phal chen): rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / khyim bdag mkhas pa yongasu tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi dbus/ lam gyi gni mdo zhig na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la/ rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i khri/ 
161a3(phal chen): nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in dra nI la sna tshogs kyis spras pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis/ 
161a4(phal chen): gzugs legs par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ gam yo nas/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rin po
161a5(phal chen): chetshe'i bla re chen po bres pa/ bla nas gser dang / rin po che'i me tog gi lnga ldi mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba dri ma med pa/ bai dUR+Ya las byas pa
161a6(phal chen): ni drung nas bsgreng zhing bzung / g.yag rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab/ ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yab/ spos kyi rim gro yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs shing bsnyungs/ rol mo bdungs pa
161a7(phal chen): dang / dkrol ba lha rdzas kyi dablangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam ni g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrol/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams shin tu dga' bar
161a8(phal chen): bya ba'i don du/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur pa/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam par spyod spyod pa/ ngag nyan cing ci dga'
161b1(phal chen): bar byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongasu grub pa/ lha dang mi'i gzugs la shin tu 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug
161b2(phal chen): pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ khyims bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa
161b3(phal chen): la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi ba
161b4(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba la dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas mngon par gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang
161b5(phal chen): dag par bskyal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying rje 'i rlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams
161b6(phal chen): cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i dgon pa
161b7(phal chen): las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / chos la dga' zhing mos pa yang dag par skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad khams gsum gyi grong brdal
161b8(phal chen): nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzung bar/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang / ji
162a1(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
162a2(phal chen): ngag dang rje su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslab na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 
162a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod
162a4(phal chen): kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so la gso// rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub
162a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu tshol ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro
162a6(phal chen): bya bas sgying lug pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid mi bde ba mi skyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang / 
162a7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dad pa'i yid las rnam par mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba las phyir mi zlogs pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag
162a8(phal chen): gi tshul la zhum pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas mi skyo ba de lta buni shin tu dkon no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong mod/ smras pa/ 
162b1(phal chen): 'phags pa mthong ngo smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu bskyed
162b2(phal chen): pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas bstud de/ gsos pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnams par bskyed
162b3(phal chen): pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog
162b4(phal chen): pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la btsud pa'o// de dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyung du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud bar
162b5(phal chen): byal dkod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabasu gyur pa yin no// rag/ sa kyi bu kho bo ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams
162b6(phal chen): mang po thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / ro dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams
162b7(phal chen): la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / blag pa 'dod pa rnams la blag pa dang / mur ba 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnam
162b8(phal chen): la me tog dang / 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / thug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / phye ma 'dod pa rnam
163a1(phal chen): la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lha ba lbub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lha ba lbu ba dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la
163a2(phal chen): dngul dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la
163a3(phal chen): na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / dga' ba 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang / glang po dang rta dang shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang ra lug 'dod
163a4(phal chen): pa rnams la/ glang po dang rta dang shing rta dang / ba lang dang bong bu dang ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan 'dod pa rnams la/ rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / bran po
163a5(phal chen): dang bran mo 'dod pa rnams la/ bran po dang bran mo dang / 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod pa rnams la bud med dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la
163a6(phal chen): gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la/ cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la/ thor pag dang bcas pa'i
163a7(phal chen): gtsug go rin po che dang / skra mthon ting dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la/ sra mthon ting dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams
163a8(phal chen): la yang / yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdong dang de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pa des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i ma
163b1(phal chen): la/ sems can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha dad pa dang / yul dang gnas tha dad pa dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / 
163b2(phal chen): tshong 'dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'od kyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa mi
163b3(phal chen): mthun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rlung tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / ming du bya ba tha dad pa nas/ sems can skye mched rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ kha zas sna
163b4(phal chen): tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba gtsang ba 'dod pa dang / sha 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du
163b5(phal chen): skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras can dang / sran can dang / khur ba dang / skyo ma dang / nya dang / sha la sogs pa/ khams kyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don
163b6(phal chen): tu gnyer ba dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na/ rnam par spyod pa dag las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don tu gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang byang
163b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang / khyim bdag mkhas pa la slong
163b8(phal chen): mo 'debs so// gdong du lta'o// sdod do// gsol ba 'debs so// de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas/ slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams ste/ na mkha' la bltas pa dang / nam
164a1(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas dang / gtung ba rnam pa sna tshogs/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ongs pa
164a2(phal chen): gyur to// des de dag yongasu blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slongs mo pa/ mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis
164a3(phal chen): yongasu tshim par byas so// ci 'dod pa yongasu byin no// rab tu dga' bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so// dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas nyams shin tu bde bar byas so// yid rab tu dga' bar bya'o// 
164a4(phal chen): ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas nas/ des kyang mchog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bas gas pa'i rgyud yongasu brjod de chos bstan to// phongs pa thams
164a5(phal chen): cad 'byung mi sring pa'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang / snying pa chen po yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod
