164a6(phal chen): pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos shin tu
164a7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang / thub pa med pa'i stobs rnams par dag pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang / bla na med pa'i kha zas yongasu shis pa 'thob pa 'byung
164a8(phal chen): ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'jom pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs mi zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'ang yongs su brjod pa bya ste chos bstan to// des kha zas
164b1(phal chen): don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la na mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par
164b2(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des btung ba don tu gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la/ btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma thob med pa/ yid shin tu dga' bar byed pa/ de dag gis tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor
164b3(phal chen): bas sgom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to// des ro'i mchog don tu gnyer zhing
164b4(phal chen): 'ongs pa rnams la/ ro'i mchog sna tshogs dang rab dang / skur ba dang / la na tsha dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska' ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongasu tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i
164b5(phal chen): mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des bzhon pa don du ga nyer zhing / phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongasu bsdud de/ de dag thag
164b6(phal chen): pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des gos don tu gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te/ namakha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / 
164b7(phal chen): rnam pa'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ kha dog sna tshogs can/ kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'then cing / 
164b8(phal chen): lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gi slongs mo pa de dag la yongasu bsdud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang / mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par
165a1(phal chen): 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slongs mo pa rnams la bsrung byas nas/ ci rig su chos bstan to// 
165a2(phal chen): ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi
165a3(phal chen): mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yo byad la dbang thob pa/ rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thad
165a4(phal chen): lag pas yong su khebs par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char
165a5(phal chen): rab tu 'bebs pa/ de bzhin du rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna choH
165a6(phal chen): kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / me togs kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / 
165a7(phal chen): bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sprin gyi char
165a8(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad yong su
165b1(phal chen): smin pa dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs
165b2(phal chen): kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grongs khyer seng ge'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de// de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
165b3(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs ste/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos
165b4(phal chen): kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/ de'i byin gyi brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / de la rag lus par ga/ 
165b5(phal chen): ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems rgyun mi 'a chad par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' na tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
165b6(phal chen): gnyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang tshig mnyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dang ba'i dbang po la bsam pa
165b7(phal chen): byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis btams te btang bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen cing bkur ba dang / rjesu 'brang bar bya ba'i sems kyis khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
165b8(phal chen): 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nar bzangs
166a1(phal chen): bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi ri bo don yongasu spyod / bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par
166a2(phal chen): 'jog/ bsod nams kyi mdzod do ni rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams kyi gter de la ni shin tu blta/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongasu spyong / bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len/ bsod nams
166a3(phal chen): kyi stobs de ni yongasu bskyed / bsod nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug pud yongasu tshol
166a4(phal chen): tshol ba las/ tshong 'dus kyi srang zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces
166a5(phal chen): smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa' smod pa la bslab par bgyi
166a6(phal chen): dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal na/ 'phags pa lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man ngag legs par mi stsal tam/ 
166a7(phal chen): de nas chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag nas bzung ste/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de/ khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo
166a8(phal chen): khyim la ltos shig ces nas/ des bltas na khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa ste/ yangs shing mtho la dngul gyis ra bas bskor bshel gyi rtsigs pas
166b1(phal chen): shin tu legs par brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa/ bai DUr+ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa/ mu sa ra gal ba'i ka ba bkye ba mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shin tu bshams
166b2(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin bo che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu
166b3(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa a sma gar ba las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/ rgya che zhing yangs pa/ 
166b4(phal chen): rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/ shin tu mtho ba/ sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'a dug pa mthong nas/ des khyim de'i nang du phyin te/ kun tu bltas na/ rim khang tha ma'i nang na/ bza' ba dang / btung ba'i rnam pa
166b5(phal chen): yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na/ gos rgya rnam pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang ga/ sum pa'i nang na/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang lha ba lhub
166b6(phal chen): yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na/ btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba/ bud med rin po che sa chen po'i steng na bzang du bya ba yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo // rom khang lnga pa'i
166b7(phal chen): pa'i nang na/ sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos yang dag par bgro ba'i dga' ba la mos pa/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad
166b8(phal chen): mngon par sgrub pa/ gzungs kyi tshul dang / ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / ting 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang / ting 'dzin la rnam par spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'an
167a1(phal chen): par mam nga / ma 'ang drug pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab gan tubab pa rab tun pa'i chos thams cad mngan
167a2(phal chen): bar shes pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgra dang / snying po mang pos sgo kun nas 'byung ba/ bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul can/ mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa chos yang dag par 'gro ba la rnam par 'dul
167a3(phal chen): ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgomang po yang dag par 'gro ba byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa
167a4(phal chen): mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgon pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro da thams cad du ye shes rnam par bye ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi
167a5(phal chen): ro du phyin pa'i sgo mi g.yo ba'i glong zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pa ro tu byin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang / shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / 
167a6(phal chen): rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gru ba thams cad mos par byed cing / rjesu 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i na bya bzhin 'drang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / 
167a7(phal chen): sa ba kyi sar ma phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtshor snying ba zhes bya ba dang / sa kyi pha rol tu byed pa'i ni kun tu kha'i btang sams tho pa zhes bya ba da / shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgom dzad pa'i mdzo ldan pa
167a8(phal chen): bya dang / shes pa kyi b.ram khyen pa rnams cos cad kyi tshul rgya mtshonas bya ba dang / shes rab gyi b.rab tsun pa'i rdo 'grol rgya ma tsho'i su song gas bya dang / gas gyi ros du phyid pa'i
167b1(phal chen): pa med pa'i spobs pa nas bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnargyas kyi smin lang rigs pas rim pas mi darigs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par snang dag las sogs pa/ 
167b2(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa grangs med pa brgyad stong phrag bcu chang bar yang dag par bgro ba byed cing / rgyan brjod du med pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur to// rim khang / 
167b3(phal chen): bdun pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi smon yang dag par 'dzin/ 
167b4(phal chen): pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo // rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu/ 
167b5(phal chen): ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'gyu nga ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas/ 
167b6(phal chen): gung du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku la yang dag par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa/ 
167b7(phal chen): stes kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo // rim khang dgu pa'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / ma khang bcu pa'i nang na/ de bzhin gshes/ 
167b8(phal chen): thams cad thosam byang drug du gyu ma byed pa dang / byung ba dang / 'azung ba dang / sngon lam rgya mtsha dang / sangs rgyas kyirnam par 'phrul ba'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag 'a' kyang rtsal
168a1(phal chen): thams cad dang bcas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang bcas par mthong // mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon
168a2(phal chen): rin chen gtsug pud la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mnga' na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de/ ji lta bu zhig du sbyang ba mdzad mdzad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yo
168a3(phal chen): su bskrun bskrun/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos dran te 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol gcig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo
168a4(phal chen): sna tshogs shes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od zer mtha' yas pas/ yongasu brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes dbya ba mkhyen pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
168a5(phal chen): rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo spur gtudang mi rnams kyi ston pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snar
168a6(phal chen): bal sogs pa/ nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang / ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / thabs gcig tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/ 
168a7(phal chen): bza' shing ra ba chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis mdzes pa'i zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas/ tshong 'dus kyi srang nas bzhud pa'i tshe/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de
168a8(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung / spos kyi ril lu gcig gcig kyang bsregs te/ bdug spos kyis
168b1(phal chen): bsrung so// spos kyi ril lu gcig po de de ltar bsregs pas/ zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas/ yongasu khebs
168b2(phal chen): par gyur to// spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dus gsum du dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
168b3(phal chen): sgrib pa thams cad mi mnga' ba'o// nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongasu byang ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen po tshad med pa bsgrub par 'gyur
168b4(phal chen): ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyuraro zhes dri skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ 
168b5(phal chen): spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi/ sa sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i
168b6(phal chen): rtsa ba de yang / kho bos gnas gsum du yongasu bsngos te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang dam nga'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen sa sa
168b7(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngos so// rigs kyi bu kho bos na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs
168b8(phal chen): pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po che tshad med pa'i 'byung gan su gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang tha mi dad pa la zhugs pa/ tha mi dad pa'i
169a1(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par 'dzin pa/ tha ma dad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ ting 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa/ 
169a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad tha mi dad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun gcig tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad cing rnam par mi rtogs par spyod pa/ dus gsum tha mi dad pas mnyam pa nyid la tu/ 
169a3(phal chen): pa/ bskal pa thams cad tha mi dad par yongasu gnas pas/ mi skyo gakun tu lta ba tha ma dad pa'i yul gyis la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re snyan/ song rigs kyi bu ste phyogs kyi rjud
169a4(phal chen): 'di nyid na yul swa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba zhes byab/ 'dug gis/ de'i gan du seng la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chu
169a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gyi tshu raban rin chen gtsug pud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
169a6(phal chen): chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug pud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug gi drung nas song ngo // 
169a7(phal chen): bam po dgu bcu lnga pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam/ 
169a8(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brtan pas/ shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam gyi rnam parang / 
169b1(phal chen): pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjesu song ba'i sem
169b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongasu skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gyis thub med pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyal mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa' ba'i ye shes snang ba mtha'
169b3(phal chen): yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ mthar gyis yul spa rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yong su tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs pa sa
169b4(phal chen): dang yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang / skang dang gshong dang / mnyam pa dang mo mnyam pa thams cad du yongasu skyo ba med pa'i bsam pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sems dang / ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thub pa/ 
169b5(phal chen): med pa'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag ma brjed pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa mno ra bas sems rab tu bsgos pa dang / sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs
169b6(phal chen): pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ bag med pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mig dang rna ba g.yeng ba med par kun tu tshol tshol nas/ yul spa'i rtsa ba'i dbus shig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong 'dus kyi rdul stong phrag bcu'i
169b7(phal chen): gnas su gyur pa de/ shin tu bzang po grub pa/ brtan pas bskor ba/ shin tu mtho ba/ bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba yang / spos 'tshong gi khyams shig
169b8(phal chen): na 'dug pa mthong nas/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/ spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phag
170a1(phal chen): / pa bdag gis than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na// da kar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems can srung pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyibs
170a2(phal chen): 'tshal to// smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lag so leg so// rigs kyi bu kho bas ni sems can thams cad kyi nang shes te/ rlung las gyur pa dang / 
170a3(phal chen): mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bang kan las gyur pa dang / cha mnyam par 'khrugs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa dang / mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / sngags dang / mtshon dang / ro langs
170a4(phal chen): ba'i sbyor bsna tshogs dang / me las gyur pa dang / chus bskyod par lus gyur pa dang / sngas pas 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so/ nang de dag thams cad zhi bar bya ba'ang shes te/ 'a
170a5(phal chen): ra skyem par bya ba'ang rab tu shes sdug par byab dang / bgrub dang / brta ba dang / ga ba dang / snam chog dang/ gdugs dang / lums dang / thug pa dang / dunas pa dang / 'thung
170a6(phal chen): gdon med par bya ba dang / bcud dang / khrus dang / gzhag pa dang / bskyed pa dang / kha dog sbyang ba dang / nyam bstod pa'ang rab tu shes / rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung
170a7(phal chen): du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyi nang thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar byed de// nad sos kyang legs par bkru ba dang / lus la byug pas byug byas nas ci tshul gyi rgyan kyis yan lag shin tu brgyan
170a8(phal chen): te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/ kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs kyis yongasu tshim par byas ste/ nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do// de'i 'og tu yang de dag la
170b1(phal chen): mi gtsang ba bstan cing 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// byams pa chen po yongasu bsngags shing zhes sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// chos rnam par dbye ba bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba'i phyir chos ston
170b2(phal chen): to// ldang par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad yong su brjod cing byad
170b3(phal chen): nub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung du med pa/ yongasu bstan cing snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa yang
170b4(phal chen): dag par bsngags shing yon tan chang mang pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba yongasu bstan cing / theg pa chen po'i smon lam
170b5(phal chen): 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad da nga / bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin tu rgyas par bshad cing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i
170b6(phal chen): spyod pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu bsngags shing mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// 
170b7(phal chen): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongasu dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing / de bzhin
170b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ro rgyu yongasu ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thub par dka' ba yongasu
171a1(phal chen): stan to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zil gyis mnon pa rnam par dag pa yongasu sun no/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing / 
171a2(phal chen): chos kyi sku yongasu ston to// thabs ma khas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon tu gyur pa'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongasu ston to// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod
171a3(phal chen): cing / bskal pa thams cad kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongasu ston to// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongasu brjod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par
171a4(phal chen): 'byung ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yong su ston to// ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam/ deb ji lta bu bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i su rnam par dag pa yongs
171a5(phal chen): su stan to// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par ldog pa ma ngasu brjod cing bltan phul du bzang ba'i su rnam par dag pa yongasu ston to// de ltar de dag chos kyi smyon pas yongasu bsdus te/ 
171a6(phal chen): nor dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do// yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos dang / bdug spos dang / bsgo ba dang / bsku ba sbyor shes te/ 'di ltar spos kyi rgyal
171a7(phal chen): po gzhal du med pa las sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal posan du ba ra las sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi 'pham pa las sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal byed las sogs pa dang / spos kyi
171a8(phal chen): rgyal po nyi ma yod pa las sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dus dang 'thun pa las sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan las sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ga ru las logs
171b1(phal chen): pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mo 'khrugs pa las sogs pa spos sbyar ba thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// yang rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad
171b2(phal chen): nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod
171b3(phal chen): pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i mthus kho bo sems can thams cad yongasu skyo ba pa'i rgyan gyi sprin byin gyis rlob pa
171b4(phal chen): byed de/ 'di ltar spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan nas// rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do// rigs kyi
171b5(phal chen): bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya bar 'dod pa/ ra gyur pa de'i tshe/ kho bo sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas blta zhing
171b6(phal chen): mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin chad gzung du med pa bton cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
171b7(phal chen): chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du spros thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlobs pa byed do// chos kyi dbyings thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
171b8(phal chen): cad yongasu sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi khang po'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi sa
172a1(phal chen): chung gi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi bu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi zla gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / sras kyi gdugs rgya sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rgyal mtshan pasgreng bar sprin gyi rgyan dang / 
172a2(phal chen): spos kyi lha'i bdan gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi bla re'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi 'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / 
172a3(phal chen): thad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob ste/ rigs kyi gru bo bos ni sems can thams cad yong su tshim par byed pa dang // sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
172a4(phal chen): ba'i spos kyi gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpar sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur/ pa blta na don yong pa/ 'grogs na don yod pa/ rjesu dran na don yod pa/ 
172a5(phal chen): brtul zhugs rjesu byas na ngan yang ba/ ming thos na don yong pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyan mo/ bzhi bar 'gyur ba// mthong ba cam gyis sems can rnams ngan so
172a6(phal chen): zud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs bye ba thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams/ 
172a7(phal chen): cad zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams thams cad
172a8(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rga shi'i grog po dang g.yang sar mi ltung ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can
172b1(phal chen): rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud
172b2(phal chen): 'di nyid na/ grong khyer ta la rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar/ 
172b3(phal chen): nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba la lan brgya stong du mar ga
172b4(phal chen): phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpo na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
172b5(phal chen): de dag rje su dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis/ dmas ngag gi sgo de dag rje su dran par bya ba dang / bdag ning / ge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo zhes rang gi sems
172b6(phal chen): yongasu tshim par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyis yongasu bsrungs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro snyam du rnam par sems shing sems
172b7(phal chen): dga' ba ni rab tu thob sems dang ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems mgu ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems kyi shugs dang / sems rnam par zhi ba dang / sems
172b8(phal chen): rgya chen po dang / sems rgyan dang / sems la thogs pa med pa dang / sems la slob pa med pa dang / sems rnam par phye ba dang / sems yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sems kyi dbang dang / sems dpang
173a1(phal chen): sgyur ba dang / sems kyi chos la du chud pa dang / sems kyis zhing rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems sangs rgyas mthong bas brgyan pa dang / sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang / mi 'bral ba'ang / 
173a2(phal chen): thob nas de mthar gyis ldongs nas ljongs dang / grong nas grong dang / yul nas yul du tshol zhing grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po ma gang na bzhugs shes dris na/ de la 'gro bzhin dag
173a3(phal chen): gis 'di skad du bstan te/ rigs kyi bu 'di re/ rgyal po mon// rgyal tha ngon bsgrub pa'i phyir/ seng go'i bdan la bzhugs shing rgyal po'i phrin las mdzad do// khams rab tu stong ngo // chang pas gcad par 'os/ 
173a4(phal chen): pa ni chang pas bcing ngo // bya dgas bsdu bar bas pan bya dgas srung // gaman yod pa'i rnams lani rgyang rmed do/ cod pan dmas kyi nam tshan mang su gtsang // dma' ba rnams ni dbugs
173a5(phal chen): 'byin to// dregs pa rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad do// sngags gtso/ daM pa las ni rnam par bzlog go// ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam bar 'byed pa mdzad do// gzhan gyis yong su bzung ba la mngon par
173a6(phal chen): zhen pa ni rnam pa bzhi par mdzad do// brdzun du smra ba las ni phy-i zlog pa mdzad do// phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par dbral bar mdzad do// zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do// tshig kyal ba las ni yongs
173a7(phal chen): glon no// chags sems dang ni mo 'dre bar mdzad do// gnod sems dang ni rgyang srong ngo // log par lta ba ni 'dre ba med par mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs rgyal po ma gang na ba der phyin na des
173a8(phal chen): mthong ba/ rgyal po ma de rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/ rin po che
173b1(phal chen): gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yi 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lcag bod kyi dra bas legs par blas shing chu btags pa/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas
173b2(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin po tsha dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad mo'i stong po can lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar bting ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyis shin tu bdugs pa/ 
173b3(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i bdan brgya phrag rnam par bris pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes
173b4(phal chen): par byas pa/ steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna tshogs shes pa zhig la 'dug cing / de ni gzhon zhing dar la bab pa ga/ zugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba/ sgra mthon thing g.yas
173b5(phal chen): phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug gtor gyi spyi bo can 'phral ba yangs pa mig dkar na/ ga 'byes shing / rdzim pa'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs la
173b6(phal chen): shing bzang la/ ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i
173b7(phal chen): ljang seng ga'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa/ ma bur ba shas rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i theg la can/ na shal ring zhing lbod
173b8(phal chen): par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying kha dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stong seng ge'i stong ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu
174a1(phal chen): rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dra bar 'brel pa'i sor mo can/ gang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu
174a2(phal chen): mtho ba/ rkeng pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla' zlum pa/ po mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas en la'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa/ 'od
174a3(phal chen): 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba s+phu re ra nas g.yas phyogs gyen du 'khyil pa/ shing n+ya gro nga'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu
174a4(phal chen): brgyan pa/ mgo la nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa'i 'phral rgyan zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ rna ba las rin po che in dra nI la'i rna
174a5(phal chen): dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa'i sa mdzal zad kyis snang bar byas pas/ dri ma med pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i dpung rgyan dang / gdu
174a6(phal chen): pus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po rin po che bai DUR+Ya dri ma med pa'i yub can rin po che shar bu brtse phrag bcus rnam par phye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can/ 
174a7(phal chen): nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can rin po che'i dril gyi phreng ba las s+tha snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ nor bu rin pa che'i 'od phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing
174a8(phal chen): bsgreng ba/ rgyal po'i gzi dang dbang chen po la gnas pa/ srong la gzhan gyi 'khor gyis gtse ba med pa/ dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo // de'i 'khor/ 
174b1(phal chen): kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa la brtson pa mthong ngo // de'i mdun na chad pas gcod pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma lta bu/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu/ 
174b2(phal chen): 'jigs 'jigs lha'i gos gyon pa gtum zhing mi bzang la 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/ mig dmar ba/ so gtsigs pa gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ral gyi dang / sta re dang lcags
174b3(phal chen): tshangs mdung dang / mda' dang / ber ga dang / mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha dang lag cha thogs pa/ lus dang bzhin gyi dbyings mo sdug cing / 'jig su rung ba/ sprin nag po ltar 'dug pa/ mi snyan cing brlang
174b4(phal chen): la/ sdang ba'i sgra drag po 'byin pa/ gzi bltar bar dkar ba la jigs pa chen po skyed pa/ srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gum par byed pa de lta bu dag chad pas gcad par 'os pa'i se
174b5(phal chen): can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo // de na srog chag sa rku ba/ gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/ sems can gyi longs spyod chung smon pa/ lam sbugs shing 'phrog pa/ grong dang grong khyer
174b6(phal chen): dang / grong rdal dang / lhas la mes gtong ba/ grong du chom po byed pa/ khyim phugs 'debs pa/ sdig sdig ltar byed pa/ dug ldud pa/ bkrugs ma byed pa/ thong mi byed pa/ byi ba byed pa/ logs par zhugs
174b7(phal chen): pa/ gnod par sems pa 'dod chen che ba/ sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las mi bzad pa byed pa/ brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing / rgyal po ma'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de dag la'ang
174b8(phal chen): rgyal po mas ci rigs par chad pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo // des de na rgyal po mes bsgo zhing / la la ni rkang lag bcad / la la ni rna ba dang sna bcang / la la ni mig phyung / la la ni yan lag dang nying
175a1(phal chen): lag dang mgo bcang / la la ni lus thams cad mes btang / la la ni bca'i chu khol mas lus la gtor cing / lpags pa brnyil ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i chang pa sna tshogs du
175a2(phal chen): ma mi bzad pa/ drag pa brlab pa yid du mi 'ong ba/ srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed par mthong ngo // gsad pa'i sa de na yang / bsad pa'i rka lag dang / rna mig dang / sna dang / mgo dang / yan lag dang / nyid lag
175a3(phal chen): gi phung po ra tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo // khrag gi mcho dpag tshad gsum tsam du gzab su zab la chu zheng du dpag chad du ma yod pa yang mthong ngo // de na shi ba'i keng rus yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mgo
175a4(phal chen): bral ba brgya stong du ma la/ spyang khi dang / wa dang / khyi dang / bya rgodadang / khwa dang / bya ku ra ra mang pos gang ste/ 'drid cing 'thog pa mthong ngo // de la yang la la ni kha dog gyur te/ sngon por gyur
175a5(phal chen): pa tsam/ la la ni rnam ma ni ma sa la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du rmu ra te/ shin tu skye g.ya' zhing 'ji 'dik+ta ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo ngo// / gsang pa de dag bsod pa'i tshe/ mi sdug tsho dgur byas pa
175a6(phal chen): na/ 'jigs 'jigs skang dang / snying rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing / cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos na/ spyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po skyed pa/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu
175a7(phal chen): yang thos so// des de ltar kha btags ste btungs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to// bdag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa
175a8(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongasu tshol zhing 'bad de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi/ mi dge ba ni gang zhig
175b1(phal chen): spa shes 'dri 'drin/ rgyal po mo 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang med de/ kha na ma tho ba chen po rims la spyod pa/ yid kyi yongasu rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/ sems can pha rol gyi srog gcad pa la zhugs
175b2(phal chen): pa/ sems can pha rol shin tu mnar ba la brtson pa/ tshe phyi ma la lta ba med pa/ ngan song gi g.yang sa'i gang kha na 'dug pa zhig na/ 'di las ci byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thob par 'gyur ram snyam
175b3(phal chen): ste dang de ltar sems shing yid la byed de/ sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa la mngon par brtson pa/ snying rje rgya chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa de la/ steng gi nam pa'i dbyings las lha mang pos bos
175b4(phal chen): pa/ rigs kyi bu drang srong rgyal ba'i drod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag tu bya ba mi dran nam/ des gyen tu rnam pa'i dbyings la bltas nas dran zhes/ brjod do// lha rnams kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
175b5(phal chen): ljong dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la de ltar the tsom ma skyed cig/ rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni/ yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi log pa ma yin no/ rigs kyi bu byang chu
175b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas/ spyod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can yongasu sdud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis
175b7(phal chen): mi khyab bo// sems can tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can gzeng bstod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khya'o// sems can yongasu sbyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems
175b8(phal chen): can yongasu sbyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can 'jud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mo khya'o/ sems yong su smin par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes
176a1(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab go/ sang rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dris shig ces nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor b.rangs kyis/ lha ngag mnyan to// rgyal po me gang na bder sa
176a2(phal chen): ste/ byin nas/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di gad ces smraso/ 'phags pa
176a3(phal chen): bdag gis blan mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa
176a4(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjesu bstan pa mdzad zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'dab pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang nga chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du
176a5(phal chen): bgyi ba bdag la bkar stsal du gsol// de nas rgyal po mas rgyal po'i bya/ kha byas te/ seng ge'i khri las langs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba ngas kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung te/ rgyal po ro pho brang tala'i
176a6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan du khring ngo //  mthar gyis rang gi gan su phyin nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrod de/ khri la bzhugs nas 'di skad ces smra'o// rigs kyi bu nga'i khyim dang longs spyod la bltos shes nas/ des
176a7(phal chen): bltas na/ khyim de rgya che zhing yangs la/ rin po che bdun gyi rabs yongasu bskor ga/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin no
176a8(phal chen): che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'o shin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa tha dad par rnam par phye zhing bris pas rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig dmar po'o ka rba/ 
176b1(phal chen): / bkye gnang du seng ge'i khri mus rag pa las byas pa rin po cha bcu stong du mas rnam pa sna chogasu brgyan pa shin tu bshams panor bu rin po tshe sgra snang bu'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba steng nas no/ 
176b2(phal chen): phuchen po che rnam par snang ba'i tha re bres pa/ yid bzhin gyi nar burin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas// kun nas yog pa/ nor bu 'on pa cha sna chags grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa'i bgam kyi rgyan dang rdzu
176b3(phal chen): sa rgya chum ma pas gang ba rnya pa ma sa kyangags 'angs pa 'dug papa mjig dang 'a bar bung med yang shing rnams bstan rdzu pa
176b4(phal chen): rnam pa bzang ba'i phul du bya ba dang ldan ga spu rdu la thams cad kyi rdul la mkhas pa sngon du ldang ba/ phyinas la ba byams pa ranga'i sems dang ldan gaji bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing gnyan pa byes
176b5(phal chen): brag bcu yang 'khod par mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po mes/ tshong dpon gyichu nor dazangs la 'di skad ces spras// rigs kyi bu ji snyam du seM sa cig sdig pa byed pa rnams la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa man
176b6(phal chen): bar grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yong dam 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yong ngam/ spyod pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ dbang phyugs dang dbang chen po phun sum
176b7(phal chen): rmo pa 'di lta bu long ngam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa de lta bu ni ma mchi so// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sems
176b8(phal chen): can 'di dag kyang / phal char srog gcod pa byed pa/ ma byin par len pa/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa/ brdzun du smra ba phra ma can/ tshig brlang por smra ba khyung rgyal du brjod pa/ chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod
177a1(phal chen): sems can log par lta ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa khro zhing gtum pa/ khab rgyal can mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod pa las
177a2(phal chen): bzlog pa dang / dgag pa dang bstan par mi nus te/ de ltar rib kyi bu nga ni sems can 'di dag gdul ba dang / yongasu smin par bya ba dang / shin tu dul bar bya ba dang / phan pa la dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po mdun du
177a3(phal chen): byas te/ gsod pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams bsad pa'i mir sprul pa rnams la gso gzung ba dang / chang pas gcod pa'i mi sprul pa rnams/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod par sprul pa'i rnams la chad pa
177a4(phal chen): sna cho kyis gcod gzung ba dang / rkang lag dang / sna dang / rna ba dang / yan lag drang / nying lag dang / mgo bcad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam su tshor bar gyur pa lta bu dag kyang yongasu ston
177a5(phal chen): pa byed/ de mthong nas nga'i khams na/ gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa/ gtor zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba skye bar 'gyuraro// de dag sdig pa'i las byed pa rnams
177a6(phal chen): gtong zhing bag byed par 'gyuraro/ r-i kyi bu de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs des/ nyes pa gtong zhing / 'jigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / skyo ba'i yod dang ldan par shes nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
177a7(phal chen): bzlog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan byas nas/ dga' zhing bde ba'i mthar phyin pa sdug bsngal thad rgyun chang pa'i thad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la dgod pa byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu nga ni lus dang ngag gam/ yid kyis
177a8(phal chen): kyang / sems can su la'ang tsho mo 'dri tho ma 'tsham mo// rigs kyi bu nga ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bgrangs shes pa ste/ byol song gi skye gnas glen pa'i khamasu gton pa las kyang / chung ngun rtsa'i rtse mos
177b1(phal chen): blta ba'i srog chags phre'u 'ga' la yang / sems bskyed pa gcig tsam du yang / bsdug bsngal bar bya bar mi dga' na/ zhing du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed par nus pa'i mi lta zhig la ji smos// ri
177b2(phal chen): bung ni rmo lam na yang mi dge ba'i chos yongasu rgyu ba mo skyed na/ che du bsams te lta smos re skan/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnar thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub
177b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/ srid pa dang lam gyi rgyu zeng sgyu ma'i rnam par khong du chud pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'jig rten thams
177b4(phal chen): ca rnam par rig po/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du chud pa/ thogs pa ni/ dngad pa'i sgo'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rje su zhugs pa mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa'i dra ba rtogs par gyur pa/ ye shes
177b5(phal chen): bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ kun tu yang dag pa gzhol ba'i ting 'dzin gyi lam gyis byung ba/ glong kun tu 'khyil pa'i rgyud kyi gzungs la dbang sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas
177b6(phal chen): kyi spyod yul gyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di tong na/ grong khyer 'ong bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po 'ong
177b7(phal chen): chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gos/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ 
177b8(phal chen): rgyal po ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal na/ rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar/ g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ rgyal po me'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
178a1(phal chen): / nor bzangs ye shes sbrum de rje su dran par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang / chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la rab tu brtag pa dang / las kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa
178a2(phal chen): de khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de la rjesu bsam pa dang / chos kyis yongasu smin par bya ba'i sprul pa mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang / ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i
178a3(phal chen): rjesu 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa de mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / spyod pa sprul pa'i chos nyid chags pa med pa de rnar sbyang bar bya ba dang / dus gsum sgyu ma'i rnam
178a4(phal chen): pa'i mtshan nyid de yang / rnam par dbye ba byed cing / mthar kyis yul nas yul du dri ba dang / kun tu btsal ba dang / rje su rnam par blta ba byed cing / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang / lam dang sman ldong dang / thang dang thag
178a5(phal chen): drug dang / khal kos dang / ri dang yul dang / grong dang grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas / du longasu skyob med pa'i sems dang / lus la du pa med par cho
178a6(phal chen): tshol te/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang ba 'i nyen 'khor cig tu phyin nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bzhugs shes dris na/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di re 'dzin grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba/ 
178a7(phal chen): yin te/ 'di na rgyal po 'od chen po bzhug so zhes nas/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzangs po gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga'
178a8(phal chen): rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'di snyam du bsam so// 'di na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa blta ste/ de ring ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen de yang mthong bar/ 
178b1(phal chen): 'gyur ro// de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thos par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam
178b2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub se de'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog mthu phyung ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin la rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis
178b3(phal chen): mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nir thar pas rnam par rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos par
178b4(phal chen): 'gyuraro zhes de ltar bsam pa yid la byed cing / grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'ong ba zang ba de la bltas na/ gser dang dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang u
178b5(phal chen): tig dmar po dang / a sma gar ba dang / mu sa ra ga la ba dang / rin po che 'di bdun gyis shin tu bzang zhing blta na mdzes pa/ rin po che'i 'obs zab su zab pa/ chus gang ba gzhi gser gyi gram pas gang
178b6(phal chen): ba/ lha rdzas kyi ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da rikas kun yog pa dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'jam dang / lums 'khor ba bdun gyis kun nas yongasu bskor ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i 'phreng
178b7(phal chen): pa'i rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongasu bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i rab bdun gyis kun nas yongasu bskor ba 'di lta ste/ seng ge yid du 'ongs pa'i rdo rje'i rab dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis thub pa med pa'i ra ba dang / 'bug
178b8(phal chen): pa'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang / thub par dkar ba'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i rab dang / rdo rje brtan pa chab pa med pa'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i 'od gzar dra ba'i snying po'i ra ba dang / rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog rgyan gyi rdo rje'i rabs
179a1(phal chen): yongasu bskor ba ste/ rdo rin po che'i ra ba de dag thaMd kyang nor bu rin po che grangs med pas yong su spras pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lan kan dang / ba so mdzes par bkye ba/ dngul rin po che'i ba so'i 'phreng
179a2(phal chen): kha mdzes pas brgyan pa rin po che bai DUr+ya'i ba sori 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che shel gyi ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po cha'i byi ru'i bso'o phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa / mu tig dmar po'i ba son
179a3(phal chen): phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa mu ti ga rin po che'i rgya mtsha'i snying por ba so'o phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa ste/ grong khyer chen po de'i sgo chen po brgyad kyi bar bar na'ang dpag tshad bcu bcu yong do// sgong dag kyang rin po
179a4(phal chen): che sna bdun las sna tsho Da mdzes pa byas pa ste/ bltan yid 'ong ba'o// grong khyer chen po de ni de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la/ yan lag rnam pa brjod du rnam par phye ba/ baiDUR+Ya sngon po'i sa la gnas pa ste/ grong khyer chen po
179a5(phal chen): nang na yang srang chen po bye ba phrag bcu yong/ srang re re'i glo gnyis/ nas kyang / khyim chen po brgya phrag stong stong mkhos legs/ par 'grogs pa ste/ kun kyang rin po che sna tshoT las byas pa dgo/ ran
179a6(phal chen): che'i rgyan sna tshon kyis rab tu brgyan pa dgo/ rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang / ba dan che phra dang ldan pa dag/ yo byad thaMd phun sum tshag pa dag go// san khrag khrig du ma gnas pa dag / grong khyer chen po de yang
179a7(phal chen): nor bu rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i khang pas mdzes par byas ste/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che beDUr+m+ma'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che
179a8(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// dngul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la/ me tog dmar po'i dra bas kunas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// 
179b1(phal chen): DUr+ya'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che mdzod sna tshoT kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// shel gyi khang partsen pa la rin po che'i rgyal po snying
179b2(phal chen): po yangs pa'i dra bas kunas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i khang pa brtseDa pa la/ rin po ma'i
179b3(phal chen): ma'i snying po'i dra bas kunas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ na po che in dra nI la'i khang pa brtseb pa la/ rin po cha ngal gyi 'od gzer gyi dra bas kun sa khebs
179b4(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs/ med pa dang ldan pa'o// rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i khang pa rtseDa pa la rin po che'i rgyal po skar ma'i 'od gzer gyi dra bas kunas khetha
179b5(phal chen): pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// rin po mdze'i khang pa bsren pa la rin po rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dra bas kunas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi byam
179b6(phal chen): pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi khang pa brtseb pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba ri dra bas kunas khebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
179b7(phal chen): grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// smos kyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i khang pa brtseb pa las rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun sa khebs pa khasam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// 
179b8(phal chen): rin po che'i khang pa brtseb pa de dag re re zhing yang / rin po che'i lan kan du mas brgyan pa rin po che'i stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po tsha ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor bar dkrigs pa'o// rin po che'i lan
180a1(phal chen): / kan de dag dang / rin pa che'i ta la de dag thams cad du'ang / phan tshun rin pa cha'i srang bus sbrel pa'o// na po che'i srang bu de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi dril gyi 'phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ sa
180a2(phal chen): gyi 'phreng ba de dag tha~Md kyang / rin po che'i chu nang po'i lnga ldi sna tshoT kyi rnam par bres shing sbrel pa'o// rin po che'i chun po'i lnga ldi de dag thams cad las kyang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sbyangs pa de dag ste/ 
180a3(phal chen): de ltar grong khyer chen po de thams cad ni/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kunas khebs pa'o// rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dra ba grangs med pas
180a4(phal chen): kunas khebs pa'o// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba grangs me/ dra pas kunas khebs pa'o// rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba grangs med pa ras kun smra pa'o// rdo rje'i bla re grangs med pas kunas khebs pa'o// rin po
180a5(phal chen): che'i bla re grangs med pas kunas khebs pa'o// rin po che'i gdun kyi bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// rin po che'i khang pa brtse ba'i bla re grangs med pas kunas khebs pa'o// gos rin po che'i/ 
180a6(phal chen): bla re grangs med pas kunas khebs pa'o// me tog phreng ba'i bla re grangs med pas kunas khebs pa'o// rin po che'i gdun dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bcu Da shing bsgreng ba ste/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de'i dbusu rgyal
180a7(phal chen): po 'od chen po bzhun ba'i pho brang brtsen pa 'khor kun tu dpag tshad bani yod pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i / rin po tshes tshon gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis yong su bskor ba'o// rin po che'i dril bu yi du 'ong ba'i sku
180a8(phal chen): sman par 'khrol ba'i dra ba rim pa bdun gyi sgra kunas 'bru rin po ma sna bdun gyi ga la'i phreng ba ma pa bdun gyis sunas bskor ba'o// rin pa che sna tshogs kyi bang pa brtsigs pa'i rgyan brgya snang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 
180b1(phal chen): nga ldan pas dzang na pa cha sa chags dum las byas pa gser gyi gram pakun tu bkram pa yan lag brgya dang ldan pa'i chus long su 'ang gsu rdzas kyi yud pa la dang pang mongag/ su mung dang / ma tog sum sa
180b2(phal chen): rikas chu'i steng kun tu yog pa/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pa'i them skas rnam par bkye ba tsan dan gyis shin tu mdzes
180b3(phal chen): par byas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya bran sna tshogs kyi sgra shin tu 'byung ba yod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i pho brang dang 'gran pa ste/ de'i dbus na rin po che 'gro ba la snang ba'i khang / 
180b4(phal chen): ba brtsegs pa shin tu bzang la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas gya nom par debargyan pa yod de/ de'i nang na rgyal po 'od chen po'i dam pa'i chos
180b5(phal chen): gces pa'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhug so// de nas tshong dpon gyi thun rdza/ bzangs rin po che'i 'obs de dag la ni/ chags pa'i sems nga/ rin po che'i rab de dag la ni/ ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i yid mang na
180b6(phal chen): bo cheHla 'bring bde dag la ni// 'dod cing chags pa med/ rin za che'i dril gyi dra ba'i sgra la ni ro myong bar byed pa med/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'o sgra dang klu bro snyan pa'i dbyangs la ni chub pa'i sems med/ rin po che rnam
180b7(phal chen): bzadang pa'i gnal med yang dang / khang pa brtseb pa snatshogs byas ma sung ni yong la bya ba med par shi tu dga' 'gyur ba'i skyes pa dang / dud med kyin gyi chos kyi dga' ba'i spongs shin tu dag zhing banu ba dang spa dang / 
180b8(phal chen): ma gas ma ma nga gag gi blagasas sa gsas sa thong sa rgyas thang byer gyi ma tham
181a1(phal chen): shig tu phyin nas/ kun tu brtas na/ grod khyer gyi las kyi sum mdo dbus kyi mchod rten gyi khang ba nas/ gcang yang ma ring bzhigs/ rgya chen po dang ldan pa khri rin po che dun sngon po'i rkang pa brtse ba bai DUR+sha sa
181a2(phal chen): seng ges blangs pa/ 'dzam bu nu klung gi gser gyi lcag bod kyis dra ba legs par btags pa/ lnga rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i stan sna tshogs bting ba/ rin po che'i 'bru grangs med pas rnam par brgyan ga/ nor bu rin po che
181a3(phal chen): rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dra ba kun nas khebs pa dang / 'dzam bu nu klung gi gser gyi snam bu la/ lnga rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gur shin du sba bar bkye ba'i gnam yol bres pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i pad mo snying / 
181a4(phal chen): po dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i chos kyi khri chen po la rgyal po 'od chen po maHngan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa/ deng byad bzang po sna tshogs brgyad cu tham pas/ lus shin tu mdzes pa/ gser gyi ngo bo ltar
181a5(phal chen): po che sna tshogs rnam par bkod pas rnam pa mdzes pa/ nyi sa'i ts+yai 'khor ltar gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba/ zla ba na zhing rgyas pa'i dkying 'khor ltar bldan bzang ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'jom
181a6(phal chen): gyi nang na/ rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab pa'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i chas tshogs dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po ltar chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa/ na mkha' ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshes
181a7(phal chen): kyis brgyan pa/ ri rab ltar kha dog bzhi po'i sems can rgya mtsho'i sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ rin po che'i gling ltar/ gzhi ye shes sna tshogs rin po ches yongasu gang bde skyil mo dkrung du 'dug pa mthong ngo // de'i mdun
181a8(phal chen): na yang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbrum dang / dngul rin po che'i phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyas
181b1(phal chen): tshogs kyi phung po dang / khazas dang / sbya gzigs sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / zhim po'i mchog khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po dgod pa dang / dang ra ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyi yul du bged pa mthong ngo // lnga rdza
181b2(phal chen): kyi shing rta rin po che bye ba brgya stong dum dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyi phung po dum dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyi phung
181b3(phal chen): po spyod du rung zhing kha na ma tho ba med pa mang po sems can rnams ji dga' bar spyod du bzud pa'i phyir bshams te/ bkod pa dang / ba bzhon gser gyi rumig can stong phrag du ma 'om bres 'jal ba mang po yang sems can phongs pa
181b4(phal chen): rnams yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir bkod pa mthong ngo // bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bzhin bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po
181b5(phal chen): che gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos lus byug pa/ s+thu rgyal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshul shes pa/ 'dod pa'i spyod pa dang // ga thams cad la mkhas pa dag kyang bstsogs shing bkod par mthong ngo // 
181b6(phal chen): de'i mdun na ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba dang / sems can rnams yongasu gzung ba dang / sems can rnams dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi yid
181b7(phal chen): dang bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi sems shin tu bde bar bye ba dang / sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams chos kyi rang bzhin gyi don la yang su dgong ba dang / sems can rnams
181b8(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa shing du don mnyam par bya ba dang / sems can rnams gzhan la 'khrub rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / lus dang ngag gis ngan du spyod pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can rnams kyi lta ba'i zug rdza
182a1(phal chen): yang dag par dbyung ba dang / sems can rnams kyi lam yongs sbyangs pa'i phyir/ srang dang / lam gyi ba'i mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / sgo dang khyams dag na'ang de bzhin te/ srang re re'i ngos ga
182a2(phal chen): g.yon nas kyang / stegs bu bye ba nyi shu nyi shu rtsa ma la yo byad thams cad yongasu spungs te bkod pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po la/ lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag byas te/ 
182a3(phal chen): rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar bayas phyogs su bskor ba byas na/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
182a4(phal chen): tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dra ba'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
182a5(phal chen): ngag dang / rje su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 28gas pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub semasadapa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi
182a6(phal chen): bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongasu dag pa dang / yongasu rdzogs par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems
182a7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa/ byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di yang sangs rgyas brgya phrag dus dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrig khrig rgya stong du ma nas/ brjod
182a8(phal chen): du med pa'i ba brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las yongasu dris so// yongasu zhus so// rnam par sbyangs so// yongasu sbyangs so// rnam par bkod do// rnam par
182b1(phal chen): bltas so// rnam par spyad do// rje su btsal to// yong su brtags so// rnam par bris so// rgya cher byas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga mi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di la gnas shing / 
182b2(phal chen): chos dang 'thun par kham so sbyong zhing ston to// chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten la phan par byed do// chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten na rje su spyod do// chos dang 'thun par sems can bcos par byed do// chos dang 'thun par sems
182b3(phal chen): can rnams la nan tan byed do// chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sems can rnams yongasu 'jud do// chos kyi tshul sems can rnams la nye bar bsgrub bo// chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la yongasu bsgo ba byed do// chos
182b4(phal chen): kyi nan tan la sems can rnams yongs sbyor ro// chos kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// byam so/ ra ba'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i dbang dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / 
182b5(phal chen): ngan pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongasu bsrung ba'i sems dang / sems can yongasu 'dzin pa mi gtong ba'i sems dang / sdug bsngal
182b6(phal chen): thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i smon lam rgyun mi gcod pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i mthar phyin pa la rab tu 'god par yang dag par spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// bag yangs kyi bde ba yang
182b7(phal chen): dag par bskyed pas/ sems pa ni dag gi lus kyang shin tu bde bar byed do// de dag gi 'khor ba'i bde ba la zhen pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rnam par bzlog pa byed do// de dag gi sems kyi rgyun kyang chos kyi dpa' ba dang / mos pa
182b8(phal chen): la yongasu gzhol bar byed do// nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad las rnam par sbyong bar byed do// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongasu sbyang ba byed do// 'khor ba'i rgyun las rnam par bzlog par byed do// chos kyi
183a1(phal chen): dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yongasu gzung ba byed do// de dag gi srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tu skye ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir/ sems kyi ma rig pa yongasu bsreg pa byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
183a2(phal chen): 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi myu gu yongasasu bskyed do// mi 'phrogs pa'i dad pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi rgya mtsho yang rab tu dang bar byed do// rigs kyi du de ltar nga byang chub sems
183a3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa/ byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan la gnas te/ chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten skyong zhing ston to// rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ ngas 'jigs shing sdang ba 'am/ bag tsha zhing g.ya' kha med
183a4(phal chen): de/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang phongs shing yo byad sna tshogs kyis brel pa/ bza' ba 'dod pa 'am/ bdung ba 'dod pa 'am/ gos 'dod pa nas/ yo brang sna tshogs thams cad gang 'dod kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad pa'i drung
183a5(phal chen): du'ong ngo // de dag la'ang ngas snga nas pa sham pa sham pa'i mdzod sgo bya zhing ci 'dod pa khyer cig ces bstabs te/ gang gi don du khyed/ sdig pa'i las la spyod par gyur cing / srob gcod pa'am/ mabyin
183a6(phal chen): par len pa 'am/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa 'am/ rdzun du smra ba 'am/ phra ma 'am/ ngag rtsub po 'am/ tshig kyal ba 'am/ chags sems 'am/ gnod soms sam/ log par lta ba 'am/ de ma yin pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshog
183a7(phal chen): la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de thams cad kyang grong khyer chen po 'ang bzang po 'di'i sgo dang / srang dang / khyams dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo kun tu spungs te/ snga nas byin pa yin gyis/ su ci 'dod pa kun kyang khyer cig
183a8(phal chen): ces bstabs shin 'byin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer 'od bzang po 'di na sems can ji snyed gcig gnas pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'o// de bas na grong khyer chen po 'od
183b1(phal chen): bzang ngo // 'di yang / de dag la bsam pa rnam pa ji lta bur ngag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ste/ la la la ni dog par snang ngo // la la la ni yangs par snang ngo // la la la ni gnyis la gnas par snang ngo // la la la ni ga'i rin pa
183b2(phal chen): che bai DUR+Ya las blangs par snang ngo // la la la ni sa'i ra bas bskor bar snang ngo // la la la ni rin po che rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ra bas bskor bar snang ngo // la la la ni gseg ma dang gyo mos gang zhing thag thug dang / 
183b3(phal chen): grog po dang / g.yangs mang po can du snang ngo // la la la ni nor bu rin po che dam pa grangs med pas gzhi brgyan cing yongasu bkram pa dang / lag mthil bzhin du gzhi mnyam par snang ngo // la la la ni sa las byas par snang ngo // 
183b4(phal chen): la la la ni rin po che grangs med pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bzhag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang stengs dang / dbagan dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam rin po che seng ge'i dra
183b5(phal chen): bas brgyan par snang ngo // grong khyer gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i sems can/ sngon ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongasu bsdus pa/ bsam pa dag pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
183b6(phal chen): bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba/ thams cad mkhyen po nyid la mngon par mos pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rab tu gzhol ba de dag la yang rin po che las byas par snang ngo // de ma yin pa gzhan dag la
183b7(phal chen): nis las byas par snang ste/ rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can yul dang / phyogs dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na/ rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i
183b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dus kyi rang bzhin gyis dkrugs te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhig skyes gyur na yang / de'i tshang de dag la phan par bya ba'i sems kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i ding nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang tho'i
184a1(phal chen): / klong zhes bya ba/ byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro bar snyoms par 'jug ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ting nge la ni de la stoms par zhugs pa dang / de nyid kyi mod la/ sems can de dag gi 'jigs de dag dang / 
184a2(phal chen): mi bde ba de dag dang / shar gnyer ba de dag dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa de dag dang sems kyi 'khrug pa de dag dang / 'tshe ba'i sems des kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong byams pa chen po
184a3(phal chen): sngon du 'gro ba de'i chos nyid tho'i khas/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nye rab zhi par 'gyur ro// rnam par ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po
184a4(phal chen): 'od chen pos de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i grong la mnyam par bzhag go// de ltar rgyal po 'od chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po/ 
184a5(phal chen): sngon du 'gro ba/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po slong la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod lazong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i yul dang phyogs su bcas mgrong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal
184a6(phal chen): podrong 'khor dang bcas par rnam drug tu g.yos so// de g.yos pa'i tshe rin po che'i// de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / rin po che'i khyim dang / rin po che'i gnas dang / rin po che'i gzhal med khang dang / rim
184a7(phal chen): tshe'i khang pa khregs pa dang / rin po che'i ba gam pa dang / rin po che'i bu shu dang / rin po che'i skar lung dang / rin po che'i stegs bu dang / rin po che'i rta babs dang / rin po che'i zla gam dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i lan/ 
184a8(phal chen): kan dang / rin po che'i 'bru dang rin po che'i bla re dang / rin po che'i srad bus brgyus pa'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i dril dang / rin po che'i rgyal nge mtshan dang / rin po che'i bdan dang / rin po che'i dal dag kyang rab tu g.yos te lnga
184b1(phal chen): 'byin to// rab tu 'khrol lo// de dag de ltar sgra 'byin cing / yid du 'ong la snyan pa dang / mnyam na dpa' ba'i dbyangs brjod cing / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dud de phyag 'tsha lo// grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nang na/ 
184b2(phal chen): sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / dga' ba dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis yongasu rgyas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bde logs su mngon du bltas te/ lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag
184b3(phal chen): 'tshal lo// de'i khams kyi grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' zhes rangs pa skyes nas/ rgyal po 'od
184b4(phal chen): chen po gangan pa de logs su phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gi skye gnas su dgatogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang / gcig gci byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems su ldan par byu sa
184b5(phal chen): rgyal po 'od chen po gangan bde logs su blta zhing mngon par 'dud do// dang spang mthon po'i sa'i phyogs thams cad kyang / rgyal po'od chen po gang na ba der mngon par 'dud do// me rtog gi shing ngas
184b6(phal chen): 'bras bu'i shing dang / lo ma'i shing dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / me tog dang / ldum bu dang / rtsa dang / gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od chen po gangan pa de'o
184b7(phal chen): su mngon par 'dud par gyur to// de'i khams na mtsho dang mche'u dang lum dang / lteng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / chu klung dang / rdzing dang / khron pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su/ 
184b8(phal chen): mngon par gzhol zhing rlabs kyi sgra 'byin par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang a ga ru nag po'i 'dug spos kyi dud par bun du 'gribs pa'i spos kyi sprin las glog sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed
185a1(phal chen): cing / 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / spos chu'i char gyi rgyun shin tu phra ba mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// brgya byin dang / rab mtshe ma dang / rab dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / dbang sgyur gyi
185a2(phal chen): lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod do// nam kha'i dbyings thams cad/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sprin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra phyung bas/ dbyangs snyan pa
185a3(phal chen): rgya cher bsgrags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo grangs med pa/ lha'i glu snyan pa len pa'i sprin gyi sgra bsgrogs pa'i dbyangs snyan cing yid 'ong ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs
185a4(phal chen): kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / wa/ rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin kha dog sde tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i cha rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin thams
185a5(phal chen): phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'dab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas
185a6(phal chen): kyi rin po che'i lbab lbub sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri ma med cing 'jam pa/ kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis
185a7(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i seng ge yid du 'ongs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab
185a8(phal chen): tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che 'bar ba'i lce shin tu 'phro ba'i rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa rgyal po 'od chen po la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byin gyis brlab so// 
185b1(phal chen): glang po'i rgyal po chen po shugs 'dzin gyis kyang / glang po'i dbang po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i sprin grangs med pas kun/ 
185b2(phal chen): nas ye g.yog byin gyis brlabs so// lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i se mo ngo grangs med pa rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i snam bu'i lda ldi dang / chun po grangs med pa rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna
185b3(phal chen): tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i rgyu grangs med pa mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi lhab lbub dang / phreng bgrangs med pa mngon par 'byang ba'i rgyan gyis brtan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna
185b4(phal chen): tshogs kyi me tog gi lnga ldi grangs med pa mngon par bres pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lnga rdzas kyi spos kyi rgyal po kha dog sna tshogs phyogs thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par la 'ad med pas kun nas khems
185b5(phal chen): pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dang / lha rdzas kyi 'dug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'khrigs pa'i sprin
185b6(phal chen): grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char phra mo rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed pa dang / glu sman
185b7(phal chen): nga'i dbyangs yid du 'ongs par len cing / bstod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i char mngon par 'bebs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par nam mkha'i dbyings byin gyis brlabs so// srin po'i dbang po brgya stong grangs med pa rgya mtsho
185b8(phal chen): la gnas pa dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyo rten gyi sa'i gzhi la gnas pa/ kha zas su sha dang khrag 'thung zhing ba la/ chul spyod pa dang / ri dgas dang / byugs dang / bya dang ba lang dang / rta dang glang po dang / bong bu dang /
