186a1(phal chen): skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyi mdangs 'phrog pa zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog dang ldan pa/ rtag tu 'gro ba la 'tshe shing / tho 'tsham pa la zhugs pa rnams kyang / byams pa dang phan pa'i sems dam pa
186a2(phal chen): dang ldan zhing / bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing / tho 'tsham pa med pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol la blta bar gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dag po sems kyis rgyal po 'od chen po
186a3(phal chen): gang na ba de logs su btud nas/ phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med pa yang myong bar gyura'o// gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / 'byung po'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang
186a4(phal chen): byams pa dang / phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing tho 'tsham pa med pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol la blta bar gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar cing shin
186a5(phal chen): dga' ba'i sems kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po gangan ba der 'dud cing phyaga'atshal bar gyur te/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs med pa yang myong bar gyur to// de ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
186a6(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang mi bde ba dang / shar gnyer ba dang / thab mo dang rtsod pa dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems thams cad rab tu'i bar gyur to// rnam pa
186a7(phal chen): zhi bar gyur to// rnam par log par gyur to// 'gags par gyur to// phyir log par gyur to// gling bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas/ 
186a8(phal chen): phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar gyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / mi bde ba dang / shar gnyer ba dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'am 'i
186b1(phal chen): sems thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i blong ga chos shing tho pa'i phyir rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rnam par zhi bar byur to// rnam par log par gyur to// 
186b2(phal chen): 'gags par gyur to// phyir log par gyur to// de nas rgyal po 'od men ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bungs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i ye shes sngang
186b3(phal chen): ba'i sgo byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bde ba'i bsam pas rgyas par 'gengs pa/ byams pa chen po'i gdugs chad med pa dang ldan pa'
186b4(phal chen): mi byed pa dang ldan pas// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor du gyur pa/ dang po bring dang tha ma'i sbyor bas 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskyab pa la zhugs pa da 'gro ba thams cad yongasu gzung ba la zhugs pas/ byams haM
186b5(phal chen): sems lnga bu dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od gzer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas bla ba zhi zhing rgyas pa lta bur gyur pa/ she sa bya thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang byed pa'i phyir/ nyi
186b6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mun pa thibs po rab tu sel bas sgron ma chen po lta bur gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho'i g.yo sgra'i rnyog pa dang bar byed ngas
186b7(phal chen): nor du rin po mi nu 'dang dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / smon lam yongasu rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin poche yid 'azhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ting nge dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i
186b8(phal chen): khang pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang chen por gzhog pas/ rlung dmar chen po dang 'dra ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ bsod nams kyi ri bo gsal ba 'am/ yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshags
187a1(phal chen): kyis brgyan pa'i rnamakha' la blta ba'am/ smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor las mtshams bcad pa'am/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi stobs la chang gzung ba'am/ theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyis ba
187a2(phal chen): pa yongasu brjod pa 'am/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po bsgom pa'i sgo dbye ba 'am/ snying rje chen po'i sprin yongasu smos par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi
187a3(phal chen): bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na rgyal po'i gnas brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba
187a4(phal chen): dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshongs dpon gyi ngu nor bzangs kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog
187a5(phal chen): su skor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i drung nas song ngo // 'am po dgu bcu drug pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ grong khyer chen po 'ong bzang po
187a6(phal chen): nas byung ste/ yud tsam du lam gyi mgo btsal nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i gdams pa dag de la rje su bsam pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de rje su dran par bya
187a7(phal chen): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong gi snang ba chen po de yongasu bsgom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dag pa bas ma~M gyis mi khyab pus brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rnam par phye/ 
187a8(phal chen): ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / bsod nams kyi dbang dang / stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag rje su spel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems
187b1(phal chen): can yongasu smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de shin du brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba thun mongs du gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la rjes
187b2(phal chen): bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin lus rnam par dag pa bsam gyis
187b3(phal chen): khyab pa de rje su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yong su dag pa de la brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don bsam pa snang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa
187b4(phal chen): de la yid ches par byed byed pas/ sems dga'a'i mos pa'i shugs dang / sems kyi khams bde ba dang / sems shin tu tshim pa dang / sems khong nas dga' ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa dang / sems 'o
187b5(phal chen): dang ba dang / sems brtan pa dang / sems rgyu che dang / sems mi zad ba thob ste/ de de ltar dpe ba'i ba shes gnyen rjes dran zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas gdong mchims gang nas rjesu sems
187b6(phal chen): pa/ kyi hud dge ba shes gnyen mthong ba 'di ni/ yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongasu dag pa dang / yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o// 
187b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs spyong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ding nge 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs chud pa'o/ 
187b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yongasasu bsgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'debs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul thams cad brjod pa'o// shes rab nga / 
188a1(phal chen): ye shes kyi snang ba bas ma kyis mi khyab pa yang dag par skyed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myi gu steng par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gig yang
188a2(phal chen): thams cad nas skyob pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la gzhog pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang / mi bde bston pa'o// dge ba'i
188a3(phal chen): bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongasu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams ngag gis 'dems pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni
188a4(phal chen): bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o// dge ba'i bu shes gnyen rnams ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnasu phyin par skyel bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbying
188a5(phal chen): kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni nga ngagal dus sum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bya shes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi
188a6(phal chen): 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o// zhes de de ltar ngu zhing smre sngags 'dod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i
188a7(phal chen): tshogs dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i
188a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa
188b1(phal chen): nyid du'ang shin tu bsten pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la theg tsom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar smin pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi
188b2(phal chen): 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyis rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song shig dang / de las byang chu sems dpa'i
188b3(phal chen): spyod pa thos par 'gyur// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas/ mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song nas/ dge bsnyen
188b4(phal chen): ma mi g.yo ba yongasu tshol zhing zeng med pa las/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni/ rang gi khyim na pham dang 'grogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ rang gi gnyen pa shes kyi tshogs kyis
188b5(phal chen): yongasu bskor cing / skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dga'i ba chen po dang mos shing spro bas yongasu rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i
188b6(phal chen): khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe/ des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa/ gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal
188b7(phal chen): bar gyur nas/ 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la phog par gyur ma thag tu/ tshor ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang
188b8(phal chen): bral ba'i ding nge 'dzin gyi sgomang po dang / kun tu lta ba'i bdang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs sa
189a1(phal chen): gyur de yongasu skyes so// de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste/ 'di ltar dper na/ thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes
189a2(phal chen): bar gyur to// des dri zhim po zhig tshor na yang ke/ ni lnga la yang med/ lnga'i bu mo la yang med/ klu la yang sde/ klu'i bu mo la yang med/ gnod sbyin la yang med/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la yang med/ dri za la yang med/ dri
189a3(phal chen): bu mo la yang med/ lha ma yin la yang med/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo la yang med/ na mkha' lding la yang med/ na mkha' lding gi bu mo la yang med/ mi 'am ci la yang med/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang med/ lto 'phye chen
189a4(phal chen): po la yang med/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med/ mi la yang med/ mi'i bu mo la yang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to// bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na
189a5(phal chen): med na lhag pa lnga ga las 'ong / kha dog dang mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin pa/ shegs pa'i sku mdog dang / kha dog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang / mdog sa gtogs par de'i
189a6(phal chen): dog dang / mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lte ga las 'ong / lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zhe dang / dbyibs dang / byang chub sems dpa'
189a7(phal chen): dbang skur ba thob pa'i lus kyi nu zheng dang / dbyibs ma gtogs par de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs su mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na/ lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs
189a8(phal chen): ba'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang skur pa thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma dogs par de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na mang na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / de'i kha'i dang kyi dri zhim po dang mnyam/ 
189b1(phal chen): ba'i dri de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med
189b2(phal chen): na/ lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i longs spyod ma gtogs par/ de'i khyim gyi rgyan dang longs
189b3(phal chen): spyod du mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun
189b4(phal chen): sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par de'i g.yog 'khor phung sum tshogs pa dang mnam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa ste/ ga las 'ong ste/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags
189b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems can de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med do// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag tu/ nyon mongs pa ni
189b6(phal chen): bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa chen po stong brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba la ni/ 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa/ 
189b7(phal chen): rnams mi rgyu'o// de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yang mthong ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mi rgyu'o// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu yang / 
189b8(phal chen): shes rab kyis ngoms pa/ ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi
190a1(phal chen): khyab pa dang // batha ga 'dod dang / dbyibs dang / chu zhepa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sa'i gzhi dang / grong khyer dang / rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam
190a2(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas/ 'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyim dang
190a3(phal chen): gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud de/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshig su bcad pa 'dis bstod do// khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yog
190a4(phal chen): bsrungs te/ bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongasu bsgom mdzad cing / brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na// ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags shing 'bar/ de nas tshong dpon gyi/ 
190a5(phal chen): bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la chag su bcad pa des mngon par bstod de/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma pad ga gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
190a6(phal chen): bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rje su bstan
190a7(phal chen): pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par 'gyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis dag la bshad du gsol// de nas dge bsnyems
190a8(phal chen): mi g.yo bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'dzem zhing / yid du 'ong la/ nyams su bde gas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas/ 'angadi skad ces smras so// rigs
190b1(phal chen): kyi phre lngar khyod kyis dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed pa legaso// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar brngub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa ste/ byang chub sems mi
190b2(phal chen): spyod pa'i sde yi das brtan pa la slob pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyisa'i gdungs kyi sgothob pa'o// ngom na spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba/ chos kyi ga'i thams cad spang bar brjod pathob pa'o// khomado tsam thas
190b3(phal chen): cad yongasu btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob pa'o// smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ yi dmal
190b4(phal chen): brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyisa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi gzhi thams cad sdang bar brjod pa'i spobs bsnang ba'i sgo dang / chos yongasu btsal bas mi skyo ba'i
190b5(phal chen): rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs/ kyi bu gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka'o// smras pa 'phags ma bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin dang / dge ba'i bshes
190b6(phal chen): gnyen gyis yongasu bzung na yid ska ches par mchi grang / rtogs pa dang 'chal ba dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / rjesu rdzogs pa dang / rig pa dang dmigasu 'bos pa dang / goms pa dang / mi 'gal ba dang / rnam par mi rtogs
190b7(phal chen): pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par bgyid par yang mchis grang / de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i
190b8(phal chen): 'od kyi bskal ba la de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po glog gis byin pa'i bu tsog ma zhig tu gyur nas/ de'i tshe nub mo mnyam tsam zhig na/ rgyal po'i sgo yang bcad/ 
191a1(phal chen): pa dang ma yang nyal/ skyes pa dang bud med dag kyang gnyid kyis log/ rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra yang ni lhan cig spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na/ kho mo mal gyi steng
191a2(phal chen): na 'dug cing / nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi 'phreng ba rnam par 'khod pa la blta ba las/ steng gi bar snang la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab
191a3(phal chen): ta brkyang ba/ ri'i dbang po ri rab ltar/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / rnam par lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas yongasu/ 
191a4(phal chen): bskor ba/ phyogs thams cad du 'od gzer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ des kho mo'i lus dang
191a5(phal chen): sems shin tu bde bar gyur yid shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ mal gyi steng nas la/ ngas nas/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar des la babs nas/ brtse/ ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang bde la phyag
191a6(phal chen): 'tshal to// de'i spyigadrug la bltas na yang / mtha' thug par ma rung / g.yas g.yon gyi tshad kyang zin par ma rung / mtshan dang dpe byang phun sum tshogs pa lo bsam na yang ngoms par ma rung ste/ de'i mngo mos 'di snyams du bas ma
191a7(phal chen): so/ ku las ji lta bu zhig byas na/ lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ mtshan dang depe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ 'od kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'khor phun sum
191a8(phal chen): tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang / longs spyod phucu sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ 
191b1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang
191b2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba des/ kho mo'i bsam bzug su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thug pa med pa'i ses
191b3(phal chen): spyad cig/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad bskul ba'i phyir bam pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ chos rab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sems can bsam pa mi bzad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho glong
191b4(phal chen): du ltung bas mi skul ba'i sems skyed cig/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mche du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir
191b5(phal chen): ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sprin yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ cho ga mi shes pa'i sems skyed du pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs pa
191b6(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzungs pa'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta/ 
191b7(phal chen): la ci smos kyi/ chung ngu na brdar byas pa tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces
191b8(phal chen): byung ste/ de lta rigs kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba las/ chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag zos nas/ tham
192a1(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yoT
192a2(phal chen): sbyang bar dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongasu bsgrub par dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni/ mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thun
192a3(phal chen): sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i chad
192a4(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon ma thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa tham ngas cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi
192a5(phal chen): phyed mi tshugs pa skyed de/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad duse mas bskyed pa de'i mthus/ bskal pa 'dzam du'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi
192a6(phal chen): dran na/ gnyis kyi gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen pa shes la'ang khong khro ba'i sems cig ma bskyed na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can mnyes pa gzhan lta la ci smos/ de nas
192a7(phal chen): nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ bdag tu lta ba dang / ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na/ de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te mngon par chags pa lta ci smos/ shi 'pho dang mangs
192a8(phal chen): na gnas pa'i cha'ang / sems rmongs pa 'am/ 'du shes sna tshogs sam/ lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran na/ legs par bsams shing lta ci smos/ bskal pa de snyed cig tu sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung tu
192b1(phal chen): na/ rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rje su mi dran na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi sprin yang dag
192b2(phal chen): par 'dzin kyang chung ngun ming du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge gcig kyang brjed par mi dran na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ chos kyi rgyam
192b3(phal chen): snyed cig 'thung yang / chung ngun 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la tshig 'ga' yang ma bsam ma brtags par mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba chun chad du de snyed cig gis chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang chung ngu na/ 'jig rten par
192b4(phal chen): bzo'i rgyus dang / tshul yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang / kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu med do// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi
192b5(phal chen): 'khor lo bzung yang / ji ltar yongasu bzung ba las/ sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par chung ngun rje su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang / yi ge 'ga' yang bor bar mi dran no// de nas
192b6(phal chen): nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong yang chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par
192b7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgyar tsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang / kho mos
192b8(phal chen): bdag gi spyod pa yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no// de nas nye bar brdung ba chun chang du/ sems can gang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tus bskul pa de
193a1(phal chen): dru gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung bcun dang/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed ba gcig cang mngon pa sgrubs su'i dra/ 
193a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ bskal ba 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba skad cig lon yang / tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la yang the tsom bskyed pa'am/ gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/ rnam par rtog pa'i 'du
193a3(phal chen): sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/ rab kyi 'du shes sam/ bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/ sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral lo// sangs rgyas
193a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang bral lo// sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma dral lo// byang chub sem
193a5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems
193a6(phal chen): dpa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos thob pa dang ma bral lo// mtha' dang dpung med pa'i 'jin rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing / khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// mtha' dang dadung / 
193a7(phal chen): med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo// 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yong su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i
193a8(phal chen): rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongasu ston pa dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
193b1(phal chen): rnam par dang pa dang ma bral mo// rigs kyi bu mo mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongasu btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la do/ 
193b2(phal chen): par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi ngas la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang ba
193b3(phal chen): brjod pa'i'adi rnam par phye ba dang / chos 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam/ smras pa 'phags ma 'tshal lo// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ 
193b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongasu btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa 'di dkyi
193b5(phal chen): 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin/ gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod las sogs pa/ 
193b6(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang / rnam par spyad pa dang / rje su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtogs par bya'o// de ltar dge bsnyen mA mi g.yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
193b7(phal chen): bzangs kyis/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa brag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa dang / baiDUn yong su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo // 
193b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya brgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste/ la la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas/ la la ni yongasu mya ngan las
194a1(phal chen): 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo // de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin de dag yong su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od gzer dang / 
194a2(phal chen): 'od dkyil 'khor cho spyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab par mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegasapa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa
194a3(phal chen): de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grag pa'ang thos par gyur to// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs na/ 
194a4(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam thos sam shes sam/ spras pa 'phags ma mtho do// thos so// rigs kyi bu kho mo na de ltar byang chub sems
194a5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing / chos thams cad yongasu btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i
194a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas/ sems
194a7(phal chen): can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa namakha'i dbyings la mdab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa/ 
194a8(phal chen): nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongasu smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gdon pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing / 
194b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyub/ mthu dang ldan pa'i nya ba ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i lag pas sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongasu smin par mngon par gdon/ 
194b2(phal chen): pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po gdul ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ khams gsum gyi gnas yongasu bkang zhing / rnam par rgyu ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
194b3(phal chen): ltar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bskam pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa/ zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa 'dul ba'i yid kyi me togs ku mu da rnam
194b4(phal chen): par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar ba/ sa'i gzhi lngar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir byams mi byams dang / mthon dman med par/ 
194b5(phal chen): 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa/ rlung dmar ltar sems can thams ca/  kyi nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i shing dang shing phran gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med par
194b6(phal chen): phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ 
194b7(phal chen): yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug
194b8(phal chen): gi de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba bangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas
195a1(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ngo // 
195a2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon du byas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rje su dran par byed cing / dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan
195a3(phal chen): ba dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang / smos pa dang rgya cher bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing / rjes
195a4(phal chen): 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjesu bsam pa dang / khong du chud bar bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / yongasu bsgom pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / snang bar bya ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed
195a5(phal chen): mthar kyis gnas nas gnas dang / yul nas yul du bsgyus te rgyu zhing so nga song nas/ yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te/ nyi ma nub du cha shin
195a6(phal chen): / grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste/ grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shin tu phyin nas nga smon srang gasgo dang / ma kyai ni do gas kyi ni dod/ grong phrag nas/ grong phrag tu kun tu rgyu thams cad 'gro ba
195a7(phal chen): tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang / mtshan mo ma nyal tsam zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs logs na ri shin tu mod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa/ de'i rtse mo rtsa dang gel ba dang / sman sna tsho dga' dga' ltar skyes pas brgyan
195a8(phal chen): ga'od chen po dang ldan pa nyis shar pa lta bur gnas pa mthong // des snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te/ 'di snyam du bsam so// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar
195b1(phal chen): thong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ ri shin tu mod pa gang na ba der phyin pa dang / ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas/ ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang / rgyang yang ring po zhig nas/ kun tu rgyu thams
195b2(phal chen): cad 'gro ba tshangs pa chen po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin tu 'bar bzhig/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te/ 'chags na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de'i drung du phyin te/ rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
195b3(phal chen): 'tshal nas/ de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
195b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rje su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa
195b5(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gso/ la/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dA na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so// legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni thams
195b6(phal chen): cad du 'gro ba te/ thams cad kyi rje su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o// sgo thams cad rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / dngos po med pa la gnas pas// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / chos kyi dbyings
195b7(phal chen): kun gyi gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can shi 'jo'i
195b8(phal chen): sgo thams cad dang / sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang / skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi sems can kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan
196a1(phal chen): pa skye ba kun tu 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lnga ste/ lha'i lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs pa dang / klu'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi
196a2(phal chen): lam gyi rgyung du gtogs pa dang / dri za'i lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud tu gtogs pa dang / namakha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang mi mtshar po rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi
196a3(phal chen): rgyud du gtog pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma
196a4(phal chen): yid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs
196a5(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis byed de/ 'di ltar sems can la la la ni bzo'i rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzung sa snang bas 'jig rten gyi bzo sna tshogs bslabs shing don byas
196a6(phal chen): sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongasu bsdu ba'i thabs kyi don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye
196a7(phal chen): kyi sgo snang ba yongasasu bskyed pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyis don chud mi za bar brtan zhing yongasasu bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongasasu brjod
196a8(phal chen): cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir// byang chub sems
196b1(phal chen): da pa'i spyod pa rnam par thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni lta ste/ ngan du spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa dang 'thun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsnga gyi tshor bar
196b2(phal chen): myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas/ skyo ba yongasu bskyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
196b3(phal chen): kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas dga' ba chen po bskyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / kul mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs
196b4(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'ang lta ste/ mi zlog shing lhun gyis grub pa dang/ rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu
196b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'drob bar mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid chen brjod pas dor byo / sems can la la la ni 'di ltaste tshus pa'i gyis gnon / ngas mi gyisa'i non pa'i dus kyi sku bun su tshogs pa 'job bar chos
196b6(phal chen): bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yo su brjod cing don bye'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di yi bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams
196b7(phal chen): cad dang / khyib thams cad dang / 'thun par 'dus pa'i rdul thams cad dang / grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang
196b8(phal chen): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang / rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du dag dang 'thun pa'i lus kyi murkeng dang byi po ra sgrubs shi ngo ston kyang so me dab byi dbus bsta pa pade ba lnga 'o pa mi shes te/ 
197a1(phal chen): gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni me yang ma yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'i dzam bu'i gling 'di na zhabs pa 'thub pa lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhem pa dgu bcu rtsa
197a2(phal chen): drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du yang / sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang 'thun par gnas te/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar kho bo grong khyer dga'
197a3(phal chen): ba 'dzin pa 'di na/ sems can gyi don byed cing / 'dug pa de bzhin du/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang yul dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na yang sems can
197a4(phal chen): gyi don byed do// 'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling pos/ ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du stong da stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
197a5(phal chen): dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi nas su khya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang / se
197a6(phal chen): can gyi khams su bya ba'i ming du gtogs pa thams cad dang / sems can yongasasu rgyu ba thams cad dang / sems can yongasu 'du ba thams cad dang / sems can rgya mamo gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi
197a7(phal chen): rgyud gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang thabs sna tshogs dang / 
197a8(phal chen): tshul sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna tshogs dang / phrad pa sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed do// gzugs dang kha dog sna tshon
197b1(phal chen): yongasu bstan cing mos par bya ba dang / tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod btsad du 'gro ba thams kyi rje su song ba 'di shes par
197b2(phal chen): zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdag dang sems can gyi lus su tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'phrul ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos bris pa'i lam gyi
197b3(phal chen): rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gi lus la rje su spyod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo la brtson pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang
197b4(phal chen): rgyud dang / cher skye ba rab tu ston pa bskal pa thams cad du gnas dpal thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par bya ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba tham
197b5(phal chen): cad kyi don byed kyang gos pa med par gnas pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud/ pa/ ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang ldan pas gas byas pa'i snying
197b6(phal chen): rje chen po mtha' las pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bskyed pa la mngon par 'tshon bang dag gi spyong pa shos pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus regan/ seng rigs kyi bu 'o phyogs kyi
197b7(phal chen): rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spo tshan 'ang dpon longs spyod ud pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
197b8(phal chen): bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig rten tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba zangs kyis kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya
198a1(phal chen): / stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ kun tu sbuthams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba rangs lus dang srog la mi lta/ srid pa'i longs
198a2(phal chen): spyod dang / yongasu zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta/ sems can gyi yul gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/ 
198a3(phal chen): g.yog 'khor dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyad pa thams cad la ni mi lte ste/ rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lta la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongasu dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas/ 
198a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang yongasu dag par bya ba la bltab/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen 'ducu dang nyim zor bya bas mi ngoms pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsdu pa nga / 
198a5(phal chen): rang bzhin med pa yongasu shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya/ ba'i phyir chos thams cad la blta ba yon tan rgya mtsho thams cakyi don du nan tan bya ba las nyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
198a6(phal chen): dpa'i yon tan thams cad la lta ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin/ 
198a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tha mthad du 'jug par bya ba la lta ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo che rer/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad gzung ba la rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/ byang
198a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par mazung bas/ mi ngoms par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams
198b1(phal chen): la/ lta ba de/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag
198b2(phal chen): par lta zhing / mthar kyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ den sa ma yo dpon longs spyod ud pa la yongasu rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ mthong nas sdos 'cho so bon longs spyod ud pa la gang na ba der
198b3(phal chen): byin te/ drung du song nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
198b4(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod sung ba la'i mdun du 'dug te thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i
198b5(phal chen): ye shes 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sun rgyu smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par bgyi b.rayang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sku yongasu grub par
198b6(phal chen): bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sku yong su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sem
198b7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu brtan par yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
198b8(phal chen): gtor bar yang dga'/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub
199a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to// spras
199a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / bdug spos tham/ 
199a3(phal chen): cad dang / bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / byug pa sbyar ba thams cad dang / bye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad shes
199a4(phal chen): talnga'i spos kyang shes so// klu dang gnos sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /  mi dang mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so// nang gso ba'i spos dang / 
199a5(phal chen): yid mi bde ba bstsal ba'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dag / yong su myed pa'i spros dang / nyon mongs pa sa bya ba'i smos dang / nyon mongs pa'i bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi da
199a6(phal chen): ba dang bde ba sna tshogs yongasu bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongasu bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad yongasu srel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud / 
199a7(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam
199a8(phal chen): bar dayod pa'i spos kyang zhes te/ kho bos spos deng ga thams cad rnam pa jig du'ang rab tu shes so// 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang / yongasu rdzogs pa dang / yong su dag pa dang / yong su ngas pa
199b1(phal chen): rab tu sbyar ba dang / yong su spyad pa dang / yul dang mthu dang las dang / d+hu yang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu mi'i 'jig rten na sras blang glang ze'i snying po zhes bya ba/ gru yongasu la drug par byed pa yod pa ri lu tim gyi
199b2(phal chen): 'bru tsam gyi kyang / yul khams chen po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba shin tu sdug pas/ kun nas khebs par gyur te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo// de'i tshe sems can
199b3(phal chen): su'i lus sam/ gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog giser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lus su 'gyur ro// khang pa dang gzhal
199b4(phal chen): med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas so// sems can khyim gyi nang na gnas par ga
199b5(phal chen): gis/ spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gis mngad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos ba chen pos yongasu rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la
199b6(phal chen): bde ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus la yang khams 'khrugs pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med de/ saH
199b7(phal chen): kyi sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba yang mi 'byung ngo // 'jigs pa 'am/ sdang ba 'am/ bag tsha ba 'am/ yid 'khrug pa 'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te nacig
199b8(phal chen): la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu le bo na dang ga de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la/ bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
200a1(phal chen): // byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu rim la ya la byung ba'i tsan danas stengs dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskus na me'i 'obs su mchongs kyang tshig pa med do/ 
200a2(phal chen): kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des rnga'am rung la bskus ma/ de'i sgras gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mtshom dros pa'i ngogs nas
200a3(phal chen): 'byung ba'i a ga ru nag po pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ril lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris kyang / 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams
200a4(phal chen): cad kyang / sdig pa la smon cing / sdom pa'i sems rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las/ 'byung ba'i spros kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tsher na/ sems
200a5(phal chen): can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho bo na dgal ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// rigs kyi
200a6(phal chen): srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bye ba yod de/ de ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des 'dugs ma thag tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi mohA
200a7(phal chen): yan lag bzhi pa yang / nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas so// rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos bzangs po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes pa yod de/ des 'dugs ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim
200a8(phal chen): bo dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa dga' ba'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ nges bdugs ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo // 
200b1(phal chen): de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems chos kyi gtam bya'o// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pa si 'du bar zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa
200b2(phal chen): chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdum du phyung na/ spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i spos kyi sprin chen
200b3(phal chen): po'i char rab tu bab bo// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su 'dugs na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam
200b4(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lo bos ni spos sbyar ba ces su zang na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi drim med pa 'dod ba'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i
200b5(phal chen): bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyung thams cad las shin/ tu 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnas pa dang cu rna pa spyod pa dang 'dzig te/ khad kyis gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ sgri pa
200b6(phal chen): med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang yul du ldan pa/ kun gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams
200b7(phal chen): kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyod ba rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongasu smos pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa 'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi rgyud
200b8(phal chen): bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyam pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i drung du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ 
201a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya 'dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor 'azangs kyis/ spos 'tshong gi tshang dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la
201a2(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod udag la/ lan brgya stong du mar ga yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas ldang yang bltas te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i drung nas song ngo // de nas
201a3(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba zangs grong khyer khang pa 'chags par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen thur dang / lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang / lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang / 
201a4(phal chen): ba dang / 'amadan pa dang /  shes pa dang /  /  'gyug pa med pa rnas pa / ma ma dis sa ma / 'a sa
201a5(phal chen): de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan hrI rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi/ 
201a6(phal chen): rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad byams sdang dang / mthon dman du gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las bsgyur ba dang / sems can thams
201a7(phal chen): cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lte ba sna tshogs kyi sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma bsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings pa sgribs pa med/ 
201a8(phal chen): pa la gzhol bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// dge ba'i
201b1(phal chen): bshes gnyen la ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo
201b2(phal chen): yongasu rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na mnyan pa dpa' bo de chos brgya phrag stong tsam dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs nyam par 'dod pa sha stag gis
201b3(phal chen): kun nas bskor cing / rgya mtsho'i gtam yongasu brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mnyan
201b4(phal chen): ba dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nus/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad
201b5(phal chen): ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / 
201b6(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rje su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sem/ 
201b7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed de/ ye shes
201b8(phal chen): chen po 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dri ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / dbyer med pa'i theg
202a1(phal chen): pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyisar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang rgyud ba tshog
202a2(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par
202a3(phal chen): 'gyul rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis/ rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi
202a4(phal chen): phyogs dang sgo thams cad kyi phyir ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur bar rdzu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'dug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i sbu 'drem
202a5(phal chen): legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi/ grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongasu spyod zhing gnas te/ rigs
202a6(phal chen): kyikyibu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de// de dag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzobs par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yongasu bsdu bar bya'o// chos
202a7(phal chen): kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongasu tshim par bya'o// de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan pa bya'o// ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongasu spel bar bya'o// 
202a8(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongasu
202b1(phal chen): mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu bstan par bya'o// sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o// yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o// 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// 
202b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la yang 'di dag bzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang / yid la byed pa la brtson par kho bo#
202b3(phal chen): ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde bar 'artson pas rgya tsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so// rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad
202b4(phal chen): dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu la khrug thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin lagru
202b5(phal chen): pa thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes te/ 
202b6(phal chen): klong yod pa thams cad dang / klong thams cad bkol ba dang / dpa' rlabs chen po yongasu spangs pa dang / chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so// gnyi zla dang / gza' skar gyi tshogs yongasu 'khor ba dang / nyams
202b7(phal chen): cag dang / yud tsam dang / thang gcig kyang rab tu shes so// phan tshung ngu 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang / bde mi bde dang / 'bru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru bzur ba dang / gru phul ba dang / rlung brdzo ba dang / rlung
202b8(phal chen): bskyed pa dang / gru bsgyur zhing / bzlog pa dang / grub rtod pa dang / gru btang ba'ang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems can gyi dog dang dgos pa byed de/ tshong pa'i tshogs
203a1(phal chen): gru brtan pos lam bad ning na mong mi 'gyur ba/ mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtan gyis dpa' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du na pomo'i tshong du byin par byas nas/ de dag ri po che thams cad
203a2(phal chen): kyis cho ga ste phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du le med kyang / rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang bub pa'am/ nye zhor glu mi myong ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang gi
203a3(phal chen): kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sred pa'i
203a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho bskal don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya/ mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon mos par 'gyur ro// 
203a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sem rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir/ yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro// zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnamapar dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro// phyogs rgya
203a6(phal chen): mtshe thams cad rgyas par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chur 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rje su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 
203a7(phal chen): 'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du'ang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / rje su dran pa'i chu klung
203a8(phal chen): gi dbyings shes bya ba thob par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams
203b1(phal chen): cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang bzhi las rnam par rgyu ba 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongasu sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen
203b2(phal chen): pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa/ sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu srub pa/ dus rgya mtsho thams cad dang tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i dmigs
203b3(phal chen): shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbyes las mi 'da' ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i
203b4(phal chen): 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan
203b5(phal chen): tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis / mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs
203b6(phal chen): su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ gdong mchi mas bkang ste ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo // / 
203b7(phal chen): dang po dgu bcu bdun pa/ de nas tshong dpor gyi bu nor ba zangs/ byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par brlan pa'i rgyungs/ 
203b8(phal chen): bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyan shin tu bstsags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang / mun pa dang / dri ma dang / 'dam thams cad dang bral ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen
204a1(phal chen): pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa
204a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byang ba/ rgya chen po'i bde ba thob pa shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od gzer snang bas ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus par bskul ba/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags
204a3(phal chen): ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/ smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul dang 'thun pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'ged sa ye shes dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
204a4(phal chen): kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de/ grong khyer dga' ba nga'i phreng ba gang na ba der phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba'i dam pa yongasu rjed
204a5(phal chen): cing tshol tshol ba la/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs/ logs kyi 'dab gcig na/ shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na/ khyim bdag stong
204a6(phal chen): phral du ma migs gis bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongasu 'gro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gnom pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa thams cad yongasu gtang ba dang / dngos po
204a7(phal chen): na rnams cad la snang ba dang / yod pa ma na pa bams cad tu gzhig pa dang / srid pa'i cing bams cad ga cad par byu dang / sa pa'i rnam pamams ca kyi sornams pasas pa dang pa ma/ 
204a8(phal chen): ba ma dang / sa khye pa/ bal 'ang bar la dang / ma du na pa thal / pa ga sa yongs rgyas pa dang mas bca
204b1(phal chen): nom pa med masems can rab tu zod pa dang / dang banog pa med pa'i stobs paskyed de/ sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyichos yang dag par drangs sa das
204b2(phal chen): byang chung sems dpa'i sbyong bsngos te/ byang nub sems dpa'i ting nga la ni gyi dngas yongasu bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dnga'i shes rab tu stobs yang dag par bstan cing / byang nung sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam
204b3(phal chen): par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ 
204b4(phal chen): gtam de'i rjes chad chad du bsdad nas/ tshong dpon rgyal 'dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu btud nas/ chos ral shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'phags
204b5(phal chen): pa bdag ni nor bzangs nor bzangs shes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu tshol na/ ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems nga ba'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas kyang ci nas sem
204b6(phal chen): can thams cad yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / 
204b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yong su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / bskal pa
204b8(phal chen): thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongasu mi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnams par 'phrul ba yongasasu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag
205a1(phal chen): par mnod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi
205a2(phal chen): bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems pa skyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la gnas
205a3(phal chen): bas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongasu spyod ste/ de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di sa
205a4(phal chen): gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'phrul
205a5(phal chen): dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang / lha'i
205a6(phal chen): gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'dzin rten thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams/ 
205a7(phal chen): cad dang / grul bu gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / rdul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri ba'i gnas thams
205a8(phal chen): cad dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha'i lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 
205b1(phal chen): mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 
205b2(phal chen): ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brangs 'khor dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ni ston to// chos ma yin pa ni bzlog go// rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa ni rnam par zlog go/ 
205b3(phal chen): 'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do// g.yul du lhags pa ni rnam par bzlog go// shags 'gyed pa nizhi bar byed do// mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to// bcing ba thams cad ni yongasu gcod do// btson ra thams cad ni mngon
205b4(phal chen): par 'dral lo// 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog go// mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do// srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par bzlog go// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas legs par g.yem
205b5(phal chen): ba dang / brdzu ru smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal ba dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / logs par lta ba la sa ni sems can rnam par zlog go// mi bya ba thams cad ni byed du mi
205b6(phal chen): 'jug go// dge ba'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'jug go// sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob du 'dzud de/ 'jig rten rnams rab tu dag 'a bya ba dang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba dang / zhags
205b7(phal chen): pa 'thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rje su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan
205b8(phal chen): pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to// rnam par 'god do// rab tu gastsal bar byed do// rjod do// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams/ 
206a1(phal chen): cad zil gyis mnan te chos ston to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya sngo/ 
206a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag tu chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can
206a3(phal chen): dmyal ba yang ston to// sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi bde ba'ang ston to// byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to// byol seng gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / byol
206a4(phal chen): song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'i sdug bsngal yang ston to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
206a5(phal chen): rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston to// mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang ston to// mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mdzo sa kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' bar spyod pa dang / long spyod kyang ston to// mi'i
206a6(phal chen): mi rig kyi chu 'gro ba'i lam dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/ de ltar rigs kyi phu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to// 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 
206a7(phal chen): 'jig rtenan nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na mtho ba dang / 'jig rten nas 'byung ba yang ston te/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlob pa dang / 
206a8(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang / sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / spring pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu
206b1(phal chen): ba'i bya ba yongasu bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / ldog pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas
206b2(phal chen): pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni
206b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'
206b4(phal chen): thams cad mngon par shes pa/ zhing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu thob pa/ tshig gi lam dang / sgra thams
206b5(phal chen): cad rnam par dmigs pa la shin tu gnol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba/ la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la yang dag par 'asol
206b6(phal chen): ye shes la dbang gis dbang bsgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta babazhin du rnam par dmigs par bya ba la ma 'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan
206b7(phal chen): ba'i lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ongs pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ongs pa'i kha dog dang dbyangs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sku
206b8(phal chen): ma lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gsol ba/ dus gsum thams cad du rje su 'brangs pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa
207a1(phal chen): / nam kha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu
207a2(phal chen): ma phyi ma'i mtha' na grong khyer ka la ka' nags tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
207a3(phal chen): bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal bdas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yos phyogs
207a4(phal chen): su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar kyis yul shu ma khyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
