207a5(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongasu tshol zhing sems can du/ nal rmed pa'i me/ gang nas gang du song ba de dang der/ rogs pa brgya/ phrag dum dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang / lam gyi bani mdo dang / 
207a6(phal chen): lam gyi sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rjesu 'brang ngo // skyes pa brgya phrag dum dang / bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang / rigs kyi bu re re/ dge slong ma seng ga rnam par bsgyings pa ni/ grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi
207a7(phal chen): bda' shing gir ba chen po// rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin nyi ma'i mdog na/ sems can chad med pa'i don du chos ston cing / 'dug go zhes bstan to// de nas tshong 'apon gyi bu nor bzangs/ bza' shing gir ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas
207a8(phal chen): kun tu btsal te/ bltas na/ bza' shing gi ra ba den/ shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyings ltar 'dug pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can/ 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'ong
207b1(phal chen): kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yongasu 'gengs pa zhes bya ba/ gdugs kyi rnam pa dang / dbyings su 'dug pa'i mdab mas kun nas khebs pa/ bai DU r+ya sngon pol 'dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang
207b2(phal chen): ldan pa mang po dang / me tog gi shing / me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa/ sum
207b3(phal chen): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang / shing tog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro// dpe med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs shes bya ba/ gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug
207b4(phal chen): rtag tu shing tog phun sum tshogs par gnas pa mang po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyings ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po
207b5(phal chen): 'phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / rgyal rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzodanas byung ba ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che kha dod/ grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing
207b6(phal chen): dpa' bar byed pa zhes byab/ skardzas kyi gos rin pos 'don na mam parab tu'o byed cing 'byung bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang / 'am ma shing dga' bskyed pa zhes byab/ lha rdzas las kyang skrag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sngas
207b7(phal chen): pa 'byin pa mang po dang / spos kyi shing kun tu nim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par/ rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ongs pa'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod par mthong / mtshe'u
207b8(phal chen): dang / lu ma dang / lteng ga dang / rdzing bu chen po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri nim pos bsdus pa/ 
208a1(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba/ gni rin po che'i rgyal po baDUr+ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'dzam bu ru byung gi gser gyi byem bdal ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu/ lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ongs bcam
208a2(phal chen): gyis yongasu bang ba/ rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pa la dang / ku mung dang / me tog pun da ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lnga rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas chu kun nas yog pa/ d+ya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i
208a3(phal chen): gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sgra snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongasu bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung
208a4(phal chen): thams cad du'ang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs drang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsams kyis mi khyab pa du mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spyan rin po che sna tshogs 'brel bar bting ba/ 
208a5(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis 'dug pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i ngar rin po che mngon par sbyangs pa// rin po che sna tshog kyi bla re bkye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs dang / 
208a6(phal chen): 'dzam bu mu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/ rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yid du 'ongs zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor du lha rdzas rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag du ma bting zhing bshams pa
208a7(phal chen): mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la la ni seng ge'i khri/ rin po che'i pang mo snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo // la la ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar nis
208a8(phal chen): de'i dri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po chen rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i
208b1(phal chen): rin po ci'i rgyal pornam par snang ba'i bad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lang ni seng ge'i khri rin mtha'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i ba dmos snying po byas pa ba sham sa mthong ngo // mam sa
208b2(phal chen): de'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang zer rdo rje'i pad mos spring po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ongs pa'i pang mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // rin pa
208b3(phal chen): che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // bza' shing gir ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang zhing rgya mtsho chen ma
208b4(phal chen): ltar rin po che'i gling gis yongasu gang ba mthong ngo // bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dam pas spras te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i phyogs ka tsa yin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam yang / gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i
208b5(phal chen): mtho dman med pa rdo rje rin po che'i mchog gi pad mo dri yid bu 'ong / bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i si lam kun tu bkram pa' mas/ rgyad / khrung khrung dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / ko ki la dang / 
208b6(phal chen): 'ji ba na 'dzi ba ka s+tha snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang po/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs
208b7(phal chen): kyi pad mo'i sprin gyi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun tu 'bab pa/ 'bres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu rtsegs ma rgyan par dkod pa'i/ 
208b8(phal chen): nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'phrul zhing zhim pa/ lha'i 'dun sa chos babang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag pas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis
209a1(phal chen): kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi drab 'bar bas kun nas
209a2(phal chen): dkrigs pa/ rol mo'i shing dang / rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i dra ba/ rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ongs pa'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe
209a3(phal chen): tshul shin tu bzang ba rnam kyis/ glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang ba/ lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang / 
209a4(phal chen): dog sna tshogs su ldan pas blta na gtang mi bra ba/ khang pa brtsegs ba'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar blta na bzang ba/ 
209a5(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs rnam par bye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan/ ba'i gdugs shin tu legs pa rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram bas/ kun nas bltan mdzes pa/ dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten
209a6(phal chen): ltar shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ yi du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang ltar/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i 'od
209a7(phal chen): kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gi rab chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang / byin gyi rlangs che ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi
209a8(phal chen): khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i mamakha'i dbyings ltar yangs shing rmim de/ rgya chen po dang ldan par mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ de ltar yon tan tshad med pa bsam
209b1(phal chen): byis mi khyab pa/ tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongasu grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa/ sang+yas la mchod
209b2(phal chen): cing / rim 'gror byas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub
209b3(phal chen): pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen pos grub cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang / rgyu 'thun pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis byung ba/ nyan thos dang / 
209b4(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa/ mu stegs ca dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongasu rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/ byis pa so
209b5(phal chen): so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med par mthong ste/ shing snga tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la 'ang / den/ slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa lus shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod
209b6(phal chen): lam zhi ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba/ shin tu dben pa/ dbang po thul ba/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtshe ltar dngas zhings gsal la rnyeg pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu
209b7(phal chen): ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa/ pad mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang / spyi g.ya' ba med pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas ri'i dbang po chen po ltar mi
209b8(phal chen): sprul ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas/ yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sman gyi rgyal po bltar na bzang ba
210a1(phal chen): / sngar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ nu'i lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/ 
210a2(phal chen): tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun sa ldang ba dang bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu nu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dngas par byed
210a3(phal chen): pa/ zhing gshin pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po las
210a4(phal chen): sogs pa gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'a dad cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi dad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag
210a5(phal chen): par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba las sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lhani bu rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
210a6(phal chen): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ gzhi kun nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag pa bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'o rgyal po dbang sgyur las sogs pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu/ 
210a7(phal chen): lha'i du me'i 'khor dang / bcas pa dag 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnamar brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par
210a8(phal chen): bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab tu 'phrul dga' las sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings/ 
210b1(phal chen): chos kyi sgo chos thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan las sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu/ lha'i
210b2(phal chen): bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi klong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ lha'i
210b3(phal chen): rgyal po rab mtshe ma la sogs pa lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // cwo
210b4(phal chen): kyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la sogs pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas
210b5(phal chen): chos kyi sgo skyo ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'tsho/ ra gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gangs chen mtsho la sogs klu'i rgyal po 'od brgyab dang / dga' bo dang / banyen dga' bo dang / 
210b6(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs ldan dang / madros pa la sogs pa/ klu'i chu mo 'khor dang bcas pa/ klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgos pa
210b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ rgyal po chen po ngal bso po la sogs pa/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin
210b8(phal chen): gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongasu skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi na
211a1(phal chen): la la la ni dri ba'i rgyal po gnas srung po la sogs pa/ dri za mang po dri bi'i bu mo dang / dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyis
211a2(phal chen): sgo dga' ba mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lnga ma yin gyi bu mo dang lha ma yin gyi byas pa'i 'khor dang bcas
211a3(phal chen): pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa shes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni na mkha'
211a4(phal chen): lding gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la sogs pa/ namakha' lding gi dbang phro/ na mkha' lding gi bu mo dang / na mkha' lding gi byis pa'i lakhor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
211a5(phal chen): bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'jo rje stan la la la ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la sogs pa mi'am ci'i dbang 'o// 
211a6(phal chen): mi'amatsho'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang / bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi spro sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 
211a7(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la sogs pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang / lto 'phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgying / 
211a8(phal chen): pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo brgya stong mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge
211b1(phal chen): rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog sdong po'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ srin po'i dbang po/ sr-i
211b2(phal chen): po'i bu mo dang / srin po'i byas pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni
211b3(phal chen): sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la
211b4(phal chen): la la ni/ sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khor cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong
211b5(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ sems can theg pa chen po la mos pa rnam sa 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun tu sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par
211b6(phal chen): bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam
211b7(phal chen): kyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan lal la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
211b8(phal chen): rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas
212a1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyam ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan lal la ni byang chub sems dpa'as ba'i ba la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par stings
212a2(phal chen): pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong
212a3(phal chen): ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing
212a4(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ga yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la
212a5(phal chen): gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ sa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgos kun nas brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ yang / dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub
212a6(phal chen): sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa
212a7(phal chen): mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i stabs kyi gnas kyis bstan pa/ 
212a8(phal chen): shes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi gan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi po sgrib pa
212b1(phal chen): med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu
212b2(phal chen): bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongasu smin pa rnam par 'du/ 
212b3(phal chen): bsdod du gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gir ba der 'ongs shing / 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa/ mos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa/ dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan
212b4(phal chen): ba rnams la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ci nas kyang thams cang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur/ bu de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dge sdig
212b5(phal chen): me seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des/ kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang / ldan pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cadashin du bstan pa la sogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dang
212b6(phal chen): pa la sogs pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / 
212b7(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la sogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang / sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par sgrubs pa'i snying po la sogs pa/ shes rab kyis
212b8(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa non pa'i phyir te/ bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la blta ba dang / chos
213a1(phal chen): / mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / sngon dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la shin tu dkod pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
213a2(phal chen): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas sha stag go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong ma se ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / nags tshal phun sum chos
213a3(phal chen): pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'chags phun sum tshogs dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / mal ma phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen
213a4(phal chen): po phun sum chog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos
213a5(phal chen): nas/ chos kyi kyi sprin gyi char chen pos/ sems mngon par brlan pa de// 'i yid la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis
213a6(phal chen): da ni g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig du bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad
213a7(phal chen): kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ skor ba byed pa'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas/ mdun du
213a8(phal chen): 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub dmas dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa
213b1(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rje su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ 
213b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi ngu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ rlom sems thams cad
213b3(phal chen): yongasu bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ rlom sems thams cad yongasu bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis pa/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ye
213b4(phal chen): snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan sems skad cig gi ma shes la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no// smras pa/ 'phags ma ni ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa
213b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang / yong su sgrub pa/ 'tshe/ chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin
213b6(phal chen): gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jog rten gyi khams thams cad du// byang chub sems dpa' sku che gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi ni
213b7(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lha'i lus dang / klu dang / gnod
213b8(phal chen): sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha'i ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i dbang po lus me tog gi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongasu
214a1(phal chen): 'dzin pa dang / bdun spos kyi sprin yong su 'dzin pa dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i sprin yongasu 'dzin dang / phye ma'i sprin yong su 'dzin dang / na bza'i sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / 
214a2(phal chen): gdugs kyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / ba dan ci sprin yongs 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i lhab grub kyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongasu yin
214a3(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rin po'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongasu
214a4(phal chen): 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o// dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du/ 
214a5(phal chen): yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / gtsun ma'i 'kho/ khyi ma ngan bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po/ byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
214a6(phal chen): byang chub tu ngon par sangs rgyas shing / snying po byang chub la bzhug sa dang / chos kyi lakhor lo rab tu sbyor ba'i di bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo // de bzhin du la'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / glu dang / gnod sbyin nga/ 
214a7(phal chen): dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi rim ci dang / sno phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bcugs pa nas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa yongasu tshim par mang / 
214a8(phal chen): las rgyam pa'ang ba sa lal bdapa/  ci ldanapa sa sug gi 'ang las tshod kyi nga /  sa pa sa pa drang dutshal
214b1(phal chen): gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong bde
214b2(phal chen): dag thams cad la yang kho mo ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdam sa ngag dang / rje su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/ rigs kyi bu chos shes kyi mig gis/ sems can thams cad la blta'ang sems can gyi 'du shes
214b3(phal chen): kyang mi skyed la rlom sems kyang mi byed do// 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
214b4(phal chen): kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongasu shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo yongasu 'dzin kyang / chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems byed pa med do// 
214b5(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'ged/ sa kyang chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i
214b6(phal chen): rnam par thar/ rlom sems thams cad yongasu bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbung med pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas
214b7(phal chen): skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang / skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du
214b8(phal chen): 'dod ba/ lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa spu'i nyag ma gcig gcig gis skams shing mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi
215a1(phal chen): spu'i drunar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal ba yongasu ston pa/ skad cig gcig la brgal pa brjod du men pa'i yang brjod du med par
215a2(phal chen): gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khod pa de dag gi ga spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song
215a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bcoms lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar
215a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa dar bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshedang dpon gyi bu nor pa 'angs kyis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
215a5(phal chen): bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slongam seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar gam sa phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bsdus te/ 
215a6(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni sems chos
215a7(phal chen): nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rje su Sh+Ta/ sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam par dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
215a8(phal chen): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi ni shin tu byas par byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi snab su gyur pa'i stobs de nin par rton/ chos thams cad kyi nul snang ba'i sgo nas yang
215b1(phal chen): dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni rab tu rtog/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yong su dag pa de'i rje su ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi
215b2(phal chen): phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/ 
215b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i las dang dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar byung ba'i smon lam de ni yongasu rdzogs par byed cing / mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na
215b4(phal chen): ba der phyin te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongasu tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la/ ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i tshe
215b5(phal chen): snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i/ dbang po dang ldan la/ de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te// de ltar 'khrul pa med cing / de ltar yid 'khrul pa med la/ 
215b6(phal chen): ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lte ste/ de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing / de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang / ldan te yid la brel pa med cing / 
215b7(phal chen): bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te/ rgyamatsho ltar 'dug cing / sems migam mi 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko cizhig bya/ 'di lta du dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba medadade/ serba
215b8(phal chen): byin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid po/ 'di lta budag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongasu rtsub med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi sring do// 'di sa bu dag ni bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med de// 
216a1(phal chen): / 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'das du bying yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi maH
216a2(phal chen): pas bcis par 'gyur ba med de/ mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo// gang yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing / ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag
216a3(phal chen): ni 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongasu dri bar sems pa ni/ khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste/ legaso log so// khyod ni nges par sangs
216a4(phal chen): rgyas su smon pa'o// khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sems ca/ thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngung byung bar 'dod pa'o// khyod
216a5(phal chen): ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod/ pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dir ro// bcom pa ma lnga'i bshes gan/ ma ni grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na
216a6(phal chen): rang gi khyim na 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis chog de thos nas/ dga' rangs ske mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang
216a7(phal chen): na ba der phyin nas/ de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i rab rim pa bcus bskor ba/ rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos nus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad mo dang / 
216a8(phal chen): yud pa la dang / ku su da dang / me tog phun da rigs chu yongasu khebs pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba/ spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dres pa'i chu di'i ma
216b1(phal chen): bas gang ba/ rin po che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dkrigs shing
216b2(phal chen): ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam dang / seng ge'i shing thags dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i
216b3(phal chen): 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dgar/ bai DUr+yas spras pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos zhim po thams cad kyis/ 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/ a ga ru nag po mchog gi 'dus
216b4(phal chen): spos kyis dri zhim par bdugs pa/ spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis/ rtsig ngos kun tu bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs
216b5(phal chen): kyis rab tu spras pas kun nas bka' ba/ gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba/ rin po na thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil
216b6(phal chen): makun tu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba mu med par
216b7(phal chen): brjod du yod pa/ rin po che bye ru'i sdong po dang rdo rje dang man shel la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa
216b8(phal chen): mthong ste/ de nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma/ gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha dog dam rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can/ skra mthon 'thing du/ 
217a1(phal chen): / 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang / mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs mdzes
217a2(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/ sems cad thams cad kyi sgra skad tshul la mkhas/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can/ rnam par thar pa
217a3(phal chen): yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzod dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba/ chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam
217a4(phal chen): pa thams cad du thob pa/ rin po che'i lpab lbub sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus
217a5(phal chen): rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang wA/ ba lbub grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pas lus shin tu 'bar/ 2/ nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thog/ 
217a6(phal chen): pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang / no'u rin po che seng ge mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sprad pa la bskal ba mthun pa dang / smon lam
217a7(phal chen): gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag thams
217a8(phal chen): cad dang / rin po che'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sim bskyed pa/ sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas
217b1(phal chen): gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces
217b2(phal chen): smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du
217b3(phal chen): bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rje su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan
217b4(phal chen): tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ 
217b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar lo mo ni lha rnams lnga mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / nu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog ga sal ba dang / rnam par dag pas ci las mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/ 
217b6(phal chen): de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs
217b7(phal chen): dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// sems can gang 'dod chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag kho mo'i drung du 'ongs na yang
217b8(phal chen): de dag thams cad la kho mo na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ chos ston te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mas
218a1(phal chen): pa med pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang / ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu
218a2(phal chen): 'thob bo// la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni laganas bzung
218a3(phal chen): btsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/ thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rje su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni gcig tu 'a
218a4(phal chen): pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral bas sna ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis/ 'dod chag
218a5(phal chen): dang bral bathob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting / 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yang rab tu ba no// la la ni sprul ba tsam gyis/ 'dod chags dang bral ba
218a6(phal chen): par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni mig btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub
218a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni bang du khyud pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dra
218a8(phal chen): pa thams cad yongasu sdud cing migatong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo// la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba
218b1(phal chen): thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa
218b2(phal chen): thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do// smras pa 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
218b3(phal chen): ba de/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bstsags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
218b4(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med par skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
218b5(phal chen): shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa de/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i sku don du/ rgyal
218b6(phal chen): po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas/ sgo'i them pa la zhabs kyis non pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas/ yangs shing rgya che la/ rin po che du ma las byas par
218b7(phal chen): yongasu grub par gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang / rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mos sna tshogs kyi sgra ra
218b8(phal chen): tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin tshad med par rgya che bas khebs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe/ tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig tu gyur te blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o// de nas kho motsho 'phrul gyis
219a1(phal chen):  nas/  / de ba gshems pazo na ga shegs pas sa na ma tsha drus cig / 
219a2(phal chen): ma mo// de'i tshe 'am mam bshin dur gyur pa ya/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu tho bar gshegs pa'i rnam 'bring na 'dug ste/ des kho ma ldan mes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu se
219a3(phal chen): bskyed do// rigs kyi bu lo chos byang chub sems papa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar byin pa 'di shes par bdan/ khams byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang / ye shes mtha' yas pas
219a4(phal chen): gnas pa/ yo mas rgya 'ang mangs pa'i dzang ldan pa/ me dres kyi lum la dzub ba med pade dan pa spyod pa shes pa'ang / yon tan brjod par sa nan/ mang gis kyi thu ma phyogs kyi rlung
219a5(phal chen): na/ drod kyi dge par rlon tu phyin pa zhes bya ba med de/ den khyim bdan ma zhugs shes byag/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i co rten canar kyi khri 'ang banal chod byed pa du/ 
219a6(phal chen): gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du rgyu badris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzadang kyis/ bcom
219a7(phal chen): ba ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas ste/ 
219a8(phal chen): bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khug kyi khyim ga na ba der phyin nas/ khyim
219b1(phal chen): bdag nan thugs kyi rkang pa gnyis spyi bas phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
219b2(phal chen): na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ ladags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes
219b3(phal chen): bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba/ 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des
219b4(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rab yong su mi zad pa thob po ste/ rigs kyi bu jo bo'i sems kyi rgyud las ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang / sems can
219b5(phal chen): 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten gyi la mas thams cad nas kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul/ du de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa med do// yongasu
219b6(phal chen): mya ngan las 'da' ba med do// yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gi sgo 'byed pa ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed pas
219b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la sems kyi senacig tu mnyam par gzhog ste/ sems kyi skad cig thams
219b8(phal chen): cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu 'thob bo// smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ spras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i
220a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa/ bsod skyabs las sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang / log par dang sel dang / 
220a2(phal chen): thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug tor dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang / rdzogs mdzad dang / zags mchod dang / pad mo'i bla las sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas
220a3(phal chen): mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i
220a4(phal chen): sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong ngo // de bzhin dusangs rgyas bye da mas rgyas byes khrag rgya gas pa rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / 
220a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas byed ngargya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dz+ra/ ka khrig dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgya/ sa bye ba thams cad tha dad pa dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrigs
220a6(phal chen): dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu
220a7(phal chen): gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin
220a8(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug go// thugs dang zho bskyed pas thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go// smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par
220b1(phal chen): bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yong su bsgrub pa la'ang 'jug go// 
220b2(phal chen): bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la'ang 'dzub bo// sarba
220b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// sems can yong su smin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug go// 'khor kun nas 'dus pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
220b4(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mtshogs gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos 'phrul la'ang 'jug go// 
220b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa'ang shin tu rnam par gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par dran te yang dag par 'dzin te/ dran pas yongasu bcangs so// rigs pas rab tu shes par byed do// 
220b6(phal chen): blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa byams pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ 
220b7(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas rgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
220b8(phal chen): du da chu gis tha ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan
221a1(phal chen): / pa yang shin tu gsal ba dang / ma 'dres pa rje su dran te yang dag par 'dzin to// dran pas yongasu bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs
221a2(phal chen): par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs
221a3(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i snying kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo // @
221a4(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas dgacig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go// sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / mi zad pa dang / dang
221a5(phal chen): pas shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus/ dang / zhe non pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sem/ sa dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'a
221a6(phal chen): rten thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la ma zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par shes shing khong du chud par byed do// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
221a7(phal chen): bad ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa/ gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas
221a8(phal chen): brgya'ang mthong zhing shes so// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi nong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
221b1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du'ang mthong ste/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhil blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe bzhin du mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang / bstan pa mdzad pa dang / bstan
221b2(phal chen): par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang thos so// bos nas kyang 'dzin to// dran pas yongasu bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis
221b3(phal chen): snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par bang na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tu
221b4(phal chen): shes pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gi cha shes la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa
221b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'jig rje su rtogs pa/ bdag dang sems can dang sangs rgyas mi gnyis par spro/ dpa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang
221b6(phal chen): ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba'i gangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang mi 'gayo bar rnam par spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtogs par byed
221b7(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi
221b8(phal chen): bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ ri glu 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' snyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems da
222a1(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shis ces nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcang ba 'di gnyis smras so// song shig nor bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal dpung zhig ma// ngas pa
222a2(phal chen): rnams kyi ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod// rin chen rgyus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang // bza' shing ra ba rdzi nu bran 'bab par ldam/ ri mchog de la brtan pa spyan ras gzigs dbang // 'gro ba rnams
222a3(phal chen): la phan pa'i don tu rnam par spyod// degan song dang nor bzangs khyod la mgon po yi// yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston pa byed// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi
222a4(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim bdag nan/ khrugs la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yong dang yang bltas nas/ khyim bdag nan lugs kyi drung nas
222a5(phal chen): song ngo // // bam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams ngag rje su sems shing / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i
222a6(phal chen): mdzod de ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjesu dran pa'i stobs de ni rjesu dran par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin/ sangs rgyas gcig
222a7(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud par byed/ rnam thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mnan de dag gi ni rje su 'brang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag
222a8(phal chen): par bsgrub pa'i rgyan da ni khong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyum chog gi mthu phyung ba de la ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyin las bsam gyis mi khyad pa de ni
222b1(phal chen): mngon du byed cing / mthar kyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 'ongs nas/ ri gu 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongasu med cing tshol tshol ba las/ nub phyogs logs
222b2(phal chen): kyiri'i sman ljongs mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa/ baiDUr+ya sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la gzhon pa'i spang na gas tshal chen po'i mthongs na 'dug pa zhig na/ rin po che rdo rje'i rdorje
222b3(phal chen): shigs la skyil mo krung bcas te/ 'dug cing / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo rtags la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro thams cad
222b4(phal chen): yongasu sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba yang dag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la mi
222b5(phal chen): tshang yid bde bskyes nas dga' bas rgyas shing mi 'dzums pa 'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la/ dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas/ sems mi 'khrugs pa/ dge ba'i n+de
222b6(phal chen): bzhin mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang / nan tan thams cad dge ba'i
222b7(phal chen): bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dga' bar sems pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung zhing 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du
222b8(phal chen): shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las ye shes snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa
223a1(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa yongasu ston par 'du shes pa/ dge ba'i
223a2(phal chen): bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yongasu skyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dang
223a3(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong na mas sa chu pos dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po yangs shing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna
223a4(phal chen): tshogs kyis gtses shing bskyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bskyabs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan la/ sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las
223a5(phal chen): 'das ste/ dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje/ chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad yod/ su bskyabs pa'i blo gros can blta na kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon
223a6(phal chen): tu bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongasu sbyangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu gzung por mos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa
223a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du bltas
223a8(phal chen): ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba la/ mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba dang mos pa'i
223b1(phal chen): shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/ legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nam/ 
223b2(phal chen): dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan la yongasu bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin
223b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs pa legs so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ 
223b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs ngal lan pa stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug
223b5(phal chen): ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa 'ang / ga gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem/ sa bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
223b6(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to// 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rje su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems
223b7(phal chen): dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par 'gyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ mdog 'dzam bu
223b8(phal chen): chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dra ba rnam pa snang tshogs tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od gzer sna tshogs dri ma
224a1(phal chen): med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa rab tu skyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag sde 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu
224a2(phal chen): ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu nga ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi
224a3(phal chen): bu nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo// snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la dbye ba med par sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang 'dul ba la zhugs pa/ sgo kun nas thos shing rnam
224a4(phal chen): par rig par 'gyur bas/ sems can yongasu bsdu ba dang gdul bra la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo// snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/ 
224a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rlabs kyi drung nas kyi mi g.yol/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa'ang sa 'on du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongasu srung ngo //  gzhan pa dang / 
224a6(phal chen): don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas kyang sems can yongasu sdud do// gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang / sems can yongs smon par byed do// kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs bsam gyis
224a7(phal chen): mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba dbye bas kyang / sems can rab tu sim par byed cing yong su smin par byed do// bsam 'ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang / cil
224a8(phal chen): dga' ba'i spyod lam yongasu bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul 'thun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam 'phrul ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bsugs par bag mi byed pa'i
224b1(phal chen): sems can gyi sems yongasu bskul ba dang / bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongasu bstan pa dang / rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang skal ba 'thun pa'i gzugs yong su bstan pa
224b2(phal chen): dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang / sems can yongasu bsdus shing yongasu smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo// snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongasu
224b3(phal chen): sbyangs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jig pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can
224b4(phal chen): cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongasu cad ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'gre
224b5(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yo byad kyis phongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang / sems can tham sa cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can
224b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yong su bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag ma pa'i 'jigs pa
224b7(phal chen): med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs las rnam par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam mun
224b8(phal chen): bas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skal ba mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang
225a1(phal chen): bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral
225a2(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu bzla ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba
225a3(phal chen): thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon las mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas so// sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rje su dran pa'i sgo byin gyis brlabs so// sems
225a4(phal chen): can thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi ming gi 'khor lo'ang / 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so// dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas/ rnam par dmigs par
225a5(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa'i bye brag mtha'ayas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so// rigs bu de ltarang ni thabs 'dis sems can thams cad
225a6(phal chen): 'jigs pa las yongasu bkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi ldog par byed do// rigs kyi bungs
225a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo// snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam
225a8(phal chen): par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpal kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/ dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud
225b1(phal chen): la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rje su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tham/ 
225b2(phal chen): cad kyi glong yongasu 'khyil pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yongasu 'phel ba'i rgyud
225b3(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re snyan/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// g.yas phyogs
225b4(phal chen): bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas/ nor bzangs shin tu dul ba lho phyogs rgyud tu song // spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa// rin chen ri'i sul na gnas par des kyang
225b5(phal chen): mthong // rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri'i sman ljong na/ pad mer snying po'i seng ge'i khri la brtan pa 'dug/ lha dang lha minak+Sha/ dang srin po mi 'am ci// rgyal ba'i sras kyi bskor cing de la chos kyang
225b6(phal chen): snyom// mthong nas nor bzangs dga' 'a chad med skyes par gyur// bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis 'thob 'gyur bar// 'phags pas thugs rje
225b7(phal chen): bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsel// bsod nams brgyapas brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste// 'od sprin drab rgya chen bzang po rabarngon pas// nor bzangs spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa/ 
225b8(phal chen): sbyin ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di sngas// sangs rgyas sras po ni rnam par gcig sgo shes// ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes sug// 'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs
226a1(phal chen): bsdu phyir byung // kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu// 'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob// gang rnams dam du bcings shing dag las byin pa dang // lus la gzer
226a2(phal chen): cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang // nga yi ming thos bcing shing bzung ba thar bar 'gyur// rgyal po dag la zhes pa'i g.yon byas gsad spangs pa// de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran 'gyur na// mda' 'phangs de'i lus
226a3(phal chen): la phog par mi 'gyur te// mchod rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'jug rgal bar 'gyur// dbang po'i 'khor du phyin dang gang rnams zod gyur pa// dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur// grag+sa
226a4(phal chen): dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// da da yi ming drin de dag thub pa med par 'gyur// gang gis nga yi ming ni rje su dran byas pa// de dag rkun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'a
226a5(phal chen): nags phyin te// seng ge dom gzig gcan zan yag rgod sbrul gang yang // dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jig sa pa med par 'gyur// gang rnams la las tshang zhig dran byas ma
226a6(phal chen): sdang ba'i sems kyis ri chen ljongs su bor gyur tam// sol ma dag lci med rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang // me rnams pad mos gang ba'i chu'i gter 'gyur// nga yi ming ni skad 'ba' yud tsam rjes dran na/ 
226a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i nur bor de'i nang du 'chir mi 'gyur// chu bos mi khyer me'i dbus su 'tshig mi 'gyur// don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// shing sprog dbyig bcings lpags sgrob de bzhin
226a8(phal chen): ltung rnams dang // brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin brid cing bslus pa dang // spyod shing bsdigs te gshe dang spa phab rnam pa las// nga'i ming tsam dran par byas na thar 'thob// gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs
226b1(phal chen): glags lnga ji snyed dang // gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan rjod pa'i rnams// nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par rjod par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis mong la byams pa'i sems kyang skye// nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas na/ 
226b2(phal chen): gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang bang byed pa'o// ngagra rnams rtag tu de yi bil gyis non par 'gyur// ma lus dug gis de'i lus la mi tshugs so// la las gang gisang yi ming tsam dran byas na// klu dbang
226b3(phal chen): srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang // grul bum sru so 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang // mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur// nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang / 
226b4(phal chen): pha dang ma dang gnyen gshes mdza' ba kun dang yang // 'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min// nor zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro// nga yi ming gi rje su la la dran byed na// 'di nas
226b5(phal chen): shi 'phos mdar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste// byol song skye gnas yi dgas mi khom gnas su min// sems can dang / pa lha dang mi'i gnas su skye// nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na/ 
226b6(phal chen): dbus logs yon pa zha bor mi 'gyur te// theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra ba lta sdug 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang por kun ldan 'gyur// la la gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes dran na// sems can
226b7(phal chen): dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu'i// 'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur// 'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs ming ji snyed
226b8(phal chen): kyis// 'gro ba sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nus// sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgom ste// yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba
227a1(phal chen): zhes bya ga/ shar phyogs nas nam la'i dbyings las 'ongs ste mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
227a2(phal chen): khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis bor ma thag tu/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des/ 
227a3(phal chen): nyim dang bya ba'i 'od thams cad dazil gyis don pa dang / grwa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / rnam par lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / sgo phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mthon to// 
227a4(phal chen): dang / me dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zi'i kyis non pa lta bu'i 'od lus lekye ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dang kyang snang byar byas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi/ 
227a5(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas ste/ ngan so/ gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu ni'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'ang nyam su mi gnod par gyur to// mya ngan gyi
227a6(phal chen): zug rdul dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du'ang / rin po che'i sprin gyi char phang ste/ me to ba dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
227a7(phal chen): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo // de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni/ sems
227a8(phal chen): can thams cad kyi gnas su snang ba ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/ ri bru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du'ang byin par snang po// de nas byang du/ 
227b1(phal chen): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po// tshong dpon gyi bu nor 'azangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/ smras
227b2(phal chen): ba/ 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nam tan du bya / 
227b3(phal chen): dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i nang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya stong
227b4(phal chen): du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpal spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang por
227b5(phal chen): ye shes kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis/ spyan ras gzig/ sa kyi dbang po bltas pas kyang mngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na ba der song
227b6(phal chen): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis mi spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'judug de bal mo sbyar nas 'di ga ces smras so// lags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
227b7(phal chen): nub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu 'gyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gangs/ 
227b8(phal chen): ngag dang rje su bstan pa meng do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ 
228a1(phal chen): des smras pa/ rigs kyi phung ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas byang chub sem
228a2(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i di brnyes/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di
228a3(phal chen): ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas par 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa
228a4(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrog pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi du dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu ma zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa/ dge ba'i sra ba ma bsugs pa/ bsam pa
228a5(phal chen): yongasu ma dag pa/ byang chub sems de pa'i dbang po mthob/ ba/ shes rab kyi mig dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis thos pa/ 'am/ yongasu gzung ba 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ khong du chud par
228a6(phal chen): bya bar mi nus so// smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dge ba'i bshos gnyen gyi gzungs kyis dang pa dang / mos par bgyin 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi stsa la tAm/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ni shar phyogs
228a7(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i
228a8(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung nas/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sngo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob bo// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'arjod
228b1(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bstod cig 'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bor ro// gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas
228b2(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu dra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi ni 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad
228b3(phal chen): de bzhin gsheg pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa yid kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongasu bskyed pas mchod pa byas// 
228b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'ang khong du chud ngo // de dag thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khom
228b5(phal chen): lo yang yongasu shes shing bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongasu bstan to// chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu bkye'o// yo byad sna
228b6(phal chen): tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar bsdud do// rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro// shar phyogs nas ji ltam
228b7(phal chen): 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyobs mtshams dang / lho nub phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs marnams dang / 'os
228b8(phal chen): dang / steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kun tu mngon par rgol ba
229a1(phal chen): tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings tham cad lus rnam par bkod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'thun par spyod pa/ zhing \u0f7f
229a2(phal chen): cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rje su song ba/ dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ chos kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam
229a3(phal chen): bar snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtogs pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/ gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ 
229a4(phal chen): yon tan brjod par yang nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhes khya ba yod de/ de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'dug gis de'i gan du song la
229a5(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar namatan du bya ba dris shig/ de/ nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dang
229a6(phal chen): gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang blta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
