229a7(phal chen): gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjesu song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes
229a8(phal chen): kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can mngon par shes pa chen po// mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/ bsam gyis
229b1(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjesu song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pade/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi sa la ni nan tan du byed/ ting nge 'dzin gyis la ni rnam par spyod/ gzungs kyi sa la
229b2(phal chen): ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i sa la rjesu sngob/ stobs kyis ni yong su sgrub cing mthar gyis zong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lhal
229b3(phal chen): chen po kun tu dris pa dang / de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dire/ lha lha chen po zong khyer gyi lam gyi mi mngon/ bdag zhing shin tu che bas sems can rnams la ches ston cing 'dug go// de nas tsong dpon
229b4(phal chen): gyi bu nor 'azangs lnga lha chen po bangan pa der song ste/ lha lha chen po'i chung ba gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis blan
229b5(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ rdzi ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du dgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 
229b6(phal chen): 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rje su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
229b7(phal chen): nan tan du brtsi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas lha lha chen pos lag pa ba'i phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu chur ba'i shugs kyis nu drangs te/ bdag gi gdong bkrus nas
229b8(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar shin tu dka' ba ste/ thos par yang rab tu dka'o// skyes bu mchog gi me tog paH
230a1(phal chen): 'da' rika ni 'jig rten gyi phul du bya ba yin pas/ ngo tsho mtshar ma du byung ba yin te 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o// 'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o// sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o// 
230a2(phal chen): lam rmongs pa rnams la lam bde ba ston pa'o// chos kyi tshul du gzud pa la mgon du gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen po gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub
230a3(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston cing / lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams dbyangs kyi
230a4(phal chen): snang ba yongasu gnon par byed pa dang / bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par gnas pas lta ba ngan pa 'jom ba yin par bsams so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni/ byang chub sems
230a5(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dri ba thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar la/ sprin gyi dra bde'i yum dzA/ wA bu zhig mchis/ de nas walnga chen pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba
230a6(phal chen): kyi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang / dngul gyi phung po dang / bai shU R+Ya'i phung po dang / shel gyi phung po dang / mu sa ra gal ba'i phung po dang / a sma gar ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che dang gis snang ba'i phung po dang / 
230a7(phal chen): nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin
230a8(phal chen): po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do'i phung po dang / dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang / rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang / gdu ba'i phung po dang / skarabs kyi phung po dang / rkang gdub kyi phung po dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che
230b1(phal chen): tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag dang shing lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang / nor burin po che yid ba'i kyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / phreng 'thams cad dang / 
230b2(phal chen): byug pa thams dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / gdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo krol ba thams cad dang / 'jon
230b3(phal chen): pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyer la sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig bsod nams mang po
230b4(phal chen): ni gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni mchod cig/ sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongasu bsdus te/ gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig/ 'jig rten na sbyin pa la spobs shig/ #
230b5(phal chen): bar dka' ba yongasu gdong ba ni ston cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji wAr yo byad kyi rnams pas bstud pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bas ma pa dang / ma bral ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag gis bsam gyi
230b6(phal chen): rgyud kyang gtong bas yongasasu bsgo ba byed do// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
230b7(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni/ sems can 'dong ba'i dga' bas myong ba yul gyi longs spyod la yongasu chags pa rnams la yul de dag mi sdug par byin gyis rlob bo// 
230b8(phal chen): khro bas non pa dang / nga rgyal can dang / rgyags shing dregs pa dang / rlom pa tshar gcad pas 'dul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po ltar mi sdug la 'jigs pa'i lus sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan par bstan te/ 
231a1(phal chen): rlom pa dang snyems pa/ sa 'khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed do// le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams la ni me dang / chu dang / rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / gnod pa'i 'jigs pa
231a2(phal chen): yongasu bstan cing skyo bar bya ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa la 'god par byed de/ de ltar thabs de dang de dag gis/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang mi mthun pa rab tu gzhom pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs
231a3(phal chen): bstsags pa dang / sgrib pa'i ri'i g.yang sa'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos la gzud pa'i phyir mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/ dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la
231a4(phal chen): yang dag par dgod par byed de/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad ni/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin rab tu 'jom
231a5(phal chen): ba/ chu lnga 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung pozhi bar byed pa/ me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi srid pa'i chu skems pa/ rlung ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par
231a6(phal chen): 'thor ba/ rdo rje ltar bdag gi 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan sngo rigs kyi bu 'dzem bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga ti'i snying po byang chub na/ sa'i lha mo
231a7(phal chen): brtan ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dri shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs kyis/ lha lha chen
231a8(phal chen): po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha lnga chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang du bltas te/ lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ 
231b1(phal chen): cad ma kyi 'i snying po rgyang chubatusa'i l+h+wa po banam gangan bder song ba dang / de 'gro ba'ims kyi mo bco stong tha bcu bcig la gcig 'di sa ces to// sems can thams sad kyi rten du 'byur ba gi ni 'dims
231b2(phal chen): tshur 'ong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'dral bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas chur 'ong ngo // chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba/ chags pa med cing drim
231b3(phal chen): med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo // ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas chur 'ong/ 
231b4(phal chen): zhes nas de'i mod la lha mo brtan ma la sogs pa sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de/ 'brug sgra zab mo / bu'i sgra chen po grag par byas nas/ stong sum gyi stong chen po'i
231b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ lus rin po che'i rgyun dang / lbab lbub thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan nas klog gi 'phreng ba'i tshogs namakha'i dbyings las 'bru zhing snang ba
231b6(phal chen): wA bu sha stab tu byas te/ shing thams cad kyi myi gu ni skye bar byed/ me tog gi shing thams cad ni kha 'ju bar byed/ chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni 'bab par byed/ mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / thams cad ni rgyas
231b7(phal chen): par byed/ spos chu'i char pa ni rab tu 'bab par byed/ me dog gi sprin rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu sgra sgrog par byed/ lnga rdzas kyi gzhal
231b8(phal chen): med khang dang / rgyan gyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khrol bar byed/ ba lang dang / khyu mchog dang / glang po dang / stag dang / ri dgas kyi dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / 
232a1(phal chen): 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'drub sgra 'byin par byed/ ri'i dbang po chen po rnams ni phan tshul thug par byed/ gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong ni mngon du 'byung bar byed cing / sa'i 'og nas
232a2(phal chen): 'thon to// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so// sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/ kho mor
232a3(phal chen): mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na/ de'i rnam par smin pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam lta bar 'dod dam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
232a4(phal chen): te/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i mdun 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma 'tshalo// 
232a5(phal chen): de nas sa'i lha mo brtan pas rkang pa'i mthil gyis/ sa chen po la brdabs te/ rin po che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu
232a6(phal chen): rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang / khyod kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o// khyod kyis ci dgar spyad pa'o// khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o// khyod
232a7(phal chen): kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o// 'di las long ste/ khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba
232a8(phal chen): snying po can thob pa ste/ de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun cha du byang chub sems dpa'i rje su 'brang zhing / rtag tu srung ba la zhu
232b1(phal chen): bad/ de tsun pa du yis kyi bu lo na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pal rnam par spyod do// ye shes kyi yul la 'jug no// skyon las kyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do// byang num
232b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rje su rtogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rje su 'brang // byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'a
232b3(phal chen): so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang sgyur ba dang / zhing gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mngon pa dang / 
232b4(phal chen): dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshar rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang / mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams cad dang / chos sdang bcos
232b5(phal chen): snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin pa/ rabya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa tham/ sa cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjesu rtobs par byen/ 
232b6(phal chen): yang dag par 'dzin to// yang dag par nod to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi pha rol de'i yang
232b7(phal chen): pha rol gcig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskal pa snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po las thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo byang chub sems
232b8(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la dpyod dpyod/ rnam par dpyod dpyod/ shin tu dpyod dpyod/ yang dag par 'phel bar byed de/ shin tu rgyas par byed byed pas/ bskal pa
233a1(phal chen): ba bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bra'o// de srid kyi bar gyis kho mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
233a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul la yang mthong ste/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa de
233a3(phal chen): dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa
233a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham ring du 'brang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rje su 'brang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems kyi skad
233a5(phal chen): cig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shug/ sa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du/ myur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs/ 
233a6(phal chen): pa dri ma med pa'i snying por gyur pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las tha mi dad pa'i phoTar gyur pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par
233a7(phal chen): nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga ta zhes bya ba grong khyer ser skya'i gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dbying dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji lta
233a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang // ji ltar nan tan du b+ha ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i nang ga gra nyis la sbyi/ 
233b1(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ sa'i lha mo brtan pan
233b2(phal chen): gdams ngag rjesu dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can de rje su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pasgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang / 
233b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rdul de'i rje su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba de la rnam par dpyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par
233b4(phal chen): blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mche ngal 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la yi nges par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
233b5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyangs pa de rje su rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtshod la 'bab par bya ba byed cing / grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas dang
233b6(phal chen): na ba der phyin te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/ nyi ma nub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus shig na/ 
233b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag 'thun par len pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing dge pa'i bshes gnyen yod na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa ye
233b8(phal chen): kyi mig kun tu blta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang / ye shes chen po snying por gyur pa'i
234a1(phal chen): // 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byam klas pas rgyas par 'azhengs
234a2(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mig gis phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par blta ba/ ye shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam pa rtsa gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang / mtshan
234a3(phal chen): me'i lha mo dbying dang ldan pa de/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gi na mkha'i dbyings la/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po spos zhim po thams cad kyi
234a4(phal chen): pad+mo'i snying po can zhig la/ lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ sku 'jam zhing mangs la mthon thing du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag/ 'byis pa/ gzugs bzang ba shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ 
234a5(phal chen): lus rgyan dang lba ba sgrub thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/ 9/ ngag bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa/ tshangs pa'i gtsug tor rgya/ cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa thogs pa/ lus la rgyu
234a6(phal chen): skar dang / gza' dang / skar chen dang / skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur 'dug par mthong ngo // de sa sems can gyi khams yangs par mi khoms pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / logs
234a7(phal chen): ltung ba nas/ sems can ji snyed cig yongasu bkrol ba de dag thams kyang / de'i baspu sbubasu chud par mthong ngo // ji snyed cig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang / ji skad cig nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
234a8(phal chen): dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par bya ba de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo // lus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog mngon par bsgru
234b1(phal chen): pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed cig yongasu smin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i baspu'i sbungasu chud par mthong ngo // nga ro mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 
234b2(phal chen): skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongasu sbyar ba ji snyed cig gis yongasu smin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i baspu'i sgo nas rje su brjod pa thos so// dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 
234b3(phal chen): sems can gyi rje su 'brang bar bye ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnams par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / 
234b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba dang / byang chu sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par blta
234b5(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bstiH sa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par
234b6(phal chen): rtse ba ji snyed cig gis/ des sems can yongasu smin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i baspu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo // des thabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag mthong zhing thos nas
234b7(phal chen): dga' rangs de mgu zhing rnams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ mtshan ma'i lha mo dpying dang ldan pa de la lus thams cad kyis phab nas phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyed/ 
234b8(phal chen): dang ldan pa la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo bdag gis
235a1(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskye dede/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yon+da tan thams cad 'byung bar yang da/ 
235a2(phal chen): bar mthong bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag du bdag nyid bor ba lags na/ lha mo shul gang la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul gal
235a3(phal chen): deskad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis non te
235a4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig mnyam par 'dod pa dang / dge raba'i bshe gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa legaso so// rigs kyi bu khyod ni de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams
235a5(phal chen): dag la nan tan du byed pas/ gdon mi ba bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tus par 'gyur ro// dzin/ sa kyi bu kho mo na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tharapa
235a6(phal chen): sems thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas/ 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste/ bsam pa mo mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems
235a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 
235a8(phal chen): sems mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la/ rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 
235b1(phal chen): 'am nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhubs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dma' pal mos pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongasu bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 
235b2(phal chen): dbang po zhum pa rnams la/ brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la/ 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo
235b3(phal chen): las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
235b4(phal chen): kyi lam la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo lta bu'i sems dang yid la bya bar ldan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thab sems
235b5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel pa'i chos kyi sdang bas 'gror tsham par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas/ sems can gang ji snyed cig/ mun nas smag tu gyur pa'i
235b6(phal chen): nam la/ min thal bar gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyo bar gyur/ rkun chom mang pos ni byis par gyur/ sems can mi srun pa'i tshul bcani phyos su rtsu bar chu
235b7(phal chen): sprin stug po nag pos kun nas khebs par 'gyur/ dung pa dang / rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas 'grigs par gyur/ rdzi char mi bzad pas ni rab tu gtags par gyur
235b8(phal chen): zla skar gyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/ mig gis bya ba'i mthun med par gyur pa'i mun pa la/ sems can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la spyod dam thang la spyod dam/ 
236a1(phal chen): ril spyod dam/ nags tshal ga'azhamanan spyod dam/ yul gzhanan spyod dam/ zong gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs gzhanan
236a2(phal chen): spyod dam/ phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod dam/ lam gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod spyod pa las gru thub par gyur pa 'am/ thangal spyod spyod pa las
236a3(phal chen): nyam nyes pa 'am/ ril spyod spyod pa las g.yangs chen por lhung bar gyur pa 'am/ 'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa las/ kha zas kyis phongs par gyur ram/ 
236a4(phal chen): nags tshal thibs por spa'i zang zing la thogs pa 'am/ tshul ma yin pa'i nyam nyes shig tu g+hu tam/ yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa 'am
236a5(phal chen): zong gzhan spyod sbyong ba las/ mi srun pa'i tshul/ can gyis gces pa'am/ phyogs gan/ nan spyod spyong pa las 'brog mis pa'am/ phyo
236a6(phal chen): mtshams gzhon na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa 'am/ lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nye nor gyur kyang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can de lta bu dag la
236a7(phal chen): thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed pa ste/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod pa rnams kyi rlung sprin mag po gtor ba dang / chu'i rnyog pa dang ba dang / rlung mi ba
236a8(phal chen): pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang / rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / klong gi 'jigs pa las thar par bya ba dang / phyogs bstan pa dang
236b1(phal chen): chu'i lam legs par darigs pa dang / 'gram bstan pa dang / rin po che'i gling du byin par bya ba'i byi las yong sa ston te/ yongs sduspyad pa'i 'a sa da da pon gyi gdugs dang / 'irgya
236b2(phal chen): rdo chen gyi gzugs dang / glang ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / rus sbrul gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lham yin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / namakha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang lto chen
236b3(phal chen): po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / rgya mtsho'i lha'i gzugs dang / mnyan pa'i 'azugs kyis skyabasu gyur par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongasu bzlog pa'i phyir
236b4(phal chen): gyur par shog shig ces yongasu bsngo'o// bang la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa chen po shin tu gnag pa'i nam la/ sa gzhi 'od ma dang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang /  spos gang ba sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba thag thug dang mi bde ba'i
236b5(phal chen): 'am can/ rdul dang phyag dar shin du 'phrul ba rdzi char drag pos gtags pa cha/ ba dang grangs pa'i sdug bsngal yod ba sprul dang sa can pan gyis pas tshab yod pa/ khong mi dang chos po rgyu bar byur ba zhig las go 'khor bar byud
236b6(phal chen): ba'i sems can rnams lagi ma'i 'thugs dang / bla ba'i 'jugs dang skya reng 'ar ba'i 'argyabyas dbakar mad chen po'i gzungs dang zlos gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / rin po tshe'i 'od kyi bzungs dang / ma'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang / rgyu ska dang
236b7(phal chen): skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med yang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang lnga'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis skyabs gyur par byed do// sems dge pa'i rtsa ba 'dis nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par bskul ba'i phyir/ sems
236b8(phal chen): can thams cad kyi skyabasu shog shig par bskyed do// ri'i g.yangs la spyod cing 'chi bas/ 'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi srog dbyung ba dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / snyan pa dang / sgra'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang / longs spyod tshol ba dang / 'dod
237a1(phal chen): ba la mnyam pa'i g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / sbrang dul gshong du 'du shes par gyur te/ phyogs kyilam dang mchod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang kho ma ni mas sna'i tshogs kyis snang bar byas te phyir 'thung ba
237a2(phal chen): rnams la ni sgo yongasu ston to// rgal bar 'dod pa rnams la ni mu stag yongasu ston to// brgyal bar 'dod pa rnams le ni bru yongasu ston to// khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongasu ston to// rnam par blta bar 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs
237a3(phal chen): yongasu ston to// sa rig ni mtho ba dang dma' ba yongasu ston to// sa'i gzhi phyogs mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang yongasu ston to// lam gyis dub pa rnams la grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
237a4(phal chen): 'khor kyang yong su ston to// tsha ba dang / skom pas mnar pa rnams la yang mtsho dang / rdetse'u dang / lum dang / rdzing dang rdzi bu dang chu klung dang chags tshal dang / bza' shing shri ra ba dang kun dga' yi 'ongs pa yongasu ston to// sdugs bral zhing phrang
237a5(phal chen): par 'dod pa rnams la pha dang ma dang bu dang chung ma dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po da pa/ gnyen pashes dang / yid tu 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs yongasu ston to// sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mu/ 
237a6(phal chen): pa mun gnag gis chod pa mig gis rab rib kyis nyams pa phyogs bslad ga lam 'khor ba rnams la/ gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang bskyed do// 'od byas pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis yun ring po nas
237a7(phal chen): 'khor ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la bslad pa/ ma rig pa'i mun par 'joms pa/ ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa/ 'du shes dang sems dang lta bas phyin ci
237a8(phal chen): 'og tu gyur pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa/ spu bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang
237b1(phal chen): gso ba dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi phyogs su zhugs pa/ srog gcod pa
237b2(phal chen): byin par len pa/ 'dod pas logs par g.yem pa/ brdzun du smra ba/ bram zer ba/ ngag rtsub po 'byin pa/ tshig kyal ba smra ba/ chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa/ log
237b3(phal chen): par lta can/ par mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer mi shes pa/ dbang po mi shes pa/ skyes bu dam pa mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa/ mi tshul ba'i 'dod pas zim
237b4(phal chen): gyis non pa/ log pa'i chos kyis yongasu 'khris pa/ de bzhin gshegs rapra la skur pa 'debs pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la kuHngas pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
237b5(phal chen): la gnod par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la zhe sdang ba/ byang chub kyi sems la/ mos pa spong bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du rjod du/ snod ma skams par spring ring ba/ gnod pa ma byas par dgrar len pa/ 
237b6(phal chen): 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/ mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi dngos po la 'khru ba/ pha ma la log par sems pa/ mtshams med pa'i las byed pa/ g.yangs chen po la mngon par bltas pa ni
237b7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i dun ga shes rab kyi snang bachen pas brtu la te bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nub tu yang dag par 'askul nas thed pa chen po ku tu bzang pos stobs bcu'i se shes kyisa'i las yong su non par gyur cig de ban da na/ 
237b8(phal chen): ba'i sa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / sang+yas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / stobs bcu yongasu grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
238a1(phal chen): sku mchog du gyur pa yongs su ston par shog shig/ yongs su bstan nas kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog shig par
238a2(phal chen): bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can yur ring po ras rba shing nad kyis yongasu skyo ba/ lus nyam chung ba dang / rgas pa/ na ba'i zil gyis non pa dang / mgon med pa dang / phongs
238a3(phal chen): shing dbul ba dang / log par ltung ba dang / yul gzhan du phyin pa dang / phyogs log par zhugs pa dang / btson ran 'dug pa dang / chad pas bcad pa dang / nyes byung sde rgyal pos gsang
238a4(phal chen): par sri ba rnams kyang srog dang bral gyis 'jigs pa las yongasu bskya pa'i phyir gnaso// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni/ mabs thams cad kyis gso bar
238a5(phal chen): nan tan du byed do// rgas pa dang / rga ba'i zil gyis non pa/ rnams la ni/ bsnyen bkur dang rim 'gro dang / mo byad kyis mi phongs par yongasu sdud par byed do// mgon med pa'i
238a6(phal chen): sems can rnams la mgon byed do// phongs shing dbul ba rnams ni nor dang gser gyi phung pos yongasu sdud do// log par ltung ba rnams ni don 'thun pas yongasu sdud do// yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni rang gi yul
238a7(phal chen): du phyin par byed do// phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs mi nor bar 'dzud do// btson ran 'dug pa rnams ni btson ra nas thar par byed do// chad pas bcad pa ni tshed pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do// 
238a8(phal chen): nyes pa byung ste rgyal pos gsad par sgri ba rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed de/ sems kyang bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs las yongasu skyob cing mgon byed pa
238b1(phal chen): de bzhin du/ bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongasu bsdu bas yongasu bsdus te nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu dgrol bar bya'o// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 
238b2(phal chen): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o// ngan song dang / log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las
238b3(phal chen): yongasu dgrol bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzugs la rab tu dgod par bya'o// chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yongasu bsdu bas yongasu bsdu bar bya'o// kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o// 
238b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams par dag pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// rga shi yong su med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya bar bskyed do// rigs kyi su kho mo ni sems can log pa'i
238b5(phal chen): lam la zhugs pa lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ log par rtog pa'i spyod yul can lus dag yid kyis nyam nga bar 'gyur ba la yongasu spyod pa/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub
238b6(phal chen): sna tshogs la gnas pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya su 'du shes pa/ lus gdung ba dang / yong su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa/ mtsho dang / mche'u dang / yum dang / 
238b7(phal chen): rdzing bu dang / nu klung dang / r-i'i gabar dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams la bdud cing phyags 'tshal ba la mos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la yang / thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed de/ de
238b8(phal chen): dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / ngan song thams cad kyi ga yang sa ltung ba'i las las rnam par 'jog/ 'jig rten pa'i yang dag par blta ba la rab tu bkod cing / lha dang ri'i dun sum chags pa la yang yong su 'gad do// sems
239a1(phal chen): ba'i zil gyis non pa dang / yo byad yongasu btsal ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod cing brtson pa dang / bu dang rlung ma gtong mi phod pas thogs par gyur pa dang / lta ba'i thibs por 'khyams pa dang / 
239a2(phal chen): sdug bsngal dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyi gtses pa rnams la yang / thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabasu gyur byed de/ 'di ltar ri'i phug dang / bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shing dog dang / rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chu
239a3(phal chen): las dang / chu mig mngon par bsgrub pa dang / tsha ba dang / grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam bstan pa dang / ka la bing ka'i sgra skad bsgrag pa dang / ma bya'i rgyal po skad 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / sman 'bar bas snang
239a4(phal chen): gzugs dang / ri'i lha'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / ri'i phug dang / sul dang / ljongs rlab ste/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi man pa'i rab rib rnam par bskul ba dang / sa'i gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgru
239a5(phal chen): pas skyabasu gyur par byed de/ sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can ring hU~M/ dpa 'di dag yongasu bskyabs pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i ri'i lam/ rgyud g.yang sa la gnas shing / rga shing gdon gyis zin pa de dag gi s+yaH
239a6(phal chen): su yang bdag gyur par shog shig par skyed do// nags tshal thabs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i sems can mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag gis chod de/ shing dang shing phran 'dzings pa'i gseb shin tu nyam nga ba dang / chu dang / rtswa dang / sdong po dpal dra
239a7(phal chen): shing gis lamachod pa dang / shing dang / shing phran sna tshogs kyi nags tshal thibs po'i nang du phyin te/ sdug gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying canangon ma grub pas sems ladrugs par gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / tshe ba dang / mi dga' bsnga
239a8(phal chen): tshogs kyis nyams mi bde gnags tshal stug po nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la/ kho mo ni bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongasu ston par byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can lta ba thabs po sna tshogs la gnas
239b1(phal chen): pa sred pa'i dra bas 'khris par byur 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yong su 'grel par shog shig par bskyed// 'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na 'jom pa rnams kyang thabs
239b2(phal chen): kyi sgo sna tshogs kyis bde ba yongasasu bskyed cing lam bstan te/ de dag 'jigs pa med pa dang / bde ba la rab tu bkod nas sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'jom gangan song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa
239b3(phal chen): rnams/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu bkrol te/ shin tu phun sum tshogs pas bde ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskye do// rigs kyi bu yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par
239b4(phal chen): chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar gyur pa rnams la yang khre mo na skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la mngon par chags pa de las gyen tu spyod pa byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams
239b5(phal chen): bang phung po la mngon par chags pa las rkyen du bskyod de/ gnas med pa'i thams cad nyan pa'i ye shes la dbod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed/ 'gas kyi bu'o moni thong sa spyod pa'i sems cam byim dang gnas kyi bcing bas grags pa
239b6(phal chen): rnams mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pas chod pa'i nang ma khyim gyi don sna tshogs nas su gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/ chags pa med pa'i sems yongasu bskyed nas chos kyi sprin pas
239b7(phal chen): yongasu bzung ste/ tshim par byas nas rten pa med pa'i chos la bkod de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems cad skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi spyod yul las gyen tu bskyod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
239b8(phal chen): ye shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do// rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/ shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs bslang bar gyur pa/ sa'i phyogs mnyam
240a1(phal chen): kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang sdug bsngal las yongasu bkrol ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang / 'phags pa'i'ajig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu
240a2(phal chen): byin pa'i lam la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la/ kun du bzang po'i smon lam chen pos/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad ma dul gyi
240a3(phal chen): bar du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bskyed// de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi
240a4(phal chen): snang bas 'grob rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di banan te/ bstan par / dpa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor babangs la/ tshigasu
240a5(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag smraso// gti mug ma rig mun nag bskul don du/ sems can phan phyir kho ma chos ston te/ dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas/ 'dos par tshul mchog ni pa yin/ kho mos
240a6(phal chen): byabs yangs shin du sbyang ba byas/ bskal ba mtha' yas sngon chad shin tu bsgoms// des ni 'jig rten rgyas bkang snang bar byed// nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis/ kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med de/ 'di
240a7(phal chen): las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung // de ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed// nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis// 'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang // ma byas 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon pa sgrub ci'i
240a8(phal chen): des ni kho mo dga' mgur rangs par byed// rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongasu spyod byed cing // nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang / 'dus byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyis/ 
240b1(phal chen): rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// cham mig ni rgya che yongasu dag/ des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong // ni dbyings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams/ byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs par mthong / 
240b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas su ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing // 'od bzang rnam pa sna tshelu 'gyed de/ bsdu kun nas 'od gzer mang 'gyed pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mthong // zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi sems
240b3(phal chen): can rnams// shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste// byis pa de dag 'gro rlung rgya mtshon// 'khor zhing rang rang las kyang myong bar byed// kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste/ der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongasu 'du// 'gro ga
240b4(phal chen): kun gyi sgra skang rgya mtsho dag/ kun kyang thos nas dran pas yongasu 'dzin/ dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis// dpe bla med pa'i gsung ni rab brgyan te// des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu skor// de dag
240b5(phal chen): kho mos thos shing dran pas 'dzin// kho mo'i sna'i mthu yangs rnam dag ste// chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med// rnam thar/ gnas rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i// tshul ni rgyal sras khyod kyis
240b6(phal chen): shes par gyis// kho ma'i smon gyi cher btu yangs// srab cing mdog dmor rin can 'od du dag/ sems can bsam bci bzhin des shes byed// rgyal sras khyod kyis rdul 'digs par gyis// kho ma chos sus shinang rnam
240b7(phal chen): dag ste// dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas// gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhi dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang du mthong // kho mo'i sems ni chags med zag pa med// sgra dbyangs sprin gyi ngoraro ji bzhin pa
240b8(phal chen): de'i khong su mi mchog kun chud kyang // de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med// zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab// de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho lo mos shes// de dag dbang po bsam par ba shes kyang // de la kho mo rnam
241a1(phal chen): / par rtog pa med// shing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab/ de dag sems kyi rgyamatsho kho mos shes// de dag dbang po bsam par ba shes kyang // de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med/ kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul
241a2(phal chen): rab yangs shin tu grub// des ni bsam yas zhing yang rab tu spyod// lus kyi 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te// des ni sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul// kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yongs yongasu dag/ kun tu rgyan byed
241a3(phal chen): zad pa med pa'i mdzod// des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba'ang yin// kho me'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag/ des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes// 'gro ba kun gyi the tsom yongasu
241a4(phal chen): gcod// rgyal sras khyod kyis rdul 'di shes par gyis// dus gsum kun la kho mo zhugs gyur pas// sangs rgyas rna mtsha kun kyang mthong zhi 'a shes// de dag smon lam la yang rab tu zhugs// tshul 'di dpag yas rab
241a5(phal chen): rdzogs pa yin// rdul mang kun la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong // jidagadus gsum 'jug pa'ang de bzhin te// de dag kun gyi sangs/ rgyas rgya mtsho mthong // 'di ni kun tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis// rnam pas
241a6(phal chen): snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing // rdul sbubs kun gyi byang chub shing drung na// zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung du sgrog pa ltos// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan
241a7(phal chen): mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras// lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid tsag lags/ de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus/ sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar
241a8(phal chen): ba de ni khyod kyis brnyas nas ji srid cig lags de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phrag
241b1(phal chen): snyed kyi bskal ba'i yang pha rol gcig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin chen dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i dri
241b2(phal chen): bzhi pa 'bring po'i rin chen zla bsgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de ni/ rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba yod/ rgyal po'i gnas der/ rgyal po chos rab mu stegs shes bya ba chos dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bskur ba/ gling bani
241b3(phal chen): la dbang ba rin po che bdun dang ldan 'byung ste/ des sa chen po de yang ding rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos kyis rgyal bar byas nas/ bde bar gnas par byaso// rgyal po chos rab tu stegs de'i btsun mo// chos kyi blo gros zla ba
241b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba byung ste/ de srid la 'dod pas myos shing dga' bar rtse rtse bas du nga nas nam gyi gung la btsun me'i 'khor gyi gan su byin te nya'o// de nas nga rgyal po'i gnas pad+mor 'od dor shar phyogs kyi nags chal chen po zhi pa'i dbal
241b5(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin po che'i sman bams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i rdzun can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul bas byung ba byang chub kyi shing chen po'idrung du bzhi'i gshegs pa ches bams pad rab smom
241b6(phal chen): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dpal 'byung ba thams cad/ 'od chen po kha dog du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar gyur to// rgyal po'i
241b7(phal chen): gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ mtshan me'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug nyid rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song nas// rgyan dkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas te/ 'di skad ces smraso// 'di ltar
241b8(phal chen): rgyal po'i btsun mo shes par gyis shig/ nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa/ chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par sangs rgyas// 
242a1(phal chen): denas nyam tha tsun mo deng mdun du/ sangs rgyas sa yon tan bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu b.rang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam
242a2(phal chen): cher bshod// rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyu / bsam pabad pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhu ga mi nis des de bzhin gshegs pa
242a3(phal chen): de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / can pos kyi 'dun du bcas pa la mchod padang rib gro cher bya'o// rigs kyi phreng la ji snyam du sems de'i me ngas kyi rnal ze dus ma tshas kyi rdzo zhes bya de/ 
242a4(phal chen): zhig ma lam dusems na ni bya' ma bces/ mam da'i ci drus na/ rgyal po'i mun mchos kyi rnoms zla zhes byab gyur to// nyigs kyi su mnamos pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / de bani gshebs pa la brjed
242a5(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'in bangs/ brgal ba'i rdul shin thasted rgyan nadu/ nam yang ngam gro log par byung bar ma skyes te/ sems can dmyal bar ma yin// rgyam song gi skye bsus yin no/ 
242a6(phal chen): dgasum yin// nam yang rigs dmara' bar ma skye'o// nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to// nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/ de ltar kho mos rtog par lnga'i nang du lha'i bdag nyid che bcing thob/ mi'i nang du min
242a7(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo// dus ngan par yang ma skyes// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu dge ba'i
242a8(phal chen): babaskyed/ bskal pa'i rab kyi rdub shin tu tha bsnyed cig tu lam bde zhing mnyam pa nas nyog med par byin kyang / de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yong su thub par mthur te/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal bde
242b1(phal chen): ngag ni 'das/ bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol gyi ni/ bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i me/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar/ bskal pa mya ngan med cing rdul dang bral/ 
242b2(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rig kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni/ kun nas snyoms mongs la rnam par dag par gyur te/ de sangs rgyas lnga brgya byong // sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog
242b3(phal chen): mal de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med par skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan snyan
242b4(phal chen): yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe 'o mo yang tshong dpon snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing b.rang la blta na sdug pa kha dog shin tu mdzes
242b5(phal chen): shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas/ rgyal
242b6(phal chen): mtshan sna tshog su mtshan mo'i lha mo mog rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ pa mnyal bar gyur pa dang / khyim de'ang yongasu bskyed/ 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs bsngan
242b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yonas bsngags pa brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thog pa mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te/ snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de bstan te// de nas kho mo pa ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs
242b8(phal chen): chen po dang / 'grogs te/ maran me'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar phyin to// de nas kho mos de bzhin gshegs de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de
243a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings ye shes kyi snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces
243a2(phal chen): bya ba'ang thob par gyur to// de thob pas kyang kho mo bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed pa de dag kyang rje su dran par gyur to// kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur te/ de ltar kho mas de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos
243a3(phal chen): bstan pa thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par gyur to// de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
243a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing / bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyi
243a5(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par sheso// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can/ ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ de dag gi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa'i brda' yang rab tu
243a6(phal chen): shiso// sems dang bsam pa dang / dbang po dang mos pa yang rab tu sheso// sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongasu smin par gyur pa'ang rab tu sheso// de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
243a7(phal chen): du tshim par 'gyur ba'i lus kyang yong su ston to// kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de yang sems kyi skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og mi'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
243a8(phal chen): khams brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengaso// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'geng so// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis
243b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'geng so// de bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod med pa'i yang brjod
243b2(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag kyang bus kyi rgyas par 'gang so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs
243b3(phal chen): kyi drung na 'dug par sheso// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len to// 'dzin to// yongasu 'dzin to// nye bar 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya
243b4(phal chen): mtsho dang / smon lam rgya mtshol b.rang 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par smra'o// 
243b5(phal chen): sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag tu skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / mos pa'i
243b6(phal chen): bye brag ji sbed pa de snyed kyi bye brag tu/ de dag yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis rlob ste/ de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la yang / chos kyi dbyings 'byam klas pa
243b7(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phelo// rigs bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas/ 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di
243b8(phal chen): shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dpung med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'byam klas pa 'dal ba la 'jug
244a1(phal chen): par dbang sbyar ba/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
244a2(phal chen): rigs thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis/ yong su dag par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi rgyam tsho chen
244a3(phal chen): po yongasu grub pa sems kyi skad cig re re la/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / bdul ba'i ye she dbang sbyar ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/ sems cad thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams
244a4(phal chen): cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyi'i mi'i mig dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bcom dang / nem nur dang / yid banyis kyi rab
244a5(phal chen): rib rnam par sel ba'i tha thos kyi thu ba dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgyamatshathams cad la mngon par chags pa las rkyen du bstong ban sgra dbyas kyi 'khor rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi byings thams cad kyi rdu
244a6(phal chen): gsal rnam par 'bul ba yongasu ston pa la dang bsgyur ba/ dus gsum gyi dbyis kyi kyil 'khor la ye shes dbyer med pa de dag gi skyed bshes pa'am/ yon dan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul la dag pa'am/ rnam
244a7(phal chen): bar bar ngas rnam par rtse long su bstan par nus res n-i/ song rigs kyi bu yul ma gta 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems paskyed bskyed pa/ yang dang ya skul sprul ba'i mtshan
244a8(phal chen): mo'i n+ya mo// kun tu bab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bye dris shig/ dem
244b1(phal chen): tsong dpor gyi bu nor bangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mod dri dang ldan pal/ cig su bcad pa 'idi dgagis mngon par brjod/ khyod du shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong / mtshan gyis rnam brgyan rib tso ba na du/ 'a se
244b2(phal chen): yinams ma ma na du / khyo sa sarnam /  du ma parnams// den sa nas sa sa
244b3(phal chen): zhing rnam par 'jig kyang chags mi mnga'// lam cud 'byam thas thams cad kun du yang // khyod kyi sbyin gzugs brnyan rnam par bye// skar chen bla nar rgyus tshogs bzhin du// spu rtse kun la'ang khyod ni bdag gis mthom
244b4(phal chen): khyod kyi thugs yangs shin tu rnam dag ste// phyogs rnams kun gyi nam kha'i dbyingasu rgyas// der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongasu da 'dra// khyod la ye shes mi rtog dam pa mnga'// zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna
244b5(phal chen): tshogs sprin/ khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'bon pa// rgyal ma sna tshogs char pa mngon 'babs shing / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nabs drung rgyas par 'bengs// 'gro ba kun snyed lus rnams mtha' yang
244b6(phal chen): pa// khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon 'thon cing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can rnam par spyod// sU ru kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams// sna tshogs rgyan ldan
244b7(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad mthong // lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa// ji snyed de dag bsam bzhin kun kyang byung // gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan pos dgar 'gyur ba// de dag thong bya legs pa lenas pas sems can gang gi
244b8(phal chen): khyod kyi sku mthong ba// byang chub 'i ma la mngon du ltas par 'gyur// de ltar thos nas rab tu sems dga' la// mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs ni mdzad pas// bskal ba bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang rung // khyod
245a1(phal chen): / kyi zhal blta'i don tu mos par bgyi// zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed lus byas te// de snyed bskal pa brgyud khyod 'dra ba'i// sku gcig khyod kyi yon tan legs brjod kyang // legs pa'i mthar byin
245a2(phal chen): nam du'ang mi 'gyuraro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba rangs kyis mtshan mo'i sku mo byid dang ldan pa la chags su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas// mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyil spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
245a3(phal chen): mtshan mo dpyid dang ldan pa la// lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas na/ yang dang yang bltas ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten bkur bya bas ma ngoms bzhin du/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa
245a4(phal chen): drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa/ thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i/ byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor
245a5(phal chen): yang su dag pa ni khong du chud par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i snying po/ yang dag par byung ba la ni rjesu dpyod byang chub sems dpa'i ston lam rgya mchis ni yong su 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa'i ba
245a6(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni mongs spyod/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khorin yong su gnon/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni N+Din re byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung brnyan tshono rje su 'brang / bam
245a7(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtshol ni rnam parasas/ 'gro ba thams cad song su bsgru ba la gnol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin ni rgya rmer byed/ mtshan me'i lha mo dpying dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dun
245a8(phal chen): tu'abang po'i spod pa dang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ zhing thams cad phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas mngon par bsgrub cing / mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od gangan ba der song ste/ 
245b1(phal chen): mtshan me'i lha mo kun tu rang pa'i dngal drim med pa'i 'od kyi dang pa gnyis la spo bas phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun nu rab pa dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la/ lan bcwa stong dumar g.yas phyob su bskor babyas
245b2(phal chen): nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal drim med pa'i 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
245b3(phal chen): bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang / ji ltar 'byung ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyid pa mtshal to// smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dran med pa yang dag par rdzom
245b4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyad pa dang / ra 'byung ba dang / yong su 'grub pa 'dri ba legs legaso// rig bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang chub
245b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongasu grub yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ti nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
245b6(phal chen): kyi sku mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnam par blta ba'i mig rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbung med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i
245b7(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med pa la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis tshad kyi 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi baspu'i sgo nas 'od gzer rgya mtsho/ sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa dang / sems can snga
245b8(phal chen): tshogs kyi don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtshos chos kyi dbyings thams
246a1(phal chen): cad rgyas par bkang zhing / sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi brlabs la 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pas dus gsum du
246a2(phal chen): byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra sgrogs pas/ mdo sde thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam
246a3(phal chen): par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jugs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
246a4(phal chen): yongasu grub pa yin// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ bsam gtan ni ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni de'i mthus/ dus gsum du
246a5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong // ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / yong su dag pa la'ang 'jug/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang / ting nge
246a6(phal chen): 'dzin mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / mtshan rgya mtsho la'ang 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba rnam pa
246a7(phal chen): tha dad pa'ang 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe tshad sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sku la'ang
246a8(phal chen): 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par zhen pa yang medo// de ci phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams ca du bzud pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni
246b1(phal chen): bzung ba med pa'o// rang bzhin gyis byung ba med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byon pa med pa'o// mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma skyes pa'o// mi skye
246b2(phal chen): ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma 'gags pa'o// sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur mthong ni rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bden pa ma yin pa'o// 'gro
246b3(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi don du byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni brdzun pa ma yin pa'o// shi 'pho dang skye ba las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med pa'o// chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'dzin
246b4(phal chen): ba med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'jig pa med pa'o// ngag gi lam thams cad la song su 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni
246b5(phal chen): mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi/ mthar thug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid mi mngar ba'o// rigs kyi bu/ kho mo ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs
246b6(phal chen): thathams cad khong du rud par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pabs su gtan zhi ba'i bdebs kun tu rnam par gnon pa'adi/ de ban gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi kyil 'khor snang bas she
246b7(phal chen): rgyache bar bye'o// shin tu yangs par byed// khong du chud par byed// rtogs par byed// mnyam par byed// mngan par bsdu'o// bani sgoms par bye// rab tu 'a gro/ rnam par 'phel bar byed
246b8(phal chen): ngem par sems// nye bar rdzom/ dran par byod// spyod sul du byed// brtan par byed// sdang bar byu// ra tu badzad// rnam par chung // rnam par byed// chos ra//  nges par bye/ 
247a1(phal chen): rtogs pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa'i snying rje chen po de la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yang dag par spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan da
247a2(phal chen): po sgom mo// yid kyi las thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / mthus sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bde ba la sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ bsam
247a3(phal chen): gtan gnyis pa bsgom mo// 'khor bar log par zhugs pa la btang snyoms su byas te/ sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gsum pa bsgom mo// sems
247a4(phal chen): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi pa sgom mo// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor shin du yangs par bya ba dang / ting nge 'an
247a5(phal chen): rgya mno thams cad ma ngon par bsgrub pa la ma kham par bya ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par b.rab rgya mchomams cad kyi /  la 'jug bapar bya ba dang / byang chub sem pa pa'i rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes pas/ 
247a6(phal chen): cad mngon par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongasu sbyong zhing / byang
247a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di sgom mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo// rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing thabs sna tshogs kyi sems can yongs su smin
247a8(phal chen): par byed de/ 'di ltar nub mo zhi bar gyur pa'i tshe/ dga' ba la mos par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi mi sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed do// mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / yongasu skyo ba'i 'du shes dang / gegasu 'gyur ba'i
247b1(phal chen): 'du shes dang / 'ching ba'i 'du shes dang / srin mo'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / rje med pa'i 'du shes dang / gzhan la rag las ba
247b2(phal chen): 'du shes dang / rga shi'i 'du shes dang / 'dod pa'i yul dang / longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ sems can de dag kyang sems de la yongasu sgom pas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad
247b3(phal chen): la mngon par dga' ba med pas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo // de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe'i chos dang 'thun pa'i dad pa yongasu skyed do// sgra chen po 'jigs pa mi
247b4(phal chen): snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do// mtshan mo zhi bar gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yang yang dag par ston/ to// spang ba dang 'thun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar ston to// khyim gyi sgo'ang rnam par
247b5(phal chen): 'byed do// lam yang yongasu ston to// snang bas kyang mngon bar byed do// mun pas chod pa'ang rnam par sel to// 'jigs pa'ang med par byed do// rab tu byung ba la yang yang dag par bsngags
247b6(phal chen): par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'ang brjod do// chos kyi legs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi legs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi legs pa'ang brjod do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la'ang bsngags pa byed
247b7(phal chen): ngo// rigs kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing / sems can rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi yongs su rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed do// tshul ma yin
247b8(phal chen): pa'i 'dod pas non pa rnams dang log par yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yongasasu rtog pa de dag dang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed do// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba dang / sdig to'i yongasu
248a1(phal chen): rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar bsdub po// dge ba'i yongasu rtog pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su
248a2(phal chen): 'byung ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang / byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su skyed pa
248a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i yongasu rtogs bskyed pa dang skyes nas kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyen nye bar bsgrub pa byed pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'thun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar bsgrub pa byed de/ rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
248a4(phal chen): thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di shes pa zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang pos spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
248a5(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang bar
248a6(phal chen): tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gnas thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongasu rdzogs pa'i sems dang
248a7(phal chen): ldan pa/ zhidi rgya mtshothams cad du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtshethams cad mthong bar byab la nugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par
248a8(phal chen): bzung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba/ 'khor ba'i 'de ba la dga' zhing sred bzang cing mapar byin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis thams cad sa khyen pa nyid du drang bsred
248b1(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skran/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nyid na nga dang yang rgyang mi ring ste/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol gcig na/ mtshan mor
248b2(phal chen): lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/ 'gro bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la brtson par bya ba dris shig/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu
248b3(phal chen): zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas/ kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshig su
248b4(phal chen): bcad de smras pa/ dus rnams kun tu byung ba'i bde gshegs rnams mngon du bya bar mos pa'i sems ldan pa// de dag mig yangs rnam bar dag par 'gyur// des ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'ong // rgyal
248b5(phal chen): ba'i sku gsal dri mes bsngos// mtshan gyis yongs su brgyan pas/ shin tu mdzes// rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chos dbyings rnams// skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la'ang bltos// byang chub
248b6(phal chen): shing drung sangs rgyas gdan rabal// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas// chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas pa khyab mdzad cing // 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin 'khor lo skor// rgyal bas chos nyid lus med
248b7(phal chen): bzhog/ gzhis med rang bzhin med pathungs ru sa// 'dubs rdzu nga po can gyis brgyan pa'is/ 'thob ma rus pa 'i don pa mdzu// sangs rgyas du rtirje bas ma mi khyab/ chos cos du
248b8(phal chen): yong su rgyal pa shing / 'o nyam par dang sa/ rgyal ba mas cad du ston pa nga/ shigasas sun rdul ba sa mtsha la la 'i mang pa'i ma sargyas su/ 'ad
249a1(phal chen): dang gzhan snang bas// chos ngas rgyas par mang cishi nges 'das// rgyal ba'i bcu skyonas 'ong khyer smon// rnamachos ma las mibang mngon 'byung ba/ deng 'thobs lus
249a2(phal chen): byed cing / srob chags rnams kyi son mongs gdung ba sel// sangs rgyas sprul ba rgyaman mi 'ad ba// rgyal ba'i spyi'i lakhor nas yongs brten cing // chos dngas yangs brgyas par kun pa sa// grog chags rnams
249a3(phal chen): kyi sdug bsngal ngan song sel// sangs rgyas gsung san rab tu sgrob mdzad pa/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho sgo 'ong can// chos char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa mdzad// srog chags byang chub bsam pa yongs su skyed/ 
249a4(phal chen): bskal ba rgya mtshor spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// 'dis ni sngan chad yongs gzung mdzad pa// de dag kun gyis rgyal ba rnam snang mdzad/ zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid mthong // de bzhin bshes
249a5(phal chen): pa 'jig rten kun tu byung // sems can re re kun la'ang mngon par/ bzhugs// mos pa'i tshul bzhin spyod yul gzhan dang gzhan// de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras dam pa
249a6(phal chen): thams cad ma lus par// bde bar gshegs pa'i spu gcig rtse las 'byung // rnam thar de la gang rnams bsam yas pa// de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi nus// kho mo'i mdab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di// 'jig rten
249a7(phal chen): mgon la mngon 'gyur rab tu dga'// ming du snang ba 'od 'bro mig ces bya// de la byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra dris// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal// dri ma med pa'i
249a8(phal chen): 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la// lan rgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas// yang dngas bltas te mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu
249b1(phal chen): zab 'i dpal drim med pa'i nga kyi nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon sde bu nor b.rangs dge ba'i bshes brten gyi gangams ngaga'i byin gyi bzlas pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyitshig sa nan tan du bya ba'i sems yang
249b2(phal chen): dab par skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sman pa la nad pa lta ba'i 'du shes kyis yongasu spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba yid la byed pa ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge
249b3(phal chen): bshes zin na ba ba la sgrib pa'i rithams cad rnam par gtor ba'i thugs rnye par sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes banyen mthong ba la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa'i snying rje chen
249b4(phal chen): po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i ba shes gnyen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa de// mtshan mo'i rtsa
249b5(phal chen): mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang na ba der song ngo // de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu no bzangs
249b6(phal chen): de bas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las byung bas yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba/ tshogs chen po las byung bar byin gyis brlabs so// 
249b7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba rnam par gnon pa chen por byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus kyi las 'jug par dka' bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshe
249b8(phal chen): gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba bsdad cing shin tu legs par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba phyogs mtha' dang dpung med pa la 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi
250a1(phal chen): nga tshub byu ga tsu gyi / gle na nga chub mam 'das pam na rdzunas pa'i ma pa tugyis gyu
250a2(phal chen): brlas so// den 'de ci shes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba lam gyi dz+nyAn mtha' dang bung med pa'i tshigs kyis yong su gnon par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba sgo thun nas rnam
250a3(phal chen): pabar gnon pas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba g.yo ba med par 'ong bas rnam par gnon par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ 
250a4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi brtson 'grus la rab tu dbartson pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / smon lam chen po rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam par gnon pas
250a5(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / sems can gcu ga gi don du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par sdug bsngal nyams su blangs pa'i zhe non pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
250a6(phal chen): drung du 'gro ba dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgra sgrog cing / yun ring por gnas pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i go bgos pas/ dge ba'i bshes
250a7(phal chen): gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / phyogs rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad du shugs kyis 'gro bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / ba spu'i sbubs gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byang chub
250a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i
250b1(phal chen): ma ga 'azhe sa pal gnas par bya bas/ dge ba'i bshes garten gyi drung ngu 'tho ba dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul da'i rgyan dang / lar yongs gnon
250b2(phal chen): ngar neno na ngas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / ches kyi dbyings kyi tshul kyi rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam yong su gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi drung du 'gro ba nga/ chos kyi rtsi
250b3(phal chen): kyi nus bams cad la darigs pa las ma ga'os par ches kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas par 'gangs pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo btudaga' ba'i ming/ 'gro ba rnam par snga
250b4(phal chen): bgangan bder byin pa dang / des mnan tshe'i lha mor btu mig/ 'gro ba rnam par snang ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ seng po'i khri me chos 'i sring bcar pa'i
250b5(phal chen): cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ kun tu bzang po'idaga' ba yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan la mnyam par bzhag pa mthong ngo // de'i baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ sbyin
250b6(phal chen): bal sogs pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa mngon par ston pa'i sprin sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ sems can thams kyi yid du 'ong ba/ sems can thams cad kyis bstan nyams su bad ba/ sems can thams cad kyis
250b7(phal chen): blta na sdug pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang mthong ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing rtsong ba med par bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad la phangs par rtsa ba med par bya ba dang / sems can thams
250b8(phal chen): cad la sbyar ba mtshungs pas yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la brnyas pa med par yongasu gtang ba dang / nang dang phyi'i dngos po thams
251a1(phal chen): cad yong su gtang ba dang / dka' ba chen po yong su gtang bar bstan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi bsam pa ji bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sems
251a2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bsam pa lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang 'thun pa'i sgras/ sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu ston pa'i sprin dang / dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtang bar dka' ba yongasu gtong ba'i sprul pa
251a3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmigs par gyur pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i
251a4(phal chen): khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos pas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam nga ba'i skye ba sna tshogs su sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin mngon par mthong
251a5(phal chen): te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ mngon sum du/ brtul zhugs thams cad kyi yi dam las mi g.yo bar yongasu
