251a6(phal chen): ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams dang / mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du gnas pa med pa dang / yul thams cad la bltos pa
251a7(phal chen): med pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad du gnas pa las bIr phyogs pa dang / lha dang mo'i dzin sum tshogs pa chung ba'i sgor gzhol ba yong su ston pa dang / mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sdug pa'i
251a8(phal chen): 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rnam pa zlog pa dang / mi rtag par dang g.yo ba dang 'jig pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongasu ston pa dang / 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal zhing / bdag med pa yongasasu
251b1(phal chen): ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa dang mi 'bral bar mos par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par
251b2(phal chen): bskul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongasu ston
251b3(phal chen): par byed cing / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshog su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ yan lag dang nyid
251b4(phal chen): lag thams cad kyang nyam su bzod pa sems can thams cad la yongasu ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par tho btsams kyang nyam su bzod par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis
251b5(phal chen): tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshig gis skyo ba dang / brgyad pa dang spang ba dang / bskyung / ba dang les sa sdigs pa nyi su bzod par byed pa yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi skul ba yong su ston pa dang / 
251b6(phal chen): rim gror byas pa dang / rim gror ma byas pa thams cad kyis mtho ba dang / dma' bar ma 'gyur ba yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa yongasu ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang
251b7(phal chen): bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas/ ye shes mi zad pa yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs spang ba'i phyir/ bzod pa'i spyod pa yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad
251b8(phal chen): kyi lus dbyings mi sdug cing kha dog mi mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongasu ston cing / sems can yongasu
252a1(phal chen): smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kyi lus kha dog dang / dbyings dang / chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'don te/ 
252a2(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ci bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la/ brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba yang dag par ston pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma
252a3(phal chen): thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlogs pa rtso 'grus dang / sems can thams can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rag tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang / mi khom pa
252a4(phal chen): dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin ga she
252a5(phal chen): pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongasu mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang / yongasasu bzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang / 
252a6(phal chen): sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu dag
252a7(phal chen): par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongasu ston cing / sems can yong su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ lus sna tshogs
252a8(phal chen): kha dog dang / dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'bon te/ thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongasu skyed pa dang / yin mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams
252b1(phal chen): cad rnam par smod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrogs pa dang dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang / 
252b2(phal chen): 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongasu ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongasu ston pa dang / chos
252b3(phal chen): la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
252b4(phal chen): pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la/ nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongasu brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongasu ston pa dang / 
252b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul kha dang / khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba yongasu ston pa byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongasu bskyed pa dang / spro phel
252b6(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongasasu bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongasu bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po
252b7(phal chen): gas par bya ba dang / lus kyi bde ba yongasu skyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams
252b8(phal chen): cang dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te/ zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skyo ba med pa yongs
253a1(phal chen): ston pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa yongasu ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
253a2(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongasu gzungs pas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongasu ston pa dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang / 
253a3(phal chen): chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongasu ston pa dang
253a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang / the tsom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas/ shes rab kyi yul yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'jom pa'i shes rab rdo rje
253a5(phal chen): yongasu ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang / ldan bas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sem ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongasu ston pa byed
253a6(phal chen): cing / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongasu skye bar bya bas sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams
253a7(phal chen): cad dang / mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongasu sbyang ba bstan pas/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod/ 
253a8(phal chen): nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongasu paston pa dang / khams gsum pa
253b1(phal chen): thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang / lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas/ thams cad mkhyenar pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongasu
253b2(phal chen): brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongasu bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim 'gror byas pa dang / rim gror ma byas pa la/ byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongasu ston pa dang / 
253b3(phal chen): 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo la gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gag sa rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongasu ston pa dang / snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par/ 
253b4(phal chen): 'chang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongasu ston pa byed cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongasu smin pa byed pa mthong ngo // baspu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
253b5(phal chen): cang brdul gan tu thabaskyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'ayon te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon su ma du banas shing byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang ba stong pa dang ldan lam mongs
253b6(phal chen): brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par yongasu brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re lo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yong su dag par bya ba yongasu
253b7(phal chen): brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongasasu brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la/ chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongasu
253b8(phal chen): ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongasu ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug
254a1(phal chen): par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya bar yong su brjod pa rgyun mi 'chang pa yang dag par ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
254a2(phal chen): stobs la 'jugs pa rgyun mi 'chang ba yang dag par brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chang pa yongasu ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu bstan
254a3(phal chen): ba rgyun ma 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongasu bstan pas sems can thaMd thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re
254a4(phal chen): nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te/ sems can thams cad la mngon par gnasad shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongs
254a5(phal chen): ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs mi zad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chung mi za ba'i chos can yong su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba thams cad yongasu bsdun
254a6(phal chen): ba'i stobs phyir mi ldog cing phyi ma ldog la/ thug pa med pa dang / rgyun med pa dang / bla na med pa yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis mi
254a7(phal chen): gos pa yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar
254a8(phal chen): nyon mongs pa med pa yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs
254b1(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba med pa yong su ston pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams yongasu bskyod cing bskul bas/ sems can thams cad rab
254b2(phal chen): tu dga' bar byed pa yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yongasu ston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po/ 
254b3(phal chen): 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi baspu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho kha dog mtha' yas pa/ 'gro ba/ 
254b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin/ phyogs bcu mtha' las dpa'i sems can gyi khams su rgyas par 'gengs pa 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems
254b5(phal chen): / dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes rnam par gnon pa yong su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsha thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes/ yong su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la
254b6(phal chen): 'jug pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongasu shes pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang / 
254b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus las mi 'dara' ba'i ye shes yong su ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang / sems kyi snang / 
254b8(phal chen): cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang / 
255a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang / dbyibs dang / rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te spyan sngar byon
255a2(phal chen): nas mchod cing rim 'gro byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa byed cing de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' bskyed pa dang / 
255a3(phal chen): sems dang bar byed pa dang / rab tu dga' ba skyed pa dang / mos pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par rlog pa dang / sems rnam par sbyong ba dang / sems skyon med pa skye bar byed pa dang / dang
255a4(phal chen): po gsal bar byed pa dang / mos pa'i stobs yongasu skyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed pa mthong ngo //  pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongasasu bstan pas 'jig rten du ji ltar sems
255a5(phal chen): can yongasu smin par gyur pa mthong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i thog ma
255a6(phal chen): sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i thabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing mchod pa dang rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 
255a7(phal chen): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtang bar dka' ba yongasu btang ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su sbyangs pa'i thabs dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'khor mang po dang longs spyod kyi dbang / 
255a8(phal chen): chen po yongasu btang ste mngon par byung ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyod pa brtul zhugs dang dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa ji snyed cig yong pa dang / byang chub sem
255b1(phal chen): dpa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya ji snyed cig yod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyes byas dang / ngan du smra ba dang / nyes par
255b2(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad bag la zhi bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang / lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyam su bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid la bzod pa dang / chos thams cad la
255b3(phal chen): yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
255b4(phal chen): cang yongasu sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang / bsam gtan gyi
255b5(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas rnam par 'phrul
255b6(phal chen): baji snyed cig yod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug par ji snyed cig yod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa cig
255b7(phal chen): yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par spyang ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab chen po'i sprin yongasu 'du ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi gter chen
255b8(phal chen): po'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang / sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thabs
256a1(phal chen): chen po la mkhas pa yongasasu dag par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon la mtshan
256a2(phal chen): po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu grub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / 
256a3(phal chen): stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen tu gyur pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs
256a4(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dadang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / 
256a5(phal chen): ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa/ dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rje su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig
256a6(phal chen): yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rnam par dmigs
256a7(phal chen): bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa'i rje su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yong pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyas par 'gengs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
256a8(phal chen): pa'i rgya chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lhun ji snyeng cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yong su grub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu
256b1(phal chen): byin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rab tu bye ba la 'jug pa 'byung bar yongasu bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol par bya ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / chos yong su bsdu ba dang / 
256b2(phal chen): chos kyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / las kyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / zhing gi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / bskal pa'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / dus kyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung
256b3(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongasu 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / byang
256b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / 
256b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi ye she ci su 'brang ba dang / byang chub/ sems dpa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams par 'byed ba'i ye shes kyi rje su 'drad
256b6(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gangs chen mtsho'i ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyud kyi ye shes kyi rje su 'jang
256b7(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter gyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lugs kyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mi
256b8(phal chen): 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dpung med pa'i dmigs pa can de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas mngon par 'thon te/ 
257a1(phal chen): sems can gyi lus kyi sprin kha ngor sna tshogs can du mngon par mched cing sems can yongasu smi byed pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ 'og min dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / mi dros par / 
257a2(phal chen): mi che ba'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang / sprin dang bral ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi
257a3(phal chen): sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // dge rgyas dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // 
257a4(phal chen): kun snang dang ba dang / tshad med snang ba dang / snang ba chung ngu'i lha lta bu'i las kyi sprin tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // tshangs chen dang / tshangs lha nye pan dang / tshangs pa kun ris
257a5(phal chen): kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po// lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin tu mngon
257a6(phal chen): bar 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' lha mo'i tshigs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yong su smin par byed pa mthong
257a7(phal chen): rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang
257a8(phal chen): bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sngon tu mngon par 'bon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin tu mngon par 'bon cing / 
257b1(phal chen): sems can yong du smin par byed pa mthong ngo // dri ba'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang / dri ba'i bung / dri ba'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongasu sbyin par byed pa mthong ba/ 
257b2(phal chen): thul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / grul bum gyi bu dang / grul bum gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // grur rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / klu'i bu dang / 
257b3(phal chen): klu'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprir du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po chen po ngal bso po dang / banod sbyin gyi bu dang / gnod sbyar gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par
257b4(phal chen): 'dzin cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // mi 'am cun rgyal po sdong po dang / mi 'am tso'i bu dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo da lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smir bar byed
257b5(phal chen): ba mthong ngo // lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po dang / lho 'phye chen po'i bu dang / lto 'bye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // 
257b6(phal chen): namakha' lding gi dbang po shugs drag stobs chen dang / na mkha' lding gi bu dang / na mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgrag can/ 
257b7(phal chen): dang / lha ma yin gyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i bdung / gshen rje'i bu mo lta du'i
257b8(phal chen): lus sprin du mngon par 'bon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // mi'i dbang po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can 'os
258a1(phal chen): smin par byed pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rlud thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // nyan thos dang / 
258a2(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin tu mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rlung dang / chu dang / me'i phung po'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi spri ratu mngon par 'thon cing sems can
258a3(phal chen): yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog dang / sman dang / shing dang / sa'i lnga lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // 
258a4(phal chen): bza' shing gi rab dang / grong khyer dang / snying po byang chub dang / nyin par dang / mtshan mo dang / na mkha' dang / phyogs dang / rkang gis8 'gro dang / lus kyi ri su gtogs pa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin
258a5(phal chen): du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ba nas/ de bzhin du lag na rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul
258a6(phal chen): 'byam klas pa thams cad du/ sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i sems thog ma
258a7(phal chen): bskyed pa'i tshogs la logs pa/ sngon gyi mi rabs la song su bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brtu dang rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji sbed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bsgreng ba'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu
258a8(phal chen): rgyud cing ma nga chags pa dang / ging po nga/ skye ba leng su 'aru ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyad cing mang nga chags pa dang / lus yong su bzung ba gciganas gcig tu brgyud cing ma nga chags pa dang / ming gi
258b1(phal chen): lo gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing mda' chags pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
258b2(phal chen): cing mdab chags pa dang / chos kyi tshigs dang yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / 
258b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pas dang sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud tsang mda' chags pa dang / zhing mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par bkang ba gcig nas
258b4(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud cing ma dang chags pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu dbargyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo mda' chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing
258b5(phal chen): mdab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdang chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can pha rol gyi sha 'bo
258b6(phal chen): skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / lha'i rna ba yong su dag pa rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing mdab chags dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi
258b7(phal chen): sems la rnam par lta zhing dbyangs la 'jugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mang 'a chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / thog ma lnga'i
258b8(phal chen): na rnam par dmigs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / thog ma bdag dang sems can
259a1(phal chen): pha rol gyi gnas rjesu dran pa shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mda' chags pa dang / thog ma dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas te/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen
259a2(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par gnon pas phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
259a3(phal chen): thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
259a4(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdang chags dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig/ nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems
259a5(phal chen): dpa'i yongasu banon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chung sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas gcigatu brgyud cing mdab chags dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la
259a6(phal chen): 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdang chags pa nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa ji/ 
259a7(phal chen): snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon te/ sems can rnams la chos 'chad pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yongasu ston pa dang / 
259a8(phal chen): rjesu brjod pa dang / rab tu 'byed pa dang / shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang / 'grang ba dang / nges par ston pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/ la la la ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor
259b1(phal chen): shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo // la la la ni nu'i phung po rab tu rlob pa'i sgra sad kyis/ la la la ni me'i lce shin tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra skad kyis/ la la la
259b2(phal chen): ni sa yongasu g.yos pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni ri chen po phan tshul thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni lha'i grong khrir g.yos pa'i nga ro sbran pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni lha'i gzhal med khang thug cing 'khrol
259b3(phal chen): ba'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo // la la la ni lha'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni klu'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni dri za'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ 
259b4(phal chen): la la la ni lA ma yin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni na mkha' lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i ska kyis/ la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la
259b5(phal chen): la ni mi'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha mo'i klu dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni lha rdzas kyi rol mo legs par blangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ la la la
259b6(phal chen): ni nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skad sna tshogs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul/ sems can
259b7(phal chen): rnams la rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul sku'i sprin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
259b8(phal chen): gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul/ thog ma sems bskyang ba dang bcas/ yongasu byung ste grub ci
260a1(phal chen): yang dag par 'dus pa dang bcas/ rnam par thar pa'i rnam par rtse ba dang bcas pa/ sems can thams cad la rnam par dmigs par byed pa mthong ngo // de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sbyini re res kyang / 
260a2(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjo drus pa rnam par sbyong ba mthong ngo // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dag kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngam
260a3(phal chen): thams cad las rnam par 'grel pa mthong ngo // sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dpung med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbud med pa dag kyang
260a4(phal chen): 'khor ba rgya mtsho las gyen du spyod pa mthong ngo // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbung med pa dag kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // sems kyi skad
260a5(phal chen): cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa dag kyang / stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzangs kyis mthong ngo // thos rnam par dpyad do zhugs so khong
260a6(phal chen): du chud do// nges par rtogs so// rjesu she'o// rjesu 'brang so// rje su zhugs so// mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/ 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub se
260a7(phal chen): nganga'i rnam par thar pa/ kun tu bzang po'i dbe' ba shin tu yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan bsam gyi si ma khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba'i byin dang sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa dang / de bzhin
260a8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi byin du brlabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshong
260b1(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor ba rangs byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs drag po gangs chen mtsho snang ba chen po rab tu thob pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhiran gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa des
260b2(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/ 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/ 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su
260b3(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab// de la khyod kyis bskal pa tshad med bslabs// bsam pa ci bzhin gzugs rnams kyis// 'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten rim
260b4(phal chen): pas bstan// bdag med mgon med log pa yi// 'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas// rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du/ ma yis// lus dang dbang phyug ston mdzad 'gro ba 'dul// shin tu
260b5(phal chen): rims thal rangab tu zhi// chos sku gnyis med rnam par dag/ pa mnga'// 'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa// sprul pa'i/ sprin sgra 'drug gis rnam par 'dul// phung po khams dang skye mched / 
260b6(phal chen): khyod ni nam yang mi gnas maM rten te// yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang // dbang phyug yongasu bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul// phyi dang nang las rnam par grol// gnyis las byung ba'i mtsho las 'phabs
260b7(phal chen): gyur kyang / 'khor ba'i rgyamatshamatha' yas pa'i// gzugs parnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud tu rab tu ston// khyod la g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// nam yang rlom sems g.yo ba'i spros mi mnga'/ 'jig rten spos mos kyis
260b8(phal chen): ba rnams// chos kyi rang bzhin bstan cing 'dul ba mdzad/ ting 'dzin rgyam mobun spya bas// bskal pa mang por rtse gcig thub bzhugs kyang / phyobs bcu'i bde gshegs mcho ngon du// rdza rnams
261a1(phal chen): las sprul pa'i spri kyang 'byed// sangs rgyas stobs la 'jug pa'i tshul/ skad ci pa re mtha' yas thugs su chud// sems can bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rnams// mam sbyin patshan pa par bgyilas
261a2(phal chen): bstar// khyed kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag/ las kyi rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing // chos kyi sgrib pa med pa'i lam bstan te// sems can kur kyang rnam par sbyong ba mdzad// khyod sku mtshan zis rnam dag
261a3(phal chen): kyang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa yis// sems can bsam pa'i dbang nul du// khyod ni lha mi sku gzugs ston// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' mig 'gro bar rnam
261a4(phal chen): par snang ba la// tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de// 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo khyod tha ngan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lag/ 
261a5(phal chen): lha mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas ni// ji srid cog lags// de nas mtshan mos
261a6(phal chen): lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor 'azangs la tshig su bcad de spras pa// dran pa bskal pa mnga'angs pa// zhing gi rdul snyed de'i snga rol na// zhing ni rin chen mdog pa byung // de
261a7(phal chen): bskal bzhi pa'i dbyangs shes bya// gling ba ni bye ba khrag khrig ste// brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis yongasu gang // tshad med rin chen ri bo 'dra// gling bzhi'i bar ma bzang po rnam par bkram// rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya// 
261a8(phal chen): stong phrag bcu rnams yongasu tshad ba ste// rgyal po'i 'o brang mdangs dga' ba// dbus na gnas pa'i spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od// der ni phyogs kyi dbang po sa'i bdag/ 'khor los bsgyur ba mngon par gzugs bzang / 
261b1(phal chen): zung / mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan// de'i lus kyang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// pad+mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung // gser gyi mdog pabang 'od 'byung lus dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan thams cad du/ 
261b2(phal chen): mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de'i gangs so// de'i bu ni stong nang ste// kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan// blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang / 'dzangs shing yid gzhungs bye ba shin tu mang // btsun mo bye ba
261b3(phal chen): brag bcu tshang // lha mo ji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul la mkhas// de dag pa na sems bde sems kyis// rgyal po de la nye ba'i yid du gnas// rgyal po de nis chen de// ri dang khor yug kun gyi mtha' glas pa'i// gling
261b4(phal chen): bani phun sum tshogs pa dag/ kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyis gnas par byed// kho mo 'khor los bsgyur ba yi// btsun mo tshangs dpa'i sgra skad rin chen lus// gser gyi mdog 'anang dri med 'od
261b5(phal chen): dpag tshad stong du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs// nyi ma nub par gyur nas kyang // rgyal po sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur/ nas// rol mo'i dbyangs kyang 'ir gyur te// kho mo malan bde bar
261b6(phal chen): zhal na// nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la// sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur// de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste bstan pa mdzad// rgyal ba'i 'od gzer rgya mtsho des// zhing gi rdul
261b7(phal chen): sbed 'jig rten khyab par gyur// rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus rgyas par bgang // sa rnams ri dang bcas par g.yos// rgyal 'byung zhes sgra yangs yongasu brjod// lgang
261b8(phal chen): lha min mi dang thu/ kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'// sangs rgyas baspu'i klo kun nas// sprul pa'i rgyamatsho mang po mngon par byung // des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas/ 'jig rten bsam pa bzhin du rjes kyang bstan/ 
262a1(phal chen): rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag kyang // rgyal bas thams cad bdag gi rmilam bstan// thab ma'i 'drug smra thos gyur nas// khong du drung pas 'o mo dga' yid gur// mtshan mo'i lha mo stong ste kyang // kho mo'i steng gi/ 
262a2(phal chen): bar snang mkha' gnas shing // rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas nas// kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod// lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs// khyod kyi rgyal po'i khams su rgyal ba skyes// bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya dag tu// de 'dra'i phun sum
262a3(phal chen): tshogs pa rnam dag dkon// kho mo dgar gyur sad par gyur// 'od gsal dri med rnam dag mthong // 'od babang de ni g.yas blta bltan// byang chub shing rgyal drung gi rgyal ba mthong // mtshan nyid sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan// baspu kun/ 
262a4(phal chen): nas 'od gzer rgya mtsho bkye// ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags/ rgyal ba g.yas g.yosu kun tu'ang de bzhin no// mthong nas kho ma rab dga' ste// de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongasu bskyed// sangs
262a5(phal chen): rgyas rnam 'phrul yang mthong nas// khoms smon lam shin tu rgya chen/ btab/ kho mos rgyal tho bzhes su gsol// de'i 'khor dang / bud med tshigs kyang bslang // sangs rgyas 'od yang mthong gyur nas/ 
262a6(phal chen): kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur// rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu// gzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig gis// yongasu bskor te dpung bcas pa// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dong // lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang // kho mos rgyal ba de/ 
262a7(phal chen): la mchod bkur byas// rin chen bdun yang yon du phul// rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang gsol// mdo sde rgya mtsho yon tan sprin// smon lam mtshe las yongasu byung ba'i rgyan// kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung / 
262a8(phal chen): babasam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan/ mtshan mo ro lha baji snyed cig/ de tshe snying brtser kho mos phan bstan pa// de 'drar gyur te myos bsal zhes// kho mos pa yongasu skyes par gyur// kho mo'i smon lam de 'dra'i sems/ 
262b1(phal chen): thog ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gnas pa'i rtse// srid pa'i rgya mchos de ni nig ma gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag zigapa/ kho mos dad pa bskyed de mchod pa byas// 'khor ba'i lda dang mi dbus su
262b2(phal chen): yul gyi dga' dang bde la mngon par smon// rgyal ba'i dang po dpal gyi mtsho// de'i 'og ma yon tan sngon ma ste// rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen dpal// sangs rgyas bzhi pa namakha'i shes rab po// rgyal ba lnga pa me tog mchog
262b3(phal chen): rgyal ba drug pa chags med zla ba'i blo// rgyal ba 'od rgyal chos kyi zla// brgyad pa ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba'o// rin chen 'od 'phro ri sbron te// rgyal ba dgu pa de tshe byung bar gyur// bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs te// de
262b4(phal chen): dag kho mos dad pas mchod// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi de dbang po dam pa kun mchod de// tshul gyi rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i/ dmig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur// de 'og zhing gi mtshams sbyar ba/ 
262b5(phal chen): rin chen thams cad 'od ces bya ba byung // bskal pa lha'i dpalazhes bya// sangs rgyas lnga brgya de la byung bar gyur// thog mazla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung // gnyis pa nyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par skyes/ 
262b6(phal chen): / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas gsum// de'i 'og tu rin chen ri ba'o// me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron// me'i dpal dang lha'i ba gyi mchog/ snang ba'i rgyal po'od kyi dpal// bcu pa ye shes kun snang rgyal po'o// bcu
262b7(phal chen): bo de la sogs pa dag/ mi'i dbang po de dag kho mo yis// phung po'i gnas la dang dga' zhing // gnas med chos la gnas kyi blos mchod do// de 'og de'i mtshams sbyor ba// 'jig rten khams bzangs byung bar gyur
262b8(phal chen): pa ni// pad+mo'i sgron ma sprin gyi dpal// de tshe bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya// de la rgyal ba tshad med de// de dag 'khor dang bcas par kho mos mchod// rgyal ba de dag thams cad las// rim gro chen thos
263a1(phal chen): kho mos chos kyang thos// rgyal ba'i dbang po rin chen mi// de'i 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho ste// rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal// chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o// chos kyi rgyal mtshan
263a2(phal chen): gzungs kyi 'od// chos stobs 'od dang na mkha'i blo gros te// chos 'od ri bo spo mthon dang // de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sprin dpa'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dang / mi'i dam pa de dag kun mchod de// rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho 'dor
263a3(phal chen): zhugs pa'i// chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs// nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya// zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste// de la bskal ba zla ba'i dpal byung ngo // de la stobs bcu byung
263a4(phal chen): ba ni// bye ba brgyad cu yongasu cang bste// de dag kun la'ang mchod/ ba'i sgo// rgya mi mtha' yas yid 'ong du ma byas// thog mar byung ba dri ba'i rgyal// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas shong rgyal te// rgyal ba gsum pa/ 
263a5(phal chen): yon tan ri// de'i 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so// rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od kyi rgyan// chos kyi rgya mtsho sangs rgyasagazi brjid dpal// 'jig rten dbang po 'od bzang dpal// kun gyi tha ma/ 
263a6(phal chen): chos 'od rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs de dag thams cad mchod byas kyang // chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yi// ye shes kho mos thob par ma gyur to// de'i 'og tu zhing dag pa// rdo rje'i rang
263a7(phal chen): bzhin mi phyed gzi brjid brtan// kun tu 'od sprin ming ldan byung // rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o// de la sems can dag pa mang // nyon mongs dri mas nyon mong shin tu nyung // bskal pa rab zhi blo gro 'od/ 
263a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan// rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug/ gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga' mtshan ldan pa// rgyal ba chos dbyings gzugs brnyan dang // phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma
263b1(phal chen): gsal ba'i bdag/ rtul ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od// rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o// bde gshegs bzod 'khor sgron ma dang // brgyad po chos kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste// snang ba rgya mtshos brgyan pa
263b2(phal chen): dang / de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi'i dam pa de kun kho mos mchod// chos nyid na mkha' mnyam pa 'di// rang bzhin yongasu kun nas dag pa ste// de la gan+da shi shing gi rnams/ 
263b3(phal chen): 'byam klas kun tu spyod spyang ma ngag go/ de'i 'og tu mdangs dga' ba'i// zhing ni spos spyon sprin gyi dpal zhes bya// kun nas nyon mongs yongasu dag/ de'i bskal pa legs par byung zhes bya// rgyal babye ba de tshe byung / 
263b4(phal chen): de dag kun gyis de tshe bskal pa brgyan// mgon po de dag chos gsung ba// kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongasu bzung / rgyal ba'i dang po grangs yangs ste// chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag
263b5(phal chen): dpal gyi rgyal// chos dbang rgyal po yon tan sprin// chos gyi dpal dang lha'i cod pa no// ye shes 'od 'phro gzi brjid/ dpal// rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no// rgyal ba brgyad
263b6(phal chen): pa na mkho'i dbyangs// dashu pa kun tu 'byung ba'i sgron ma ste// de dag tha ma'i sangs rgyas ni// mdzod spu'i dpal gyi 'od kyi blo gros te// rgyal ba mi mchog de dag la// mchod pa byas kyang chags med de ma
263b7(phal chen): sbyangs// de'i 'og ma rgyan rab can// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste// 'jig rten rnam par phye ba'i mtha'// rin chen rgyal mtshan blo gros mchog/ de tshe bskal pa'i snying pa'i tshogs// de la
263b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste// rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing // rang byung de dag thams cad kho mos mchod// thog ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor// zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// nyi ma'i
264a1(phal chen): / gzi brjid dpal kyi 'dag/ mtshan gyi sprin snga dbyangs shes bya ba dang // chos dbang rgyal po yon tan bdag/ bsod nams ri rab ni ba'od kyi rgyal// bcu po de lamangs bdan/ rna
264a2(phal chen): bde dag kun kyang kho mos mchod// rgyal ba'i lam ni ngar sbyangs te// de la rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag gzhol// 'on kyang dadung rgyal ba yi// tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa ma thob bo// de 'og yid 'ong 'ong ldan// yongs
264a3(phal chen): dag pa'i 'jig rten khams byung ste// zhing dbyangs theng pa'i blo thos can// sems can nyon mongs nyung ba'i gnas yin no// bskal pa bad ning mngon dga' ste// de la sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu byung / mi mchog de dun
264a4(phal chen): chos mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi lam yang rnam par sbyangs// rtul ba'i drang po me tog 'gas// rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog/ lnga dbang gtsug bud rini chen gtso// gser gyi ri bo rin brtsegs pa dang // chos
264a5(phal chen): rgyal ma mar gyi sa/ de gsu kyi ma sa / 'acu po ma mams padang/ ldang ma ba cid pa khams / depam gyu ba 'byung ba/ smras pa ya
264a6(phal chen): ste/ banas paslong ba dpa la zhes bya// de las sa rgyas bye la khrag khrig drug/ zhiba'i rnam maca ni gnas dpal/ zhi'i smonapa sbyin rgyam pa da la// snang kyi rnam pa nga/ rnam pa tshun/ 
264a7(phal chen): mtshad ci mi'i ga'i brjid dang // chom gyi ston ma dpal gyir/ 'ong gro dpal dang gA'i snying po dpal// de dag tha mar byung ma// seng ge'i sgra sgonas mkhas pa skon pa'o// bcu ba dam sonas padang/ de na
264a8(phal chen): cha ngas ma tsha 'o chu mcha 'di la// bzo pa khams pa' par mgyur // de'on mamams gyur shing byu su pa'i da zhes bya'o// garnas pa pas me
264b1(phal chen): par brgyan// de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum cu drug/ dang po yon tan kun tu sprin// de'i 'og ma sangs rgyas na mkha'i thugs// sangs rgyas legs byung rnam brgyan dang // rgya mtsho'i chos kyi sprin sgra ldog pa'i dbyas
264b2(phal chen): rgyal 'chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang // sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mnga' dang // sangs rgyas phyogs kun gzi brjid dang // chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs byung sgra dbyangs dang // yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi ston// rgyal
264b3(phal chen): ba'i ni ma dgu pa byung bar gyur// de dag kun gyi tha ma ste// rin chen dpal smon yon tan dpal mchod do// rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal// rkang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// kho mo lha mo zla bzhin
264b4(phal chen): te/ mi'i ngam byung che mchod pa byas// rgyal ba des ni kho mo la/ mdo sde smon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i rgyan// gnas med rgyan kyang rab tu bshad// thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis bzang // kho mo
264b5(phal chen): mig yangs der thob ste// ting 'dzin ni dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang thob// sad tsag re re zhing brgyud pa'i// rgyal brgyam/ mang po'ang kho mos mthong // byams tshul kun tu snang ba'i sprin// byang chub
264b6(phal chen): sems rang mkha' dang mnyam pa ste// snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa yang // sangs rgyas stobs kyi chad du yangs par skyes// 'gro ba phyin ci log gyur te// rtag dang bde dang gtsang dang bad gzhen pa// gti mub mngongs gyur
264b7(phal chen): ma rig bsgribs// nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log par 'du shes pa// lta ba'i rnam par stug la spyod// lam gyi 'gro rgyud nyam ngar sred dbang gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs bye brag tu// las kyis rnam par bris pas kun byung ba/ 
264b8(phal chen): 'gro rgyud kun gyi shi 'bo'i sgor// skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu sbyar gyur cing // skye dang rga shi gnod pa rnams// lus dang sems kyi nyamasu myong gyur pa// mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyir// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad/ 
265a1(phal chen): // kyi/ stobs bcu gang las byung ba yi// bla na med pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed// de las smon lam sprin byung ba// 'gro bkun la bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog/ tshogs rnams 'byung ba mtha
265a2(phal chen): yas dang // lam tshul rgya mtsho rtogs pa'ang de nas byung // 'jug pa'i sprin yangs thob gyur pa// lam rgyud kun tu sgo gsal shugs ldan te// pha rol byin gyi sprin yangs pa'ang // chos dbyings 'byam klas kun tu rnam par
265a3(phal chen): 'gyed// sa gnon shugs drag yangs ldan dang // dus gsum rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis rnams la// chags pa med par spyod par gyur// skad cig gcig gis rgyal ba kun drung 'gro// gzhan yang rgyal sras kho mos ni// spyod
265a4(phal chen): pa kun tu bzang po yongasu gnon// chos dbyings bye brag bcu rnams kyi// rgya mtsho'i tshul la'ang kho mos rtogs par 'jug/ rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'khor los
265a5(phal chen): bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ba de// gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni// rigs kyi bu de ltar mi blta ste// 'jam dpal
265a6(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa ni// de'i tshe de'i dus na// rgyal po mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyud ma gcad pa la zhugs pa'o// kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan me'i lha mo de ni/ 
265a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sprul pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems// de'i ga dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo/ bu de rin po che/ bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba byung de/ gzhan zhig yin bca
265a8(phal chen): du sems na ni/ de ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus ma 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya bar gyur te/ kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mo des sad par byas nas/ sangs rgyas/ 
265b1(phal chen): blta ba la yang dag par bskul to// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems de srid cig nas bskyed de/ de ltar kho mos sems bskyed pa de'i mthus/ bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
265b2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du/ nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la rten cing / thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang ldan par gyur to// tha mar
265b3(phal chen): mas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi sgrol yon tan rgyal mtshan mthong ba tsam gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'ing snga
265b4(phal chen): ba shin tu langs shing / dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi mtshan zhes bya ba 'di thob ste/ de thob pas kho mo sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du rnam pa 'di lta bus sta gon du gnas pa yin no// rig
265b5(phal chen): kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba rgya chen po'i shugs kyi mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
265b6(phal chen): kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'khor cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa/ 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam
265b7(phal chen): chen po rgya mtshos 'jug pa rab tu thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi kyi tshul la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ spyod pa re re la yang las
265b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ lus re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa la mkhas pa/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshul rgya mtsho
266a1(phal chen): re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rnam par dmigs pa'i spyod pa yongasu ston pa la mkhas pa/ zhing thams cad du'ang zhing gi rdul shin
266a2(phal chen): tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
266a3(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gsheg pa re re'i sngon gyi mtha'i bskal pa la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshogs yongasu bsgrub pa/ yang dag par bsdus pa la 'jug par
266a4(phal chen): mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos kyi 'khor los shin tu yangs pa yang dag par blangs pa dang / yongasasu gzung ba la mkhas pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phru
266a5(phal chen): ba'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par mkhas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon// tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs/ pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nying na
266a6(phal chen): kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
266a7(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongasu sbyang bar bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rkang pa gnyis
266a8(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba rnam par snang ba la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i drung nas so/ 
266b1(phal chen): 'phags pa sangs rgyas pa la po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po brgya tham da/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs// mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par/ 
266b2(phal chen): snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing / dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / shes
266b3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / yid ches par bya ba dang / rab tu gzhol bar bya ba dang / rgyas par dgang ba dang / rje su shes par bya ba dang / rjesu dran par bya ba dang / rje su gzhol bar bya ba dang / bsgom pa byed cing / dge ba'i
266b4(phal chen): ba shes bya nyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang / gdams ngag rjes bstan pa la bar chad med par bya ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo'i lha mo/ rab tu dga' ba mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas 'gro
266b5(phal chen): kar btams pa rje su dran 'byed cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i rjesu sems dpa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba thob par bya ba la yang dag par spyod pa phyogs
266b6(phal chen): kun tu mngon par bltas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar yid la bya ba nga rgyal thams cad dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i mthu tshogs chen po yongasu bsgrub par zhe non
266b7(phal chen): ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa mi phyed pas zhugs pa/ dge ba'i
266b8(phal chen): ba ges gnyen la brtan pa yongasu 'phel bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po rgya mtsho yongs skyes pa/ bskal pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas
267a1(phal chen): gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu myong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung du song ngo // de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun
267a2(phal chen): tu skyod pa'i gzi brjid dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon tu gyur pas/ 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba yongasasu bstan pa'i phyir/ mtshar ba
267a3(phal chen): dpe byad bzang pos yongasu grub pa'i lus bstan te/ mdzod spu nas 'od gzer ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa'i mdasangs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'od gzer gyi mtha' dang dpung med pa dang ldan par bkye'o// des
267a4(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor 'dug ste lus thams cad du khyab par gyur to// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'od gzer des reg par gyur ma thag tu de nyid kyi mong la
267a5(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin shin tu rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor/ thob par gyur to// de thob pas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga'/ ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba dang / mtshan me'i lha mo sems can kun
267a6(phal chen): tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gnyis kyi kyi bar gyi lam na sa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa de la me'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i rdul shin tu the ba 'am/ sa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rdo rje'i rdul shin tu za ba'am/ nor bu rin po/ 
267a7(phal chen): tshe'i rgyal po nam pa sna tshogs kyi rdul shin tu phraba'am/ me tog dang / spos dang / bye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rgyan thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig yod pa'i
267a8(phal chen): rdul shin tu za ba de dag thams cad la tha mo re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed/ chu'i phung po dang bcas/ me'i phung po dang bcas/ rlung gi phung po dang chagasa'i phung po dang bcas/ 'jig
267b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi mtshams dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ rten dang bcas pa dbyings sna tshogs can/ sa gni rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ ri'i 'khor sna tshogs can/ chu rlung dang / mtsho sna tshogs kyis brtan pa
267b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor ba/ lha rdzas kyis khyim sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ shing sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi rgyan sna tshogs can/ lha'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa klu'i
267b3(phal chen): grong khyer gyi khyim rgyan dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ dri za'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ lha ma yin gyi gro khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ na mkha' lding gi grong khyer gyi
267b4(phal chen): khyim gyi brgyan dang bcas pa/ mi'am tsi 'grong khyer gyi khyim dkyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi da rgyan dang bcas pa/ mi'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ phyogs
267b5(phal chen): dang phyogs mtshams thams cad na rnam par gnas pa'i sem/ can thams cad kyi grong khyer gyi gnas dang / sems can dmyasaba'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi yul dang / 
267b6(phal chen): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi shi 'bo dang skye ba'i yul dang bcas pa/ skye bsna tshogs kyis ma 'dres pa'i rgyud mtha' las pa'i bya brag la yong su gzhol ba rnams 'du'i 'jig 'gyur ba
267b7(phal chen): mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams la la ni kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo // la la ni yong su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni shin tu kun nas nyon mongs par mthong // / 
267b8(phal chen): la la ni lam gyi rgyud yongasu dag pa mthong ngo // la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la yongasu dag par mthong ngo // la la ni rnam par dag pa kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo // la la ni shin tu long su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni gni
268a1(phal chen): mnyam par mthong ngo po// la la ni sbyi tshugs su gnas par mthong ngo // ya la ni spel zhir 'dug par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gyi lam gyi rlud dang / sems can gyi skye gnas
268a2(phal chen): thams cad na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyongs pa'i gzi brjid dpal/ sems can so so nas 'dul ba'i rkyen bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la ma 'dres par yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la
268a3(phal chen): mngon tu gyur par gnas par mthong ngo // sems can tshe'i tshad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / mos pa'i spyod yul rnam pa sna tshogs can dang / lus rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / ngag rnam par phye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig
268a4(phal chen): gi 'du byed kyi tha snyad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / dbang gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad la ma 'dres par
268a5(phal chen): mngon sum du gnas pa mthong ngo // de yang 'di lta ste/ sem/ sa can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnam/ sa kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa rnam par zlog pa dang/ 
268a6(phal chen): byol song gi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba'i 'jigs pa rnams par bzlog pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi drung du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi
268a7(phal chen): bkres pa dang / skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / klu'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi klu'i sdug bsngal dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rnam
268a8(phal chen): par rlob dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pagi khams kyi sdug bsngas dang / 'jigs pa rnam par brlog pa dang / me'i 'o garten gyi las gyi rlung ngu rtogs pa'i sems
268b1(phal chen): can rnams kyi mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod pa'i mun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa la
268b2(phal chen): mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi grags pa ma yin pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'khor gyi 'jigs par lhung ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor tu bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa
268b3(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'chi bas 'jigs shing spangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi g.yang sas 'jigs shing sngangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi g.yang
268b4(phal chen): sas 'jigs rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'tsho ba med pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs shing / 
268b5(phal chen): bas tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zos kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi/ byang chub kyi
268b6(phal chen): sems nyams kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sdig ti 'grogs po dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
268b7(phal chen): gnyen dang bral gyis dogs shing / bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung gis 'jigs shing bag tshe ba'i
268b8(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i gnas sna con
269a1(phal chen): kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sems can sbal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad pa'i 'jigs
269a2(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dus mi bzad par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag cha ba rnams kyi dus mi bzad par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / rigs ngan par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi
269a3(phal chen): rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sdig to'i las byas kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sdig to'i las byed pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas
269a4(phal chen): 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang / 'ching bas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams 'du shes kyi rnam pasna
269a5(phal chen): tshogs kyi gnas dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par ba/ zlog pa dang / sems can thams cad la so sor mngon tu gyur par gnas pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ stong las skyes pa'i sem
269a6(phal chen): can dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin// 
269a7(phal chen): 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin pa'i sems can thams cad yongasu bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyi stobs mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs drag po dang / rnam par gnon pa shin tu
269a8(phal chen): yangs pa'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po stobs dang mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ snying rje chen po che/ 
269b1(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho'i shugs drag po shin tu skyes pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i byams pa chen pos rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yongasu bsgrubs pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs
269b2(phal chen): rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i ye shes rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems drapa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang
269b3(phal chen): ldan pas zhing thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa gnas par mthong ngo // chos thams cad kyi rgyus shes par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba la mngon
269b4(phal chen): du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa/ yongasasu gzung ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa la mngon du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
269b5(phal chen): thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems la sgrib pa med par mdzen du gyur par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu
269b6(phal chen): smin par bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos rnam par bzlog pa la mngon du
269b7(phal chen): gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba la mngon du gyur cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba yongasasu bskyed pa'i don du gnas mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
269b8(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan me'i lha mo sems can kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i khru mchog gi mthu byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten thams cas mngon
270a1(phal chen): bar gnas shing / 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu mthong nas rab tu dper bsgres te/ sbron tshernam cha zigs drag po rgya mtsho rab tu thob nas/ mtshan mo'i sum
270a2(phal chen): sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas nas ngor gyen tu blta so// de nas mtshan me'i lha mo sems can kun skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i
270a3(phal chen): gzugs dang / mtshan rnam par dag pa de mi snang bar byas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo'i gzugs su byas nas/ rnam par 'phrul pa thams cid 'byin cing 'dun par gnas so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
270a4(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can tu sbyong pa'i gzi brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ de'i tshetshig su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// khyod kyi sku yangs mtshan rab rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu bzang zhing mdzes pa
270a5(phal chen): bdag gis mthong // namakha' skar mi'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhin// dpe byang bzang pos rnam par bris pa mthong / 'od kyi/ 'khor can sru bzang dam pa'i mchog/ mtha' las ning gi rdul khams mang
270a6(phal chen): po sted// kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa'i dpe tshul du// phyogs rnam sa kun gyi dbyings su khyab par gang // 'od gzer dra ba mang po 'gro se mos mnyam// khyod ni baspu'i sgo nas 'gyed pa mdzad// 'od gzer sgo la bad+mo
270a7(phal chen): yid 'ong gnas// khyod kyi sprul pa 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// spos kyin bun sprin du chags pa 'gyed// 'gro ba'i gzugs su gnas te kun nas mdzes// me tog sgo rnams kun nas dgyed mdzad pas/ 
270a8(phal chen): chos dbyings bzhugs pa'i rgyal bkum tu khyab// khyod kyi phrag pa'i rgyun langs 'dag ni// rin chen 'od 'bra po rab 'dra// dri med ni 'gro ba kun tu gsal// gti mug sun da rnam par brlog pa mdzad/ 
270b1(phal chen): khyod kyi dri med pan la mdag bzang polas/ nabu smin da nyi ma yangs 'brung khyod kyi ma'i 'khor 'dra'o ba rang ba/ rnam par snang mdzad spyod sum yangs bri 'byin// khyod kyi spyan nas bla skar 'od 'byung ba/ rtag tu
270b2(phal chen): dri med sprin ltar mang ba ste// de dag phyogs bcur bkang zhing 'gro ba rnams// rab tu snang byed 'jig rten rab rib sel// khyod kyi mtshan las 'gro ba'i lus mnyam pa'i// sprul pa rgya mtsho phyogs su khyab par 'gro// de da// 
270b3(phal chen): chos dbyings yang bar rgyas 'gengs shing // sems can tshad med tshogs rnams yongasu 'dul// khyod kyi sku ni 'byam klas phyogs su snang // 'gro ba kun la mngon gyur dga' ba skye ba// rgyal po me dang rkun po chus bskyed pa'i// 
270b4(phal chen): 'jig pa thams cad rnam sel zhi bar mdzad// gang tshe khyod kyi da spyan sngar bdag btang nas// yon tan rnam par sems shing nyer dbyin pa// de tshe'o gcer dri med 'khor babang po// khyod kyi zhal gyi smin ma
270b5(phal chen): gseb nas 'thon// phyogs rnams rgya mtsho rgya mang snang mdzan nas// 'jig rten snang ba rgya che yongs bskyed de// rnam 'phrul rnamapa mang po rnams bstan nas// de tshe bdag gi lus kyi gseb du zha// gang tshe 'od
270b6(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bdag reg pa// de tshe bde ba rmad byung yangs pa myong // gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin brgya mang yongasu non// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag yas mthong bar gyur// gom pa rnam por gyen tu bteg pa la'ang // rdul phran/ 
270b7(phal chen): grangs snyed tshul ni bdag gis rig/ rdul phran shin tu phra ba gcig la yang // zhing gi rdul snyeng zhing rnams mthong bar gyur// rdul la gnas kyang rnam pa tha dgu ste// zhing mang brgya ni shin tu nyon yang mongs// de'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal
270b8(phal chen): nyam su myong // mongar ngagyi smre sngags yang su 'don// ning mngal la kun nas nyon mongs dang / de ni sdug bsngal mang zhing bde ba chupa / rgyal ba thugs rje can yang der skye ste// rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin mo// zhing nu/ 
271a1(phal chen): la la yongs dngartson mongs ste// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang mang pos brgyan// skyes pa bud med yongs brgyan blta na sdug/ skyon med rgyal ba'i gdung yang rgyun mi 'chang // zhing rnams
271a2(phal chen): mtsho yangs shing dri med pa// rdul la gnas shing mnyam pa'i gzhi dang ldan// de dag bskal pa brgya mang sngon gyi tshe// rnar snang 'dzad spyod mdzad yongs sbyangs// zhing rnams 'byam rdzas kun na rgyal ba dag/ shing dbang dam pa'i drung
271a3(phal chen): du gshegs pa ston// rnam par 'phrul zhing byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing 'dul ba ston// rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa la// khyod kyang kun tu rje su bzhud par mthong // mchod pa stong phrag char
271a4(phal chen): med khrag khrig gis// rgyal ba kun la mngon par mchod mdzad mthong // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// tshigs su bcad pa dang ga smras nas// mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu sbyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la 'di
271a5(phal chen): skad ces smras so// lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar/ ba de// de lta bur zab pa ni ngo mtshar chem// rnam par thar pa de'i/ ming ni ci zhes bkye// de khyod kyis brnyes nas yun ni ji srid cig lags/ 
271a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na rnam par thar pa de yongasu dag par 'gyur// smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas/ 
271a7(phal chen): yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ 'di ni byang chub sems sa dpa' snying rje chen po lhur len pa/ 'gro/ 
271a8(phal chen): ba thams cad yongasu bskyab pa la zhugs pa/ mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa bla na med par bya ba la
271b1(phal chen): zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi nang thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mig cad pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongasu bzung ba la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad du byang chub
271b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad la bsgrib pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba rnam par sbyang ba la zhugs pa/ skad cig re re zhing dus gsum gyi tshul
271b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad du ye shes snang bas rnam par gnas parab tu thob pa rnams kyi yul te/ 'od kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma
271b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig gi pha rol tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya bar/ bskal ba rdug nga dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba byung ste/ bskal pa de la sangs rgyas ri rag
271b5(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de ni rI hU~M rje thams cad kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ rdo rje las byas pa'i gzhal med
271b6(phal chen): khang dang / gnas kyis yong su mdzes par byas pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i gzhin rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgya mtsho las blangs pa ste/ lhun dang lus ni nor bu rin po che spos thams cad kyi rgyal po las
271b7(phal chen): gyur pa'o// de ni dbyibs kun tu zlum pa ste/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ lhab lhub thams cad kyi sprin gyi bla res kun nas khyab pa rin po che'i khor yug rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rim pa stong gis yongasu
271b8(phal chen): bskor ba/ gling bzhi pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis shin tu brgyan par brgyan pa ste/ de la glang bzhi pa la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/ sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so// 
272a1(phal chen): la la ni kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa ste/ sems can las 'dren ma dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so// la la ni rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/ sems can yongs su
272a2(phal chen): dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyongs pa kha na ma tho ba thub rnams kyi gnas so// la la ni shin tu yongasu dag pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyi gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang
272a3(phal chen): mdzag zi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na/ gling bzhi pa rin po che me tog sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ marmos ma skyes pa'i 'bras la yongasu spyod
272a4(phal chen): pa sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas dang gzhal med khang la yongasu spyod pa/ 'khor kun nas yid bzhin gyi shing gis 'khor ba/ spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyi
272a5(phal chen): lhun las spos kyi sprin rgyun mi mchad par 'byung ba/ 'phreng ba/ sna tshogs kyi shing las 'brang ba'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung / ba/ me tog sna tshogs kyi shing las me tog kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi
272a6(phal chen): khyab pa'i sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa/ phyi ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi shing gi lhun las spos rin po che'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi bye ma'i char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab/ rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las/ rin po che'i 'brumang
272a7(phal chen): po 'brul ba'i kha dog snang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing las sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rlung gis bskyod cing nam mkha'i dbyings las sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/ nyin mtshan gyi bde ba
272a8(phal chen): nyi ma dang zla bas dbyung ba nor bu rin po mi kun tu snang bas gamisas pa'i sa rab tu mnyam par gyur pa ste/ gling bzhi pa deng rgyal po pho thang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i 'a brang de dag re re zhing la/ 
272b1(phal chen): mu zung stong gis yongasu bskor ba'o// mub+hang dad ga thams cad kyang b+ha rdzas kyi me rtogasi lams gang po'o// sgra zas kyi ros mo dang 'i sgra gang sra cing 'ang du ba btsun pa'o// rlung tha ma chen po na'i shing ming dzungs
272b2(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa'i gru phan tshun du rgyu ba'o// bde ba sna tshogs ci dga' bar yongasu spyad du yod pa'o// chu klung gi mtshams kyi gzhi re re dag na yang grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig
272b3(phal chen): brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas gnas pa ste/ grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi 'khor gyis yongasu bskor ba'o// grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi
272b4(phal chen): bza' shing gi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi 'khor gyis yongasu bskor ba'o// gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na/ rgyal po'i pho brang dbu ma rin po che'i me tog smon
272b5(phal chen): ma zhes bya ba yod par gyur te de ni skyid cing longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la rtag tu lo legs shing bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'o// lha dang mi mang pos yongasu gang ba'o// sems
272b6(phal chen): can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma zhes bya ba de na/ rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin po chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug pud snying po shes bya
272b7(phal chen): ba 'khor los bsgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba/ pad+mo'i snying po la rdzus te byung ba/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan pa gnas par
